T03TD3787E:14a-0: @14a * // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i tshul gyi mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa bzhugs //
T03TD3787E:14b-1: panytsa bim sha ti s'a hasvi ka a'arya pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a pa de sh'a aa bhi sa ma ya aa lam k'a ra sh'astra s+ya britti /
T03TD3787E:14b-3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol ru phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa /
T03TD3787E:14b-4: bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03TD3787E:14b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03TD3787E:14b-6: nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang ;
T03TD3787E:14b-7: /'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang //
T03TD3787E:14b-8: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsungs pa //
T03TD3787E:14b-9: nyan thos nang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum de la phyag 'tshal /
T03TD3787E:14b-11: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dbang du mdzad nas thams cad mkhyen pa rnam pa gsum gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan nye bar dgod pa sngon du 'gro bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03TD3787E:14b-12: zhes brjod pa 'di ni de'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi man ngag bshad sbyar du bya'o snyam pas rnam par dgrol bar bya'o //
T03TD3787E:14b-13: zhes mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi bshad pa 'di sbyar bar dam bca' ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:14b-15: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam //
T03TD3787E:14b-16: ston pas 'di rnams bshad pa gang //
T03TD3787E:14b-17: gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin de //
T03TD3787E:14b-18: chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi //
T03TD3787E:14b-19: mdo don dran pa la gzhag nas //
T03TD3787E:14b-20: blo dang ldan pas mthong gyur phyir //
T03TD3787E:14b-21: bde blag tu ni rtogs pa zhes //
T03TD3787E:14b-22: bya ba brtsam pa'i dgos pa yin //
T03TD3787E:14b-23: zhes de ltar phyag 'tshal ba nye bar bkod pa'i tshigs su bcad pas yang dag par mtshon pa'i don 'di yod pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:14b-25: ci mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan rtogs pa'i rgyan 'di gzhi bsdus pas sam /
T03TD3787E:14b-26: 'on te gnyen po bsdus pas sam /
T03TD3787E:15a-0: de ste rnam pa bsdus pas rgyan du byed pa yin zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya @15a * //
T03TD3787E:15a-3: phyogs dang po ltar na ni 'bad pa don med pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:15a-4: mdo sde 'di las mtshan nyid kyi bstan bcos dag las mi smos pa'i gzhi gang yin pa de bshad pa ni med do //
T03TD3787E:15a-5: gnyis pa ltar na rnam par byang pa'i dngos po bsdus pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dngos po ma bsdus pas 'di gang gi gnyen po yin pa rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:15a-6: gsum pa ltar na yang rnam pa gzhi med pa tsam zhig bsdus pa'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:15a-7: don rtogs pa med pas cung zad kyang ma bshad pa yin no zhe na /
T03TD3787E:15a-8: phyogs gsum car gyis kyang bsdus pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:15a-9: zhes gsungs pa yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03TD3787E:15a-13: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin thams cad shes pa nyid pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:15a-15: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis mngon par rtogs pa mtha' dag bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:15a-16: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no //
T03TD3787E:15a-17: lam shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin no //
T03TD3787E:15a-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no //
T03TD3787E:15a-19: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thams cad 'tshal ba nyid nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags /
T03TD3787E:15a-20: rab 'byor thams cad ni phyi dang nang gi chos rnams ji snyed pa 'di tsam yin la de dag nyan thos dang /
T03TD3787E:15a-21: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes kyi /
T03TD3787E:15a-22: lam thams cad kyis kyang ma yin la /
T03TD3787E:15a-23: rnam pa thams cad du'ang ma yin pas de'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya'o //
T03TD3787E:15a-24: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa 'tshal ba nyid byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lags /
T03TD3787E:15a-25: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni nyan thos kyi lam gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:15a-26: rang sangs rgyas kyi la gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:15b-0: sangs rgyas kyi lam @15b gang yin pa'i lam thams cad bskyed par bya zhing lam thams cad shes par bya la de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing de dag gis lam gyi bya ba yang ste /
T03TD3787E:15b-1: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:15b-2: sems can rnam yongs su smin par ma byas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:15b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs par de dag gis yang dag gis yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o //
T03TD3787E:15b-4: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o //
T03TD3787E:15b-5: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags /
T03TD3787E:15b-6: rab 'byor rnam pa gang dag dang /
T03TD3787E:15b-8: mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnam par rab tu mtshon pa'i rnam pa de dag dang /
T03TD3787E:15b-10: mtshan ma ded dag de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o //
T03TD3787E:15b-12: de la thams cad shes pa nyid ni chos la 'bad pa'i rten can /
T03TD3787E:15b-13: 'bras bu bdag tu rmongs pa spangs pa can yin no //
T03TD3787E:15b-14: lam shes pa nyid ni theg pa ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3787E:15b-15: de kho na nyid mngon du mi byed pa'i rten can /
T03TD3787E:15b-16: sems can ma bsdus pa sdud pa dang /
T03TD3787E:15b-17: sems can yongs su ma smin pa yongs su smin par byed pa dang ;
T03TD3787E:15b-18: sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par grol bar byed pa'i 'bras bu can yin no//
T03TD3787E:15b-19: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs par sems can gyi don rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:15b-20: yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:15b-21: bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa'i 'bras bu can yin no //
T03TD3787E:15b-22: de lta bas na mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ni gzhi dang gnyen po dang rnam pa rnams bsdus pas mngon par rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa mtha' dag bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:15b-23: zhes bya ba 'di 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:16a-1: pha rol tu phyin pa de gang yin zhes bya ba 'di ni brjod par bya'o zhe na /
T03TD3787E:16a-3: shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni //
T03TD3787E:16a-4: dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad //
T03TD3787E:16a-5: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
T03TD3787E:16a-6: de nas thams cad shes pa nyid //
T03TD3787E:16a-7: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-8: rtse mor phyin dang mthar gyis pa //
T03TD3787E:16a-9: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
T03TD3787E:16a-10: chos kyi sku dang de rnams brgyad //
T03TD3787E:16a-11: sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-12: nges 'byang yan lag rnam bzhi dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-13: sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa //
T03TD3787E:16a-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-15: dmigs pa dag dang ched dang ni //
T03TD3787E:16a-16: go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-17: tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams //
T03TD3787E:16a-18: thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid //
T03TD3787E:16a-19: mog mog por byed la sogs dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-20: slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang//
T03TD3787E:16a-21: 'di dang gzhan pa'i yon tan gyis //
T03TD3787E:16a-22: phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam //
T03TD3787E:16a-23: byed pa dang ni mos pa dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-24: bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-25: bsngo dang rjes su yi rang ba //
T03TD3787E:16a-26: yid la byed pa bla med dag / sgrub dang shin tu dag pa zhes //
T03TD3787E:16a-27: bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam //
T03TD3787E:16a-28: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyis //
T03TD3787E:16a-29: lam shes nyid ni de 'drar bshad //
T03TD3787E:16a-30: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
T03TD3787E:16a-31: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-32: thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-33: thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid //
T03TD3787E:16a-34: mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-35: sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-36: nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i lam //
T03TD3787E:16a-38: rnam pa sbyor bar bcas rnams dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-39: yon tan skyon ni mtshan nyid bcas //
T03TD3787E:16a-40: thar dang nges 'byed cha mthun dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-41: slob ba phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs //
T03TD3787E:16a-42: srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-43: zhing dag bla na med pa ni //
T03TD3787E:16a-44: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa ste //
T03TD3787E:16a-45: 'di ni thabs mkhas bcas pa yin //
T03TD3787E:16a-46: de yi rtags dang rnam 'phel dang //
T03TD3787E:16a-47: brtan dang sems kun gnas pa dang //
T03TD3787E:16b-0: mthong zhes bya dang sgom @16b ba zhes //
T03TD3787E:16b-1: bya ba'i lam ni so so la //
T03TD3787E:16b-2: rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi //
T03TD3787E:16b-3: gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
T03TD3787E:16b-4: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03TD3787E:16b-5: log par sgrub dang bcas pa ni //
T03TD3787E:16b-6: rtse mo'i mngon rtogs mthar gyis pa //
T03TD3787E:16b-7: rnam gsum rnam bcu skad cig ma //
T03TD3787E:16b-8: gcig gis mngon rdzogs byang chub pa //
T03TD3787E:16b-9: mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi //
T03TD3787E:16b-10: ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang //
T03TD3787E:16b-11: de bzhin gzhan pa sprul pa ni //
T03TD3787E:16b-12: chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa //
T03TD3787E:16b-13: rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod //
T03TD3787E:16b-15: tshig le'ur byas pa bco lngas mdor bsdus pa dang rgyas par bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus par rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:16b-17: shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni //
T03TD3787E:16b-18: dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad //
T03TD3787E:16b-20: chos kyi sku dang de rnams brgyad //
T03TD3787E:16b-21: ces bya ba'i bar gyi tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis po 'di dag gis ni mdor bsdus pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:16b-22: de la dngos po brgyad ni 'di yin no //
T03TD3787E:16b-24: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:16b-26: thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:16b-27: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:16b-28: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:16b-29: mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:16b-30: sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:16b-34: nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang //
T03TD3787E:16b-35: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:16b-36: chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa //
T03TD3787E:16b-37: rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod //
T03TD3787E:16b-38: ces bya ba'i bar gyi tshig le'ur byas pa bcu gsum gyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa don brgyad po de rnams kyi dngos po bsdus te bstan pas rgyas par bshad pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:16b-39: de ltar na mdor bsdus pa dang rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir legs par bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:16b-40: don gyi lus rnam par bzhag pa brjod zin to //
T03TD3787E:17a-0: 'di phan chad ni don gang la khyad par can gyi rnam pa gang gi rab tu dbye ba'i chos gang dag bstan pa de @17a * //
T03TD3787E:17a-1: dag gi go rims bsdu ba 'ba' zhig brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:17a-2: de la re zhig / sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir //
T03TD3787E:17a-3: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod //
T03TD3787E:17a-4: 'on te 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:17a-6: byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o zhes mdo nas bshad pa gang dag yin pa 'di yin no //
T03TD3787E:17a-7: 'di mtshan nyid ci yin zhes bya ba de nyid mi shes te don de gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:17a-8: 'di ni stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa 'di nyid las don du gnyer pa yin no zhes gsungs te 'di ltar sems bskyed pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub par bya'o zhes de ltar don du gnyer bar byed pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:17a-9: 'o na ni de sems bskyed par mi 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:17a-10: sems ni yul so sor rig pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la /
T03TD3787E:17a-11: don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba ni sred pa yin pas so zhe na de ni de ltar bden mod kyi 'on kyang dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'i mtshan nyid don du gnyer ba yod na sangs rgyas nyid kyi don du sems skyed par byed pas na 'dir rgyu 'bras bus bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:17a-12: de ltar na 'dun cing don du gnyer ba'i dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad ces bya ba rjes su mthun par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:17a-13: yang na don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba ni smon lam yin no //
T03TD3787E:17a-14: sems bskyed pa'i gnas skabs ni don du gnyer ba gtsor gyur pa yin pas na de dag lhan cig spyod pa'i sems bskyed pa la don du gnyer ba bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:17a-15: de lta na yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'thad par 'gyur ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:17a-16: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang gzhan gyi don de yang gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:17a-17: de dang de ni mdo bzhin du //
T03TD3787E:17a-18: bsdus dang rgyas pa'i sgo nas brjod //
T03TD3787E:17a-20: de dang zhes bya ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang de ni zhes bya ba gzhan gyi don to //
T03TD3787E:17b-0: @17b de la de'i bsdus te bstan pa 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:17b-1: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:17b-2: de la de'i rgyas par bstan pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:17b-3: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
T03TD3787E:17b-6: len pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir yongs su btang ba med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:17b-7: de la gzhan gyi don gyis bsdus te bstan pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:17b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyogs bcu re re zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang zhig yod pa de dag thams cad phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:17b-9: de la de'i rgyas par bstan pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:17b-10: sems can ser sna can rnams ni sbyin pa la /
T03TD3787E:17b-11: tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams ni tshul khrims la rab tu dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:17b-12: de ltar sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang ched du bya ba dang bcas pa brjod nas /
T03TD3787E:17b-13: da ni de'i rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi dbang du mdzad pa ni /
T03TD3787E:17b-14: de yang sa gser zla ba me //
T03TD3787E:17b-15: gter dang rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho //
T03TD3787E:17b-16: rdo rje ri sman bshes gnyen dang //
T03TD3787E:17b-17: yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma glu //
T03TD3787E:17b-18: rgyal po mdzod dang lam po che //
T03TD3787E:17b-19: bzhon pa bkod ma'i chu dang ni //
T03TD3787E:17b-20: sgra bsnyen chu bo sprin rnams kyis //
T03TD3787E:17b-21: rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
T03TD3787E:17b-22: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:18a-0: @18a * // de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa dang po 'dun pa dang ldan pa ni sa lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:18a-1: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:18a-2: chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang de'i tshogs bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:18a-3: gnyis pa bsam pa dang ldan pa ni gser bzang po lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:18a-4: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas pa med pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te /
T03TD3787E:18a-5: sbyin pa dang gtong ba dang yongs su len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:18a-6: yongs su btang ba med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:18a-7: de bzhin du chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:18a-8: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis bsdu ba'i phan pa dang bde ba'i bsam pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du gnas pas na bsam pa yin pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa dang 'di la rnam par 'gyur ba mi bsten pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:18a-9: gsum pa lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa ni yar ngo'i zla ba tshes pa lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:18a-10: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:18a-11: mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dgu bsgom par bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3787E:18a-12: skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad bsgom par bya ba'i par dang /
T03TD3787E:18a-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:18a-14: dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur bar bsam pa lhag pa yin pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya bas so //
T03TD3787E:18a-15: bzhi pa sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni me lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:18b-0: @18b thams cad shes pa nyid la shes pa dang mthong bas bltas nas 'da' bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:18b-1: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:18b-2: lam shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:18b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi sbyor ba ni mchog tu gyur pa'i sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba yin pas na bud shing gi khyad par gyis me bzhin du gong nas gong du khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:18b-4: lnga pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni gter chen po lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:18b-5: sems can ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la 'jog par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:18b-6: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa rnams sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:18b-7: zang zing gi longs spyod kyis sems can tshad med pa tshim par byed kyang yongs su gtugs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:18b-8: drug pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:18b-9: tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshul khrims la 'jog par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:18b-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims rnams rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:18b-12: yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa thams cad ni de las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:18b-13: bdun pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:18b-14: gnod sems dang ldan pa rnams bzod pa la 'jog par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:19a-0: rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs @19a * //
T03TD3787E:19a-2: mi 'dod pa thog tu babs pa thams cad kyis 'khrug par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:19a-3: brgyad pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rdo rje lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:19a-4: le lo can dag brtson 'grus la 'jog par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:19a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:19a-7: de ni yid brtan pas mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:19a-8: dgu pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni ri'i rgyal po lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:19a-9: sems rnam par g-yengs pa rnams bsam gtan la 'jog bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:19a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:19a-12: de ni dmigs pa'i rnam par g-yeng bas mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:19a-13: bcu pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni sman lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:19a-14: sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams shes rab la rab tu 'jog par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:19a-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab rnams rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:19a-17: de ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:19a-18: bcu gcig pa thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:19a-19: dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pas mi zad par byed par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:19a-20: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal bzod par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:19b-0: bskal @19b pa brgya stong du yang dag par bsags pa'i tshul khrims kyang sems can la ltos nas 'dor bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:19b-1: sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:19b-2: de ni gnas skabs thams cad du sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:19b-3: 'dir kha cig na re bden pa dang gtong ba dang shes rab nye bar zhi ba la brten pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3787E:19b-4: gzhan dag ni mthong ba'i lam gyis bsdus pas la 'jug pa'i sems yin te /
T03TD3787E:19b-5: 'di ltar mdo las gang gi tshe sems bskyed pa dang lhan cig skyes pa na byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin no zhes gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T03TD3787E:19b-6: gzhan dag ni da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du phyogs par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang snying rje chen po gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes 'dod do //
T03TD3787E:19b-7: la la dag ni sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab pa la bya bar 'dod do //
T03TD3787E:19b-8: kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bya'o zhes zer ro //
T03TD3787E:19b-9: gzhan ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:19b-10: yab ni thabs mkhas pa yin pas /
T03TD3787E:19b-11: de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes 'dod do //
T03TD3787E:19b-12: bcu gnyis pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:19b-13: sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:19b-14: phyogs bcu re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par chos ston pas go bar byed par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:19b-15: sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:19b-16: de ni ji ltar smon pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:19b-17: bcu gsum pa stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni nyi ma lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:19b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:20a-0: @20a * // de ni gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:20a-1: bcu bzhi pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa sgra dbyangs snyan pa lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:20a-2: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi tshad shes par 'dod pa dang ;
T03TD3787E:20a-3: de bzhin du sbyin pa 'di ltar byin pa ni 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:20a-4: sbyin pa 'di ltar byin pas ni rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu la sogs par skye ba nas /
T03TD3787E:20a-5: de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:20a-6: de ni gdul bya 'dun par byed pa'i ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:20a-7: de la s'a la chen po zhes bya ba ni mngon par mtshon par bya ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:20a-8: bco lnga pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa ni rgyal po lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:20a-9: sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu re rer 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20a-10: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu'i phung po chen po de thams cad lan brgyar skra'i rtse mos thams cad gtor bar 'dod cing yang de na gnas pa'i srog chags rnams la mi gnod par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20a-11: bskal pa sreg pa'i me la kha'i dbugs gcig gis zhi bar bya bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20a-12: rnam par 'thor ba chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor sor mo gcig gi rtse mos yongs su khebs par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20a-13: nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa de thams cad skyi la mo krung gcig gis rgyas par yang dag par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20a-14: ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sogs pa'i ri rnams skra nyag ma gcig gis sbams te gyen du bteg nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med par 'phang bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20a-15: phyogs bcu re re'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha'i mig gis lta bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20b-0: de rnams las kyang chos bstan pa @20b lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20b-1: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20b-2: de rnams kyi 'ang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20b-3: zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa sgrub par 'dod cing yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du me byed par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:20b-4: de ni mthu thogs pa med par gzhan gyi don sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:20b-5: ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sogs pa skra nyag ma gcig gis bcings te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par 'phen pa la ni ma dad par mi bya ste /
T03TD3787E:20b-6: bsam gtan pa rnams kyi dbang 'byor pa ston pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:20b-7: bcu drug pa bsod nams dang ye shes dang ldan pa ni bang mdzod lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:20b-8: sangs rgyas tshad med pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bsod snyoms gcig gis khyed par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20b-9: bden pa mthong ba rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas /
T03TD3787E:20b-10: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la 'jog par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:20b-11: de ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mang po'i bang mdzod lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:20b-12: bcu bdun pa byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni lam po che lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:20b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20b-15: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad rjes su 'thob par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:20b-16: chos 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:20b-17: de ni 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:20b-18: bco brgyad pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang ldan pa ni bzhon pa lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:20b-19: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad @21a * //
T03TD3787E:21a-1: kyi nang gi 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dong ba dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'thob par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-3: yon tan rnam par sbyar bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-6: bsgom pa las byung ba'i bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-7: bkur sti dang rdzas las byung ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la sems can rnams dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:21a-8: de ni zung du 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang du 'ang mi ltung bas bde blag tu khyer bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:21a-9: de la nang gi 'khor zhes bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang bar 'jug pa'i ye shes phra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes la rjes su zhugs par gyur pa'o //
T03TD3787E:21a-10: bcu dgu pa gzungs dang spobs pa dang ldan pa ni bkod ma'i chu lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:21a-11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang gsung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:21a-12: mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang lung bstan pa nas /
T03TD3787E:21a-13: shin tu rgyas pa dang rmad du byung ba'i bar gang cung zad bstan pa de thams cad thos par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-15: yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-16: de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-17: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3787E:21a-18: de ni chu 'dzin pa dang mi zad par 'byin pa dang chos mthun par thos pa dang ma thos pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-19: bstan pa mthar thug pa med pa 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:21a-20: nyi shu pa chos kyi dga' ston dang ldan pa ni sgra snyan pa lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:21a-21: phyogs bcu re re zhing 'jig rten gyi bar yun ring por mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa lus kyi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas der skyes pa'i sems can la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-23: dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21a-24: de dag yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:21b-0: @21b des ni thar pa 'dod pa'i gdul bya rnams la snyan pa sgrogs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:21b-1: chos kyi dga' ston yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03TD3787E:21b-2: 'du byed thams mi rtag par so sor rtog pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-3: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-4: chos thams cad bdag med par so sor rtog pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-5: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi bar so sor rtog pa'o //
T03TD3787E:21b-6: nyi shu gcig pa bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam dang ldan pa ni chu bo'i rgyun lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:21b-7: phyogs bcu re re mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi sems can long ba dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-12: skom pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-13: ngan song du ltung ba rnams sdug bsngal de dang de las thar bar byas te mi'i lus 'thob bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-14: de rnams kyang tshul khrims dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-18: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:21b-19: de ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-20: bgrod pa gcig pa nyid ni sa der gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzhan gyi don gyi bya ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:21b-21: nyi shu gnyis pa chos kyi sku dang ldan pa ni sprin lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:21b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam bstan par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-23: glang po che'i lta stangs kyis lta bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes rgya cher yang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:21b-24: dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa kun du ston pas sems can gyi don bya ba rnam pa thams cad de la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:21b-25: sems bskyed pa gsum par mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dgu bsgom par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de ni rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-26: rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-27: rnam par gang pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3787E:21b-28: rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3787E:22a-2: rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3787E:22a-5: rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes so //
T03TD3787E:22a-6: de la 'tsho ba mthar thun pa'i 'og tu go rims bzhin du sbud pa rlung gis khengs pa ltar mtho bar skrangs shing rbobs [?] par gyur pa'i phyir rnam par bam pa'o //
T03TD3787E:22a-7: rnam par bam pa nyid ni rnam par bam pa pa'o //
T03TD3787E:22a-8: yang na mi mthun pa'i phyir btsog cing rnam par bam bas na a'a by'a bhy'a ta ka zhes bye brag rtog byed du byung dhma ta k'a te rnam par bam pa pa'o //
T03TD3787E:22a-9: 'di ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin can ro'i lus kyi tshig bla dgas yin no //
T03TD3787E:22a-10: de bzhin du gzhan du yang bshad pa ni ming la stsogs pa'i don dag la brjod par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:22a-11: de ni dbyibs la chags pa rnams la lus de'i dbyibs kyi rgyud pa ston pa'i phyir 'di bsgom par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:22a-12: 'bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis nang du bskyod pas na bi dhu bi ba tu ma ka ta k'a zhes bya ba rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa pa ste /
T03TD3787E:22a-13: de ni lus kyi mkhregs pa'i dngos po la chags pa la khong stong gi dngos po nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:22a-14: gnas tha dad pa nas rnag 'dzag pa ni rnam par gang pa pa ste /
T03TD3787E:22a-15: de ni phreng ba dang dri la sogs pa'i dbang las byung ba'i lus kyi dri la chags pa rnams la lus kyi rma dang 'brel pa'i dri nga ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:22a-16: 'di dang de nas khrag 'gred cing rnam par 'phro la rab tu 'dzag pas na rnam par dmar ba pa ste /
T03TD3787E:22a-17: de ni rgyan gyis byas pa'i mdzes pa la chags pa la khrag gis sbags pa'i mi mthun pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir yin no //
T03TD3787E:22a-18: rnam par gsal bar sdo bas na rnam par bsngos pa pa ste /
T03TD3787E:22a-19: de ni lus kyi kha dog la chags pa la pags pa'i 'dod chags kyi rgud pa bstan pa'i phyir yin no //
T03TD3787E:22a-20: khyi dang ce spyang la sogs pas phan tshun du rnam pa sna tshogs par zos pa ni rnam par zos pa pa ste /
T03TD3787E:22a-21: de ni nu ma la sogs pa'i sha rgyas pa la chags ba la sha rgyas pa rnam par bstan pa'i phyir yin no //
T03TD3787E:22b-0: lag pa gnyis @22b kyang gzhan du /
T03TD3787E:22b-1: rkang pa gnyis kyang gzhan du /
T03TD3787E:22b-3: sna tshogs par 'thor bas na rnam par 'thor pa pa ste /
T03TD3787E:22b-4: de ni yan lag dang nying lag gi sgeg pa la chags pa la yan lag dang nying lag rnam par 'thor bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:22b-5: rus pa nyid ni rus pa pa ste /
T03TD3787E:22b-6: 'di ni rus pa sbrel ma dang rus pa gcig gi'ang tshig bla dags te /
T03TD3787E:22b-7: de ni so la sogs pa'i rus pa'i 'byor pa la chags pa la lus kyi rus pa'i mi mthun pa'i dngos po ston pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:22b-8: rnam par zhu zhing tshig par rnam par tshig pa pa ste /
T03TD3787E:22b-9: de ni kha dog dang dbyibs la chags pa la pags pa dang dbyibs kun du 'khums pa ston pa yin pa'i phyir 'di bsgom par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:22b-10: skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:22b-11: chos 'di ni 'dod pa chung ba rnams kyi yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:22b-12: 'dod pa che ba rnams ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:22b-16: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:22b-18: shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:22b-19: shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyi ni ma yin pa ste /
T03TD3787E:22b-20: skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa bdun po 'di dag gis gnas brtan mood gal gyi bu chen po gnas par gyur to //
T03TD3787E:22b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mood gal gyi bu chen po khyod bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad po 'di dag la yang rnam par rtogs shig / chos 'di ni spros pa med pa spros pa med pa la kun dga' ba /
T03TD3787E:22b-22: spros pa med pa la kun dga' ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3787E:22b-23: de la 'dod pa chung bas chos bzhi spong ste /
T03TD3787E:22b-28: de la tshul 'chos zhes bya ba 'di na kha cig rnyed pa don du gnyer zhing snyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa sems ltos pa dang bcas pa dang 'brel pas dgon pa pa'am /
T03TD3787E:23a-0: phyag dar khrod pa'am stan gcig pa nas sbyangs pa'i yon tan @23a * //
T03TD3787E:23a-1: gzhan gang yang rung ba la nye bar bsten te gnas par gyur pa na /
T03TD3787E:23a-2: de 'di snyam du bdag la gzhan dag gis bsnyen bkur byed /
T03TD3787E:23a-5: rjed par byed na ci ma rung bdag gis kyang rnyed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:23a-7: tshigs su bcad pa grub par bya na ci ma rung snyam du sems shing /
T03TD3787E:23a-8: de rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du gnyer zhing rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod pa de tshul de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi spyod lam byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3787E:23a-9: kha gsag ces bya ba ni 'di na kha cig rnyed pa dang bkur sti la ltos pa dang bcas pas gzhan dag la 'di skad du khyod ni bdag gi ma ji lta ba de 'dra ba dang /
T03TD3787E:23a-11: spun zla ji lta ba dang /
T03TD3787E:23a-12: nye du gang yang rung ba dang /
T03TD3787E:23a-13: sang gi gnyen mtshams ji lta ba de 'dra ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:23a-14: nga la yang sbyin par bya ste nged kyis kyang khyed la sbyin no //
T03TD3787E:23a-15: da'i bya ba bgyis te nged kyis kyang khyed kyi bya'o //
T03TD3787E:23a-16: kho bo ni thag ring po nas kyang khyed kyi thad du 'ong zhing kho bo 'dir gnas pa gang yin pa'ang khyed cag nyid kyi don du yin no zhes smra ste /
T03TD3787E:23a-17: de rnams la gces par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:23a-18: rnyed pa don du gnyer zhing rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod pa ltos pa dang bcas pa sems 'brel pa de gzhan dag la tshul de lta bur kha gsag kun du smra ba dang /
T03TD3787E:23a-21: kha zhu 'brel par bcas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:23a-22: gcam gsag gi las byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni kha gsag ces bya'o //
T03TD3787E:23a-23: gzhogs slong zhes bya ba ni 'di na kha cig so sor brtags shing rnyed pa la brten nas dngos bo dang de'i rgyu mtshan du las byed pa ste /
T03TD3787E:23a-24: khyod kyi lhung bzed 'di ni mdzes so zhe 'am /
T03TD3787E:23a-29: khyod kyi yo byad 'di dang 'di ni bzang ngo //
T03TD3787E:23a-30: gal te kho bos 'di lta bu zhig rnyed na bcang ba bya ba na /
T03TD3787E:23a-31: sbyin pa po 'ang rnyed pa dka'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:23a-32: gang yang rung ba'i khyim du 'ang song nas der 'di skad ces kyang smra ste /
T03TD3787E:23b-0: khyed kyi 'bras chan 'di @23b ni bzang po yin no //
T03TD3787E:23b-4: khyed kyi bca' bar bya ba'am /
T03TD3787E:23b-5: bza' bar bya ba 'di ni bzang po yin no //
T03TD3787E:23b-6: sngon chad kyang bdag cag la khyed kyis sbyin par bya ba dang bsgrub par bya bar gyur pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:23b-7: kho bo cag khyed kyis byin pa dang bsgrubs pas dga' bar gyur pa yin na /
T03TD3787E:23b-8: da ltar ni khyed cag bdag cag la sbyin par bya ba'am /
T03TD3787E:23b-9: bsgrub par bya bar mi sems so zhes smra ba lta bu ste /
T03TD3787E:23b-10: de'i so sor brtags nas brkam pa las byung ba'i gzhogs slong gi las dngos po de dang de nyed kyi rgyu mtshan du brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni gzhogs slong zhes bya'o //
T03TD3787E:23b-11: nges par ston pa zhes bya ba ni 'di na kha cig rnyed pa don du gnyer ba rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod pa ltos pa dang bcas pa sems 'brel pas gzhan dag la 'di skad ces khyed kyis ma la yang sbyin par mi bya /
T03TD3787E:23b-13: sring mo la yang ma yin /
T03TD3787E:23b-14: nye du dang sang gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi bya bar khyed kyis gang zhig la sbyin par bya ba 'am bya ba bsgrub pa yin zhes smra zhing /
T03TD3787E:23b-15: khyim 'ga' zhig tu song nas der yang 'di skad ces khyed kyi khyim du dgra bcom pa zhugs shing khyed dang dgra bcom pa lhan cig tu phrad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:23b-17: gtam smra bar 'gyur ba ni khyed rnyed pa dang ldan pa'o //
T03TD3787E:23b-18: khyed kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
T03TD3787E:23b-19: khyed kyis 'byor pa legs par thob bo //
T03TD3787E:23b-20: mir rnyed pa'ang don yod pa yin no zhes smra zhing /
T03TD3787E:23b-21: de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gi khyim du 'phags pa 'di las ma gtogs par dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan ni su mang ma zhugs pas nges par 'phags pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba yin no zhes bya bar sems na ci ma rung zhes sems pa ste /
T03TD3787E:23b-22: rnyed pa don du gnyer ba rnyed pa 'dod pa ltos pa dang bcas pa sems 'brel pa de'i de lta bu'i tshul du gzhan rnams la nges par sgrogs pa gang yin pa 'di ni nges par ston pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3787E:24a-0: chog shes pa ni rnyed pas rnyed @24a * //
T03TD3787E:24a-1: pa 'dod pa sbod bar byed pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:24a-2: de la rnyed pas rnyed pa tshol ba zhes bya ba ni 'di na kha cig rgyal po 'am /
T03TD3787E:24a-6: mchog tu gyur pa gzhan gang yang rung bar gyur pas ltung bzed dam /
T03TD3787E:24a-11: yo byad gzhan yang rung ba byin pa yongs su blangs so zhes gzhan dag la ston pa dang /
T03TD3787E:24a-12: 'di ni bdag la rgyal po che ge mo zhes bya ba'am dam par gyur pa gzhan zhig gis byin no zhes smra zhing de 'di snyam du 'di rnams 'di ltar de dag kyang re zhig de 'dra bar 'phags pa la sbyin par bya ba'am /
T03TD3787E:24a-13: bya ba bsgrub par bya bar sems na /
T03TD3787E:24a-14: kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa la sbyin par bya ba'am bya ba bsgrub par ci'i phyir mi sems zhes sems na ci ma rung snyam du sems pas /
T03TD3787E:24a-15: de'i rnyed pa gzhan gyi rnyed pa gzhan 'dod cing tshol ba gang yin pa 'di ni rnyed pas rnyed pa chol ba zhes bya'o //
T03TD3787E:24a-16: sems bskyed pa'i skabs su mi gtsang ba la sogs pa ci zhig 'brel zhe na /
T03TD3787E:24a-17: sems bskyed pa yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can nyid shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:24a-18: de yongs su nyams pa'i rkyen ni rnam pa dgu ste /
T03TD3787E:24a-23: 'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' ba dang /
T03TD3787E:24a-28: spros pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams te /
T03TD3787E:24a-29: de'i gnyen po'i don du mi gtsang ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:24a-30: de bzhin du dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i 'du shes la sogs pa gzhan dag la ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:24a-31: sems bskyed pa bzhi par thams cad shes pa nyid la mthong bas bltas nas 'da' bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:24a-32: lam shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-0: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes gang gsungs pa @24b de la ye shes mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:24b-1: sa dang po la mthong ba'i lam gyis bsdus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'dod pas zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:24b-2: lam shes pa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:24b-3: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:24b-4: 'di ltar de nyid las ye shes phyir mi ldog pa'i sa zhes brjod do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:24b-5: de nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba yin no zhes gsungs pa ni gzhon nu'i sa las 'das par 'dod pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:24b-6: gzhon du'i sa yang de nyid yin te /
T03TD3787E:24b-7: 'di ltar de nyid las kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i sa zhes brjod do zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3787E:24b-8: de las 'da' ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag par bskul ba de'i bya ba lhag ma mngon par 'du bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:24b-9: 'da' ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:24b-10: mthong nas 'da' ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ste de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsgom pa'i lam med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:24b-11: gnas nas 'da' ba ni phyin mi ldog pa'i sa ste /
T03TD3787E:24b-12: bsgom pa'i man rgyan chags pa'i ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:24b-13: 'o na rin chen zla bas zhus pa'i mdo'i rjes su 'brangs nas gsungs pa 'di dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-15: rin chen phreng ba las bcom ldan 'das dpal bzangs dpal bzangs zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-16: tsandan dpal tsandan dpal zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-17: gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas par snang ba zhes grags shing mtha' yas par snang ba zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-18: tog gi dbal tog gi dbal zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-19: mya ngan med pa'i dpal thams cad kyi tshe mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-20: rin po ches mchod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-21: rin po ches mchod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-22: rin po che'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-23: rin chen mchod sdong dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:24b-24: rin po che'i mchod sdong zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:25a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal zhes @25a * //
T03TD3787E:25a-2: gsung rnam par gnon par zhes grags shing gsung rnam par gnon pa zhes grags pa dang /
T03TD3787E:25a-3: rgyal ba skar ma'i dpal skar ma'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:25a-4: yon tan rgya che ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:25a-5: yon tan rgya che ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:25a-6: bcom ldan 'das yon tan dpal zhes bya ba phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi mtshan gzung ba byas na phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:25a-7: de bzhin du sems can ji snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i mtshan thos pa de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:25a-8: 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba nyid phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i rgyu'i dngos po yin par ldog pa las mthong ngo //
T03TD3787E:25a-9: bstan pa sgra ji bzhin pa 'di ni dgongs ba can yin te /
T03TD3787E:25a-10: ji skad du mtshan thos pa las rigs kyi bu dag la phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyes par gyur pa yin pas /
T03TD3787E:25a-11: sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs nas phyir mi ldog par yang bstan pa yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:25a-12: de rnams mtshan thos pa'i mod la phyir mi ldog par gyur pa ni ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:25a-13: zhes 'dir sa bon rjes thogs nyid la skyes pa dper brjod do //
T03TD3787E:25a-14: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa nyid phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i rgyu nyid yin par 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:25a-15: sems bskyed pa bcu gcig par dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi zad par bya bar 'dod pas zhes gang gsungs pa ni byang chub chen por yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du yang rgya mtsho chen por chu'i thigs pa gcig bor ba'i dpes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du zad pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:25a-16: sems bskyed pa bcu bzhi par chos thams cad khyi par chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su rtogs par 'dod pas zhes gang gsungs ba de la /
T03TD3787E:25a-17: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang /
T03TD3787E:25b-0: gnyen po'i phyogs la sogs pas bsdus pa'i chos @25b rnams kyi spyi'i chos nyid do //
T03TD3787E:25b-1: chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su rtogs par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni khyad par gang gi rigs zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba de'i chos nyid gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:25b-2: yang dag pa'i mtha' thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su rtogs par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ye shes thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:25b-3: thams phyin ci log pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:25b-4: thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis bsdus pa'i'o //
T03TD3787E:25b-5: rjes su rtogs par 'dod pas zhes bya ba la rjes su smos pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i rtogs pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:25b-6: de la thams cad shes pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pa tsam sel bar byed do //
T03TD3787E:25b-7: lam shes pa nyid kyis ni gnyen po ma lus par yang dag par 'grub par byed do //
T03TD3787E:25b-8: de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa spong ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:25b-9: bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa gsum po 'di rnams la spang bar bya ba la brten pa'i bye brag ci zhig mchis /
T03TD3787E:25b-10: rab 'byor gang yang med mod kyi /
T03TD3787E:25b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba sbangs pa yod pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:25b-12: de ltar na khyad par yod do zhe na /
T03TD3787E:25b-13: rab 'byor bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:25b-14: 'on kyang nyam thos rnams la 'dod chags dang /
T03TD3787E:25b-16: gti mug sbangs pa yod mod kyi /
T03TD3787E:25b-17: las dang dag gi rnam par 'gyur ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams bzhin du 'phags pa rnams la rab tu shes pa yin na /
T03TD3787E:25b-18: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mnga'o zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3787E:25b-19: 'dir dgra bcom pa dge slong mchongs pa can dper brjod do //
T03TD3787E:25b-20: sems bskyed pa bcu bdun par 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi pha rol du 'gro bar 'dod pas zhes gsungs pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:26a-1: thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su rtogs par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid la khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:26a-2: sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis par lha'i ris thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der 'gro bar bya snyam pa'i byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de la /
T03TD3787E:26a-3: kun nas bskor ba ni yongs su bskor ba'o //
T03TD3787E:26a-4: mchod par bya ba nyid kyis mdun phyogs su byas pa ni mdun du bdar ba'o //
T03TD3787E:26a-5: phyogs yongs su chad pa'i mdun du byas pa yin na ni /
T03TD3787E:26a-6: snga ma dang phyi ma 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:26a-7: 'di thams cad byas nas te mdor na sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni 'ga' yang med do //
T03TD3787E:26a-8: de nyid kyi phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha yod par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag de ltar sems par byed pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba'i dbang du byas pas sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na 'jig rten gyi mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa 'thob par bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:26a-9: rang gi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:26a-10: yon tan gyi tshogs su lhung bar gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:26a-11: de la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris ni lhung bzed kyi dbang du byas pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:26a-12: de rnams la kham gyi zas mchog tu ro zhim pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa mang ba'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:26a-13: 'dir gzugs can snying pos zhus pa dper brjod do //
T03TD3787E:26a-14: sum cu rtsa gsum pa la sogs pa ni rim gro'i dbang du byas pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:26a-15: de rnams sgyu rtsal ma lus pa la mkhas pa ni 'dod pa tsam la rag las pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:26a-16: tshangs ris la sogs pa ni gsol ba 'debs pa'i dbang du byas pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:26b-0: de rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das @26b pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar skal ba mnyam pas gzhan rnams de la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:26b-1: de la 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba tshangs pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:26b-2: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni gnas gtsang ma pa rnams so ;
T03TD3787E:26b-3: /'di ni phal che bas bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:26b-4: tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi 'og na yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa ni ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:26b-5: dbang du byas pa gsum po 'di rtogs pa mngon du byed pa su zhig gis byas she na /
T03TD3787E:26b-6: sus kyang ma yin mod kyi /
T03TD3787E:26b-7: 'on kyang 'di ni dge pa'i rtsa ba yongs su gyur pa'i chos nyid yin te /
T03TD3787E:26b-8: rnam par bsgrub pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'di rnams kyi bdag po yin 'di rnams kyi bdag po yin pas na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris so //
T03TD3787E:26b-9: legs par spyod pa lhan cig spyad pa sum cu rtsa gsum der skyes pas na sum cu rtsa gsum mo //
T03TD3787E:26b-10: sdug bsngal las spong zhing spang pas na 'thab bral lo //
T03TD3787E:26b-11: dga' ba dang ldan zhing thob par gnas pas dga' ldan te /
T03TD3787E:26b-12: mgu pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:26b-13: rang gis sprul zheng byas pa'i longs spyod rnams kyis dga' zhing rol pas na 'di ni 'phrul dga'o //
T03TD3787E:26b-14: gzhan gyis sprul pa'i longs spyod rnams la dbang byed pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do //
T03TD3787E:26b-15: tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor yin pas na changs 'khor te /
T03TD3787E:26b-16: tshangs pa chen po de rnams kyis bsnyen bkur ba'o //
T03TD3787E:26b-17: gzhan ni 'di'i mdun na 'don gyi gnas na gnas pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don no //
T03TD3787E:26b-18: tshe dang kha dog la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams kyis tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor yin pas tshangs chen no //
T03TD3787E:26b-19: tshangs pa gzhan rnams las 'di 'od chung ba yin pas na 'ong chung ngo //
T03TD3787E:26b-20: 'di la tshad med cing che ba'i 'od yod pas na tshad med 'od do //
T03TD3787E:27a-0: 'di dag gi dga' ba dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan las grub pa'i phung po'i rgyun las sprin las glog 'byung ba bzhin du 'di dang de nas 'od 'phro zhing @27a * //
T03TD3787E:27a-1: 'byung bas na a'a bha sva ra ste 'od 'phro'o //
T03TD3787E:27a-2: yang na de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis 'od kyis snang bar byed pas na 'od gsal lo //
T03TD3787E:27a-3: dge ba zhes bya ba ni lus kyi 'od gcig tu 'dug cing mi 'gyur ba la bya bar bshad la /
T03TD3787E:27a-4: de ni de'i gong gi tshangs pa rnams las 'di 'od chung ba yin pa'i phyir dge chung ngo //
T03TD3787E:27a-5: 'di dag gi 'od che zhing tshad med pa'i phyir tshad med dge'o //
T03TD3787E:27a-6: 'di dag gi 'od kyi tshogs dge bas rgyas pa'i phyir dge rgyas so //
T03TD3787E:27a-7: rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan las grub pa'i bdag gi lus thams cad bkang nas gnas pa ste /
T03TD3787E:27a-8: de rnams ni dper na rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang na gnas pa'i mar me ni rin po che'i 'od dang 'dres pa'i rang gi 'od rnams dang 'od kyi tshogs gcig tu gyur nas gnas pa de bzhin du 'bar ba'i lus kyis rnam par gnas pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:27a-9: 'du shes la 'dod chags dang bral ba bsgoms pas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs kyi phung po tsam yod kyi 'di la 'du shes yod pa ma yin pas na 'du shes med pa'o //
T03TD3787E:27a-10: sprin med dang bsod nams skyes ni go bar sla'o //
T03TD3787E:27a-11: 'di rnams la bsam gtan gyi mthu las grub pa'i 'bras bu chen po yod pas na 'bras bu che'o //
T03TD3787E:27a-12: so so'i skye bo'i mthar thug par rnam par gnas pa'i phung po lnga dang ldan pas gegs cung zad kyang mi byed la dus cung zad kyi bdag gi gnas spong bar yang mi byed pas aa bhi ha ste mi spong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:27a-13: gzhan dag ni aa smri ha zhes bya ba yin par sems so //
T03TD3787E:27a-14: de dag gi lugs kyis ni de dag la 'og mar 'dod pa med pas na mi 'dod pa zhes bya bas yin no //
T03TD3787E:27a-15: su la yang gdung bar mi byed pas mi gdung ba'o //
T03TD3787E:27a-16: shin tu yid 'phrog par byed pa'i phyir na tshegs med pa'i bde bar mthong ba'i phyir su dra sha ste legs par mthong ngo //
T03TD3787E:27a-17: gzhan ni su darsha na ste legs par lta zhes so //
T03TD3787E:27a-18: de dag gi lugs kyis ni byed pa por blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3787E:27a-19: lta ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir mchog tu lta ba'i phyir su darsha ster ba lta'o //
T03TD3787E:27b-0: phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ram @27b 'di rnams 'og ma ma yin pa'i phyir 'og ma yin no zhes bya ba ni btsun ba zangs mdog gi'o //
T03TD3787E:27b-1: gzhan dag ni sdig mtha' zhes zer te /
T03TD3787E:27b-2: sdig pa zhes bya ba ni bsags par gnas pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
T03TD3787E:27b-3: de ni der shin tu bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:27b-4: sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba la /
T03TD3787E:27b-5: sems ni rnam par shes pa ste rnam par rig pa'o //
T03TD3787E:27b-6: rnam par shes pa gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:27b-7: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste dkar po'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa ni de la srid pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:27b-8: bskyed pa zhes smos pas ni ma skyes pa skyed par shes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir na sems kyi rtog pa'i chos la dang po'i mtshams kyi dngos po bstan pa'i don du'o //
T03TD3787E:27b-9: sems bskyed pa bshad zin to //
T03TD3787E:27b-10: da ni gdams ngag brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:27b-12: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi zhes gsungs pa las so //
T03TD3787E:27b-14: de ltar sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas sems bskyed par bshad pa'i chos rnams rdzogs par bya ba'i don du ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba'i don to//
T03TD3787E:27b-15: skabs kyi mthar yang 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdams pa ste 'di ni rjes su bstan pa yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:27b-16: de la don du gnyer ba'i don thob pa'i bya ba nye bar ston pa ni gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:27b-17: thob zin pa'i yon tan yongs su skyong ba'i don gyis mi nyams par byed pa ni gdams ngag yin la /
T03TD3787E:27b-18: de'i 'og tu ma thob pa'i yon tan thob par byed pa'i phyir na rjes su bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:27b-19: gdams ngag de yang rnam pa bcur 'gyur ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:27b-21: sgrub dang bden ba rnams dang ni //
T03TD3787E:27b-22: sangs rgyas la sogs dkon mchog gsum //
T03TD3787E:27b-23: ma zhen yongs su mi ngal dang //
T03TD3787E:27b-24: lam ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang //
T03TD3787E:27b-25: spyan lnga dang ni mngon shes kyi //
T03TD3787E:27b-26: yon tan drug dang mthong lam dang //
T03TD3787E:27b-27: bsgom zhes bya la gdams ngag ni //
T03TD3787E:28a-3: de la sgrub pa la gdams pa ni sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas brtsams pa'o //
T03TD3787E:28a-4: mi dmigs pa'i rnam par sgrub pa nas sgrub pa /
T03TD3787E:28a-5: de nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dag dge slong sha ra dva ti'i bu dang /
T03TD3787E:28a-6: mood gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis 'dam bu'i tshal la sogs pa lta bur yongs su gang ba dper brjod pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:28a-7: phyogs bcu re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed des yongs su gang ba'i dge slong rnams kyi shes rab pas /
T03TD3787E:28a-8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab nyi ma gcig tu bsgoms pa khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa ni /
T03TD3787E:28a-9: sh'a ri'i bu gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
T03TD3787E:28a-10: mood gal gyi bu sha stag gis 'di lta ste dper na /
T03TD3787E:28a-13: bu ram shing gi tshal lam /
T03TD3787E:28a-16: til gyi tshal ltar yongs su gang bar gyur kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:28a-17: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir shes rab tha mi dad pa ma yin nam snyam pas de khyad par med par zhus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:28a-18: bcom ldan 'das rgyun du zhugs pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:28a-19: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:28a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa 'bras bu gang gi don du nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:28a-21: sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ;
T03TD3787E:28a-22: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:28a-23: chos kyi sku thob pa'i mtshan nyid ched du bya ba dang sbyor ba dang rtogs pa rnams yang dag par thob pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
T03TD3787E:28a-24: rgyal rigs s'a la chen po lta bu la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:28b-1: rgyun tu zhugs ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:28b-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab byang chub sems dpa' med na mi 'byung bar bstan pas sbyin gnas su gyur pa sgrub par byed pa'i khyad par ldan pa'i don gyis lan btab ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:28b-3: de la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi po rnams dang mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam dag la go rims bzhin du 'dam bu ltar las dang nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa chung du mi bzod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:28b-4: 'od ma la me dang mtshon dag gis bzhin du las dang nyon mongs pa drag po'i gnod byed dang phrad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'chad pa dang bu ram shing dang 'dra bar gnas skabs gzhan thob kyang ngan song chad ba'i phyir bde 'gro'i skye ba rnams su rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sbyor bas chos sgom pa'i mngar ba las mi 'da' ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:28b-5: smyig ma dang 'dra bar myur du mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam rtogs par byed pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:28b-6: 'bras dang 'dra bar 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi rtogs pa'i 'bras bu mchog nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:28b-7: ji ltar mthong ba la mngon du phyogs par byed pa'i phyir til dang 'dra bar me tog la sogs ba'i dngos po tha mi dad du zin kyang /
T03TD3787E:28b-8: dus gzhan du bsgom pa la spangs pa'i khyad par mthong ba'i dbang du byas nas dpe drug po rnams yin par shes bar bya'o //
T03TD3787E:28b-9: tshal smos pa'i don ci yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:28b-10: gang zag gi khyad par rnams kyi dbang po'i khyad bar la sogs pa tha dad pa yin yang dro bar gyur ba la sogs pa rnams kyi rigs tha mi dad par shes par bya ba'i don du yin te /
T03TD3787E:28b-11: don mang po brtag pa na yang dpe gcig gis chog par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:28b-12: re zhig lam zhes bya ba'i sgras snga ma snga ma smos pa dpe phyi ma phyi ma drang bar bya ba'i don yin no //
T03TD3787E:28b-13: 'on te tha mar lam smos pa 'di ci'i don du yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:28b-14: 'phags pa'i gang zag de rnams kyi mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa shes par byed pa'i dpe gzhan drang bar bya ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:28b-15: 'o na dpe gzhan ci ste ma brjod ce na /
T03TD3787E:29a-0: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa rnams ni rang bzhin sna @29a * //
T03TD3787E:29a-1: tshogs pa nyid kyis rigs bsdus pa'i ngo bo shes par bya ba'i don yin te /
T03TD3787E:29a-2: so sor dper brjod pa btags na ni dpe ji snyed cig brjod par bya zhing nye bar bshad pa la mi mkhas pa nyid du 'gyur te 'dir ngag gi don ni 'di yin no //
T03TD3787E:29a-3: dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang mood gal gyi bu dang 'dra bar sha stag gis zhes gang gsungs pa 'dis ni ji skad gsungs pa'i rtogs pa dang mthun pa rnams kyi zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03TD3787E:29a-4: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pa'i don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:29a-5: 'dis ni nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi grangs kyi khyad par dang /
T03TD3787E:29a-9: dpe las 'das pa nyid bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:29a-10: de la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba nas grangs dang zhes bya ba'i bar ni grangs kyi khyad par ro //
T03TD3787E:29a-11: khyad par med par grangs gzung ba ni de las gzhan pa'i grangs gzung bar shes par bya ba'i don du ste /
T03TD3787E:29a-12: brgya la sogs pa smos pa khyad par can du gyur pa na khyad par med par grangs smos pa ni grangs khong du chud pa'i rgyu'i khyad par tsam yin no zhes shes par bya ba'i don du'o //
T03TD3787E:29a-13: bye la la sogs pa smos pa ni shes rab mang po'i go rims shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:29a-14: char yang zhes bya ba ni mthu'i khyad par ro //
T03TD3787E:29a-15: bgrang bar yang zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi khyad par te /
T03TD3787E:29a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi rigs la de bgrang du med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:29a-17: rgyur yang zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i khyad par te /
T03TD3787E:29a-18: shes rab de ni 'di'i rgyu tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:29a-19: dper yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba ni dpe las 'das pa'o //
T03TD3787E:29a-20: yang 'dir byang chub sems dpa' gang gi dbang du byas pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:29a-21: gang gi shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa la 'di lta bur yon tan yod pa de'i'o //
T03TD3787E:29a-22: ci dang po sems bskyed pa'am /
T03TD3787E:29a-25: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin /
T03TD3787E:29a-26: re zhig bzhi pa ni ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:29b-0: sa bcu pa la ni de bzhin gshegs @29b pa nyid yin zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:29b-1: don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:29b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas nye bar gnas pa yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:29b-3: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod kyi /
T03TD3787E:29b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su chud pas ni ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:29b-5: gsum pa yang ma yin te ;
T03TD3787E:29b-6: sa brgyad pa la ni dgongs pa can gyi mya ngan las 'das pa bkag pas nyan thos thams cad las shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:29b-7: kye rgyal ba'i sras khyed mos par bya /
T03TD3787E:29b-8: khyed khong du chud par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:29b-9: gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo la bcug par ma gyur pa na ni /
T03TD3787E:29b-10: 'di de'i tshe nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:29b-11: yang de'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang zhig yin /
T03TD3787E:29b-12: gal te nyan thos kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin na /
T03TD3787E:29b-13: de ni re zhig mi rigs te /
T03TD3787E:29b-14: nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa'i yid la byed pa ni sems bskyed pa nas brtsams te ring du yongs su sbangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:29b-15: 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yin na bsgom pas spang ba de yang mi rigs so zhe na /
T03TD3787E:29b-17: bstan pa 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa mang po rnam par gzhag ste /
T03TD3787E:29b-18: 'di ltar rtse mo thob pa rnams kyi ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'chad pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:29b-19: bzod pa thob pa rnams ni ngan 'gro yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:29b-20: bsam gtan thob pa rnams kyi ni de'i yan lag dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:29b-21: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi ni srid pa brgyad pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:29b-22: lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi ni 'dir srid pa gnyis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin //
T03TD3787E:29b-23: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi ni 'dod pa'i khams yong su mya ngan 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:29b-24: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:30a-1: chos padma dkar po'i mdo tshad mar byas nas /
T03TD3787E:30a-2: ji ltar 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la nyan thos kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa de bzhin du dgongs pa can gyi mya ngan las 'das pa yin par shes par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:30a-3: dus de srid du 'gro ba'i don rgyun chad pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:30a-4: de nyid kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi bya ba rgyun bcad pa'i phyir de nyid 'di'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bshad do //
T03TD3787E:30a-5: gnyis pa yang ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:30a-6: de yang de rnams las rtogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:30a-7: de ltar yang rgyan du zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang spangs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T03TD3787E:30a-8: de bas na yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can brda las byung ba'i sems kyis dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skabs dang por sems bskyed par bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid 'dir mngon par bzhed par mngon no //
T03TD3787E:30a-9: gal te de ltar yin na /
T03TD3787E:30a-10: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:30a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i shes rab 'bras bu gang gi don du nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:30a-12: sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
T03TD3787E:30a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:30a-14: chos kyi sku thob pas bsdus pa ched du bya ba dang sbyor ba dang rtogs pa rnams yang dag par thob pas zhes bya ba 'dir mi 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:30a-15: 'di dag ni nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyi 'bras bu ma yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:30a-16: bskal pa grangs med pa mang po'i shes rab kyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na ;
T03TD3787E:30a-17: 'dir yang mar me'i snying po tshig pa'i dpes sems bskyed pa dang po dang phyir ma'i 'bras bu yin pa ni lam yin no //
T03TD3787E:30a-18: sgrub pa la gdams pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:30a-20: // / bden pa la gdams pa gang zhe na /
T03TD3787E:30a-21: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gdams pa gang yin ba'o //
T03TD3787E:30b-0: @30b de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:30b-1: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:30b-2: kun 'byung gi bden pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:30b-3: gal te gzugs skye ba'i chos can nam 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
T03TD3787E:30b-4: gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam rnam par byad ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
T03TD3787E:30b-5: gzugs ni tshor bar yang dag par 'du ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:30b-6: zhes bya bar yang dag par rdzas su mi mthong zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T03TD3787E:30b-8: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:30b-10: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs gzhan ma yin la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:30b-11: gzugs stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid ni gzugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:30b-12: 'dis ni sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' gnyis sel bar byed do //
T03TD3787E:30b-13: 'gog pa'i bden pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:30b-14: sh'a ri'i bu stong pa nyid de ni mi skye mi 'gag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
T03TD3787E:30b-19: da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:30b-20: gang yang 'di 'dra bde la ni gzugs med do //
T03TD3787E:30b-21: tshor ba med do zhes bya ba nas ma rig ba skye ba med do //
T03TD3787E:30b-22: ma rig pa 'gag pa yang med do zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3787E:30b-23: rgyun du zhugs pa med do //
T03TD3787E:30b-24: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas med do //
T03TD3787E:30b-25: byang chub sems dpa' med do zhes bya ba'i bar yin no //
T03TD3787E:30b-26: lam gyi bden pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:31a-0: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na bdag nyid la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi @31a * //
T03TD3787E:31a-1: mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:31a-2: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la lam du grags pa yin pa'i phyir lam yin no //
T03TD3787E:31a-3: yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i rnam par rnams la lam yin no //
T03TD3787E:31a-5: de stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de //
T03TD3787E:31a-6: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor lam yin no //
T03TD3787E:31a-7: mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma med pas sbyor bar mi byed de /
T03TD3787E:31a-8: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor la ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:31a-9: smom pa med pa la smon pas sbyor bar mi byed de //
T03TD3787E:31a-10: smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor la ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:31a-11: 'dis ni lam gyi bden pa rnam par mi rtog pa yin par bstan to //
T03TD3787E:31a-12: de la gzugs la sngon gyi mthas sbyor bar mi byed de //
T03TD3787E:31a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:31a-15: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas //
T03TD3787E:31a-16: de sngon gyi mthong ngo bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:31a-17: de sngon gyi mtha' la phyir ma'i mthas sbyor bar mi byed de //
T03TD3787E:31a-18: phyi ma'i mtha' la sngon gyi mthas sbyor bar mi byed do zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:31a-20: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3787E:31a-21: 'dis ni lam gyi nges par 'byin pa ston par byed do //
T03TD3787E:31a-22: nges par 'byung bar bya ba yang gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:31a-23: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
T03TD3787E:31a-24: gang gi phyir de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las 'das pas sbyor bar mi byed de //
T03TD3787E:31a-25: 'di ltar 'das pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:31a-26: bden pa la gdams pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:31a-28: // / dkon mchog gsum la gdams pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:31a-29: de ni dkon mchog gsum la gdams pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:31a-30: de la sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos rnams ni sangs rgyas te /
T03TD3787E:31a-31: de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yang dag par bsdus pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:31a-32: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3787E:31b-0: gzugs la rnam @31b pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de //
T03TD3787E:31b-1: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03TD3787E:31b-2: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
T03TD3787E:31b-3: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
T03TD3787E:31b-4: zhes bya bas chos rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:31b-5: de'i stong pa nyid phan tshun gyi rang bzhin gcig tu 'dod pas gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:31b-6: de la sngags ni rtag pa'i mtha' bkag la cig shos kyis ni chad pa'i mtha' bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:31b-7: bden pa bzhi'i dbang du mdzad nas sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i skabs su gnas pa med pa'i dmigs pa'i khyad par ni bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3787E:31b-8: des gzugs la mi rtag ces gnas mi bgyi'o //
T03TD3787E:31b-9: zhes bya ba nas gzugs la zhi ba'o //
T03TD3787E:31b-10: zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
T03TD3787E:31b-11: zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par te /
T03TD3787E:31b-12: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03TD3787E:31b-13: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag ba ni gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste /
T03TD3787E:31b-15: de la gnas pa ni dngos po la dmigs pa'i sems kyi rten pa'o //
T03TD3787E:31b-17: gal te re zhig gnas pa med pa tsam gnas par mi bya ba yin na ni med pa'i phyir gnyen po mi rigs so //
T03TD3787E:31b-18: 'on te gang gnas pa yin pa ma yin na /
T03TD3787E:31b-19: de lta na ni thal ches pa yin no zhe na /
T03TD3787E:31b-21: mngon par zhen pa med pa la tshul ji ltar bshad pa de ltar 'di la yang blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3787E:31b-23: bcom ldan 'das gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mi rtag pa nyid ma lags pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te zhes bya bas mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:31b-24: de'i stong pa nyid phan tshun de'i bdag nyid kyi rnam pa'i khyad par can dang /
T03TD3787E:31b-25: de ni 'di ltar gzugs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed de /
T03TD3787E:31b-26: de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
T03TD3787E:31b-28: sangs rgyas nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa /
T03TD3787E:32a-1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas yin no //
T03TD3787E:32a-2: byang chub nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa /
T03TD3787E:32a-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub po zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3787E:32a-4: 'dis ni dmigs par bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:32a-5: dmigs pa po mnyam pa nyid kyi yi shes ni sangs rgyas yin no zhes yongs su bstan to //
T03TD3787E:32a-6: chos dkon mchog gi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni //
T03TD3787E:32a-7: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3787E:32a-8: gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
T03TD3787E:32a-9: gzugs dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro ;
T03TD3787E:32a-10: / gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
T03TD3787E:32a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:32a-12: chos ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad du 'dod chags pa dang bral ba yin par bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:32a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do zhes bya ba nas btsams te /
T03TD3787E:32a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32a-15: de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:32a-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:32a-19: las so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32a-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:32a-21: nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /
T03TD3787E:32a-25: lha'i mig yul dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32a-26: de'i yul phyogs bcu re re zhing gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba lha'i mig gis mthong bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T03TD3787E:32a-27: lha'i rna ba yul dang bcas cas dang /
T03TD3787E:32a-28: de'i yul ni bshad ma thag pa'i sems can gyi sgras bsdus pa'o //
T03TD3787E:32a-29: gzhan gyi sems shes pa yul dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-0: de'i yul ni bshad ma thag pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems @32b kyis bsdus pa'o //
T03TD3787E:32b-1: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang bcas pa de'i yul ni bshad ma thag pa'i sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi gnas kyas bsdus pa'o //
T03TD3787E:32b-2: rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa yul dang bcas pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bkag pa ste ;
T03TD3787E:32b-3: de'i yul ni bshad ma thag pa'i sems can rnams kyi gzhi'i yul du 'gro bas yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
T03TD3787E:32b-4: de ltar spyod pa ni sems can gyi khams gzhal du med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-5: bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-6: 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa bsal pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su so rnams su da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas lha'i rigs rnams srung bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-8: mthong ba'i chos nyid la byams pa'i rgyu can gyis las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-9: tshegs chung dus gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mngon du gyur pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-10: byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du skye ba thams cad du sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-11: chos thams cad nye bar mi dmigs pas phrad pa dang bral ba bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-12: chos kyi dbyings rjes su mi dmigs pa'i phyir de dag gis myur du mngon par byang chub pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-13: sna tshogs par byed pa mi byed pa'i phyir rtogs par bya ba dang rtogs pa po'i chos nye bar mi dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-14: chos kyi dbyings la stong pa dang mi stong par sbyor ba bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-15: mig la sogs pa'i khams bco brgyad la stong pa nyid kyis sam //
T03TD3787E:32b-16: de la de dag gis sbyor ba bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-17: nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa las 'da' ba dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-19: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-20: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor mchog tu brjod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:32b-21: rtogs pa thams cad la nga rgyal bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:33a-0: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor la gnas nas snying rje chen po dang byams pa chen po mngon par @33a * //
T03TD3787E:33a-1: bsgrub pa dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ser sna la sogs pa'i sems mi skyed pas zhes bya'o //
T03TD3787E:33a-2: 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba dang zhes brjod pa de la 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa ni ma rig pa dang /
T03TD3787E:33a-4: zag pa dang bcas pas bsdus pa ste /
