T03TD3787E:51a-15: gnas dang btags dang brjod du med //
T03TD3787E:51a-16: gzugs sogs mi gnas de dag ni //
T03TD3787E:51a-17: de yi ngo bor rang bzhin med //
T03TD3787E:51a-18: de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig / de mi rtag sogs par mi gnas //
T03TD3787E:51a-19: de rnams de yi ngo bos stong //
T03TD3787E:51a-20: de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig / chos rnams mi 'dzin gang yin dang //
T03TD3787E:51a-21: de dag mtshan mar mi mthong phyir //
T03TD3787E:51a-22: thams cad dmigs su med pa ni //
T03TD3787E:51a-23: shes rab kyis ni yongs rtogs par //
T03TD3787E:51a-24: gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid med nyid //
T03TD3787E:51a-25: de med pa yi ngo bo nyid //
T03TD3787E:51a-26: de dag skye med nges 'byung med //
T03TD3787E:51a-27: dag dang de dag mtshan nyid med //
T03TD3787E:51a-28: de yi mtshan mar mi brten pas //
T03TD3787E:51a-29: mos min 'du shes med pa yin //
T03TD3787E:51a-30: ting 'dzin de yi byed pa nyid //
T03TD3787E:51a-31: lung bstan pa dang rlom pa zad //
T03TD3787E:51a-32: gsum po gcig gi ngo bo gcig / ting 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa //
T03TD3787E:51a-33: de ltar nges 'byed cha mthun ni //
T03TD3787E:51a-34: chung dang 'bring dang chen po yin //
T03TD3787E:51b-0: @51b mthun pa rnams kyi dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:51b-2: rgyu nyid kyi khyad par dang /
T03TD3787E:51b-5: chen po'i bye brag bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:51b-7: // / yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:51b-8: da ni rnam par rtog pa dang yang dag par ldan pa bshad par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:51b-9: de la mthong pa'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni rnam par rtog pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03TD3787E:51b-11: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:51b-12: dngos po tsam la brten pa dang /
T03TD3787E:51b-13: gnyen po'i phyogs la brten pa'o //
T03TD3787E:51b-14: tsam smos pa ni khyad par gsal ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:51b-15: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:51b-16: gang zag rdzas su yod pa'i rten can dang /
T03TD3787E:51b-17: skyes bu btags par yod pa'i rten can no //
T03TD3787E:51b-18: de la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang po dang gnyis pa dag ni go rims bzhin du gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis su gyur pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:51b-19: gsum dang bzhi pa dag kyang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis yin no //
T03TD3787E:51b-20: gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dbang du mdzad pa'i don du gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:51b-21: rab 'byor ji ltar ngas khyod la nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa ltar ston pa ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:51b-22: de la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa ni bdag dang gzhan la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa 'gog pa la mkhas pas na gsal bar byed de dbang du byas ba nyid du shes pa'i don du'o //
T03TD3787E:51b-23: de la dang po gzung ba'i rnam pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa dgur 'gyur ba las /
T03TD3787E:51b-24: ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni ma rig pa'i stobs kyis ji lta ba ma yin par mngon par zhen pa ste /
T03TD3787E:51b-25: de ni sh'a ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ji ltar mngon par zhen pa de ltar yod pa ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:51b-26: ji ltar med pa de ltar yod pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:51b-27: de ltar yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:51b-28: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:52a-0: sh'a ri'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid @52a * //
T03TD3787E:52a-1: kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:52a-2: ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:52a-3: de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ma rig pa dang sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen te /
T03TD3787E:52a-4: ji lta ba bzhin yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams mi shes mi mthong ste /
T03TD3787E:52a-5: de dag chos rnams su btags nas mngon par zhen te zhes gnag gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:52a-6: mtha' gnyis la chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:52a-7: de dag chos rnams la mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i mtha' gnyis su rtog par byed do//
T03TD3787E:52a-8: de dag ni gzugs mi shes mi mthong ba zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:52a-9: des na byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:52a-10: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang pa mi shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:52a-11: de dag gi ma rig pa sred pa'i rkyen mi shes mi mthon ngo //
T03TD3787E:52a-12: ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na /
T03TD3787E:52a-13: gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa'o zhes mi shes mi mthong ngo //
T03TD3787E:52a-14: de bzhin du gzugs rnam par byang ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar mi shes mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:52a-15: de dag 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin pa nas /
T03TD3787E:52a-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:52a-18: 'phags pa'i lam la mi gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:52a-19: de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste /
T03TD3787E:52a-20: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar yid mi ches so zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:52a-21: byang chub byang chub kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar yid mi ches so zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3787E:52a-22: de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:52a-23: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:52a-24: dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:52a-25: sh'a ri'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3787E:52a-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
T03TD3787E:52b-0: de ltar slob na rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no zhes @52b bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:52b-1: bdag la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:52b-2: sh'a ri'i bu bdag mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
T03TD3787E:52b-3: shin tu rnams par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:52b-4: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:52b-5: rnam par dag pa skye ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:52b-6: sh'a ri'i bu rnam par dag pa ni skye ba med pa ma byung ba mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:52b-7: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:52b-9: // / gnyis pa rnam par byang ba tsam gyi yul can brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:52b-10: de yang rnam par byang ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po dang /
T03TD3787E:52b-13: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa dgur 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:52b-14: de la phung po'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:52b-15: de thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:52b-16: rnam par shes pa'i bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:52b-17: phung po'i don ni spungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:52b-18: skye ba'i sgo'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa ni mig la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:52b-20: zugs [*gzugs?] la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:52b-21: de bzhin du chos la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:52b-22: skye ba'i sgo'i don ni skye mched kyi don yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:52b-23: rigs kyi don gyi rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:52b-24: mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:52b-25: sa bon gyi don gyis khams kyi don yin no //
T03TD3787E:52b-26: skye ba'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa ni ma rig par rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:52b-27: ma byung ba las byung ba'i don ni skye ba'i don yin no //
T03TD3787E:53a-0: stong pa nyid kyi don gyi rnam par rtog pa ni de nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po @53a * //
T03TD3787E:53a-1: med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:53a-2: med pa tsam ni lta bas byas pa'i gnyen por 'gyur bas 'os pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53a-3: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:53a-4: dngos po med pa tsam ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53a-5: mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:53a-6: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog tsam cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:53a-7: yod pa'i bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma rnams ni bral ba la nus par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53a-8: bsgom pa'i lam gyi rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:53a-10: mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:53a-12: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:53a-13: yod pa la gnas pas bsam gtan gyi yan lag las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /
T03TD3787E:53a-14: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la dmigs pas yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53a-15: mi slob pa'i lam gyi rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:53a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:53a-17: don byas pa de nyid kyi rten gyi bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshams su bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53a-18: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa bshad pa zin to /
T03TD3787E:53a-20: // / gang zag rdzas su yod pa'i rten nam 'jig pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po bshad par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:53a-21: de ni rnam pa dgur 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:53a-22: bdag dang dbang can gyi rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:53a-23: sh'a ri'i bu bdag nye bar mi dmigs /
T03TD3787E:53a-26: gang zag nye bar mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:53b-0: shin tu rnam @53b par dag pa'i phyir bdag med cing mi dmigs so zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:53b-1: tshad ma'i brtag pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:53b-2: bdag gcig pur rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:53b-3: sh'a ri'i bu gzugs nya bar mi dmigs zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:53b-4: rnam par shes pa nye bar mi dmigs zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:53b-5: phung po'i don ni gnyen po'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53b-6: bdag rgyu nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:53b-7: sh'a ri'i bu mig mi dmigs so //
T03TD3787E:53b-9: de bzhin du yid kyi bar dang /
T03TD3787E:53b-11: chos kyi bar mi dmigs so zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:53b-12: skye mched kyi don ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53b-13: lta ba po la sogs pa'i bdag tu rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:53b-14: sh'a ri'i bu mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:53b-15: yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar mi dmigs so zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:53b-16: khams kyi don ni de'i gnyen po'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53b-17: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:53b-18: sh'a ri'i bu rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs so zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:53b-19: gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:53b-20: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53b-21: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:53b-22: bsam gtan dang po mi dmigs so zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:53b-23: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:53b-24: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams kyi yan lag la dmigs pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i don ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53b-25: mthong ba'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:53b-26: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:53b-27: bden pa mthong ba'i don ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:53b-28: sgom pa'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:54a-2: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs so zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:54a-3: lus kyi sa mngon sum du byed pa'i sgom pa'i don ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:54a-4: don byas pa'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:54a-5: stobs bcu mi dmigs so zhes bya ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so //
T03TD3787E:54a-6: ji ltar mi dmigs she na /
T03TD3787E:54a-9: bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:54a-10: thams cad la brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:54a-11: gang zag rdzas su yod pa la brten pa 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:54a-13: // / skyes bur btags pa yod pa'i rten can 'dzin par rtog pa gnyis pa brjod par bya ba yin pas de nye bar dgod par bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:54a-14: bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
T03TD3787E:54a-15: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram /
T03TD3787E:54a-16: zhes 'dri na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:54a-17: de ni rnam pa dgur 'gyur bas phung po btags par yod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:54a-18: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:54a-19: gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
T03TD3787E:54a-21: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so //
T03TD3787E:54a-22: zhes bya ba'i bar gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:54a-23: gzugs la sogs pa ni rdzas su med pa nyid kyis ni spangs pa'i don med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:54a-24: skye mched btags par yod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:54a-25: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:54a-26: mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:54a-27: de bzhin du yid kyang gzhan la sgyur ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
T03TD3787E:54a-29: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:54a-30: mig la sogs pa ni rdzas su med pa nyid kyis ni /
T03TD3787E:54b-0: skye ba'i sgo'i don med pa yin @54b pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:54b-1: khams btags par yod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:54b-2: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:54b-3: mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:54b-4: de rnams rdzas su med pa nyid kyis rigs kyi don med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:54b-5: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba btags par yod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:54b-6: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:54b-7: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:54b-8: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma rig pa la sogs pa rkyen so so ba dang tshogs rnams la skye ba'i don med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:54b-9: rnam par byang ba btags pa yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:54b-10: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:54b-11: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:54b-12: de rnams ni gzings dang 'dra ba nyid kyis gtan du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:54b-13: mthong ba'i lam btags pa yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:54b-14: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:54b-17: smon pa med pa'ang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
T03TD3787E:54b-19: de rnams ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs tshogs pa tsam yin pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid du yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:54b-20: bsgom pa'i lam la btags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:54b-21: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:54b-23: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:54b-24: de rnams ni yan lag dang dmigs pas yang dag par 'da' bas rdzas su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:54b-25: khyad par gyi lam btags pa yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:54b-26: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:55a-0: stong pa nyid thams cad kyang gzhan la sgyur ma yang gzhan gzhig yin snyam mam zhes gang @55a * //
T03TD3787E:55a-2: de rnams ni stong pa nyid du kun btags pas stong pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:55a-3: mi slob pa'i lam btags pa yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:55a-4: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:55a-5: stobs bcu yang gzhan la zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:55a-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam zhes bya ba'i bar gyis de rnams ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas skyes bur btags pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:55a-7: phung po la sogs pa rnams dang sgyu ma yang phan tshun de'i rang bzhin du 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:55a-8: sgyu ma yang skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa bkag pa'i sgo nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba 'ga' yang khas mi len pa dang /
T03TD3787E:55a-9: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:55a-11: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di rnams la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:55a-14: tha snyad du 'gyur ram zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:55a-15: sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu kho nar bslab par bya'o zhes nges par gzung bar shes par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:55a-16: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu de nyid ces bya ba phung po la sogs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' btags pa 'gog pa dang /
T03TD3787E:55a-17: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sgyu ma lta bu'i gzugs la zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:55a-18: nang stong pa nyid la phung po la sogs pa mi dmigs pas dpe'i don du mi 'thad pas phung po la sogs pa rnams rmi lam dang /
T03TD3787E:55a-22: sprul pa'i dpe rnams kyis dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas dpe'i don yin pa la gnod pa nyid kyis sems mi zhum pa nyid dang mi dngang ba la sogs pas thams cad shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3787E:55a-23: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3787E:55a-24: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:55b-0: de la dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin pa ni 'du @55b shes so //
T03TD3787E:55b-1: dngos po dang lhan cig tu bdag ces bya ba ni kun shes pa ste /
T03TD3787E:55b-2: dper na bdag gi mig gi gzugs rnams blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:55b-4: shes bya dag gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par shes pa ni gdags pa'o //
T03TD3787E:55b-5: gzhan zin pa dang ma zin pa'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs brjod pa ni tha snyad de /
T03TD3787E:55b-6: dper na 'jig rten na 'di ni nas so //
T03TD3787E:55b-9: 'dra ba'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:55b-10: mi zhum mi 'gong 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba tshig gsum po 'de rnams kyi nges par bstan pa ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig gsum por shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:55b-11: de la gnas ma yin pa la 'jigs pa ni dngang ba ste /
T03TD3787E:55b-13: de med pas na mi zhum pa'o //
T03TD3787E:55b-14: rgyun du 'jigs pa ni skrag pa ste /
T03TD3787E:55b-15: 'jigs pa skyes pa slar ma log pas so //
T03TD3787E:55b-16: de med pa ni mi 'gong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:55b-17: 'jigs pa nges par gyur pa ni skrag par 'gyur ba ste /
T03TD3787E:55b-18: de med pa'i phyir 'gyod par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T03TD3787E:55b-19: de la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po ni dngos po thams cad pa kho na yin la ;
T03TD3787E:55b-20: gnyis pa ni rnam par byang ba'i dngos po kho na yin te /
T03TD3787E:55b-21: 'di ni gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa 'di dag gi khyad par yin no //
T03TD3787E:55b-22: de ltar byas nas brjod pa gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po gang yin pa de ni gnyis pa yang yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig snga ma dang sbyar ro //
T03TD3787E:55b-23: re zhig dang po ni gnyis pa yang yin pa ni dper na /
T03TD3787E:55b-24: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang por gyur pa dngos po thams cad pa bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:55b-25: gnyis pa kho na yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:55b-26: dang po ma yin pa ni gzung ba'i rnam par rtog par gnyis pa rnam par byang ba'i dngos po la brten pa bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:55b-27: yang dag par ldan pa'i khyad par bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:55b-29: // / ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dbye bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni /
T03TD3787E:55b-30: gzhi dang de yi gnyen po yis //
T03TD3787E:55b-31: gzung bar rtog pa rnam pa gnyis //
T03TD3787E:55b-32: rmongs dang phung sogs bye brag gis //
T03TD3787E:56a-2: rdzas dang btags pa'i rten can gyi //
T03TD3787E:56a-4: rang dbang bdag sogs ngo bo dang //
T03TD3787E:56a-5: phung sogs rten las de bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:56a-7: thabs mkhas pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su 'dzin pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:56a-8: zhes gsungs pa de la thabs mkhas pa'i dbang du mdzad nas sems mi zhum pa nyid dang mi dngang ba la sogs pa'i rgyu las brtsams nas /
T03TD3787E:56a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams la so sor mi rtag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:56a-14: dben pa rnams su mi rtog pas so sor rtog pa dang /
T03TD3787E:56a-15: de dag nyid kyi mi dmigs pa dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas de dag nyid la mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i chos ston pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:56a-16: de dag nyid la mi rtag pa la sogs par yid la byed pas mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:56a-17: de bzhin du sa'i khams la sogs pa drug po rnams la mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzod cing 'dong la so sor rtog pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:56a-18: phung po la sogs pa rnams la mi rtag pa la sogs par so sor rtog cing mi dmigs pa dang ldan pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa mi 'dor ba brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:56a-19: theg pa dman pa dang ldan ba'i yid la byed pa'i skabs mi 'byed pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:56a-20: phung po la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar rnams de'i stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid yin pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:56a-21: de rnams dang de'i stong pa nyid dag phan tshun de'i rang bzhin du rjes su shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:56b-0: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas pha rol tu phyin pa @56b nas /
T03TD3787E:56b-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar rnams sgom par byed cing der dmigs te rlom pas ni dngang ba la sogs pa rnams 'gyur bas na thabs la mkhas pa yin par thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par gyi don du bstan pas gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:56b-2: thabs la mkhas pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:56b-4: // / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su 'dzin pa ni phung po la sogs pa nas ma 'dres pa'i chos kyi bar rnams mi rtag pa la sogs pa rnams su mi dmigs par ston zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngor 'jug pa rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:56b-5: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang bral bar bya ba'i don du snyan dang gas mkhan gyi rang bzor byas pa'i snyan dang gas su rjod par byed pa 'di dang /
T03TD3787E:56b-6: sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du 'ongs nas khyod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pas ci zhig bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rang gi las dang /
T03TD3787E:56b-8: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:56b-9: khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa slu ba nye bar ston pa dang /
T03TD3787E:56b-10: mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams nas /
T03TD3787E:56b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar rnams bdag dang bdag bdag gis stong pa yin na /
T03TD3787E:56b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ba dang /
T03TD3787E:56b-13: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang /
T03TD3787E:56b-17: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i cha lugs la sogs par 'ongs ba'i bar la yang brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:56b-18: de ltar nye bar ston pa po bdud kyi chos slu ba nye bar ston pa la /
T03TD3787E:56b-19: 'di dag ni bdud kyi las yin no zhes byang chub sems dpa' la mi ston pa 'di ni sdig pa'i grogs po yin no zhes rig par byas nas /
T03TD3787E:56b-20: de yongs su spang bar bya'o zhes dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khyad par gyi don du mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mtshan nying bstan pas gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:56b-21: yongs su 'dzin pa'i bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni /
T03TD3787E:57a-0: @57a * // sems mi 'gong ba nyid la sogs //
T03TD3787E:57a-1: ngo bo nyid med sogs ste /
T03TD3787E:57a-3: de yi mi mthun phyogs bor ba /
T03TD3787E:57a-4: rnam pa kun du yongs 'dzin yin //
T03TD3787E:57a-5: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:57a-6: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams zhes bya ba la 'byed pa ni rnam par 'byed pa yin pas rnam par mi rtog par 'byed pa ni nges par 'byed pa ste /
T03TD3787E:57a-7: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhi po rnams kyi gnyen po mthong ba'i lam mo //
T03TD3787E:57a-8: de'i cha ste phyogs gcig la skyed par byed pa nyid kyis phan pa'i phyir mthun pa ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams yin no //
T03TD3787E:57a-9: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:57a-11: // / sgrub pa'i rten brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:57a-12: rigs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:57a-13: de ni sgrub pa'i chos kyi gnas skabs tha dad pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bcu gsum du 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:57a-15: rtogs pa yi ni chos drug dang //
T03TD3787E:57a-17: de dag gi ci yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:57a-18: rten la rigs zhes brjod ces mthar 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:57a-20: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3787E:57a-23: / gang gi phyir sems bskyed pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:57a-24: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun par rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:57a-25: mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam de dang der byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod pa /
T03TD3787E:57a-26: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ci lags /
T03TD3787E:57a-28: rtogs pa'i chos de dang de'i rten gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:57a-29: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don med pa ste /
T03TD3787E:57a-31: byang chub la ni skye ba'am yod pa nyid yod pa 'am /
T03TD3787E:57a-34: 'dis ni rten byang chub rdzas su med pa'i 'thad pas skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi rigs ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:57a-35: dngos por gyur pa'i tshig gi don ni ma yin no zhes bya bar ston to //
T03TD3787E:57b-0: de la dro bar gyur pa'i rten @57b ni ;
T03TD3787E:57b-2: nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med ces bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-10: sprul pa la gnas med cing /
T03TD3787E:57b-11: dmigs su med pa'i dpes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:57b-12: dpe dgu po de dag gi don bstan pa ni /
T03TD3787E:57b-13: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang po dang yang dag par ldan pa gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po rnam pa dgur brjod pa gang yin pa de'i dbye ba dang bstun par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:57b-14: gzhung mngas pa spangs pa'i don du kho bo cag gis ni rnam par ma spros so //
T03TD3787E:57b-15: de bzhin du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gzhan dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-17: bsgom pa'i lam dag la yang bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-18: dpe'i don gyi khyad par rnams tshul bstun pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:57b-19: rtse mor gyur pa'i rten ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-21: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-22: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-27: bden pa nyid kyi gnas med pa nyid dang ;
T03TD3787E:57b-28: dmigs su med pa nyid kyi dpes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:57b-29: bzod par gyur pa'i rten ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-33: rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-34: de nyid kyi mig la sogs pa'i tshig gi don dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-35: de nyid kyi gzugs la sogs pa'i tshig gi don dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-36: de nyid kyi mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs pa'i dpes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:57b-37: chos kyi mig gi rten ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-38: de nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-39: de nyid kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-40: de nyid kyi stobs la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-41: de nyid kyi phung po rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-42: de nyid kyi khams rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-43: de nyid kyi skye mched rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-44: de nyid kyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:57b-45: de nyid kyi bsam gtan dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-0: @58a * // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs pa'i dpes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:58a-1: mthong ba'i lam gyi rten ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po'i tshig gi don dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-2: de nyid mig nas yid kyi bar gyi tshig gi don dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-3: de nyid kyi nang la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid rnams nas stobs la sogs pa'i bar gyi tshig gi don dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-4: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-5: 'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med cing rjes su mi dmigs pa'i dpes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:58a-6: bsgom pa'i lam gyi rten ni skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-8: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-9: rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-10: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-12: dmigs pa med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs pa'i dpe dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-14: rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:58a-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-20: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-21: rnam par byang ba'i tshig gi don dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-22: de dag nyid dben pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-23: mtshan ma med pa'i gnas dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-24: yang byang chub kyi phyogs dang bdag dang srog la sogs pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i gnas med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:58a-25: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa gsum po sgom pa yang nas yang du goms pa nyid shes par bya ba'i don du gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:58a-26: gnyen po dang ni spong ba dang //
T03TD3787E:58a-28: gnyen po dang spang ba gnyis kyi rten gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:58a-29: rigs yin no zhes bya ba skabs su bab pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:58a-30: de la gnyen po'i rten ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba'i 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs pa'i dpes gsangs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:58b-0: mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba'i rten ni bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe 'du byed kyi gnas med cing rjes su @58b mi dmigs pa nyid kyi dpes bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spang ba'i don gyis gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:58b-1: de dag yongs su gtugs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:58b-3: gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba gang dag yin pa de dag yongs su gtugs pa'i rten zhes rjes su 'jug go //
T03TD3787E:58b-4: de la gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa spang ba'i rten ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:58b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang /
T03TD3787E:58b-9: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po rnams la de dang de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnas med cing nye bar mi dmigs pa nyid kyi dpes shes bya'i sgrib pa spang ba'i don gyis gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:58b-10: shes rab snying brtser bcas pa dang //
T03TD3787E:58b-12: shes rab dang snying brtse'i rten ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:58b-13: shes rab dang snying brtse 'bar ba dang 'dod pa dag gis 'khor ba ji srid bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos nyid du gnas pa nyid kyis gnyi gar mi gnas par shes par bya ba'i don gyis gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:58b-14: slob ma thun mong min nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:58b-16: thun mongs ma yin pa'i yon tan gyi rten ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:58b-17: nyan thos la sogs pa gza' dang /
T03TD3787E:58b-18: nor bu rin po che dang /
T03TD3787E:58b-19: skar ma'i ye shes rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:58b-20: thun mong ma yin pa mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gzhan du 'phro ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba nyid kyis gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:58b-21: gzhan gyi don gyi go rims dang //
T03TD3787E:58b-23: gzhan gyi don gyi go rims kyi rten ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:58b-24: lha'i ris su rnam par gzhag pa dang 'dra bar 'jig rten gyi dge legs gong nas gong du khyad par du 'gro ba'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyis gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:58b-25: ye shes rtsol ba mi mnga' bar //
T03TD3787E:58b-28: mthar go bar byed pa ni /
T03TD3787E:58b-29: rten la rigs zhes brjod ces bya ba'o //
T03TD3787E:58b-30: de la ye shes lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'i rten ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:59a-0: sems can thams cad kyi don @59a * //
T03TD3787E:59a-1: dang mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:59a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de la gnas ni rten gyi dngos po'o //
T03TD3787E:59a-4: med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la med pa las bzlog pa 'di yod pa'i don yin pa'i phyir med pas mi dmigs pa stong pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:59a-6: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang gis byang chub gang gis byang chub sems dpa' yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:59a-7: gang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i tshig gi don gyis chos 'di dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin /
T03TD3787E:59a-8: gzugs med pa bstan du med pa /
T03TD3787E:59a-12: mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bya ba'i tshig ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3787E:59a-13: mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam gzhir byas nas bkod pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:59a-14: de ni khyad par rtogs par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:59a-15: ma mthong ba mthong ba dang /
T03TD3787E:59a-16: mthong ba la mngon du phyogs par byed pa'i gnas skabs rnams su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i gnas skabs ldan pa dang mi ldan pa dag dang /
T03TD3787E:59a-19: phan tshun 'brel ba snga na med bskyed pa dag dang /
T03TD3787E:59a-20: de yod pas gzhan mi 'jug pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T03TD3787E:59a-21: tha dad pa med pa'i dbang du byas nas 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:59a-22: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:59a-26: gcig yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:59a-27: 'o na sgrub pa'i rten gyi mtshan nyid gang yin snyam na /
T03TD3787E:59a-28: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi chags pa med pa nyid dang yod par ma gyur pa nyid la bslab par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:59a-29: rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pas so zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3787E:59b-0: de la @59b rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa ni dngos po dang de'i mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa ste /
T03TD3787E:59b-1: de med pa'i phyir chags pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:59b-2: yod par ma gyur pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
T03TD3787E:59b-3: des na 'dis ni chos kyi dbyings nyid 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rigs sgrub pa'i rten yin no zhes ston par byed do //
T03TD3787E:59b-4: gal te rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rigs 'ga' zhig yod na ci'i phyir thog ma dang bral ba'i 'khor bar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mya ngan las 'das kyang da dung du yang rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i srog chags rnams mya ngan las 'das she na /
T03TD3787E:59b-5: de ni nyes dmigs rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:59b-9: gzhan gyi dbang rnams ni de'i nyes pa yin no zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:59b-10: 'dir ni bar chad med pa nyid la rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rigs su mngon par 'dod do //
T03TD3787E:59b-11: gzhan dag ni rigs ni skye mched drug gi khyad par yin no //
T03TD3787E:59b-12: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:59b-13: rkyen gyis yang dag par blangs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:59b-14: rang bzhin du gnas pa'o zhes zer ro //
T03TD3787E:59b-15: de dag gis ni rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rigs la rang bzhin du brjod pa'i don brjod dgos so //
T03TD3787E:59b-16: rgyu'i rnam grangs yin no zhe na /
T03TD3787E:59b-17: rkyen gyis yang dag par blangs pa yang de yin pa des na don gyi khyad par ci yod /
T03TD3787E:59b-18: chos nyid kyi rnam gangs yin pa la ni nyes pa 'di med do //
T03TD3787E:59b-19: yang na de dag gi rigs ni btags pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:59b-20: 'di ni mtshan nyid pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:59b-21: nges na de dang 'di dang 'grigs pa ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:59b-22: gal te chos kyi dbyings rigs nyid yin na thams cad rigs la gnas par 'gyur te /

T03TD3787E:59b-24: ji ltar dmigs pa na 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur ba de ltar rigs yin par brjod pa de na 'dir ha cang thal ba ji ste tshol bar byed /
T03TD3787E:59b-25: de lta na'ang chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir /

T03TD3787E:59b-27: 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs so //
T03TD3787E:60a-0: @60a * // sangs rgyas kyi rigs so zhes /
T03TD3787E:60a-1: rigs ni tha dad rung ma yin //

T03TD3787E:60a-8: brten pa'i chos kyi bye brag gis //

T03TD3787E:60a-11: gang la 'du byed cung zad kyang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:60a-12: 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs yin te /
T03TD3787E:60a-13: rigs de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis khyad par med pa'o //
T03TD3787E:60a-14: rigs de ni thams cad kyi tshe chos kyi de bzhin nyid yin pas chos kyi ro gcig tu gyur pa nyid kyis rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03TD3787E:60a-15: nges pa'i tshig ni yon tan sgrol ba'i don gyis na rigs te /
T03TD3787E:60a-16: de las yon tan de dang de dag skye zhing 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:60a-17: de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba yin no zhes brjod do //
T03TD3787E:60a-18: yang gzhan dag na re go zhes bya ba ni sa yin la sa'ang gnas yin te /
T03TD3787E:60a-19: lhan cig spyod pas gnas pa srog chags rnams la go'i sgrar nye bar 'dogs so //
T03TD3787E:60a-20: de bas na sas bsdus pa rnams skyob par byed pas rigs so //
T03TD3787E:60a-21: yang na phyogs rnams go yin pa'i phyir phyogs na gnas pa'i srog chags rnams la go zhes gdags te /
T03TD3787E:60a-22: des na gang skyob par byed pas rigs yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3787E:60a-23: sems bskyed pa dang thar pa dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams de sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir dang po kho nar rigs bshad par bya ba ma yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:60a-24: de ni don gyi go rims yin la 'bras bus rgyu rtogs par byed pa yin pa 'di ni rtogs pa'i go ri mas yin no //
T03TD3787E:60b-0: 'di ltar rigs nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams la 'khrul par mthong pa yin @60b no ;
T03TD3787E:60b-3: gnyis slob rigs las bzlog nas ni //
T03TD3787E:60b-4: sangs rgyas su 'gyur gzhan gsum yang //
T03TD3787E:60b-6: sgrub pa'i rten bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:60b-8: // / sgrub pa'i dmigs pa bshad par bya ba yin pas /
T03TD3787E:60b-9: dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad de //
T03TD3787E:60b-11: de dag kyang gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:60b-12: de yang dge la sogs pa yin //
T03TD3787E:60b-13: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:60b-14: sogs pa zhes bya ba smos pas ni mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dag bsdu'o //
T03TD3787E:60b-15: ci de dag kho na tsam du zad dam zhe na /
T03TD3787E:60b-16: 'jig rten pa yi rtog pa dang //
T03TD3787E:60b-18: zag bcas zag pa med chos dang //
T03TD3787E:60b-20: slob ma thun mong chos rnams dang //
T03TD3787E:60b-21: gang dag thub pa'i thun mong min //
T03TD3787E:60b-23: de la dge ba'i chos ni 'di dag yin te /
T03TD3787E:60b-26: dge sbyong du 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs rgya cher gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:60b-27: dge sbyong nyid la dge sbyong du 'dzin pas so //
T03TD3787E:60b-28: mi dge ba'i chos ni mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:60b-30: ma byin par len pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:60b-31: srog gcod pa la sogs pa rnams ni mi dge ba kho na yi na pas so //
T03TD3787E:60b-32: lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams ni /
T03TD3787E:60b-33: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:60b-34: lung du ma bstan pa nyid ces nges par gzung bar shes pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:60b-35: gzhan du na lus la sogs pa'i las dge ba 'am mi dge bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:60b-36: 'jig rten pa'i chos ni phung po lnga dang /
T03TD3787E:60b-39: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
T03TD3787E:60b-42: gzugs med pa'i snyam par 'jug pa zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:60b-43: 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa nyid yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:60b-44: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni bsam gtan bzhi dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:61a-1: chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad ces bya ba'i bar du rgya cher gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:61a-2: 'phags pa'i lam gyis bsdus pas na /
T03TD3787E:61a-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:61a-4: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni /

T03TD3787E:61a-6: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ;

T03TD3787E:61a-8: zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin te /

T03TD3787E:61a-10: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni //

T03TD3787E:61a-13: 'di dag ni bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po yin pas zag pa med pa nyid yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:61a-18: khams gsum par ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:61a-19: byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:61a-20: 'di dag ni rkyen rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas byas pa yin pa'i phyir 'dus byas nyid yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:61a-22: gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:61a-23: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid du mi mngon pas te /
T03TD3787E:61a-25: 'dod chags la sogs pa zad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:61a-26: 'di dag ni rgyu dang rkyen rnams la ltos pa med pa nyid kyis na 'dus ma byas pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:61a-28: bsam gtan bzhi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:61a-29: 'di dag ni rgyud gzhan la yang 'byung ba nyid kyis na thun mong gi chos nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:61a-30: thun mongs ma yin pa'i chos ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
T03TD3787E:61a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:61b-0: 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud la 'byung ba nyid @61b kyis na thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:61b-1: gang dag chos kyi dbyings nyid dmigs pa yin no snyam du sems pa de dag gis dmigs pa'i dag pa gong nas gong du khyad par du 'gro ba ji ltar yin zhes bya ba brjod dgos so //
T03TD3787E:61b-2: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' rnams //
T03TD3787E:61b-3: dag pa bzhin du dag par 'dod //
T03TD3787E:61b-4: ces bya ba yin no zhe na /
T03TD3787E:61b-5: de lta na ni mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa spong ba med pas dag pa phyogs gcig par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:61b-6: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ni dmigs pa med do zhes 'byung bas khyed kyi phyogs la yang dmigs pa dag pa'i mthar thug par mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T03TD3787E:61b-8: chos rnams 'khrul pa tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:61b-10: gnyis su med pa ni dngos po med pa'o //

T03TD3787E:61b-13: mngon par zhen pa ni gnyis kyi mtshan nyid yin gyi /

T03TD3787E:61b-16: des na 'di la khyed 'khrul par zad do //
T03TD3787E:61b-17: de ltar na rang bzhin gtsor gyur pa ni rigs yin la rnam 'gyur gtsor gyur pa ni dmigs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:61b-18: gnyi ga'ang gnyi gar ma bkag pa des na rten dang dmigs pa dag gi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba dang dmigs pa dag pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba'ang 'thad par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:61b-20: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad kyi ma chags pa nyid dang /

T03TD3787E:61b-25: dmigs pa rnam par dag pa la brjod par bya ba mang du yod de /

T03TD3787E:62a-19: phyir mi ldog pa'i bar gyi mchog nyid du byed pas so zhes bya ba yin no //

T03TD3787E:62a-21: chen po zhes bya ba ni dpag tu med pa'o //

T03TD3787E:62a-23: sems can gyi sde zhes bya ba ni zhugs pa dang lam gyi 'bras bu la gnas pa'i sde'i dbye bas so //
T03TD3787E:62a-24: gang dag gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag kyang gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:62a-25: de la rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de /

T03TD3787E:62a-28: gang 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du 'khor ba dpag tu med par go cha bgo bar bya'o snyam pas 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:62a-29: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ste /
T03TD3787E:62a-30: bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:62b-0: sems @62b can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang de dag theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pa ste /
T03TD3787E:62b-2: chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par rtogs pa nyid kyis dang /

T03TD3787E:62b-4: ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i sems dang ma 'dres pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3787E:62b-5: thams cad rjes su spong bar rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par bya ba nyid kyis dang /

T03TD3787E:62b-7: sems can ngan 'gror skyes pa thams cad las /
T03TD3787E:62b-8: sems can re re'i don gyi phyir de rnams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du rang nyid kyis de'i sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes khas blangs pas phyis rang gi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:62b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:62b-10: sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags la sogs pa dang /

T03TD3787E:62b-13: sems can thams cad skyob cing yongs su mi gtong ba dag dang /
T03TD3787E:62b-14: des rlom sems su yang mi byed pas na phan pa dang bde ba'i sems kyis so //
T03TD3787E:62b-15: chos zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dbyer med pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:62b-16: de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni chos la dga' ba'o //
T03TD3787E:62b-17: de la sgom zhing mang du byed pa gang yin pa de ni chos la kun du dga' ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:62b-20: kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang /
T03TD3787E:62b-21: stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
T03TD3787E:62b-22: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad kyi bar dang /
T03TD3787E:62b-23: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T03TD3787E:63a-0: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par @63a * //
T03TD3787E:63a-1: grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas nas sems can gyi mchog nyid du byed pas te /

T03TD3787E:63a-3: sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu bya ba'i chos ni de dag yin te /
T03TD3787E:63a-4: des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:63a-5: spong ba chen po nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu spobs pa ston pa gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:63a-6: bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang /
T03TD3787E:63a-7: sems can du lta ba dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:63a-8: chad pa dang rtag pa lta ba dang /
T03TD3787E:63a-9: yod pa dang med par lta ba dang /
T03TD3787E:63a-10: phung por lta ba dang zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:63a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad dang sems can yongs su smin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:63a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /
T03TD3787E:63a-13: byang chub rnam par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:63a-14: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar gyi lta ba rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa nyid kyis dang /
T03TD3787E:63a-15: thabs la mi mkhas pa dang ldan pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i lta ba'i tshogs bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur pa nyid kyis bshad ma thag pa mi dmigs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa khyad par du byed pa 'di nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:63a-16: de la nga rgyal bskyed pa'i don gyis na bdag ste /
T03TD3787E:63a-17: 'di las nga rgyal skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:63a-18: zhum pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas na sems can no //
T03TD3787E:63a-19: srog gi dbang po'i dbang gis skal pa mnyam pa'i ris yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du gnas pas na srog go //
T03TD3787E:63a-20: las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis skye zhing mi rtag pa nyid kyis skye bar byed pas na skye ba pa'o //
T03TD3787E:63a-21: kham du byas pa la sogs pa'i zas kyis rgyas par byed pas na gso ba'o //
T03TD3787E:63a-22: bu ni lus la bya bar bshad la de la brten pas na pu ru sha ste skyes bu'o //
T03TD3787E:63a-23: gzhan dag ni skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pas skyes bu yin no zhes zer te /
T03TD3787E:63b-0: de dag gi ltar na gzugs mkhas pa rnams skyes bu ma yin par 'gyur @63b bas mi rigs so //
T03TD3787E:63b-1: 'gro ba rnams su yang dang yang du brten pas na gang zag go //
T03TD3787E:63b-2: gtsor yid kyi las las skyes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yid las skyes so //
T03TD3787E:63b-3: nga rgyal srung bar byed pa yin pas na shes bdag go //
T03TD3787E:63b-4: dge ba la sogs pa'i las la brten pa nyid kyis na byed pa po'o//
T03TD3787E:63b-5: de'i rnam par smin pas so sor kun du myong bas na tshor ba po'o //
T03TD3787E:63b-6: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir shes pa po'o //
T03TD3787E:63b-7: mig la sogs pa rnam par shes pa lnga'i rten du gyur pa'i phyir mthong ba po'o //
T03TD3787E:63b-8: sngon byung ba da ltar med pas na chad pa'o //
T03TD3787E:63b-9: rang bzhin gyis yod pa gang yin pa de ni med pa ma yin pas na rtag pa'o //
T03TD3787E:63b-10: yod pa gang yin pa de ni rtag tu yod pa nyid yin la /
T03TD3787E:63b-11: med pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa'i lta ba ste /
T03TD3787E:63b-12: dper na ser skya ba lta bu'o //
T03TD3787E:63b-13: lta ba lhag ma ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T03TD3787E:63b-14: rtogs pa chen po nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:63b-15: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi spobs pa ston pas /
T03TD3787E:63b-16: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems /
T03TD3787E:63b-17: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems /
T03TD3787E:63b-19: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems /
T03TD3787E:63b-20: zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i sems gang lags pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis te /
T03TD3787E:63b-21: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:63b-22: de la byang chub pa'i don gyi sems ni /
T03TD3787E:63b-24: mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams yin la /
T03TD3787E:63b-25: de rnams dang mnyam pas na mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o //
T03TD3787E:63b-27: 'di ltar sems de ni sems ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:63b-28: des na de de la chags pa med do //
T03TD3787E:63b-29: yang mnyam pa gang gis sems de mi mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang mnyam zhe na /
T03TD3787E:63b-30: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos 'ga' yang skye ba'am 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:64a-0: skye ba la sogs pa las rnam par grol ba thun mong ma yin pa'i sems kyi mtshan @64a * //
T03TD3787E:64a-1: nyid kyis gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:64a-2: de la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste zhas bya ba ni brda las byung ba nas so //
T03TD3787E:64a-3: chos gang la'ang skye ba'am 'gag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni drod kyi dus su snga ma dang phyi ma'i gnas skabs dang 'gag pa dang skye ba dmigs pa'i tshul du mi mthong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:64a-4: 'grib pa dang 'phel ba mi mthong zhes bya ba ni /
T03TD3787E:64a-5: rtse mo'i dus su sngon dang phyi ma'i gnas skabs dag zad pa dang khyad par du 'gro ba dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi mthong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:64a-6: 'ong ba dang 'gro ba mi mthong zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i dus su rtogs pa'i chos kyi nye ba dang ring ba dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi mthong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:64a-7: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:64a-8: rnam par byang ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi dus su mi mthun pa dang ;
T03TD3787E:64a-9: gnyen po'i phyogs dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi mthong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:64a-10: gang la zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gang gis mi mthong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:64a-11: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang ;
T03TD3787E:64a-12: rnam par byang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pas bsgom pa'i lam ston pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:64a-13: ji ltar mthong ba la mngon du phyogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:64a-14: de la nyan thos kyi sems med do //
T03TD3787E:64a-15: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do zhes bya ba ni sems bskyed pa'i thun mong ma yin pa nyid gsal bar byed do //
T03TD3787E:64a-16: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:64a-17: chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid du khas blangs pas ni rtogs pa'i yul ston pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:64a-18: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med dam zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:64a-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos la chags pa med pa nyid du khas blangs pas sems de la mngon par zhen pa dang rlom sems bkag cing shes bya dang shes pa gnyis mi dmigs pa'i sbyor bas rtogs pa la brten pa'i chags pa bsal bar ston pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:64b-0: de la gzugs ni gzugs kyi chos nyid @64b do //
T03TD3787E:64b-1: de la ma chags pa ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin du 'khrul pa rnam par dpyad pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:64b-2: des na de ltar spangs pa dang rtogs pa'i khyad par can gyi tshogs chen po dang /
T03TD3787E:64b-3: sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma rgyal ba la rgyal ba'i ched du bya ba dang chos mthun par byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par can nyid sgrub pa'i ched du bya ba yin par rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:64b-4: dmigs pa dang ched du bya ba la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T03TD3787E:64b-5: dmigs pa ni de'i che ba yin la /
T03TD3787E:64b-6: ched du bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa skal ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:64b-7: mda' ltong sbyor ba dang 'bem la phog pa dang chos mtshungs so //
T03TD3787E:64b-10: ched du bya ba bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:64b-12: // / da ni sgrub pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:64b-13: de la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi yul la ni spyir dkar po'i chos kyi rten can gyi bya ba ni sgrub pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:64b-14: rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi la ni mngon par rtogs pa so so la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis thogs pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:64b-15: 'dzin pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sgrub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:64b-16: gnas brtan gang po'i spobs pa gsal bar byed pas sgrub pa'i don gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:64b-17: bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags so zhes bya ba nas brtsams pas 'di tsam zhes tshad yongs sum bcad pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi don du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod pa'i go cha sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bya ba shes pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:64b-18: de nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pas sgrub pa gzhan gyi don gtsor gyur pa yin pa'i khyad par shes par bya ba'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:64b-19: de la sgrub pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03TD3787E:64b-24: de la go cha'i sgrub pa rnam pa drug gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:64b-26: de dag so sor sbyin pa sogs //
T03TD3787E:65a-2: go cha'i sgrub pa gang yin te /
T03TD3787E:65a-3: drug tshan drug gis ji bzhin bshad //
T03TD3787E:65a-5: ji ltar na drug tshan drug gis yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:65a-6: byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas sbyin pa gtong ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:65a-7: de nyid kyi nyan thos la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:65a-8: de nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams la bzod pa dang 'dod pa dang nye bar rtog pa nyid bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:65a-9: de la dang por nye bar gnas pa la ni bzod pa'o //
T03TD3787E:65a-10: skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa rnams su ni 'dod pa'o //
T03TD3787E:65a-11: rnam pa du mar nye bar rtog pa ni nye bar rtog pa'o //
T03TD3787E:65a-12: de nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de la na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:65a-13: de nyid kyi theg pa gzhan gyi sems dang ma 'dres pa'i rtse gcig pa nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:65a-14: de nyid kyi sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pas sbyin par bya ba dang gtong ba po dang len pa po mi dmigs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha yin pa nyid kyis gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:65a-15: 'di ni go cha'i sgrub pa las sbyin pa'i go cha ste drug tshan dang po'o /
T03TD3787E:65a-17: // / de nyid kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de bzhin du spyod pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3787E:65a-18: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gsum pa'o //
T03TD3787E:65a-19: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bzhi pa'o /
T03TD3787E:65a-20: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni lnga ba'o //
T03TD3787E:65a-21: de nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni drug pa'o //
T03TD3787E:65a-22: de ltar na 'de dag drug tshan drug tu 'gyur yang go cha rnam pa drug tu chos mthun pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:65a-23: spyin pa la sogs par chos mthun pa'i phyir go cha'i sgrub pa drug bshad pa yin no /
T03TD3787E:65b-0: // / @65b rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mtshan ma med par byed pa'i mi dmigs pa ni go cha sgrub pa'i rang gi ngo bo chen po nyid shes par byed pa'i don can go cha chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:65b-1: de bsam gtan la sogs pa la snyoms par 'jug par yang byed cing de dag gi ro myang bar yang mi byed /
T03TD3787E:65b-2: de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur /
T03TD3787E:65b-3: de dag gi dbang gis skye ba'ang ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:65b-4: bsam gtan la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:65b-7: smon pa med pa mthong bas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya bas go cha'i sgrub pa'i yongs su 'dzin pas thabs mkhas pa chen po nyid yin par shes par byed pa'i don can thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:65b-8: go cha'i sgrub pa'i yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po nyid du shes par byed pa'i don can phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis sangs rgyas rnams bsngags pa la sogs pas gsungs pas de ltar go cha'i sgrub pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:65b-9: go cha'i sgrub pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:65b-11: // /'jug pa'i sgrub pa brjod par bya ba yin pa las de ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:65b-13: theg pa chen po la 'jug pa dang de la 'dzeg pa'o //
T03TD3787E:65b-14: de lta bas na mdo las kyang /
T03TD3787E:65b-15: tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'jug ba dang theg pa chen po la 'dzeg par 'gyur ba yin zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:65b-16: de 'ang don gcig pa nyid kyis 'jug pa ni 'dzeg pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:65b-17: 'dzeg pa'ang 'jug pa yin no zhes ming gcig nyid du rnam par gzhag pas rnam pa dgur 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:65b-18: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:65b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:65b-22: mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:65b-23: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:65b-24: ched du bya ba'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:66a-0: @66a * // mngon par shes pa'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:66a-1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3787E:66a-3: bsam gtan gzugs med sbyin sogs dang //
T03TD3787E:66a-4: lam dang byams la sogs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:66a-5: dmigs pa med dang ldan pa dang //
T03TD3787E:66a-6: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa dang //
T03TD3787E:66a-7: ched du bya dang mngon shes drug / rnam kun mkhyen pa'i tshul la ni //
T03TD3787E:66a-8: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa theg chen la //
T03TD3787E:66a-9: 'dzeg pa yin pa shes par bya //
T03TD3787E:66a-11: de la bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug nga dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ni /
T03TD3787E:66a-12: byang chub sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nam mkha'i rnam pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'jug cing ldang ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba theg pa chen po yin pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:66a-13: nam mkha'i rnam pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dmigs su med pa'i rnam pa can gyi lam yongs su 'dzin pas rnam pa med pa dang rtags med pa dang mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3787E:66a-15: 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:66a-16: rtags ni rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:66a-18: dben pa la skyes pa'i dga' ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:66a-19: yang na sa 'og ma dang gong ma'i dbye bas rags pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa ni rnam pa'o //
T03TD3787E:66a-20: sa gang la tshor ba gang zhig yod pa de ni rtags so //
T03TD3787E:66a-21: snyoms par 'jug pa'i dben pa'i ro myang ba ni mtshan ma'o //
T03TD3787E:66a-22: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas sems cad rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-0: de nyid kyi theg pa dman pa'i sems kyi go skabs mi 'byed pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen @66b po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-1: de nyid kyi sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam pa'i yid la byed pa de dag la bzod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-3: yongs su rtogs par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-4: khong du chud par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-5: nges par nye bar sems pa rnams ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-6: de la yongs su brtags nas gzung ba'i don yongs su bskyang bar bya ba'i phyir de yongs su nyams par byed pa'i rkyen shes par byed pa ni khong du chud par byed pa'o //
T03TD3787E:66b-7: don de nye bar gnas par bzung nas blo ma lus par 'god par byed pa ni sems pa'o //
T03TD3787E:66b-8: de nyid kyi brtson 'grus mi gtong ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-9: de nyid kyi bsam gtan dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-10: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la dmigs su med pa'i rnam par snyoms par 'jug pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-11: de nyid kyi bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-17: smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:66b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po yin pa nyid kyis gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:66b-20: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gsum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:66b-21: rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid gsum gyis bsdus pa ni rnam par sgom pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:66b-22: tshad med pa bzhi la 'jug pa ni /
T03TD3787E:66b-23: yang tshad med pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-24: theg pa dman pa'i sems dang ma 'dres pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:66b-25: bsam gtan gyi ro myang ba ni shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:67a-0: tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa ni bsam gtan gyi @67a * //
T03TD3787E:67a-1: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:67a-2: sems can rnams la zag pa zad pa stobs par byed pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:67a-3: tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:67a-4: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po yin pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:67a-5: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rim pa'i bye brag 'di ni tshad med pa bzhi la gnas pa'i gang zag gi dbang du byas par rig par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:67a-6: de nyid la srid pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:67a-7: yang tshad med pa dag ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03TD3787E:67a-13: byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:67a-14: de dag re re zhing rnam pa gsum ste /
T03TD3787E:67a-15: sems can la dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:67a-18: de la sems can la dmigs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:67a-19: rgyu rnam pa bzhis rnam par bzhag ste /
T03TD3787E:67a-20: nye bar sgrub pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:67a-21: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnyen po nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:67a-22: rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:67a-23: 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:67a-24: nye bar sgrub pas ji ltar zhe na /
T03TD3787E:67a-25: bde ba gsum nye bar sgrub pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:67a-26: de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni phan pa dang bde ba nye bar sgrub par nye bar gnas pas so //
T03TD3787E:67a-27: yangs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na bde ba nye bar sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:67a-28: rgya chen por gyur pa zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sa zhes bya ba'i don te /
T03TD3787E:67a-29: de gnyis la ni dga' ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:67a-30: mi gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T03TD3787E:67a-31: de ni sdug bsngal dang dga' ba dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:67a-33: tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu tshad med pa'i phyir na chu bo chen po bzhi'i chu 'dus pa dang 'dra bar /
T03TD3787E:67a-34: de nyid tshad med par shes par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:67a-35: ji skad du bshad pa'i bde ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:67b-0: de ltar na @67b zhig nye bar sgrub pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:67b-1: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnyen po las ji ltar zhe na 'khor med pa zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3787E:67b-2: mi 'dod pa nye bar sgrub pa dang /
T03TD3787E:67b-3: 'dod pa nye bar sgrub pa'i gnod byed pa'i gnod byed kyi gnyen po yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:67b-4: rnam par dag ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:67b-5: 'gran zla med pas sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3787E:67b-6: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin gnyid dang /
T03TD3787E:67b-9: 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa dag zhi bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:67b-10: legs par mnyam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:67b-11: 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pas ji lta bu zhe na /
T03TD3787E:67b-12: gnod pa med pa zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3787E:67b-13: gzugs dang 'dod pa'i khams kyi rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu gnod pa med pa nyid ci rigs par yongs su 'dzin pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:67b-14: de ltar re zhig sems can la dmigs ba rgyu rnam pa bzhis rnam par bzhag pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:67b-15: chos la dmigs pa ni thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba gcig gis yin te /
T03TD3787E:67b-16: thams cad rjes su song ba nyid kyis 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i so so'i skye bo dang slob pa'i chos ji snyed pa ste /
T03TD3787E:67b-17: gang dag la sems can du gdags par byed pa de la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:67b-18: shin tu bsgoms pas zhes bya ba ni shin tu goms par byas ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:67b-19: dmigs pa med pa ni rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis te /
T03TD3787E:67b-20: 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa zhes bya ba ni chos bdag med pa gtsor gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid la dmigs pa nyid do //
T03TD3787E:67b-21: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa zhes bya ba ni mtha' yongs su chad pa med pa nyid kyang yin pa ste /
T03TD3787E:67b-22: de ltar na dmigs pa med pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:67b-23: yang byams pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i sems des ci zhig byed ce na /
T03TD3787E:67b-24: de'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas rnam par gnas pa zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3787E:67b-25: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa'i bsam pa'i lhag par mos pas khyab par byang chub par byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:68a-0: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mang po'i don la yin par shes par @68a * //
T03TD3787E:68a-2: sems can la sogs pa'i don la mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:68a-3: ring po ni padm'a wa ti zhes bya ba bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:68a-4: nye bar bsgrubs nas rnam par gnas pa zhes bya ba ni blo de dang nye bar yang dag spong nas de'i nye bar 'tshe ba gtan nas spong bzhes bya ba'i don nye bar bsgyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:68a-5: khams rnams kyi don ni 'di nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:68a-6: snying rje la sogs pa'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:68a-7: mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ni /
T03TD3787E:68a-8: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni nang la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pas te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:68a-9: chos thams cad la sems rnam par g-yeng ba med par mnyam par gzhag pa'i shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:68a-13: zhi ba ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:68a-14: stong ba ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:68a-16: smon pa bzlog zla dang bcas pa rnams la shes pa mi 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:68a-20: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:68a-21: 'dus byas kyi chos bzlog zla dang bcas pa rnams la mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i theg pa chen po yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:68a-22: de la zhugs pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:68a-23: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa'i 'jug pa ni /
T03TD3787E:68a-24: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3787E:68a-25: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des spyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
T03TD3787E:68a-26: len pa po 'ang mi dmigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no /
T03TD3787E:68a-27: ched du bya ba'i 'jug pa ni /
T03TD3787E:68a-28: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pas bsgom pa gzhig pa'i don du stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:68a-29: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad kyi bar du sgom pa dang /
T03TD3787E:68a-30: de dag ming tsam du shes par bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:68a-31: de la zhugs pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:68b-0: bsgom pa gzhig pa'i don du zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i @68b don gzhig pa'i ched du yin gyi byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i don du ni ma yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:68b-1: sgom pa'i don yang gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:68b-2: dngos po med pa'i don ni sgom pa'i don te /
T03TD3787E:68b-3: gang gi phyir sgom pa med pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:68b-4: de lta yin kyang byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa yang ngo //
T03TD3787E:68b-5: mngon par shes pa drug la 'jug ba ni /
T03TD3787E:68b-6: de sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
T03TD3787E:68b-7: snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
T03TD3787E:68b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:68b-9: de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas te theg pa de dang nam yang mi 'bral ba'i lus yongs su 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:68b-10: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa ni /
T03TD3787E:68b-11: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang sngon chad ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
T03TD3787E:68b-12: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas gang yin pa rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de'i ming smos pa mdzad cing de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags ba sgrogs shing dbyangs brjod pa mdzad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:68b-13: theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:68b-14: 'jug pa'i sgrub ba bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:68b-16: // / tshogs kyi sgrub pa bshad par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:68b-17: de ni snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi dbye bas rnam pa bcu bdun du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:68b-18: brtse dang sbyin la sogs pa drug / zhi gnas lhag mthong bcas pa dang //
T03TD3787E:68b-19: zung du 'brel ba'i lam gang dang //
T03TD3787E:68b-20: thabs la mkhas pa gang yin dang //
T03TD3787E:68b-21: ye shes dang ni bsod nams dang //
T03TD3787E:68b-22: lam dang gzugs dang sa bcu dang //
T03TD3787E:68b-23: gnyen po tshogs kyi sgrub pa yi //
T03TD3787E:68b-24: rim pa yin par shes par bya //
T03TD3787E:68b-26: de la tshogs kyi sgrub pa rnam pa bcu bdun ni 'di dag yin te /
T03TD3787E:69a-10: zung du 'brel ba'i lam gyi tshogs dang /
T03TD3787E:69a-11: thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs dang /
T03TD3787E:69a-18: de la snying rje chen po'i tshogs ni /
T03TD3787E:69a-19: bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa /
T03TD3787E:69a-20: go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bgyi ba ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags zhes bya ba la sgra de 'jug pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i sgo nas tshogs kyi sgrub pa'i dbang du mdzad de /
T03TD3787E:69a-21: phyogs bcu re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:69a-22: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
T03TD3787E:69a-23: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams rang gi lus kyi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas sdug bsngal de dang de zhi bar byas te /
T03TD3787E:69a-24: sangs rgyas la sogs ba la phyag 'tshal ba thob nas /
T03TD3787E:69a-25: rkyen des de rnams ngan song de rnams las langs par gyur nas byang chub pa'i bar du sangs rgyas mnyes pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i skye ba yang dag par 'dzin pas gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:69a-26: sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i rnam pa can ni thugs rje yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:69a-27: sbyin pa'i tshogs ni zas la sogs pa'i yo byad de dang de 'dod pa'i sems can de snyed nyid la zas la sogs pa'i yo byad de dang de byin nas chos bstan pas byang chub kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi 'bral bar byed pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:69a-28: tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni sems can de snyed kho na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang bsam gtan la sogs pa nas /
T03TD3787E:69a-29: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad kyi bar la rab tu 'god de /
T03TD3787E:69b-0: sems can de dag kyang rdzogs par byang chub kyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang mi 'bral ba nyid kyis gang gsungs @69b pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:69b-2: gal te sems can thams cad kyis bdag la rdo dang /
T03TD3787E:69b-6: lag cas brdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed dar mi bya'o snyam zhing rang gi bzod pa la rab tu 'god pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:69b-8: sems can de tsam pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la len du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god do zhes bya ba yang dag par nges par sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3787E:69b-10: ma tshang ba med pa'i don brjod pa rnams kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:69b-12: sems can de snyed kho na rang nyid la gnas nas chos 'ga' yang rnam par g-yeng ba dang rnam par g-yeng ba med par ma mthong bar rdzogs par byang chub kyi bar du de nyid la 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god pa dag gis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:69b-14: ji ltar rang nyid chos gang la'ang tshu rol dang pha rol mi dmigs pa de bzhin du de rnams kyang de la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god pa rnams kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:69b-15: de la tshu rol ni 'khor ba ste /
T03TD3787E:69b-16: 'di tsam du byis pa rnams nyams dga' ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:69b-17: pha rol ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T03TD3787E:69b-18: rang gi don lhur len pa rnams sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du nyams dga' ba nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:69b-20: yang bdag nyid pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de snyed kho na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T03TD3787E:69b-21: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:69b-22: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad kyi bar dang /
T03TD3787E:69b-23: sangs rgyas nyid la yang dag par len du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god pa sems can gyi khams 'di tsam zhes yongs su ma chad pa la dmigs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:69b-24: de'i tshe bde ba nye bar sgrub pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:70a-0: @70a * // ma 'ongs pa'i bde ba nye bar sgrub pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:70a-1: bzod ba can spro ba dang ldan /
T03TD3787E:70a-2: pa rtse gcig tu gtong bas ni gcig tu nges pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir na gcig tu nges pa'i bde ba nye bar sgrub pa bzod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:70a-4: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:70a-5: gtan du ba'i bde ba nye bar sgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:70a-6: lhag mthong gi tshogs gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:70a-7: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis pas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni gzhan gyi rkyen can ma yin pa 'ga' zhig yin no zhes rang gi ngo bo yod par dogs pa 'gog par byed de de ni snang ba tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:70a-10: rab 'byor 'di ltar sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:70a-11: rtog ge'i yongs su g-yo bas sun phyung ba'i 'jig rten pa thams cad ni sang ba tsam du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:70a-13: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na sgyur ma'i chos rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid nye bar bzung na /
T03TD3787E:70a-14: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bya'o zhes bya bas /
T03TD3787E:70a-15: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi don zhes pa gsal bar bya ba nas brtsams te ;
T03TD3787E:70a-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03TD3787E:70a-17: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:70a-18: pha rol tu phyin pa rnam dang /
T03TD3787E:70a-19: stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
T03TD3787E:70a-20: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad kyi bar dang /
