T03TD3787E:88b-21: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:88b-22: ci'i phyir na gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:88b-23: ci yi phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med ces bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-0: de skad du ci'i phyir na de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @89a * //
T03TD3787E:89a-1: pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-2: ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas so zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-3: ci'i phyir na gang zhig mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang yin /
T03TD3787E:89a-4: gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-5: mngon par ma grub pas mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi 'am zhes smra /
T03TD3787E:89a-6: de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra /
T03TD3787E:89a-7: ci'i phyir na 'di skad ces gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:89a-8: de la dris pa dang po nges par bstan pa las brtsams te thob par bya ba dgag pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:89a-12: rang bzhin med pas sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus rnams su byang chub sems dpar khas blangs pa'i thob pa bkag pa dus gsum pa'i thob par bya ba'i don med par shes par byed pa'i don can dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-13: de bzhin du phung po la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-15: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-19: sngon gyi mtha' la sogs pa rnams su byang chub sems dpa' khas len pa'i thob pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-21: med pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la sngon gyi mtha' la sogs pa mi dmigs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-22: med pa nyid la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-23: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnam grangs gzhan du khas mi len pa ste /
T03TD3787E:89a-25: stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin /
T03TD3787E:89a-26: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:89a-32: yang dag pa'i mtha' rnams la yang brjod par bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:89b-0: gzhan yang nyan thos la sogs pa 'phags @89b pa'i gang zag rnams med pa nyid la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:89b-1: sngon gyi mtha' la sogs par byang chub sems dpa' khas blang ba'i thob ba bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:89b-3: med pa nyid nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:89b-4: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar du de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do zhes bya bas gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:89b-5: thob pa po dgag pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:89b-6: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar la sngon gyi mtha' la sogs pa mi dmigs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:89b-8: stong pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:89b-9: gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:89b-11: gzugs la sogs pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du des stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:89b-12: byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad ma dmigs na zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:89b-13: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang /
T03TD3787E:89b-14: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid du mi dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i bar gyis bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:89b-15: de la thams cad du zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid thams cad du'o thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa bsdus pa dang so so'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub sems dpa'o//
T03TD3787E:89b-16: rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni nang stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par khyad par rnams su'o //
T03TD3787E:89b-17: yang thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam pa bsdus pa dang so so so so'i mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3787E:89b-18: thams cad nyid 'di ni gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:89b-20: rnam pa thams cad nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//
T03TD3787E:89b-21: thob par bya ba dang thob pa po'i 'brel pa dgag pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:89b-22: gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:90a-0: chos thams cad ming tsam yin ba nyid kyis na med cing mi dmigs pa yin @90a * //
T03TD3787E:90a-1: pa'i phyir mngon par grub pa bkag cing tha snyad tsam du khas blangs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-2: shin tu mngon par ma grub pa dag gis te /
T03TD3787E:90a-3: de la glo bur gyi don ni de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i don la btags pa'i don sgro 'dogs pa'i don yin no //
T03TD3787E:90a-4: bdag bdag ces brjod kyang bdag gtan du mngon par ma grub pa de bzhin du chos thams cad ces gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:90a-5: yang chos thams cad sbyor ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid bkag pas dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-6: chos thams cad mi rtag pa nyid gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-7: de bzhin du de dag nyid kyi dge ba dang kha na ma tho ba med pa la sogs pa rnams gang dang yang bral bsam yin bas na ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-8: gzhan yang chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa dang 'jig pa nyid ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-10: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-11: gzhan yang chos thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir mngon par grub pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-12: ci'i phyir na mngon par 'du byed pa dmigs su med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-13: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin pa'i phyir skye ba dang 'gag pa dang gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-14: mngon par ma grub pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mngon par ma grub pa dag gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-16: chos rnams thams cad dang mngon par ma grub pa gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-17: chos thams cad g-yo ba med pa dang rmi lam dang sgyu ma dang 'dra ba la sogs par mthong bas byang chub sems dpa'i sems mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-18: chos de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa'i tshe /
T03TD3787E:90a-19: gzugs khas mi len zhing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de /
T03TD3787E:90a-20: mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do zhes bya bas chos su khas mi len pa la sogs pa bkag pas te /
T03TD3787E:90a-21: de la gzugs la mi dmigs te khas len pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-22: de thob pa bdag gir byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-23: de la dmigs pa'i ye shes bskyed ba dang /
T03TD3787E:90a-24: de rjes nyid du srid pas mngon du byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90b-0: de nye bar rtog pas @90b brtags pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:90b-1: gzugs khas len pa la sogs pa'i tshig lnga go rims bzhin du sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:90b-2: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03TD3787E:90b-3: chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90b-4: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis na dmigs su med pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:90b-6: chos rnams dang de'i stong pa nyid la sogs pa ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90b-7: de bzhin du chos rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de 'ang chos ma lags so //
T03TD3787E:90b-8: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03TD3787E:90b-9: chos rnams dang 'grib pa ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:90b-10: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa'o zhes gang gsungs pas thob par bya ba dang thob pa po gnyis bkag pas bstan pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:90b-11: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:90b-12: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:90b-13: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi rnam pa shes pa de la mngon par chags pas 'jug pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:90b-14: chos rnams kyi rnam pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams 'dzin pas so zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:90b-15: 'di chos thams cad la ring du song ba des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mthar thug bar de rnams las song zhing rnam par bsrings pas te /
T03TD3787E:90b-16: de la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:90b-17: kun dga' bo des na 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod de /
T03TD3787E:90b-18: sems bskyed pa'i mthar thug par rang gi don de la dga' bas kun dga' bas te /
T03TD3787E:90b-19: nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam mo //
T03TD3787E:90b-20: de las song zhing 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don te /
T03TD3787E:90b-21: de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:90b-22: gzugs la sogs pa nas chos thams cad kyi bar du re re zhing rtag ces bya ba dang zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:91a-1: bya bar mi rtog pa'i chos yongs su rtog pa'i rnam pa bsdus par shes par byed pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-2: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid la de'i ngo bo nyid bkag pa'i bar dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-5: gnyis su med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin /
T03TD3787E:91a-10: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o zhes bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-11: chos rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-12: chos rnams phan tshun tha dad pa med pa nye bar bzung nas gnyis su med par bgrangs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-13: chos thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid kyis skye ba med par mthong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la nye bar rtog pa yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-14: de lta yin na byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba lnga'i bye brag med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-15: rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa lnga thob pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-16: de'i lam bsgom pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-17: dka' ba spyod pa'ang mi 'thad pas de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-18: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'ang med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-20: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa la thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa yod par bya ba mi 'dod do //
T03TD3787E:91a-21: ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mi 'dod do //
T03TD3787E:91a-22: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:91a-23: chos thams cad la khas len pa 'thad pa ma yin par bstan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-24: chos ma skyes pa dang skyes pa dag gis thob par bya /
T03TD3787E:91a-25: skyes pa dang ma skyes pa 'thob pa dris pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-26: de gnyi ga'i dngos po mi 'dod par bstan ba dang ;
T03TD3787E:91a-27: chos ma skyes pa dang skyes pa dag gis thob par 'dod pa dris pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-28: de gnyi ga'i dngos po 'dod pa dris pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-30: mngon par rtogs pa med pa nyid du dris pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91a-31: de gnyis ka yod par khas blangs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-0: mngon par rtogs pa brjod pa'i rigs pa bzhin du de gnyi ga 'jig rten gyi tha snyad @91b du khas blangs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-1: de nyid kyi phyir ma skyes pa skyes pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-2: skye ba med pa brjod par mi spobs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-7: mi skye ba rnams ni mngon par rtogs pa brjod pa'i rigs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-9: chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-10: de la spobs pa ni rjod byed do //
T03TD3787E:91b-11: rjod pa ni brjod par bya ba yin pas na brjod pa ste don no //
T03TD3787E:91b-12: de lta yin dang 'gro ba lnga'i bye brag dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-15: skye ba ni tha snyad du yin no //
T03TD3787E:91b-17: don dam pa ni las dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-21: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-22: rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-23: chos ma skyes pa dang skyes pa skye bar dris pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-24: de gnyi ga skye bar 'dod pa bkag pa ste /
T03TD3787E:91b-25: de yod du chug kyang zhes bya bar bsams pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-26: ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar mi 'dod pa de dag gang yin zhes dris pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-27: gzugs nas brtsams te chos thams cad kyi bar ma skyes pa'i chos rnams skye bar mi 'dod pa'i rnam grangs kyis brjod pa dang spobs pa skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-28: dris pa thams cad kyi lan gyi nges par 'byung bas na mi gnas pa nyid nye bar bzung nas gnas brtan rab 'byor mchog tu bzhag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ston pa po'i 'os su shes par byed pa'i don can dang /
T03TD3787E:91b-29: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams nas chos thams cad kyi bar rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:91b-30: nang la sogs pa la brten par mi dmigs pa nyid ston pa po mi gnas par rtogs par byed pa'i don can gyis te /
T03TD3787E:91b-32: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
T03TD3787E:91b-33: de ni nang nas yang mi gnas phyi rol na'ang mi gnas gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:91b-34: lam gyi nges par 'byung ba'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:91b-35: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
T03TD3787E:91b-36: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod ces bya bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa'i lam nye bar 'god pa na /
T03TD3787E:92a-2: len pa por dmigs pas 'jig rten las mi g-yo mi 'phag mi 'da' ba de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:92a-3: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pas ni /
T03TD3787E:92a-4: 'jig rten las sgrol bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:92a-5: g-yo zhing 'phags la 'da' bar byed pa de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:92a-6: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la'ang brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:92a-7: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi nges par rnyed pas na 'jig rten las g-yo ba'o //
T03TD3787E:92a-8: de thob pa'i thabs nye bar tshol bas na 'phags pa'o //
T03TD3787E:92a-9: de'i bar chad kyi chos yongs su spong bas na 'da' ba'o //
T03TD3787E:92a-10: yang na g-yo ba ni sems bskyed pa'i dus so //
T03TD3787E:92a-11: 'phags pa ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha'i dus so //
T03TD3787E:92a-12: 'da' ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i dus su su'o zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs gzhan yin no //
T03TD3787E:92a-13: 'di las bzlog pas na mi g-yo mi 'phag mi 'da' ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:92a-14: gang zhig 'jig rten mngon par gsal bar gyur pa yin pa'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-15: gang zhig mngon par 'grub par byed pa'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-16: gang zhig 'jig rten gyis te 'jig rten par mnyam pa'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-17: gang zhig 'jig rten gyi phyir mngon bar 'byin pa'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-18: gang 'jig rten las nges par mi 'byung ba'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-20: gang 'jig rten du skyed par byed pa de dag ni 'jig rten ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ces bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:92a-21: gang dag gi 'jig rten sgrol pa yin pa'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-22: gang gis 'jig rten las sgrol ba'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-23: gang dag gis 'jig rten la rgal bar byed pa'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-24: gang zhig 'jig rten gyi don du mi 'gyur ba'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-25: gang zhig 'jig rten las nges par 'byin par byed pa'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-26: gang zhig 'jig rten gyi sgrol byed yin pa'am /
T03TD3787E:92a-27: gang zhig 'jig rten na sgrol byed yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ces bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:92a-28: 'das pa la sogs pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub kyi lam yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-0: 'phags pa rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam las nges par skyes pa @92b nyid du shes par byed pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyed byed yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-1: sems mi zhum pa dang mi skrag pa la sogs pa rnams kyis yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-2: de lta yin na ha cang thal ches par brjod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-3: de ni yang dag pa'i tshig brjod pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:92b-5: sems can med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-6: rang bzhin med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-9: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-10: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la de bzhin du sbyar ba nas /
T03TD3787E:92b-11: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po gnas pa 'di dang yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral lo zhes kho bo smra'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis yin te /
T03TD3787E:92b-12: de ltar nges par 'byung ba brgyad po 'di dag gi nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:92b-13: go cha'i sgrub pa la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi go rims kyi tshul 'di ni rigs pa nyid yin te /
T03TD3787E:92b-15: zhugs pa ni dpung gi tshogs sog go //
T03TD3787E:92b-16: dpung gi tshogs bsags pa ni ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba thob pas nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:92b-18: sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang //
T03TD3787E:92b-19: nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang //
T03TD3787E:92b-20: sgrub pa yin ni rten gyur pa //
T03TD3787E:92b-21: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang //
T03TD3787E:92b-22: dmigs pa dag dang ched dang ni //
T03TD3787E:92b-23: go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang //
T03TD3787E:92b-24: tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams //
T03TD3787E:92b-25: thub pa rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid //
T03TD3787E:92b-26: ces gsungs pa de ni 'dir rjes su 'das pa'i 'brel pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3787E:92b-27: sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i don 'di rnams kyi go rims kyi tshul 'di ni rigs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:92b-28: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i don du gnyer ba ni gdams ngag tshol ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-29: phyin ci ma log pa'i gdams ngag la gnas pa la ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa skye ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-30: de nas sgrub pa'i chos gang la brten pa dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-32: ched du bya ba gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:92b-33: sgrub pa nyid gang yin pa ste rnam pa bzhi yin no //
T03TD3787E:92b-34: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa rab 'byor gyi le'u ste dang po'o //
T03TD3787E:92b-35: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:93a-0: // / @93a * // da ni lam shes pa nyid brjod par bya ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:93a-1: de la re zhig / lha rnams rung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:93a-2: 'od kyis mog mog por mdzad dang //
T03TD3787E:93a-3: yul nges pa dang khyab pa dang //
T03TD3787E:93a-4: rang bzhin dang ni de yi las //
T03TD3787E:93a-5: brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T03TD3787E:93a-6: de la lha rnams mog mog por mdzad pa nyid ni lha'i ris thams cad kyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis mog mog por mdzad pa gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
T03TD3787E:93a-7: lha rnams kyi 'jig rten skyong ba nyid la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:93a-8: bsam gtan la sogs pa thob par mngon par rlom pa bsal ba'i don yin no //
T03TD3787E:93a-9: de bsal ba'ang de rnams rung bar bya ba'i don du yin te /
T03TD3787E:93a-10: ji skad du de rnams nyid las /
T03TD3787E:93a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya //
T03TD3787E:93a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin zhes gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan pa nyan pa'i don du smras pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:93a-13: de la rang bzhin gyi 'od ni rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o //
T03TD3787E:93a-14: yul so sor nges pa ni /
T03TD3787E:93a-16: byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:93a-17: bstan pa'i skal pa med pa nyid kyis na lam shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' kho na'i yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:93a-18: nyan thos la sogs pa'i ni ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:93a-19: zhes yul so sor nges pa'i don du gang gsungs pa yin no ;
T03TD3787E:93a-20: / khyab pa ni lam shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas te /
T03TD3787E:93a-21: sems bskyed pa nas brtsams pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyogs gcig pa ma yin no zhes khyab pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:93a-22: go rims dang ldan pa'i gang zag gi khyad par gyi don gyis gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:93a-24: 'on kyang gal te de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de dag la rjes su yi rang ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di sngar 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbang du khyad par 'thad pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:93b-0: 'dis ni theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag @93b ba'i dgongs pa can yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:93b-1: mtshan nyid pa ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:93b-2: rang bzhin ni ji ltar nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam rnams 'bras bu dang lam gyi rtogs pa so sor nges pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes pa ni ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:93b-3: rnam pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa spong ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes rang gi ngo bo khyad par du 'phags pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:93b-4: byed pa ni ji ltar nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam rnams kyi 'bras bu ni spangs pas rab tu phye ba dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i de rtogs ba ma yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:93b-5: 'on kyang 'di'i lam shes pa nyid ni sems can yongs su smin pa la sogs pas rab tu phye ba yin no zhes de'i byed pa'i 'bras bu nyid khyad par du 'phags pa'i don gyis gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:93b-6: mog mog por byed pa la sogs pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:93b-8: // / da ni nyan thos kyi lam brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:93b-9: lam shes nyid kyi tshul la ni //
T03TD3787E:93b-10: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag gi / rnam pa mi dmigs sgo nas ni //
T03TD3787E:93b-11: nyan thos lam 'di shes par bya //
T03TD3787E:93b-12: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:93b-14: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:93b-15: bu ga nam mkha' zhes byar brjod //
T03TD3787E:93b-16: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i khams drug dang /
T03TD3787E:93b-17: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg pa 'dod pa dang ma 'dres pa'i don gyis mi rtag pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:93b-30: 'tshe ba nyid ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden pa'i rnam pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed pa'o //
T03TD3787E:94a-0: de la mi rtag pa nyid nas zhi ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar ni sdug bsngal gyi bden @94a * //
T03TD3787E:94a-2: nad nyid ces bya ba nas sdig pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar ni kun 'byung gi bden pa'i rnam pa'o //
T03TD3787E:94a-3: pha rol nyid dang 'jig pa'i chos can nyid ces bya ba ni de dag nyid so so la yang byung ba'i rnam pa'o //
T03TD3787E:94a-4: g-yo ba nyid dang rab tu 'jig pa nyid ces bya ba ni de dag nyid so so la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam pa'o //
T03TD3787E:94a-5: 'jig pa nyid dang 'go nad nyid dang 'tshe ba nyid ces bya ba ni de dag nyid so so la 'gog pa'i rnam pa'o //
T03TD3787E:94a-6: de ltar byas na 'phags pa nyan thos rnams yid byung ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i lung ji lta ba bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:94a-7: de la mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba ni skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:94a-8: sdug bsngal ba nyid ces bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po rnams rjes su mi mthun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:94a-9: de lta yin dang 'phags pa'i lam ni mi rtag pa yin yang zag pa med pa nyid kyis 'phags pa rnams dang mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir 'di sdug bsngal nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:94a-10: bdag med pa nyid ces bya ba ni bdag gzhan gyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:94a-11: zhi ba nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid bdag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:94a-12: nad nyid ces bya ba ni 'bras bu'i sa bon dang 'dra bar rgyu'i rtsa bar 'gyur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:94a-13: 'bras nyid ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:94a-14: zug rdu nyid ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi rkyen nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:94a-15: sdig pa nyid ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal brgyud pa rab tu byung ba nyid kyis shin tu 'joms pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:94a-16: pha rol nyid ces bya ba ni phyir rgol bar gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
T03TD3787E:94a-17: 'jig pa'i chos can nyid ces bya ba ni 'di la gnod par byed pa yod na 'jig pa'i chos can nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:94a-18: yid byung ba'i dmigs par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3787E:94a-19: g-yo ba nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bor gnas pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:94a-20: rab tu 'jig pa nyid ces bya ba ni rgyu la ltos pa med par rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:94b-0: @94b 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dmigs par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:94b-1: 'jig pa nyid ces bya ba ni 'di dang gzhan gyi gnod pa'i gnas su gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:94b-2: 'go ba'i nad nyid ces bya ba ni srin po la sogs pa'i gnod pas glags thob pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:94b-3: 'tsho ba nyid ces bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po 'khrugs pa dang thog 'bab pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa'i gnas su gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:94b-4: 'gog pa'i dmigs par yang 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T03TD3787E:94b-5: yid la byed pa de rnams nyid kyis ma rig pa 'gog pa la bdag med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:94b-7: dben pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed pa gsum ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa'o //
T03TD3787E:94b-8: nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa bzhi ni gnag gi phyir stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:94b-9: mtshan ma med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:94b-10: smon pa med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:94b-11: mngon bar 'du byed pa med pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3787E:94b-12: ji ltar nges par 'byung pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
T03TD3787E:94b-13: gang nges par 'byung ba mngon par 'du byed pa med pa yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:94b-14: de rnams nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom pa zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:94b-15: de rnams ni mya ngan ldas 'das pa'i grong khyer thob par byed pa'i don gyis so //
T03TD3787E:94b-16: de dag nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i tshul du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'i rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:94b-17: ma lus par rtogs pa ni rigs pa yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:94b-18: gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nas bdag gi dang bral bar chos las so sor rtog par byed do //
T03TD3787E:94b-20: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems ni byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'grogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:94b-21: yongs su bsngo ba'i sems kyang byang chub kyi sems dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dag dang mi 'grogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:94b-22: byang chub kyi sems ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs pa nyid kyi ste /
T03TD3787E:95a-0: byang chub kyi sems dang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems dag ni phan tshun med @95a * //
T03TD3787E:95a-1: cing mi dmigs pa nyid kyis so zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:95a-2: rtogs par byed pas na sgrub pa yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:95a-4: byang chub kyi sems dang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems dag ni sems ma yin pa nyid kyis dang /
T03TD3787E:95a-5: sems ma yin pa'ang sems ma yin par yongs su bsngo ba ni mi 'thad pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:95a-6: 'di ltar sems ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:95a-7: bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de 'ang sems ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:95a-8: de ltar so sor rtog pa mngon par zhen pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byin pa'i rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:95a-9: mngon par zhen pa med par 'gro ba ni nges par 'byin pas so //
T03TD3787E:95a-10: nyan thos kyi lam gyi bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa'i rnam pa bcu drug gi rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:95a-13: // / de dag sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag brjod par bya ba yin pa des na /
T03TD3787E:95a-14: 'phags pa nyan thos lam la ni //
T03TD3787E:95a-15: gzugs sogs phung po stong pa'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:95a-16: stong pa nyid rnam dbyer med pas //
T03TD3787E:95a-17: dro ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T03TD3787E:95a-18: drod ni koo shi ka gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //
T03TD3787E:95a-19: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:95a-20: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:95a-21: tshor ba la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:95a-23: rtse mor gyur pa dag tu 'dod //
T03TD3787E:95a-24: ces bya ba ni koo shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o //
T03TD3787E:95a-25: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa la gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:95a-26: de la rtag la sogs tshul gyis //
T03TD3787E:95a-27: gnas pa bkag pas bzod pa rnams //
T03TD3787E:95a-28: zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang mir tag ces byar bar gnas par mi bya'o //
T03TD3787E:95b-0: gzugs bde zhes bya ba nas smon pa med ces bya ba'i bar du @95b gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:95b-1: sa bcu dag la brtsams nas ni //
T03TD3787E:95b-2: mi gnas rgyas par bstan pa yis //
T03TD3787E:95b-3: chos kyi mchog tu 'gyur bshad de //
T03TD3787E:95b-4: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' chen pos sa dang po la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:95b-5: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:95b-6: zhes dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
T03TD3787E:95b-7: zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:95b-8: gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3787E:95b-9: ci'i phyir zhe na sangs rgyas kyis //
T03TD3787E:95b-10: mkhyen nas chos rnams ma gzigs phyir //
T03TD3787E:95b-12: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos thams cad ma dmigs pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:95b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:95b-14: nyan thos kyi lam bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:95b-16: // / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:95b-17: de la re zhig / rang byung bdag nyid rtogs pa'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:95b-18: gzhan gyis bstan yang mi dgos la //
T03TD3787E:95b-19: bse ru lta bu'i ye shes ni //
T03TD3787E:95b-20: zab pa nyid du mngon par brjod //
T03TD3787E:95b-22: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3787E:95b-23: de la gzhan gyis bstan ma dgos pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:95b-25: gnod sbyin gyi skad la sogs pa ni shes par rung gi gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bshad pa'i don ni shes par mi rung ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:95b-26: gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi skad dang /
T03TD3787E:95b-28: gnod sbyin gyis smras pa dang /
T03TD3787E:95b-29: gnod sbyin gyis rab tu bsnyad pa gang yin pa de dag ni zhes bya ba ya sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de la gnod sbyin gyi skad ces bya ba de dag gi rang gi brdas rtogs par byed pa'o //
T03TD3787E:95b-30: tshig ces bya ba ni skad kyi tshogs so //
T03TD3787E:96a-0: smras pa zhes bya ba ni ji srid kyis brjod par 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par @96a * //
T03TD3787E:96a-1: 'gyur ba'i dag ces bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:96a-2: rab tu bsnyad pa zhes bya ba ni gtam gyi lan de dang de dag tu dris pa dang lan btab pa'o //
T03TD3787E:96a-3: gang yin pa de dag ni zhes bya ba ni sngon nye bar thob pa rnams so //
T03TD3787E:96a-4: de ni shes par rung gi //
T03TD3787E:96a-5: gnas brtan 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:96a-8: nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba de la gsol ba btab nas ston pa ni 'chad pa'o //
T03TD3787E:96a-9: dris nas lan du smra ba ni rab tu brjod pa'o //
T03TD3787E:96a-10: gnyis po de nyid gdul bya rmongs pa rnams kyi dbang du byas nas 'chad pa ni ston pa'o //
T03TD3787E:96a-11: bag med pa rnams kyi dbang du byas nas ni nye bar 'ongs nas ston pa nyid kyis nye bar ston pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:96a-12: lha'i bu dag 'di ltar 'dir yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod de zhes bya ba nas brtsams pas rab tu ston pa dang nyan pa bkag pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:96a-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dag ni sprul pa dang /
T03TD3787E:96a-16: sgyu ma'i dpe rnams kyis yi ge med pa yin pa'i phyir rab tu brjod pa dang nyan pa med pas so zhes bya'o //
T03TD3787E:96a-17: ji ltar na chos ston pa zhes bya ba yang yin la rab tu mi brjod pa'ang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:96a-18: chos ston pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:96a-19: sangs rgyas kyi smon lam grub pa'i yang phyir te /
T03TD3787E:96a-20: chos ston pa ni brjod pa'i rang bzhin yin pas rnam par g-yeng ba chen por 'gyur ba yin la /
T03TD3787E:96a-21: rnam par g-yeng ba'ang rgyud mi zad par 'khrug par byed pa yin par dgongs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pas bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid thob nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu brjod pa med par yang sems can gyi don byed nus par gyur cig ces de ltar smon lam btab pa yin no ;
T03TD3787E:96a-22: / tshig tu smra ba med par don ston pa'ang rung ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:96a-24: gang gang don ni gang gang la //
T03TD3787E:96a-25: ji lta ji ltar nyan 'dod pa //
T03TD3787E:96a-26: de de la don de dang de //
T03TD3787E:96a-27: sgra med kyang de de ltar snang //
T03TD3787E:96a-29: de la ye shes zab mo ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:96b-0: kye ma gnas @96b brtan rab 'byor 'di ni gsal bar byed pa ste /
T03TD3787E:96b-1: zab pa bas kyang shin tu zab pa ston pa phra babs kyang shin tu phra ba la 'jug pa'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:96b-2: de la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis nye bar bstan pa'i don mi rig pa ni shes ba zab pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:96b-3: yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod pa ni brjod pa zab pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:96b-4: mdo sde gzhan las kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid rang nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:96b-5: rkyen nyid 'di la zab mo rjes su rtogs pas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes gsungs so ;
T03TD3787E:96b-6: / bdag nyid gcig pu'i don te /
T03TD3787E:96b-7: rgyu mtshan du gyur par byas nas rang nyid sangs rgyas pas rang sangs rgyas so //
T03TD3787E:96b-8: nyan thos la'ang thal ba ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:96b-9: de ni gzhan gyis nye bar bstan pa la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:96b-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la thal ba'ang ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:96b-11: de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems can thams cad kyi don ched du mdzad pas de rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:96b-12: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rtogs pa tsam gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:96b-13: ji tsam pha yin pa dag gis rang gis kyang rdzogs par byang chub pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:96b-14: de rnams kyi rtogs pa tsam yang gang zhig dang ji tsam zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:96b-15: gzung don rtog pa spang phyir dang //
T03TD3787E:96b-16: 'dzin pa ma spangs phyir dang ni //
T03TD3787E:96b-17: rten gyi bse ru lta bu'i lam //
T03TD3787E:96b-18: yang dag bsdus pa shes par bya ;
T03TD3787E:96b-20: gang gi phyir de rnams kyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i dbang du mdzad nas phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa nas rgya cher rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin zab pa dang phra ba nyid 'gog pa /
T03TD3787E:96b-21: rang sangs rgyas rnams shes bya'i sgrib pa'i phyogs gcig spangs par ston pa /
T03TD3787E:96b-22: nyan thos rnams las de rnams kyi rtogs pa khyad par du byed pas gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:96b-23: chos bstan pa 'di la zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang du byas pa la'o //
T03TD3787E:97a-0: gzugs su btags pa'ang med dam zhes @97a * //
T03TD3787E:97a-1: bya ba nas byang chub tu btags pa'am med dam zhes bya ba'i bar ni de dag gi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:97a-2: yi ge rnams su btags pa'ang med dam zhes bya ba ni rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:97a-3: gang dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa nas rang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'dod pas bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni lam shes pa nyid lam thams cad kyi yul can du brjod pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:97a-4: de rnams kyi 'dzin pa po'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa med pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:97a-5: sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu ste chos nyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:97a-6: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni 'dzin pa po dngos po med par rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir sngar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas skabs su sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de dang 'di'am 'di dang yang de mi 'gal bar ston pa las brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:97a-7: phung po la sogs pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du'ang rmi lam lta bu dang sgu ma lta bur brjod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:97a-9: sgyu ma dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:97a-10: rtogs pa'i rten rigs kyi dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa len par byed par bstan pa rang sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don can dang /
T03TD3787E:97a-11: de rnams kyi gzugs la sogs pa dang de'i stong pa nyid gnyis phan tshun du rtogs pa bkag pa nas /
T03TD3787E:97a-13: de ni 'di ltar chos gang yang ma brjod ma bstan pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:97a-14: ji ltar chos 'ga' ma brjod ma bstan pa de ltar 'dir te rang sangs rgyas kyi skabs su len par byed pa su yang med do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rten gyi sbyor ba'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes ji skad du brjod pa de gsal bar byed do //
T03TD3787E:97b-0: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi @97b pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:97b-1: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
T03TD3787E:97b-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
T03TD3787E:97b-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rgya cher bstan zhing zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:97b-4: mi 'dod par thal bar rnam pa mang po byas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:97b-5: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de de bzhin te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:97b-6: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bar dag kyang bstan te de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis mngon par 'dod pa'i don yang dag par grub pas dngos por gyur pa'i rten med par rtogs pa'i chos thob par ston par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:97b-7: sprul pa'i me tog gi rnam pa nye bar 'god pa dang /
T03TD3787E:97b-8: me tog de dag kyang nges par ma skyes pa me tog ma yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:97b-9: gzugs nas brtsams pa'i chos thams cad nas /
T03TD3787E:97b-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du nges par ma skyes pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i bar dang de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba'i bar skabs kyi 'brel par byas pas ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi rtogs pa'i rten yin no //
T03TD3787E:97b-11: de la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pas ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa nyan thos rnams las khyad par du byed do //
T03TD3787E:97b-12: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa med pas ni rang sangs rgyas rnams las sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa khyad par du byed do //
T03TD3787E:97b-13: rigs kyis ni rtogs pa'i rgyu khyad par du byed pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:97b-14: da ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi nges par 'byed pa'i cha'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:97b-15: btags pa'i chos nyid mi 'gal bar //
T03TD3787E:97b-16: ston pa'i rnam ba dro gyur pa //
T03TD3787E:97b-18: kye ma gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de ltar btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la chos nyid zab mo ston pa ni shes rab zab po zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:97b-19: koo shi gzugs ni btags pa tsam mo //
T03TD3787E:98a-0: btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid yin pas de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to zhes bya ba la @98a * //
T03TD3787E:98a-1: sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98a-2: rtse mor gyur pa gzugs la sogs //
T03TD3787E:98a-3: 'grib pa med la sogs pas phye //
T03TD3787E:98a-4: zhes bya ba ni gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo //
T03TD3787E:98a-5: yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:98a-6: med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98a-8: nang stong nyid la sogs pa yis //
T03TD3787E:98a-9: gzugs sogs mi 'dzin phyir bzod pa //
T03TD3787E:98a-11: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid nas /
T03TD3787E:98a-12: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yongs su gzung ba med pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98a-13: gzugs sogs skye ba med sogs kyi //
T03TD3787E:98a-14: rnam pa can ni chos kyi mchog //
T03TD3787E:98a-16: gzugs kyi skye ba mi mthong /
T03TD3787E:98a-20: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:98a-25: 'phel pa mi mthong ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98a-26: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam bshad zin to //
T03TD3787E:98a-27: mthong ba'i lam phan yon dang bcas pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:98a-28: bden dang bden la bzod pa dang //
T03TD3787E:98a-29: shes pa'i skad cig rnam pa bzhi yis //
T03TD3787E:98a-30: lam shes nyid la mthong ba'i lam //
T03TD3787E:98a-31: phan yon bcas pa 'di bshad do ;
T03TD3787E:98a-33: de la sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa dag phan tshun gyi ngo bo yin pa dgag pa'i don du rnam grangs gzhan khas mi len pas gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
T03TD3787E:98a-34: koo shi ka gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
T03TD3787E:98a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98a-36: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:98b-0: koo shi ka gzugs chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams @98b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chen po nyid de /
T03TD3787E:98b-2: koo shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
T03TD3787E:98b-4: dbus mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98b-5: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:98b-6: koo shi ka gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa ste /
T03TD3787E:98b-8: koo shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad ma ni dmigs su med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98b-9: tshad ma zhes bya ba ni gang gis rnam par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gzugs 'jal ba'o //
T03TD3787E:98b-10: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:98b-11: koo shi ka gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o //
T03TD3787E:98b-12: koo shi ka 'di lta ste dper na /
T03TD3787E:98b-13: nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98b-14: tshad ces bya ba ni rdul phra rab kyi mthar thug pa la rten pa'i dbyibs la brjod de /
T03TD3787E:98b-15: gzugs can ma yin pa rnams la ni tshad kyi mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:98b-16: kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:98b-17: koo shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas so //
T03TD3787E:98b-19: koo shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:98b-20: 'dis ni rgyu bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98b-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyis ni kun 'byung ba bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98b-22: chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyis ni rab tu skye ba bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98b-23: de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyis ni rkyen bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:98b-24: sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyis ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa sems can gyi khams kyi ched nyid du ston par byed pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:99a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:99a-3: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:99a-4: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:99a-5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun par yongs su 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3787E:99a-6: bar chad byed pa thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur bar yongs su gzung pa'i don gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:99a-9: kun chub par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:99a-11: gzhan la rgya cher 'chad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:99a-12: tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral ba de dag ni bdud sdig can la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes phan yon bstan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:99a-14: de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par gyur pas zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:99a-16: de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed de /
T03TD3787E:99a-18: smon pa med pa'ang de bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:99a-20: de ni 'di ltar gang gis gang la'ang glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid med do zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:99a-21: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:99a-22: gzhan yang sems can thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byams pa dang /
T03TD3787E:99a-25: btang snyoms shin tu bsgom pa'i phyir de rnams la mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang ste /
T03TD3787E:99a-26: mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma brgyad pa la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshad med pa rnams dgos pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:99b-0: de lta yin na skad cig ma dgu pa la sems can gyi khams la ltos pa med pas @99b 'gog par ltung bar 'gyur bas so //
T03TD3787E:99b-1: yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams la yang dag par bsten zhing bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:99b-2: de rnams yang ba spangs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:99b-3: 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:99b-4: gzhan yang stong pa nyid thams cad shin tu bsgoms pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de dag la 'jigs pa dang rengs par gyur pa la sogs pa med par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:99b-5: de la mi 'dod pa thog tu bab kyis dogs pa ni 'jigs pa'o ;
T03TD3787E:99b-6: / de bsal ba'i thabs mi sgrub pa ni rengs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:99b-7: 'gog pa la chos shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:99b-8: bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:99b-9: theg pa gsum la sems can 'dul ba ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:99b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyi 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:99b-11: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:99b-12: bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung bas na zhes bya ba na brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:99b-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:99b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par byang ba'i phyogs thams cad bsdus pa nyid la sogs par gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:99b-15: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:99b-16: yang rtsi ma gi'i dpe bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdangs dang stobs dang ldan pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no ;
T03TD3787E:99b-17: / lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:99b-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:99b-22: gti mug la sogs pa'i nyes pa nas mya ngan las 'das par 'dzin pa'i bar du nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:100a-0: @100a * // rnam par 'phel par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:100a-1: lam la chos shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:100a-2: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi lhas byas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:100a-4: nang gi bar chad kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:100a-7: sba bar mdzad pa dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:100a-8: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nas /
T03TD3787E:100a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:100a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:100a-11: lam la rjes su shes pa'i brjod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:100a-12: bdag kyang srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:100a-13: bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba nas /
T03TD3787E:100a-14: gzhan gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:100a-15: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:100a-16: lam la rjes su shes pa ni //
T03TD3787E:100a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe //
T03TD3787E:100a-18: sbyin pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:100a-19: mdo'i tshig lhug pa 'di tshigs bcad du byas pa ni rnam pa 'di lta bu yin te /
T03TD3787E:100a-20: de bzhin nyid dang sangs rgyas dag / phan tshun brten pa rten med phyir //
T03TD3787E:100a-21: rnam grangs khas mi len pa dang //
T03TD3787E:100a-22: chen po tshad ma med bcas dang //
T03TD3787E:100a-23: tshad med pa dang mtha' med dang //
T03TD3787E:100a-24: der gnas gzugs la sogs pa la //
T03TD3787E:100a-25: sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'dzin dang //
T03TD3787E:100a-26: blang med dor ba med sogs dang //
T03TD3787E:100a-27: byams la sogs dang stong nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:100a-28: sangs rgyas nyid ni 'thob pa dang //
T03TD3787E:100a-29: rnam par byang ba yongs bsdus dang //
T03TD3787E:100a-30: nyam nga ba dang nad kun sel //
T03TD3787E:100a-32: sangs rgyas rnams kyis srung la sogs //
T03TD3787E:100a-33: srog mi gcod pa la sogs pa //
T03TD3787E:100a-34: rnam pa kun mkhyen tshul la ni //
T03TD3787E:100b-0: @100b bdag nyid gnas te sems can dag /'god dang sbyin pa la sogs pa //
T03TD3787E:100b-1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba //
T03TD3787E:100b-2: lam shes nyid kyi skad cig ma //
T03TD3787E:100b-3: mthong ba'i lam bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:100b-5: // / da ni bsgom pa'i lam bshad par bya ba yin pas re zhig 'di'i byed pa brjod la /
T03TD3787E:100b-6: de nas 'di brjod par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:100b-7: 'di'i byed pa de'ang rnam pa drug tu rin par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:100b-9: kun nas dul dang thams cad nas //
T03TD3787E:100b-10: bdud dang nyon mongs las rgyal dang //
T03TD3787E:100b-11: gnod pas brjid ba med nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:100b-12: byang chub dang ni rten mchod nyid //
T03TD3787E:100b-13: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:100b-14: gang gi phyir rnam pa thams cad du dul bar byed pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:100b-15: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su dul ba dang /
T03TD3787E:100b-16: nga rgyal ma chis par 'gyur ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:100b-17: rnam pa thams cad du 'dud pa'i byed pa ni rtog pa'i rnam pa thams cad la'ang ngar rlom pa bkag pa'i phyir thams cad la 'dud pa'i don gyis na yongs su 'dud pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:100b-18: nyon mongs pa las nges par rgyal bar byed pa ni g-yul gyi nang du zhugs pa'i mi'i dpes 'dod chags la sogs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa las rgyal zhing brjid ba med pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bar las nges par rgyal bas bsgom pa'i lam la slar bya ba med pa nyid du shes par byed pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:100b-19: gnod pas brdzi ba med pa'i byed pa ni k'a khor ta dang //
T03TD3787E:100b-22: chu la sogs pa'i gnod pas mi brdzi ba nyid la sogs pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:100b-23: k'a khor ta ni byang shar phyogs kyi mi ma yin pa'i rigs so //
T03TD3787E:100b-24: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi byed pa ni /
T03TD3787E:100b-25: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:101a-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob cing sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par blta bar 'gyur ro zhes @101a * //
T03TD3787E:101a-1: bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:101a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten gyi yul mchod par bya ba nyid kyi byed pa ni /
T03TD3787E:101a-3: yang snying po byang chub kyi sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rten gyi yul bar chad med pa nyid yin no ;
T03TD3787E:101a-5: lha'i ris thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang bskyab pa la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:101a-8: // / bsgom pa'i lam la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:101a-9: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:101a-11: de la zag pa dang bcas pa ni mos pa dang /
T03TD3787E:101a-13: rjes su yi rang ba'i yid la byed pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3787E:101a-14: zag pa med pa'ang mngon par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:101a-15: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3787E:101a-16: gang gi phyir mos pa yid la byed pa'i dbang du mdzad pa ni /
T03TD3787E:101a-17: mos pa rang gi don dang ni //
T03TD3787E:101a-18: rang gzhan don dang gzhan don dang //
T03TD3787E:101a-21: rang gi don 'gog pa ni ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:101a-22: gzhan gyi don dang mi 'gal ba nyid kyis de rdzogs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:101a-24: chung dang 'bring dang chen po ste //
T03TD3787E:101a-25: so sor rnam pa gsum du 'dod //
T03TD3787E:101a-26: rang gi don gyi mos pa ni chung ngu dang /
T03TD3787E:101a-29: de bzhin du gzhan du gzhan dag la'ang brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:101a-30: de la rang gi don la mos pa chung ngu dang /
T03TD3787E:101a-33: de bzhin du gzhan gyi don la mos pa'i bar yang gang dag yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:101a-34: chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yis //
T03TD3787E:101a-37: so sor zhes dkyus ma dang sbyar ro //
T03TD3787E:101a-38: rang gi don la sogs pa la chung ngu la sogs pa rnam pa gsum du shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3787E:101a-39: de ltar nang gi don la sogs pa 'di ni rnam pa dgur 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:101b-1: de bzhin du rang bzhin gyi don du mos pa dang /
T03TD3787E:101b-2: gzhan gyi don du mos pa'i rnam pa'i dbye ba la'ang brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:101b-5: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod //
T03TD3787E:101b-7: mos pa zhes bya ba ni dkyus ma nyid yin no //
T03TD3787E:101b-8: de la rang gi don la mos pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i rnam pa ni /
T03TD3787E:101b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs la mchod pa bgyis pa dang /
T03TD3787E:101b-10: sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten du bcug ste mchod par byas na /
T03TD3787E:101b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:101b-12: de rten du gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi sku mchod pa brnyes pa'i phyir dang po ches bsod nams mang du 'phel ba'i rgyu nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no ;
T03TD3787E:101b-14: koo shi ka de ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:101b-15: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag gang dag las sangs rgyas la shes nas rab tu dang ba dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:101b-17: dge 'dun la rab tu dang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:101b-18: shin tu ston pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:101b-19: tshogs re re zhing phra ba bstan pa nas /
T03TD3787E:101b-20: koo shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
T03TD3787E:101b-21: sems can tshad med grangs med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T03TD3787E:101b-22: byang chub tu spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis zhig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi /
T03TD3787E:101b-23: phal cher thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa dag mthong ngo //
T03TD3787E:101b-25: le lo can la sogs pas byang chub sgrub dka' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:101b-26: zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:101b-27: de la yon tan srid par rtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i dad pa ni shes nas rab tu dang ba ste /
T03TD3787E:101b-28: the tshom spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:102a-0: nges pa'i mthar thug pa thob @102a * //
T03TD3787E:102a-1: pas na shin tu ston pa'o //
T03TD3787E:102a-3: myur ba dang bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:102a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /
T03TD3787E:102a-5: yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste /
T03TD3787E:102a-6: 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa'o zhes bya bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan thams cad thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis mos pa gsum pa'i rnam pa yongs su gsal bar bya ba'i don du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102a-8: de bzhin du rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas te /
T03TD3787E:102a-9: de la mchod pa'i bsod nams pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo zhes bya bas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102a-11: de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten gyis bkang ba'i dpes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102a-13: de bzhin du gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102a-15: de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102a-17: de bzhin du stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102a-19: de bzhin du stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102a-20: rang gi don la mos pa rnam pa dgu bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:102a-22: // / rang dang gzhan gyi don la mos pa dgu brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:102a-23: de la re zhig chung ngu'i chung ngu'i rnam pa ni /
T03TD3787E:102b-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag las sems can re res rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten byas te mchod pa'i bsod nams pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu @102b phyin pa 'di la brtson pa bsod nams ches shin tu mang du skye ba nyid la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102b-2: koo shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:102b-3: mthong ba'i chos kyi phan yon la sogs pa rgya cher gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102b-5: kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems /
T03TD3787E:102b-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob bam zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:102b-7: gnyis su byar med pas chos thams cad de rnams kyis stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gnyis su med par yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sngon du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gro ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:102b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni rnam par byang ba'i phyogs thams cad rab tu shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa nyid ces bya ba /
T03TD3787E:102b-9: rang dang gzhan gyi don mos pa rnam pa gsum pa yongs su gsal bar byed pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang rab tu ldan pa nyid nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po rnams las tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po tshad med pa dang ldan pa nyid la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102b-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa de dag ni lha'i bu de dag spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102b-15: yang pha dang ma la sogs pa nas mi slob pa'i bar thams cad kyis kyang byams shing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:102b-17: yang spobs pa mi chod par 'gyur ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:103a-0: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa mi chod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba bsgom pa'i lam rnam pa bdun pa'i gnas skabs rnam par chad pa med @103a * //
T03TD3787E:103a-1: par shes bar byed pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103a-3: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha'i ris thams cad kyang glegs bam gyi yul du 'ongs nas /
T03TD3787E:103a-7: kun chub bar bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:103a-8: de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:103a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103a-11: lha'i tshogs thams cad 'ongs pas mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang ;
T03TD3787E:103a-12: lus dang sems las su rung ba thob nas chos gos la sogs pa la shas cher chags pa bkag pa zhes bya ba mos pa rnam pa dgu po'i don gsal bar byed pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103a-13: rang dang gzhan gyi don la mos pa rnam pa dgu bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:103a-16: // / gzhan gyi don la mos pa dgu brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:103a-17: de la re zhig chung ngu'i chung ngu'i rnam pa ni glegs bam du bris te 'chang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:103a-18: mchod pa 'ba' zhig tsam byed kyi /
T03TD3787E:103a-19: 'dzin pa nas gzhan la rgya cher ston par mi byed pa ma tshang bar byed pa bas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103a-21: yang koo shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bkang ba byas te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:103a-22: cha bzhag pa 'di gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshal lags so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103a-24: 'di la sbyor ba dang ldan pa 'di ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa'i dogs pa med pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gyi don la mos pa rnam pa gsum pa gsal bar byed pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103a-26: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltams pa zhig dang /
T03TD3787E:103b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol @103b tu phyin pa'i cha gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig 'dam du stsal na 'di nyid mchog yin pa nyid la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103b-2: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas rnams mdo la sogs pa gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi chos ston par mdzad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:103b-3: chos smra ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni 'di las byung ba yin pa'i phyir de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103b-5: 'di la rab tu sbyor ba ni rgyal po la brten pa'i skyes bu'i dpes gang gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:103b-6: mchod pa brnyes pa la sogs pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103b-8: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltams pa dang /
T03TD3787E:103b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid char byas te /
T03TD3787E:103b-10: gcig 'dam du bcug na 'di nyid len pa mchog yin pa la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103b-12: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi thugs su chud pa'i rgyu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103b-14: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:103b-19: chu zheng sna tshogs kyi grib ma'i dpes pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ro gcig pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gyi don gyi mos pa rnam pa dgu pa yongs su gsal bar byed pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:103b-20: mos pa'i rnam pa thams cad la chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa dpe gong nas gong du gyur pas gang dang gang bstan pa de dang de'i rjes su 'brangs nas /
T03TD3787E:103b-21: chen po'i chen po la sogs pa bzlog pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs su shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:104a-0: de la rang gi don la mos pa ni gzhan gyi don du @104a * //
T03TD3787E:104a-2: gnyis pa la ni sbyor ba bar chad dang bcas pa /
T03TD3787E:104a-3: gsum pa la ni sbyor ba bar chad med pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104a-4: mos pa yid la byed pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:104a-6: // / da ni 'di'i bstod pa la sogs pa brjod dgos pa de'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:104a-7: shes rab pha rol phyin pa la //
T03TD3787E:104a-8: mos pa'i gnas skabs rnams la ni //
T03TD3787E:104a-9: dgu tshan gsum gyis bstod pa dang //
T03TD3787E:104a-10: bkur ba dang ni bsngags par 'dod //
T03TD3787E:104a-11: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104a-12: de la bstod pa'i cha dang po ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:104a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis bkang ba gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:104a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i cha gnyis las gang yang rung ba 'dam du stsal na 'di nyid len te zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:104a-15: gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te gzhan la stsal na zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:104a-16: sbyin pa po bsod nams ches mang du 'phel ba nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104a-17: gnyis pa ni de bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ste /
T03TD3787E:104a-18: bshad cing bstan na bsod nams shas cher 'phel te /
T03TD3787E:104a-19: de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104a-20: gsum pa ni sems can gcig gcig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'jog par byed pa ni 'dzam bu gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i bsod nams pas bsod nams mang du 'phel te /
T03TD3787E:104a-21: rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104a-22: bzhi pa ni sems can gcig gcig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104a-23: lnga pa ni de bzhin du sems can gcig gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104a-24: drug pa ni de bzhin du sems can gcig gcig dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod na zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104a-25: bdun pa ni de bzhin du sems can gcig gcig rang byang chub la bzhag na zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104b-0: brgyad pa ni 'dzam bu gling @104b gi sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas sems can gcig gcig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na de bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
T03TD3787E:104b-2: de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa yin no ;
T03TD3787E:104b-3: / de la sangs rgyas kyi tshul ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs so //
T03TD3787E:104b-4: bstod pa cha dgu ni de bzhin du 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag pa bas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104b-5: 'di ni re zhig bstod pa'i cha dgu pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104b-6: bkur ba yang cha dgur shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:104b-7: de la bkur ba dang po ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:104b-8: de bzhin du 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag pa bas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104b-9: gnyis pa ni de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid la bzhag pa bas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104b-10: gsum pa ni de bzhin du rang byang chub la bzhag pa bas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104b-11: bzhi pa ni gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur pa'i bsod nams pas glegs bam la bris nas gzhan la byin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:104b-12: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa bsod nams mang du 'phel ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104b-13: de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:104b-14: byang chub la gnyis su spyod pa yang ma yin /
T03TD3787E:104b-15: mi gnyis par spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chad pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104b-16: lnga pa ni yang gnyis su med pa'i don gyis na don de ston pas bsod nams mang du 'phel ba nyid gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104b-17: drug pa ni yang don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan pa las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa bsod nams ches 'phel ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:104b-18: bdun pa ni yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas rnams la nam 'tsho'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa bas /
T03TD3787E:105a-2: yi ge ma nor bar 'chad cing ston par byed pa bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te /
T03TD3787E:105a-4: sangs rgyas de rnams ni 'di las nges par 'khrungs pa nyid kyis so zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105a-5: brgyad pa ni yang bskal pa grangs med gzhal du med par sbyin pa la sogs pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bas ltar bcos pa las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul du phyin ci ma log par ston par byed pa bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105a-6: bkur ba'i cha dgu pa ni yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:105a-7: phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas /
T03TD3787E:105a-8: sems can gcig gcig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dzin du bcug cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bzhag pa ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105a-9: bkur ba'i cha rnam pa dgu po bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:105a-11: // / da ni bsngags pa'i cha rnam pa dgu po brjod par bya'o de la bsngags pa'i cha dang po ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:105a-12: de bzhin du sems can de snyid cig kho na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105a-13: gnyis pa ni de bzhin du sems can de snyed cig kho na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105a-14: gsum pa ni sems can de snyed cig kho na dgra bcom pa nyid du zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105a-15: bzhi pa ni de bzhin du sems can de snyed kho na rang byang chub la bkod pa bas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105a-16: lnga pa ni yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par bkod pa bas /
T03TD3787E:105a-17: sems can gcig gcig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa bsod nams ches mang du 'phel ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105b-0: @105b drug pa ni de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i sems can de nyid la bkod pa bas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105b-1: bdun pa ni de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de nyid la bkod pa bas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105b-2: brgyad pa ni de bzhin du stong gnyis pa dang /
T03TD3787E:105b-4: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams de nyid la yang dag par bkod pa bas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105b-5: bsngags pa'i cha dgu pa ni /
T03TD3787E:105b-6: yang 'dzam bu'i gling nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:105b-7: phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:105b-8: phyir mi ldog pa de rnams las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yang rung ba mngon par shes pa myur ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyin ci ma log par ston pa'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105b-9: byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyad pa rnams la legs so legs so bsngags pa'i don yongs su gsal bar byed pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105b-10: de ltar na bstod pa la sogs pa 'di dag ni don yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid du rtogs pa'i cha'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:105b-11: rig byed shes pa rnams kyis don brjod pa ni bstod pa yin no zhes smras pa ltar don brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:105b-12: yang kha cig na re chad phyed dang bzhi pa'i aom ni bkur ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:105b-13: zhes brjod pa de dag gi ltar na ni sgra'i tshangs pa ni dam pa yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu bkur ba yin par 'gyur na /
T03TD3787E:105b-14: 'dir ni ji skad du brjod pa'i rtogs pa'i cha mtshan nyid yin no //
T03TD3787E:105b-15: bsngags pa'i dbang du byas nas snyan tshig gi rig byed pa yin par nga smra ste /
T03TD3787E:105b-16: mar lta bu'i tshig rjes su brjod pa gang yin pa de dag gi bsngags pa yin no zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de dag gi ltar na yang sgrar gtogs pa kho nar 'gyur na /
T03TD3787E:105b-17: 'dir ni cha dgu pa'i rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid bsngags pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:105b-18: cha ni yan lag ste cha shas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:106a-0: de ltar byas na mdo gzhan @106a * //
T03TD3787E:106a-1: gyi gleng gzhi de dang de dag las /
T03TD3787E:106a-2: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bkur la bsngags pa thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes gang gsungs pa de 'thad par 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
T03TD3787E:106a-3: mos pa yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:106a-4: bstod pa dang bkur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:106a-7: // / da ni yongs su bsngo ba yid la byed pa zhes bya ba yin pas na /
T03TD3787E:106a-8: yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can //
T03TD3787E:106a-9: de yi byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T03TD3787E:106a-10: de ni dmigs med rnam pa can //
T03TD3787E:106a-11: phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3787E:106a-12: dben dang sangs rgyas bsod nams tshogs //
T03TD3787E:106a-13: rang bzhin dran pa'i spyod yul can //
T03TD3787E:106a-14: thabs bcas mtshan ma med pa dang //
T03TD3787E:106a-15: sangs rgyas rjes su yi rang dang //
T03TD3787E:106a-16: khams gsum gtogs pa ma yin dang //
T03TD3787E:106a-17: chung dang 'bring dang chen po yi //
T03TD3787E:106a-18: bsngo ba gzhan ni rnam pa gsum //
T03TD3787E:106a-19: bsod nams che 'byung bdag nyid do //
T03TD3787E:106a-21: de la bsngo ba'i khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:106a-23: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnams las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos pa 'di nyid rab ces bya'o //
T03TD3787E:106a-25: gtso bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:106a-26: de la rab ces bya ba ni rab rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:106a-27: bstun pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi dam par gyur pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:106a-28: gnyis pa med pa nyid kyis na gnyis pa dang bral ba gtso bor gyur pa nyid do //
T03TD3787E:106a-29: de la dam par gyur par rab nyid ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:106a-30: thabs la mkhas pa'i mchog nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:106a-31: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyis rab mchog yin no //
T03TD3787E:106a-32: gtso bo nyid kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:106a-33: mnyam pa med pa nyid kyis phul du phyin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:106a-34: lhag pa med pas gong na med pa ste /
T03TD3787E:106a-35: tshig bdun gyis de'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bstan pas so //
T03TD3787E:106b-0: yongs su bsngo ba'i byed pa ni yang sems can rnams @106b la theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba'i lam ston par byed pas rgyur gyur pas na mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3787E:106b-1: mi mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pas na mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3787E:106b-3: nyan thos la sogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i rang dang gzhan gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:106b-4: mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa can gyi yongs su bsngo ba ni /
T03TD3787E:106b-5: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:106b-6: dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:106b-7: de yongs su bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3787E:106b-8: theg pa gsum gyis yongs su smin par byas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:106b-9: rnam par grol bar byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gcig tu bsdus te /
T03TD3787E:106b-10: rjes su yi rang zhing yongs su bsngos nas dngos po gang zhig yin zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:106b-13: byang chub kyi sems dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni gang yin zhes bya ba dang sems ni zad cing 'gags la bral zhing rnam par gyur pa nyid ces bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:106b-14: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i rnam par yongs su bsngos pa legs pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:106b-15: de la dngos po ni rigs so //
T03TD3787E:106b-16: dmigs pa ni chos thams cad do //
T03TD3787E:106b-17: byang chub kyi ched du bya ba'i sems ni 'dzin par byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03TD3787E:106b-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba ni ma chags pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:106b-19: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni sems pa'o //
T03TD3787E:106b-20: zad pa ni bsags pa rnam par 'jig pas so //
T03TD3787E:106b-21: 'gags pa ni rgyun gyis 'jig pas so //
T03TD3787E:106b-22: bral ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'jig pas so ;
T03TD3787E:106b-23: / rnam par gyur pa ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i rnam par 'jig pas so //
T03TD3787E:106b-24: phyin ci ma log pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yongs su bsngo ba ni /
T03TD3787E:106b-25: sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de nyid kyi chos nyid kyang de yin no //
T03TD3787E:107a-0: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad @107a * //
T03TD3787E:107a-1: rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes gang gsungs bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:107a-2: dben ba'i gnas su bsngo ba ni /
T03TD3787E:107a-3: gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de phung po la sogs pas dben par shes te /
T03TD3787E:107a-4: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te ;
T03TD3787E:107a-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de nyid kyi ngo bos dben par shes te zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:107a-6: sangs rgyas kyi chos dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rigs su gtogs pa'i rang bzhin dran pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ni /
T03TD3787E:107a-7: sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rigs gang dag yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:107a-8: rang bzhin gang yin pa de bzhin du bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de yongs su bsngo bar byed pa zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:107a-9: thabs la mkhas pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ni /
