T03TD3787E:107a-10: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' chen pos thabs la mkhas pa de dag la bslab par bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:107a-11: mtshan ma med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ni /
T03TD3787E:107a-12: kha zas dug dang bcas pa'i dpes mtshan ma'i 'du shes can gyis yongs su bsngo ba ni /
T03TD3787E:107a-13: dug can zug rdu can te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:107a-14: sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i bsngo ba ni /
T03TD3787E:107a-15: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pas mkhyen pa de bzhin du yongs su bsngo'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:107a-16: khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa'i yongs su bsngo ba ni /
T03TD3787E:107a-17: gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
T03TD3787E:107a-18: ji ltar gzugs khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:107a-19: bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i bsngo ba yang chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin no //
T03TD3787E:107a-20: de la chung ngu ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:107a-21: mngon par shes pa lnga zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3787E:107a-22: 'jig rten pa'i rtogs pa la gnas pa /
T03TD3787E:107b-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten @107b gyi khams kyi sems can gyi dpes yongs su bsngo ba 'di bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:107b-1: 'bring ni yang de snyad cig kho na rgyun tu zhugs pa nas /
T03TD3787E:107b-2: dgra bcom par gyur pa la bkur sti dang /
T03TD3787E:107b-3: mchod pa la sogs pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi dpes /
T03TD3787E:107b-4: bsod nams 'di snga ma bzhin du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:107b-5: chen po ni sems can de snyed kho na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams re res mchod pa'i bsod nams kyi dpes mi dmigs par yongs su bsngo ba'i bsod nams snga ma bzhin te /
T03TD3787E:107b-7: de dag thams cad ni mi dmigs pa nyid kyis so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:107b-8: yongs su bsngo ba'i yid la byed pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:107b-10: // / rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:107b-11: thabs dang mi dmigs pa dag gis //
T03TD3787E:107b-12: dge ba'i rtsa la yi rang ba //
T03TD3787E:107b-13: rjes su yi rang yid byed pa //
T03TD3787E:107b-14: sgom pa yin pa 'dir brjod do //
T03TD3787E:107b-15: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:107b-16: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rjes su yi rang ba rab tu 'gyur zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:107b-17: thabs la mkhas pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:107b-18: de la mos pa yid la byed pas ni 'byung khungs dag nas gser gyi gar bu bzhin du bsod nams mngon par 'du byed do //
T03TD3787E:107b-19: yongs su bsngo ba'i yid la byed pas ni gser mgar gyi rgyan bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu byed do //
T03TD3787E:107b-20: rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pas ni rang dang gzhan gyi bsod nams bya ba mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo //
T03TD3787E:107b-21: zag pa dang bcas pa'i bsgom pa'i lam bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:107b-23: // / zag pa med pa brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:107b-24: de las kyang mngon par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sbyor ba'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:107b-25: de yi ngo bo nyid mchog nyid //
T03TD3787E:107b-26: kun la mngon par 'du mi byed //
T03TD3787E:108a-0: @108a * // chos rnams dmigs pa med par ni //
T03TD3787E:108a-1: gtod par byed pa don chen nyid //
T03TD3787E:108a-3: de la ngo bo nyid ni /
T03TD3787E:108a-4: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pas na snang bar bgyid pa'o //
T03TD3787E:108a-5: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:108a-6: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par ston par byed pa legs so zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:108a-7: sbyor ba de ni ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin par gsal bar byed pa yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:108a-8: mchog nyid ni dmus long mang po'i dpes pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par lam shes pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:108a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro ba'i nus pa bkag pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:108a-10: chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni /
T03TD3787E:108a-11: gzugs mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:108a-12: chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:108a-13: chos thams cad dmigs pa med pas mngon par rtogs pa gtod par byed pa ni /
T03TD3787E:108a-14: dge ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar rnams gang yang gtod par mi byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3787E:108a-16: de ni chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa nyid kyis ming ji lta ba dang mtshan ma ji ltar gtod par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:108a-17: de la ming ni ming du btags pa'o //
T03TD3787E:108a-18: mtshan ma ni de 'jug par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
T03TD3787E:108a-19: gtod pa ni gtod pa med pa nyid kyis gnyis kyi 'du shes de las ring du byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pas des so sor thob bar byed pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:108a-21: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du che ba dang chung bar byed pa bkag pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:108b-0: @108b sangs rgyas stobs dang ldan pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang ldan par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:108b-1: sangs rgyas nyid kyi don chen po sgrub par byed pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yin pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:108b-2: mngon par sgrub pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:108b-4: // / da ni shin tu rnam par dag pa brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:108b-5: re zhig 'di'i rgyu ni rnam pa gsum du brjod la /
T03TD3787E:108b-6: bzlog pa'i rgyu'ang rnam pa bzhir brjod par 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:108b-8: sangs rgyas bsten dang sbyin sogs dang //
T03TD3787E:108b-9: thabs la mkhas pa gang yin pa ;
T03TD3787E:108b-10: /'di la sogs pa'i rgyu dag yin //
T03TD3787E:108b-11: chos kyis phongs pa'i rgyu dag ni //
T03TD3787E:108b-12: bdud kyi thibs kyis non pa dang //
T03TD3787E:108b-13: zab pa'i chos la ma mos dang //
T03TD3787E:108b-14: phung po la sogs mngon zhen dang //
T03TD3787E:108b-15: sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs zin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:108b-17: de la sangs rgyas la bsten pa 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:108b-18: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa bsnyen bkur byas nas 'dir 'ongs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:108b-19: sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par sgrub par byed pa ni /
T03TD3787E:108b-20: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med tshad med dpag tu med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las spyad pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:108b-22: rab 'byor 'di ni rnam par phye nas lung bstan par bya ba yin te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:108b-23: thabs la mkhas pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyi bar gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:108b-24: chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang rgyu mthun pa'i las ni /
T03TD3787E:108b-25: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis ji srid du /
T03TD3787E:108b-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms la /
T03TD3787E:109a-0: de'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms pa dag kyang @109a * //
T03TD3787E:109a-1: yod do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:109a-4: dus ring por bdag nyid kyi lus chen po la rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa nye bar bstan pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:109a-5: de la drag pa ni lhag pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:109a-6: rgyun mi 'chad pa ni rtag tu ba nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:109a-7: sdug bsngal ba ni mi mthun pa nyid kyis te /
T03TD3787E:109a-8: de nye bar bstan pa ni sems can rnams de las bzlog par bya ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:109a-9: yang las kyi sgrib pa 'di'i rgyu rnam pa bzhi'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:109a-10: bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:109a-11: chos zab mo la mos pa dang /
T03TD3787E:109a-12: phung po la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:109a-13: sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa ni de'i rgyu yin no //
T03TD3787E:109a-15: shin tu rnam par dag pa thob pa'i rgyu gsum dang bzlog pa'i rgyu bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:109a-17: // / de las kyang re zhig rnam par dag pa spyir brjod de /
T03TD3787E:109a-18: de nas khyad par gyi don 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:109a-19: de la rnam par dag pa'i spyi ni 'di yin no //
T03TD3787E:109a-20: 'bras bu dag pa gzugs la sogs //
T03TD3787E:109a-21: dag pa nyid de gang gi phyir //
T03TD3787E:109a-22: de gnyis tha dad ma yin zhing //
T03TD3787E:109a-23: gcad du med pas dag par brjod //
T03TD3787E:109a-25: rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do zhes bya ba nas de dag gnyis su byar med pa nyid kyis dbyer med gcad du med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:109a-26: de la gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i gang zag gang yin pa'i dge sbyong gi 'bras bu de ni gzugs la sogs pa la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa dang bral bas rab tu phye ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:109a-27: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la /
T03TD3787E:109a-28: gnyis su med pa'i don gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:109a-29: gnyis su byar med ces bya ba ni ldem por dgongs pa gnyis su byar mi nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:109b-0: @109b dbyer med gcad du med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
T03TD3787E:109b-1: dbye ba ni mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa nyid do //
T03TD3787E:109b-2: gcad pa ni so so tha dad par yan lag so sor byed pa'o //
T03TD3787E:109b-3: de ltar rnam par dag pa'i spyi bshad zin nas khyad par brjod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:109b-4: nyon mongs shes bya la ma gsum gyi //
T03TD3787E:109b-5: nyams phyir slob ma bse ru dang //
T03TD3787E:109b-6: rgyal sras rnams kyi dag pa ste /
T03TD3787E:109b-7: sangs rgyas rnam kun shin tu ba //
T03TD3787E:109b-8: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:109b-9: de la nyan thos kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa ni /
T03TD3787E:109b-12: gti mug rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:109b-13: gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa 'di dag gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa nyid kyis dbyer med gcad du med do zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:109b-16: srog la sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:109b-17: gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:109b-18: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa'i phyogs gcig rnam par dag pa ni /
T03TD3787E:109b-19: rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o //
T03TD3787E:109b-20: 'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:109b-21: ma rig pa rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:109b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa gsum gyi lam rnam par dag pa ni /
T03TD3787E:109b-23: rab 'byor gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:109b-24: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:109b-25: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di dag gnyis su med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:109b-26: shin tu rnam par dag pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yin te /
T03TD3787E:109b-28: de ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:110a-0: de la shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po'i mtha' @110a * //
T03TD3787E:110a-2: rtag tu chos kyi sku brnyes pas dus kyi mtha' las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:110a-3: mtha' las brgal ba dang mtha' las shin tu song ba zhes bya bas so //
T03TD3787E:110a-4: mtha' las 'das pa ni chos kyi dbyings la brjod la /
T03TD3787E:110a-5: de la yod pas na shin tu ba'o //
T03TD3787E:110a-8: gzugs med pa'i khams kyis bsdus pa'i sa dgu po rnams la so sor rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po la sogs pa dgu'i gnyen po bsgom pa'i lam chung du'i chung ngu la sogs pa rnam pa dgur phye ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:110a-9: de nyid kyi phyir ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa bsgoms pa nyid kyis bsgom pa'i lam la yang byar med pa nyid kyi rgyu nye bar bstan pa'i don du shin tu zhes smos te /
T03TD3787E:110a-11: sa dgu la ni chen po yi //
T03TD3787E:110a-12: chen po la sogs dri ma yi //
T03TD3787E:110a-13: gnyen po chung ngu'i chung ngu la //
T03TD3787E:110a-14: sogs pa'i lam ni dag pa yin //
T03TD3787E:110a-16: de la lam chung ngu'i chung ngu'i rnam pa ni /
T03TD3787E:110a-17: rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa /
T03TD3787E:110a-18: gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:110a-19: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:110a-20: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:110a-22: rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
T03TD3787E:110a-23: gzugs rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:110a-25: rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa'o //
T03TD3787E:110a-26: 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
T03TD3787E:110a-27: 'das pa rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:110a-29: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa 'di ni zab bo zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:110a-30: sh'a ri'i bu gzugs rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:110b-0: rnam par dag pa zab bo @110b zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:110b-2: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni snang bar gyur pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:110b-3: sh'a ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:110b-4: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:110b-6: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:110b-7: sh'a ri'i bu gzugs la 'pho ba med cing nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:110b-9: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni /
T03TD3787E:110b-10: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:110b-11: sh'a ri'i bu shin tu kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:110b-12: gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:110b-14: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni /
T03TD3787E:110b-15: thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:110b-16: sh'a ri'i bu thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba gang gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:110b-17: gzugs dang tshor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:110b-18: lam gyi rnam pa chen po'i chen po ni /
T03TD3787E:110b-19: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni /
T03TD3787E:110b-20: mngon par ma grub pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:110b-21: sh'a ri'i bu shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:110b-22: gzugs dang tshor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:110b-23: khams gsum pa'i gnyen po nyid kyi bsgom pa'i lam gyi dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3787E:110b-24: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:110b-26: gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba ma lags so zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:110b-27: sh'a ri'i bu khams gsum po'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:110b-28: 'jal byed dang gzhal bya mnyam pa nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:110b-29: bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags so zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:111a-1: bems po nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:111a-2: gzugs dang tshor ba mi shes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:111a-4: chos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:111a-5: de la klan ka spangs pa yis //
T03TD3787E:111a-6: lam ni 'jal dang gzhal bya dag / mnyam pa nyid kyi khams gsum gyi //
T03TD3787E:111a-7: gnyen po nyid du 'dod pa yin //
T03TD3787E:111a-8: zhes bya ba ni gal te gnyis su kun tu rtog pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs chen po'i chen po la sogs pa dang gnyen po ni chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T03TD3787E:111a-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sman par yang mi bgyid pa lags so zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:111a-10: sh'a ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:111a-11: 'o na tshogs la 'bad pas ci zhig bskyed snyam na ;
T03TD3787E:111a-12: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni chos 'ga' yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid lags so zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:111a-13: sh'a ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings yongs su gzung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:111a-14: thob pa'am rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro snyam na /
T03TD3787E:111a-15: bcom ldan 'das gnyis rnam par dag pa la thob pa ma mchis mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:111a-16: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:111a-17: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar gzung nas /
T03TD3787E:111a-18: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bas skabs yongs su rdzogs par ston par byed pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:111a-20: mog mog por byed la sogs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:111a-21: slob ma bse ru'i lam dag dang //
T03TD3787E:111a-22: 'di dang gzhan gyi yon tan gyis //
T03TD3787E:111a-23: phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam //
T03TD3787E:111a-24: byed pa dang ni mos pa dang //
T03TD3787E:111a-25: bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang /
T03TD3787E:111a-26: bsngo dang rjes su yi rang ba //
T03TD3787E:111a-27: yid la byed pa bla med dag / sgrub dang shin tu dag pa zhes //
T03TD3787E:111a-28: bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam //
T03TD3787E:111b-0: byang chub sems @111b dpa' mkhas rnams kyi //
T03TD3787E:111b-1: lam shes nyid ni de 'drar bshad //
T03TD3787E:111b-2: ces gang gsungs pa de ni 'dir 'das zin pa'i 'brel pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3787E:111b-3: rnam grangs kyi tshig rnams kyi bshad pa ni /
T03TD3787E:111b-4: nyan thos kyi lam gyi dbang du byas nas bden pa bzhi'i dmigs pa la rnam pa bcu drug tu rnam par bzhag par /
T03TD3787E:111b-5: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gdams par bgyi'o //
T03TD3787E:111b-8: yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o //
T03TD3787E:111b-10: yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o //
T03TD3787E:111b-12: rab tu gnas par bgyi'o zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de la dang po 'di ltar bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:111b-13: zhes bya bar nye bar ston pa dang /
T03TD3787E:111b-14: de nyid la yang nas yang du goms par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:111b-15: bag med pa rnams chos 'di la mos par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:111b-16: rmongs pa rnams rtogs par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:111b-17: brtson pa zhan pa rnams spro bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:111b-18: zhan pa rnams yang dag par mgu bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:111b-19: lam la nges par sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3787E:111b-20: de nyid du nges par byed pa'i dbang du byas nas tshig brgyad rim pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:111b-21: rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang du byas nas de dag gi 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma spangs par rnam par bzhag par /
T03TD3787E:111b-22: btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar zab pa /
T03TD3787E:111b-23: 'di ltar brtag par bya ba ma yin pa ;
T03TD3787E:111b-24: 'di ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa /
T03TD3787E:111b-28: 'di ltar rjes su rtogs par dka' ba /
T03TD3787E:111b-30: 'di ltar 'phags pa la nus pa yod pa /
T03TD3787E:111b-31: 'di ltar mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di len par byed pa su dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhes gang brjod pa de la sgro skur las grol ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:111b-32: sems dang rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-0: rnal 'byor gyi chos kyis nges par bya ba nyid kyis rtog ge las 'das @112a * //
T03TD3787E:112a-2: rang bzhin gyi ngo bo phra ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-3: rigs nas brtsams te chos kyi sku thob kyi bar du lam bar chad med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-5: mthong bar byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-6: mthong ba'i tshig gis kyang don de thob par mi nus pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'bras bu can nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-8: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyis rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i dbang du byas nas tshig dgu po rnams go rims bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:112a-9: tshig bcu pa ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid du bshad par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:112a-10: 'di ltar 'dir ji ltar chos 'ga' yang ma bshad ma bstan ma brjod pa de kho na 'dir len par byed pa su'ang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-12: de gnyi ga las tshig gsum po rnams yin no //
T03TD3787E:112a-13: bkur ba'i cha lnga pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3787E:112a-14: koo shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ston pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-17: gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-18: rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-19: de dag nyid kyi bstan pa gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin rnam par 'byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-20: de'i khar 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i sgo nas tshig bzhi po rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:112a-21: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:112a-23: de gang gis gnyis su med par mthong gi /
T03TD3787E:112a-24: gnyis su ni ma yin pa gang yin pa ste /
T03TD3787E:112a-25: mtshan mar ma yin mtshan ma med par yang ma yin /
T03TD3787E:112a-26: 'ong bar ma yin 'gro bar ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-27: bsal bar ma yin bzhag par ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-28: kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin /
T03TD3787E:112a-29: rnam par byang bar ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-30: skye bar ma yin 'gag par ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-31: len par ma yin 'dor bar ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-32: gnas par ma yin mi gnas par ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-33: yang dag par ma yin yang dag pa ma yin par ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-34: ldan par ma yin mi ldan par ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112a-35: bag tsam ma yin bag tsam ma yin par ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-0: @112b cha so so ma yin cha so so ma yin par ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-1: chos nyid ma yin chos nyid ma yin par ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-2: de bzhin nyid ma yin de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-3: yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa ma yin par mthong ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
T03TD3787E:112b-4: byed pa po dang thob par byed pa'i rgyu bkag pa rjes su shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-5: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-6: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dag sel ba dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-8: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dag phan tshun gyi rang bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-9: chos nyid la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-10: lta bas byas pa'i len pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-11: de'i ngo bo nyid kyis dor ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-12: rigs kyi rten gyi gnas dngos po ma yin pa nyid kyis gnas pa dang mi gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-13: gsung rab kyi chos bden pa dang brdzun pa ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-14: tshogs pa'i ldan pa dang ldan pa med pa las 'das pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-15: chos kyi dbyings la nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis phyogs gcig dang thams cad tshang bar nges par 'byung ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-16: rigs so so'i rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings char byar med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-17: lam gyi chos 'phags pa'i gang zag gi dbye bas phan tshun lam dang lam ma yin par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-18: de kho na bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i chos kyi dbyings la dbye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:112b-19: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gyur pa'i chos nyid ro gcig pa nyid kyis mtha' khyad par med pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3787E:112b-20: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mar ma yin mtshan ma med par ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig zung bcu bzhi po rnams kyis nges par bstan pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:112b-21: de bzhin du rnam grangs kyi tshig bshad pa ma byas pa gzhan rnams kyi don zung gi rjes su 'brangs nas ji ltar rigs par mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad par 'os te /
T03TD3787E:112b-22: kho bo cag gis ni gzhung lci ba'i skyon spangs pa'i don du thams cad nye bar bstan par spungs ma bskyed do //
T03TD3787E:113a-0: @113a * // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las /
T03TD3787E:113a-1: lam shes pa'i skabs mtha' gnyis rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3787E:113a-2: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:113a-4: // / da ni thams cad shes pa nyid bshad par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:113a-5: de la re zhig 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:113a-6: tshu rol pha rol mtha' la min //
T03TD3787E:113a-7: de dag bar na mi gnas pa //
T03TD3787E:113a-9: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol gyi mtha' ma lags gnyis ka las gzhan du'ang mi dmigs te zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:113a-10: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes dang dmigs pa bkag pas gang gsungs pa yin no//
T03TD3787E:113a-11: de la mi dmigs pa'ang gang gi phyir /
T03TD3787E:113a-12: dus rnams mnyam pa nyid shes phyir //
T03TD3787E:113a-13: shes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod //
T03TD3787E:113a-15: dus gsum pa'i chos rnams mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:113a-16: zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:113a-17: thabs ma yin pas ring ba ste //
T03TD3787E:113a-19: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes par bgyid na /
T03TD3787E:113a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dor bar 'gyur /
T03TD3787E:113a-21: ring du byed par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:113a-22: de'i tshe dang phyi ma'i tshe la ltos nas tshig gnyis so //
T03TD3787E:113a-23: thabs ma yin pa'ang gang zhe na /
T03TD3787E:113a-24: de ni mtshan mar dmigs sgo nas //
T03TD3787E:113a-26: rab 'byor ming las kyang chags so //
T03TD3787E:113a-27: rab 'byor mtshan las kyang chags so //
T03TD3787E:113a-29: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa ming med pa'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:113a-30: de ni thabs la mkhas pa yis //
T03TD3787E:113a-31: yang dag dge ba nyid du bshad //
T03TD3787E:113b-0: bcom ldan 'das @113b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di legs par bshad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:113b-1: legs par mthar phyung ba'i bar ni ngo mtshar ro zhes bya bas /
T03TD3787E:113b-2: nyan thos la sogs pa'i rtogs pa nyi tshe ba dang bzlog pas mthar thug par song ba de la legs par bshad pa dang legs par mthar phyung bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:113b-4: gzugs sogs phung po stong nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:113b-5: dus gsum gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang //
T03TD3787E:113b-6: sbyin sogs byang chub phyogs rnams la //
T03TD3787E:113b-7: spyod pa'i 'du shes mi mthun phyogs //
T03TD3787E:113b-9: thabs mi mkhas pas de gzugs stong zhes bya bar zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:113b-10: gzugs la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:113b-11: 'das pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:113b-12: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i 'du shes ni chags pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:113b-14: sbyin pa la sogs la bar 'dzin med //
T03TD3787E:113b-15: ces gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:113b-16: sh'a ri'i bu thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di snyam du gzugs la gzugs zhes shes par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:113b-17: bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa med de zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:113b-19: thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:113b-20: yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:113b-21: koo shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems su shes pa dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:113b-22: chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyod par mi nus so //
T03TD3787E:113b-24: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
T03TD3787E:113b-26: gzhan dag de la sbyor byed pa //
T03TD3787E:113b-27: de ni chags pa'i mtha' 'gog pas //
T03TD3787E:113b-28: zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:114a-0: de nyid la nga rgyal bkag pa ston pa la sogs pas gzhan rnams kyi chags @114a * //
T03TD3787E:114a-1: pa'i thams cad spong bar byed pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:114a-2: de la kun tu rmongs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:114a-5: yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag par ston pa dang /
T03TD3787E:114a-6: yang dag par lan du 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:114a-7: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:114a-8: yang dag par dga' bar byed pa rnams go rims bzhin sbyar bar bya'o //
T03TD3787E:114a-10: rgyal la sogs pa chags pa phra //
T03TD3787E:114a-12: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mar yid la byed na zhes bya ba nas brtsams pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:114a-13: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang yongs su bsngo ba rnams ni chags pa phra mo nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:114a-14: 'di dag chags pa nyid yin pa ni gang gi phyir /
T03TD3787E:114a-15: chos kyi lam ni rang bzhin gyis //
T03TD3787E:114a-16: dben pa'i phyir na de zab nyid //
T03TD3787E:114a-17: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:114a-18: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:114a-19: rab 'byor chos thams cad rab bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:114a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:114a-21: yang ji ltar na chags pa thams cad spong ba yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:114a-22: chos rnams rang bzhin gcig par ni //
T03TD3787E:114a-23: shes pas chags pa spong ba yin //
T03TD3787E:114a-25: rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:114a-26: chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do //
T03TD3787E:114a-27: chos kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa shes bya dang shes pa nyid du yongs su ston pa chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spong ba'i don can gyi gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:114a-28: zad pa nyid ni gang gi phyir //
T03TD3787E:114a-29: mthong ba la sogs bkag pa yis //
T03TD3787E:114a-30: de ni rtogs par dka' bar bshad //
T03TD3787E:114b-0: rnam par shes pa bkag pas na de gzugs la sogs par mngon par rtogs par dka' ba shes pa dang shes bya mnyam pa nyid du sngon du ston @114b par byed pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:114b-1: yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar rtogs par dka' ba'i rgyu ni ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:114b-3: gzugs la sogs par mi shes phyir //
T03TD3787E:114b-4: de ni bsam mi khyab par 'dod //
T03TD3787E:114b-6: gzugs nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du mi shes pa'i phyir 'di'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid shes pa mnyam pa nyid du ston par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:114b-8: de ltar kun shes nyid lugs la //
T03TD3787E:114b-9: mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dag / rnam par phye ba ma lus pa //
T03TD3787E:114b-10: ji skad bshad pa 'dir shes bya //
T03TD3787E:114b-12: da ni sbyor ba brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:114b-13: de'ang rnam pa bcur 'gyur bas de'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:114b-14: gzugs sogs de mi rtag sogs dang //
T03TD3787E:114b-15: de ma rdzogs dang rab rdzogs dang //
T03TD3787E:114b-16: de la chags pa med nyid la //
T03TD3787E:114b-17: spyod pa bkag pas sbyor ba dang //
T03TD3787E:114b-18: mi 'gyur byed po min nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:114b-19: sbyor ba bkag pa rnams gsum dang //
T03TD3787E:114b-20: skal ba ji bzhin 'bras thob pas //
T03TD3787E:114b-22: gzhan la rag las min gang dang //
T03TD3787E:114b-23: snang ba rnam bdun shes byed do //
T03TD3787E:114b-24: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:114b-25: de la gzugs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:114b-26: gal te gzugs la spyod na /
T03TD3787E:114b-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:114b-28: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:114b-29: spyod pa de rjes su gnang bas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:114b-30: gzugs la sogs pa mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni phung po rnams nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa bkag pas snga ma bzhin te /
T03TD3787E:114b-32: gzugs la sogs pa ni de bzhin du med pa nyid kyis so zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:114b-33: gzugs la sogs pa rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:114b-34: gzhan yang gzugs la sogs pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa'i spyod pa bkag pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
T03TD3787E:115a-1: yongs su ma rdzogs pa nyid la de ni kho bo bkag pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:115a-2: gzugs la sogs pa la chags pa med pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:115a-3: yang de rnams la ma chags pa nyid kyi spyod pa ni snga ma bzhin du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:115a-4: gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:115a-5: sbyor ba de nam mkha'i bsngags pa'am bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang 'dra ba chos zab mo 'di bstan pa dang ma bstan pa dag gis 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med par gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:115a-6: don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:115a-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshig gi yul ma yin pa'i phyir bstan pa nyid der 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa yin gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:115a-8: byed pa po'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:115a-9: sbyor ba de ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu bsngags pa'am bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dag gis rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa dang 'dra bar de bstan pa dang ma bstan pa dag gis 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa med par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:115a-10: bya dka' ba'i sbyor ba ni bya dka' ba rnam pa gsum nyid do //
T03TD3787E:115a-11: ched du dka' ba nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
T03TD3787E:115a-12: de nyid kyi phyir gang dag de la sbyor bar 'dod pa de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su grol bar 'dod pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:115a-13: sbyor ba bya dka' ba nyid ni lam shes pa nyid de /
T03TD3787E:115a-14: gang dag de la 'bad par 'dod pa de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la 'degs par 'dod pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:115a-15: las bya dka' ba nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid de gang dag de la rtsol bar 'dod pa de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa nyid do //
T03TD3787E:115a-17: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad kyang sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa'am gang ba med do zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:115a-18: 'bras bu yod pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:115b-0: gang yang rung ba zhig la dge slong gcig ces ming du ma bstan pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i rtogs pa nye bar bkod pas 'khor gzhan gang yin pa @115b dag gis kyang skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa thob par ston pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:115b-1: gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:115b-2: brgya byin gyis bsrung ba dang /
T03TD3787E:115b-3: bskyab par khas blangs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:115b-5: smig rgyu la sogs pa dang 'dra bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T03TD3787E:115b-6: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo srung ba la sogs pa byed par sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:115b-7: rnam pa bdun du snang ba'i shes pa'i sbyor ba ni yongs su 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:115b-12: byed pa po ma yin par snang ba rnams kyis chos rnams rmi lam lta bu la sogs par dris pa thams cad shes pa la nyan thos la sogs pa'i dbang du byas nas dpe'i don 'thad par byas pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:115b-15: // / da ni mnyam pa nyid brjod par bya ba yin pas /
T03TD3787E:115b-16: gzugs la sogs pa rlom med pa //
T03TD3787E:115b-17: rnam bzhi de yi mnyam pa nyid //
T03TD3787E:115b-19: ji ltar na rnam pa bzhi yin zhe na ;
T03TD3787E:115b-20: gzugs rlom sems su mi byed /
T03TD3787E:115b-21: gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed /
T03TD3787E:115b-22: gzugs bdag gis zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed //
T03TD3787E:115b-23: gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed ces gang gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:115b-24: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:115b-25: da ni mthong ba'i lam brjod par bya ba yin pas na de'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:115b-26: sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rigs thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas stong dang /
T03TD3787E:116a-0: 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnam pa 'di lta bur chad pa dang lhag pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa rnams sems kyis mthong bar gyur pas gang gsungs pas ni mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug las gtogs pa skad cig ma gzhan med par shes par byed pa la dbang por @116a * //
T03TD3787E:116a-2: de la 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ma brjod pa de ni de'i bstan pa mthar thug pa shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:116a-3: ma 'ongs pa brjod pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:116a-4: grangs stong gi nges pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bskal pa bzang po grangs stong du grags pa nyid kyi thabs la mkhas pas gzhan sgrub pa dang dag pa med par shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:116a-5: mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:116a-6: sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa rnams //
T03TD3787E:116a-7: chos shes rjes su shes pa dang //
T03TD3787E:116a-8: shes pa'i skad cig bdag nyid 'di //
T03TD3787E:116a-9: kun shes tshul la mthong ba'i lam //
T03TD3787E:116a-10: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:116a-11: de la sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:116a-12: gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:116a-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das zhes bya ba'am ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa phyin ci log gi rnam pa can bkag pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:116a-14: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:116a-15: gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:116a-16: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes ji skad du brjod pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis po med pa phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par chos ston par rjes su gnang ba nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:116a-17: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:116a-18: gzugs la sogs pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:116a-19: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa ni //
T03TD3787E:116a-21: rab 'byor gzugs la skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:116b-0: 'gag @116b pa med pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:116b-1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba dang 'gag pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba bkag pa'i yongs su dag pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:116b-2: kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:116b-3: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:116b-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pa bkag pa'i yongs su dag pa ni /
T03TD3787E:116b-5: yongs su dag pa yin pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:116b-6: kun 'byung la chos shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:116b-7: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos pa med pa'i phyir 'di gos pa med pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:116b-8: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:116b-9: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa ni //
T03TD3787E:116b-10: sgra brnyan gnyis kyi dpes nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir de la tha snyad med pa'i rnam pa tha snyad kyi ngo bo bkag pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:116b-11: sgra gnyis dper brjod pa nyan pa po dang 'chad pa po dag gis 'dri ba dang lan 'debs pa'i tha snyad gnyis dang tshul bstun pa'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:116b-12: 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:116b-13: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir de rab tu brjod pa'i rnam par rgyud gzhan la don de thob par byed pa bkag pas gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:116b-14: gzhan la brjod pa ni rab tu brjod pa yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:116b-15: 'gog pa la chos shes pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:116b-16: de dmigs su med pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:116b-17: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:117a-0: @117a * // nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid kyis skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir de shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:117a-1: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:117a-5: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de mig gi nad la sogs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:117a-6: lha rnams kyang de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa dang /
T03TD3787E:117a-7: 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang /
T03TD3787E:117a-9: bco lnga dag la bstan pa la bsod nams mang po 'phel ba nyid kyis de dag tu lha rnams mchod pa dang rnam par lta ba nye bar gnas pa'i 'thad pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:117a-10: lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:117a-11: rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:117a-12: zhes bya ba nas brtsams pas thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas de ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang rnam par byang ba'i phyogs thams cad rab tu shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir dga' ba rgyas par byed pas na rin po che yin pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:117a-13: lam la chos shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:117a-14: yang lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs kyis //
T03TD3787E:117a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am /
T03TD3787E:117a-19: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:117a-23: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do //
T03TD3787E:117a-25: chos de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro zhes chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i dge ba ni rang bzhin gyis rin po che yin pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:117a-26: lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
T03TD3787E:117a-27: rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:117a-28: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:117b-1: mtshan ma rab tu shes so //
T03TD3787E:117b-2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du stobs su zin kyang chos la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ma 'brel pas mgos pa'i rin po che'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:117b-3: lam la rjes su shes pa ni gal te rin po che rnam pa gsum gyi don de'ang rnam par mi shes zhes bya ba ni dngos po shes pas so //
T03TD3787E:117b-4: rnam par rtog par mi byed ces bya ba ni de'i rgyu mtshan gyi rnam par rtogs pas so //
T03TD3787E:117b-5: mi dmigs zhes bya ba ni gnyis su dmigs pas so //
T03TD3787E:117b-6: de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te thams cad shes pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:117b-7: mdo'i tshig le'ur byas pa bzhi yin te /
T03TD3787E:117b-8: gzugs rtag ma yin mi rtag min //
T03TD3787E:117b-9: mtha' las 'das dang rnam dag dang //
T03TD3787E:117b-10: ma skyes ma 'gag la sogs dang //
T03TD3787E:117b-11: mkha' 'dra chags pa spangs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:117b-12: yongs su 'dzin las grol ba dang //
T03TD3787E:117b-13: ngo bo nyid kyi brjod med dang //
T03TD3787E:117b-14: gang phyir 'di don brjod pa yis //
T03TD3787E:117b-15: gzhan la sbyin du med pa dang //
T03TD3787E:117b-16: dmigs pa med par byed pa dang //
T03TD3787E:117b-17: shin tu rnam dag nad mi 'byung //
T03TD3787E:117b-18: ngan song chad dang 'bras bu ni ;
T03TD3787E:117b-19: / mngon du bya la mi rtog nyid //
T03TD3787E:117b-20: mtshan ma dag dang ma 'brel dang //
T03TD3787E:117b-21: dngos dang ming dang gnyis po la //
T03TD3787E:117b-22: shes pa skye ba med pa ni //
T03TD3787E:117b-23: kun shes nyid kyi skad cig ma //
T03TD3787E:117b-24: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:117b-26: yang 'di yin te rnam gsum mo ;
T03TD3787E:117b-27: /'dis ni gnas skabs gsum po dag / rdzogs par yongs su bstan pa yin //
T03TD3787E:117b-28: zhes bya ba'i 'di dang zhes bya ba la /
T03TD3787E:117b-29: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin /
T03TD3787E:117b-30: ston par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:117b-33: da ltar byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba rnam pa'i tshig bcu dgus lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pa dang po shes pa nyid kyi skabs yongs su rdzogs par ston pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:117b-34: de ni gzhi thams cad pa nyid kyi chos thams cad la zla dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:118a-0: @118a * // bzlog pa'i zla dang ldan pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam pa rtog pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:118a-1: yang 'di dang zhes bya ba la /
T03TD3787E:118a-2: rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khams gsum las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin /
T03TD3787E:118a-3: thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la gnas par byad pa ma yin /
T03TD3787E:118a-4: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin /
T03TD3787E:118a-5: ser sna 'dor bar byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin /
T03TD3787E:118a-6: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:118a-7: zhes gang gsungs pa ni de kho na bzhin du gnyis pa lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs yongs su rdzogs par ston pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:118a-8: de ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pas bsdus pa mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i rnam par rtog pa dag gtan kun tu spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:118a-9: yang 'di yin te zhes bya ba la /
T03TD3787E:118a-10: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:118a-11: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:118a-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so sor ster bar byed pa ma yin /
T03TD3787E:118a-15: 'dus byas kyi khams dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa ma yin /
T03TD3787E:118a-16: 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:118a-18: rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste chos kyi dbyings 'di gnas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:118a-19: chos nges pa ni gnas pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:118a-20: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la mngon par rtogs so //
T03TD3787E:118a-21: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par rtogs nas kyang gsungs par mdzad /
T03TD3787E:118a-26: yang dag par 'chad par mdzad do zhes gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:118a-27: de kho na bzhin du gsum pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skabs yongs su rdzogs par ston pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:118b-0: rang dang gzhan gyi don gyis bsdus pa rnam pa thams cad rtogs pa dang bshad pa'i chos dag gi rgyu de yin par @118b brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:118b-2: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang /
T03TD3787E:118b-10: yang dag par rab tu ston pa gang lags pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par bstan pa lags so zhes bya ba bstan pa'i tshig rnams kyi don ni chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:118b-11: rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:118b-12: ming gi tshogs bstan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:118b-13: tshig dang ngag rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:118b-14: don de gzhan gyi rgyud la nye bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:118b-15: gdul bya rnams chos 'di la mos par bya ba'i phyir don du nye bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:118b-16: de dag nyid sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po mngon par zhen par bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:118b-17: brtson 'grus zhan pa rnams la bslab pa thams cad bsdus nas ston pa dang /
T03TD3787E:118b-18: brtson pa bar ma rnams la smos pa'i chos nyid gsal bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:118b-19: brtson 'grus lhag pa rnams la chos mtha' dag yang dag par 'chad pa'i dbang du byas nas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:118b-20: yang ci'i don gyis lam shes pa nyid bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid la bsgom pa'i lam logs shig pa med ce na /
T03TD3787E:118b-21: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:118b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa dang mthong bas bltas nas 'da'o zhes gsungs pas na 'di ni gzhan gtsor byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:118b-23: gzhan yang rgyun tu zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang spong ba gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yin no zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:118b-25: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
T03TD3787E:118b-27: lam gzhan khyad par yod pa ma yin /
T03TD3787E:118b-28: rigs dang dbang po dang tshogs khyad zhugs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:118b-29: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i byed par gzhan rnams kyis rtogs pa'i byed pa ma lus pa 'dus par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:119a-1: pa dang spangs pa gang yin pa de de'i bzod pa yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:119a-2: rtogs pa'i tshad 'di tsam ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:119a-3: zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs gzhan yin no //
T03TD3787E:119a-5: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
T03TD3787E:119a-6: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang //
T03TD3787E:119a-7: thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang //
T03TD3787E:119a-8: thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid //
T03TD3787E:119a-9: mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag dang //
T03TD3787E:119a-10: sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:119a-11: nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i lam //
T03TD3787E:119a-13: ces gang gsungs pa de ni /
T03TD3787E:119a-14: 'dir rjes su 'das pa'i 'brel pa yin par blta'o //
T03TD3787E:119a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las thams cad shes pa'i skabs spyod pa'i khyad par gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o //
T03TD3787E:119a-16: thams cad shes pa nyid bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:119a-18: // / da ni rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs pa rtogs pa brjod par bya ba yin pas /
T03TD3787E:119a-19: gzhi shes pa yi bye brag rnams //
T03TD3787E:119a-20: rnam pa zhes bya mtshan nyid de //
T03TD3787E:119a-22: dngos po la dmigs pa ni gzhi shes pa'o //
T03TD3787E:119a-23: bye brag ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang gi gnyen po'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ste ;
T03TD3787E:119a-24: dper na rtag par 'dzin pa la mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:119a-25: gnyen po'i phyogs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis bsdus pa yin pas /
T03TD3787E:119a-26: kun mkhyen nyid ni rnam gsum phyir //
T03TD3787E:119a-27: de ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod //
T03TD3787E:119a-29: rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
T03TD3787E:119a-30: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rten du byas te /
T03TD3787E:119a-31: thams cad shes pa nyid gsum gyi skabs kyi bden pa gang la rnam pa ji snyed yod pa de ston pas re zhig thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:119a-32: med pa'i rnam pa nas bzung ste //
T03TD3787E:119a-33: mi g-yo ba yi rnam pa'i bar //
T03TD3787E:119a-34: bden pa so so la bzhi dang //
T03TD3787E:119a-35: lam la de ni bco lngar bshad //
T03TD3787E:119a-37: de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i rnam pa bzhi'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni //
T03TD3787E:119b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @119b pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:119b-1: rab 'byor nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
T03TD3787E:119b-2: mi rtog don ni don med don //
T03TD3787E:119b-3: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3787E:119b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:119b-5: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'i mi skye ba'i don zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3787E:119b-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:119b-7: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni stong pa'i don ni dngos po med pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3787E:119b-8: brdzi bar bya ba ma yin pa'i rnam pa nyid kyis chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bdag med pa'i rnam pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:119b-9: de ni mu stegs thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:119b-10: kun 'byung gi bden pa'i rnam pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa la /
T03TD3787E:119b-11: gzhi med pa'i rnam pas ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rab tu bskyed pa'i don gyis gzhi ni rgyu la brjod do //
T03TD3787E:119b-12: de la ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi'o //
T03TD3787E:119b-13: lus ni gzugs kyi phung po ste /
T03TD3787E:119b-14: de gnyi ga'i rgyu 'di yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:119b-15: nam mkha'i rnam pas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
T03TD3787E:119b-17: 'dod chags la sogs pa kun 'byung ba ni sngon dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma lhan cig gnas pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:119b-18: da ltar gyi'ang 'gags pas zin pa nyid kyis dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dag dang 'dra bar nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i chos nyid kyis mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:119b-19: brjod du med pa'i rnam pas rnam pa rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rab tu skye ba'i rnam pas te /
T03TD3787E:119b-20: rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa ni las 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:119b-21: ming med pa'i rnam pas tshor ba la sogs pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rkyen gyi rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:119b-22: gtso cher tshor ba nyams su myong ba ni yang srid pa 'byung ba'i rkyen nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120a-1: bden pa'i rnam pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:120a-3: chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i rnam pas te /
T03TD3787E:120a-4: de ni lus kyi mngon sum du bya ba yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:120a-5: sod nas thob par bya ba ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:120a-6: gang 'gags pa de ni gang du'ang song ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120a-7: mi 'phrogs pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:120a-8: yul gyi ngo bo ni gzung bar bya bar rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3787E:120a-9: mi zad pa'i rnam pas tshes thams cad shin tu zad cing 'gags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gya nom pa'i rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:120a-10: chos thams cad ni shin tu zad pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:120a-11: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3787E:120a-12: skye ba med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:120a-13: ji ltar yongs su brtags pa'i chos yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir su zhig skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3787E:120a-14: lam gyi bden pa'i rnam pa ni bco lnga las bzhi ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:120a-15: lhag ma ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po yin no //
T03TD3787E:120a-16: gang gi phyir snga ma'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa la /
T03TD3787E:120a-17: byed pa po med pa'i rnam pas /
T03TD3787E:120a-18: byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:120a-19: de ni byed pa po ma yin pa nyid kyis byed pa po 'dzin pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120a-20: shes pa po med pa'i rnam pas /
T03TD3787E:120a-21: shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120a-22: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'i rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:120a-23: ma lus par rtogs pa ni rigs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:120a-24: lam ni shes pa po'i rnam par rtogs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120a-26: 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:120a-27: lam ni dman pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas skabs dag spong ba dang len pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:120b-0: so sor rtogs pa ni sgrub @120b pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3787E:120b-2: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis gdul ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byin pa'i rnam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:120b-3: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa ni nyon mongs pa 'dul bar nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas so //
T03TD3787E:120b-4: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po lam ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:120b-5: bsgom pa'i lam zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:120b-6: mthong ba'i lam zag pa med pa'o //
T03TD3787E:120b-7: gang gi phyir bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam pa lnga'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:120b-8: rmi lam gyi rnam pas rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120b-9: sgra brnyan gyi rnam pas sgra brnyan brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120b-10: mig yor gyi rnam pas gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120b-11: smig rgyu'i rnam pas chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120b-12: sgyu ma'i rnam pas mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120b-14: de ltar go rims bzhin du chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:120b-17: gzod ma nas zhi ba dang /
T03TD3787E:120b-18: rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba zag pa dang bcas pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi gnas skabs lnga po 'di dag rmi lam la sogs pa'i dpe dang tshul bstun pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:120b-19: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po'i mthong ba'i lam ni rnam par rtog pa drug spong bas rab tu phye ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:120b-20: rnam pa drug gang zhe na ;
T03TD3787E:120b-21: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spong bas gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:120b-22: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam pas /
T03TD3787E:120b-23: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:120b-25: rnam par byang ba'i rnam par rtog pa spong bas gang gsungs pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'i rnam pas nyon mongs pa'i sems can med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:120b-26: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi rnam par rtog pa spong bas gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:120b-27: gos pa med pa'i rnam pas nam mkha' dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:121a-1: la sogs pa'i 'du shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi spros pa yongs su spong bas gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:121a-2: spros pa med pa'i rnam pas spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:121a-4: rang gi rtogs pa la ro myong bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rlom pa spong bas gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:121a-5: rlom sems med pa'i rnam pas rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:121a-6: yongs su nyams pa'i rnam par rtog pa spong bas gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:121a-7: mi g-yo ba'i rnam pas rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:121a-8: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:121a-10: // / lam shes pa'i rnam pa brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:121a-11: de la bden pa rnams kyi go rims ni don ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3787E:121a-12: don ji lta bu zhe na /
T03TD3787E:121a-13: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3787E:121a-14: kun 'byung dang lam gyi bden pa dag ni rgyu yin la /
T03TD3787E:121a-15: sdug bsngal dang 'gog pa'i bden pa dag ni 'bras bu yin te /
T03TD3787E:121a-17: rgyu dang lam dang sdug bsngal dang //
T03TD3787E:121a-18: 'gog pa la ni go rims bzhin ;
T03TD3787E:121a-19: / de dag brgyad dang bdun dang ni //
T03TD3787E:121a-20: lnga dang bcu drug ces bsgrags so //
T03TD3787E:121a-22: rnam pa zhes bya ba ni dkyus ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:121a-23: de la rgyu ni 'dun pa dang /
T03TD3787E:121a-25: dga' ba dang ldan pa sred pa yang 'byung ba can yin te /
T03TD3787E:121a-26: gang gi phyir 'dun pa'i gnyen por gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:121a-27: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam pas 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:121a-28: byed 'dod pa'i dngos po'i bsam pa ni bsam pa yin pas na /
T03TD3787E:121a-29: 'dun pa'i skabs su 'dod chags gtso bo yin pa'i phyir de med na cig shos kyang med par bstan to //
T03TD3787E:121a-30: 'dod chags kyi gnyen por gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:121a-31: gnas med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:121b-0: chos rnams la chags pa med pa nyid la dgongs nas 'dod chags kyi skabs @121b su dngos su 'jug pa'i rgyu nyid yin pas 'dun pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir de med na cig shos kyang med par bstan to //
T03TD3787E:121b-1: 'di dag ni dngos po phan tshun rjes su byed pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:121b-2: mtshungs par ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:121b-3: sred pa'i gnyen por gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:121b-4: zhi ba'i rnam pas chos thams cad phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:121b-6: sred pa ni gtsor nye bar zhi ba yin pa zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3787E:121b-9: gti mug kun 'byung ba'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin no //
T03TD3787E:121b-10: de'i gnyen por gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:121b-11: 'dod chags med pa'i rnam pas 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:121b-12: zhe sdang med pa'i rnam pas zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:121b-13: gti mug med pa'i rnam pas mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:121b-14: rab tu skye ba ni kun tu rtog pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:121b-15: de las 'dod chags la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:121b-16: de'i gnyen por gang gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:121b-17: nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam pas yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:121b-19: rkyen ni sems can du mngon par zhen pa 'jig tshogs su lta ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:121b-20: don med pa thams cad kyi rkyen yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:121b-21: gnyen por gsungs pa ni sems can med pa'i rnam pas sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
T03TD3787E:121b-22: de ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:121b-23: sems can med pa'i rnam pa'i bar ni go rims bzhin du rgyu gang yin pa 'dun pa dang /
T03TD3787E:121b-26: kun 'byung gang yin pa 'dod chags dang /
T03TD3787E:121b-29: rab tu skye ba gang yin pa kun du rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:121b-30: rkyen gang yin pa sems can du mngon par zhen pa ste /
T03TD3787E:121b-35: rnam pa brgyad ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa la brten par bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:122a-0: lam gyi bden pa'i rnam pa bdun gyi @122a * //
T03TD3787E:122a-1: dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:122a-2: tshad med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:122a-3: de ni ldog pa'i phyogs thob par byed pa yin pa nyid kyis na /
T03TD3787E:122a-4: sems can tshad med pa'i go skabs 'byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:122a-5: go skabs 'byed pa de ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gnyis yod pa yin pas /
T03TD3787E:122a-6: mtha' gnyis dang 'brel ba'i rnam pas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gnyis dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:122a-7: rigs ni tha mi dad pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:122a-8: tha dad pa med pa ni yang mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i rnam pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:122a-10: phyogs gcig par 'gyur ba'i phyir tha dad par 'gyur bas ma lus par gtogs pa'i rigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:122a-11: sgrub pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i rnam pas rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:122a-12: bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3787E:122a-13: rtogs par bya ba rtogs pa'i yul rtog par byed pas na sgrub pa yin pa zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T03TD3787E:122a-14: yang ji ltar na de la bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa med ce na /
T03TD3787E:122a-15: gzhal du med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad kyi tshad ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:122a-16: thob pa yongs su yang ba dang ma thob pa la dman pa dang mchog tu gyur pa rnam par rtog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba'i nges par 'gyur ba ni /
T03TD3787E:122a-17: chags pa med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:122a-18: rtogs pa de dang de la nam mkha' ltar ma chags pa'i chos nyid nges par 'byin pa'i dbang du byas nas yin no //
T03TD3787E:122a-19: des na tshad med pa'i rnam pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:122a-20: chags pa med pa'i bar 'di rnams ni go rims bzhin du sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed par byed pa'i lam gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:122b-0: @122b ji ltar sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:122b-1: rigs pa gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:122b-2: ji ltar rigs pa yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:122b-3: sgrub pa gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:122b-4: ji ltar sgrub pa yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:122b-5: nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa ste /
T03TD3787E:122b-6: de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gnyis dang /
T03TD3787E:122b-11: de ltar na lam gyi bden pa bstan pa rnam pa bdun du bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:122b-12: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i rnam pa lnga'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa yin /
T03TD3787E:122b-13: mi rtag pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad 'jig pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:122b-14: 'dus byas rnams ni 'jig pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas ldan pa'i don med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:122b-15: sdug bsngal gyi rnam pas chos thams cad lhag par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:122b-16: de rnams la mi be bar phyin ci log pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:122b-17: stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rten par byed pa'i bdag dang rjes su 'brel ba'i dri tsam yang med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3787E:122b-18: bdag med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de rnams ni rang nyid bdag ma yin pas so //
T03TD3787E:122b-20: bdag med pa de nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:122b-21: de rnams ni 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid bdun du byas pa yin pas mi rtag pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa rnam pa bzhi dang de rnams kyang gang gi ngo bo nyid yin pa ste /
T03TD3787E:122b-22: de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la brten pa'i rnam pa lnga brjod pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:122b-23: 'gog pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa bcu drug brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:122b-24: de la 'gog pa lnga las gang gi phyir nang gi bdag nyid can la sogs pa'i dngos po'i dbye bas /
T03TD3787E:122b-25: dngos po 'gog pa rnam pa gsum gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:122b-26: nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas nang gi chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:122b-27: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123a-0: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam @123a * //
T03TD3787E:123a-1: pas phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:123a-2: mngon par zhen pa rnam pa brgyad kyi gnyen por btags pa 'gog pa ni rnam pa brgyad do //
T03TD3787E:123a-3: de la stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa 'gog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:123a-4: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin ta /
T03TD3787E:123a-5: lta ba'i gnyen por ni stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123a-6: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi dbyibs la mngon par zhen pa 'gog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:123a-7: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123a-8: 'di'i dbyibs su bkod pa dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123a-9: don dam pa la mngon par zhen pa 'gog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:123a-10: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123a-11: don dam par ni gnyen po yongs su grub pa med pa'i don gyis so //
T03TD3787E:123a-12: 'dus byas la mngon par zhen pa 'gog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:123a-13: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:123a-14: 'dus byas ni bzlog zla ltos pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123a-15: 'dus ma byas la mngon par zhen pa 'gog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:123a-16: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123a-17: 'dus ma byas la bzlog zla la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123a-18: rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' la mngon par zhen pa 'gog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:123a-19: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123a-20: chos nyid ro gcig pa nyid kyis na mtha' gnyis kyi rnam par dbye ba'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123a-21: thog ma dang tha ma dang 'dra bar 'khor bar mngon par zhen pa 'gog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:123a-22: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123b-0: @123b thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang 'dra bar dbus kyang chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123b-1: rtogs pa la mang du byed pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yongs su 'dor ba med pa'i mtshan nyid can dor ba med par mngon par zhen pa de 'gog pa yang dor ba med pa stong ba nyid kyi rnam pas /
T03TD3787E:123b-2: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123b-3: de rnams ni gzings dang 'dra ba nyid kyis spangs bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123b-5: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas /
T03TD3787E:123b-6: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123b-7: rang bzhin ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis ma mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123b-8: yul du 'khrul pa 'gog pa ni rnam pa gsum las btags par 'khrul pa 'gog pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123b-9: chos thams cad 'khrul pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123b-10: mtshan nyid 'khrul pa 'gog pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas rang gi mtshan nyid dben pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123b-11: gzugs ni gzugs su rung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dben pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123b-12: de ni 'dus pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123b-13: dus su 'khrul pa 'gog pa yang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas dus gsum la dus gsum po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te //
T03TD3787E:123b-14: dus zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dus byas kyi tshig bla dags yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123b-15: lnga pa rang gi ngo bo nyid 'gog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:123b-16: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rnam pas rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:123b-17: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang rang gi ngo bo nyid dang gzhan gyi dngos po rnams shin tu ma grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:123b-18: 'di dag ni 'gog pa'i rnam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:123b-20: gya nom pa'i rnam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:123b-21: nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3787E:124a-1: nang la sogs pa'i dngos po dang /
T03TD3787E:124a-2: ji ltar zhi ba yin pa mngon par zhen pa rnam pa brgyad dang bral bas dang /
T03TD3787E:124a-3: ji ltar gya nom pa yin par bzhin gyis dang /
T03TD3787E:124a-4: ji ltar nges par 'byung ba 'khrul pa rnam pa gsum bsal bas dang /
T03TD3787E:124a-5: nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T03TD3787E:124a-6: de ltar rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gsum dang /
T03TD3787E:124a-10: 'gog pa'i bden pa la brten pa'i rnam pa bcu drug bshad par gyur pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:124a-11: lam shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:124a-13: // / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:124a-14: de la 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dbang du mdzad nas thams cad mkhyen pa rnams pa gsum gyis rnam pa bsdus par 'gyur ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:124a-16: kun mkhyen nyid gsum bye brag gi ;
T03TD3787E:124a-17: / lam gyi bden pa dang mthun pa //
T03TD3787E:124a-18: dran pa nyer gzhag nas gzung ste //
T03TD3787E:124a-19: tha ma sangs rgyas rnam pa'i bar //
T03TD3787E:124a-20: slob ma byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T03TD3787E:124a-21: sangs rgyas rnams la rim bzhin te //
T03TD3787E:124a-22: sum cu bdun dang sum cu bzhi //
T03TD3787E:124a-23: sum cu rtsa dgu dag tu bzhed //
T03TD3787E:124a-24: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:124a-26: lam gyi bden pa'i rjes mthun par //
T03TD3787E:124a-27: kun mkhyen gsum du phye bas na //
T03TD3787E:124a-29: de la lam gyi bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa ni 'di yin no //
T03TD3787E:124a-31: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi lam dang /
T03TD3787E:124a-32: lam shes pa nyid kyi lam dang /
T03TD3787E:124a-33: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam dang /
T03TD3787E:124a-34: de la thams cad shes pa nyid kyi lam rnam pa bdun las dngos po yongs su rtog pa'i lam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
T03TD3787E:124a-35: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rnam pas /
T03TD3787E:124a-39: chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:124a-40: des lus la sogs pa'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi yongs su rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:124a-41: rtsol ba'i lam yang dag par spong pa bzhi ni /
T03TD3787E:124a-42: yang dag par spong ba'i rnam pas dge ba dang /
T03TD3787E:124b-0: mi dge @124b ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:124b-1: de ltar dngos po yongs su brtags nas des brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:124b-2: ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyong ba'i lam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni /
T03TD3787E:124b-3: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba'i rnam pas 'dun pa yang brtson 'grus dang sems dang dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:124b-4: de ltar sgrib pa yongs su sbyangs pa ni 'dun pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas des sems las su rung ba nyid rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:124b-5: mngon par rtogs par sbyor bar byed pa'i lam dbang po rnams ni /
T03TD3787E:124b-6: dbang po'i rnam pas dad pa la sogs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:124b-7: de ltar ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyang ba byas pa na des 'phags pa'i lam yang dag par 'grub pa la bdag por gyur pa dro bar gyur ba dang rtse mo la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:124b-10: stobs kyi rnam pas stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:124b-11: de ltar dbang thob pa ni des de ma thag tu bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ma dad pa la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis gnon pa bzod pa dang chos kyi mchog la rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:124b-12: mngon par rtogs pa'i lam byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni /
T03TD3787E:124b-13: byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:124b-14: des dang por de kho na so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:124b-15: rnam par dag par nges par 'byin pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni /
T03TD3787E:124b-16: lam gyi rnam pas rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:124b-17: de'i gong du des bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:124b-18: de nyid kyi phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'di rnams kyi go rims ni 'di yin no //
T03TD3787E:124b-19: de de ltar byas na dngos po yongs su rtog pa'i lam dang /
T03TD3787E:125a-0: @125a * // ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyong ba'i lam dang /
T03TD3787E:125a-1: mngon par rtogs par sbyor ba'i lam dang /
T03TD3787E:125a-2: mngon par rtogs pa dang brel ba'i lam dang /
T03TD3787E:125a-3: mngon par rtogs pa'i lam dang /
T03TD3787E:125a-4: rnam par dag par nges par 'byin pa'i lam gyi dbang du mdzad nas go rims ji lta ba bzhin du /
T03TD3787E:125a-5: bzhi dang bzhi dang lnga dang lnga dang bdun dang brgyad de /
T03TD3787E:125a-6: thams cad shes pa nyid la brten pa'i rnam pa sum cu rtsa bdun du bshad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:125a-7: de la lam shes pa nyid kyi lam rnam pa drug las gnyen po'i lam rnam pa gsum ste /
T03TD3787E:125a-8: lta bas byas pa'i gnyen po'i stong pa nyid ni /
T03TD3787E:125a-9: stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas lta bas byas pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:125a-10: lta ba'i rgyu mtshan gyi rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po mtshan ma med pa ni /
T03TD3787E:125a-11: mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pas rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:125a-12: khams gsum pa la smon pa'i gnyen po smon pa med pa ni smon pa med pa'i rnam pas bsgom la dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:125a-13: de la stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa gnyis kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3787E:125a-14: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa gnyis dang /
T03TD3787E:125a-15: kun 'byung gi bden pa'i rnam pa bzhi po rnams kyis ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'o //
T03TD3787E:125a-16: 'gog pa dang lam gyi rnam pa rnams kyis ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:125a-17: mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa 'gog pa dang /
T03TD3787E:125a-18: mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa gang gis bsal ba ni lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:125a-19: mtshan med zhi ba'i rnam pa yis //
T03TD3787E:125a-21: dngos po'i mtshan ma dang rjes su 'brel ba nyan thos kyi lam gyi dbang du mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir de dang 'di la 'gal ba med do //
