T03TD3787E:125a-22: sprul ba'i lam rnam pa gnyis las gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par ma bshig pa ni bdag nyid so sor bsam gtan nam gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la brten nas /
T03TD3787E:125a-23: gzugs kyi 'du shes mngon du byed pa ste /
T03TD3787E:125b-0: gang gis @125b gzugs can gzugs kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la zhes bshad pa'o //
T03TD3787E:125b-1: gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bshig pa ni bdag nyid so sor de bzhin du phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi 'du shes mngon du byed pa ste /
T03TD3787E:125b-2: gang gi snang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la blta'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:125b-3: 'di dag ni sprul pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i rnam par thar pa gnyis yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:125b-4: sprul pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:125b-5: sdug pa'i gzugs sprul pa la 'bad pa dang ;
T03TD3787E:125b-6: mi sdug pa'i gzugs sprul pa mi mthun pa'o //
T03TD3787E:125b-7: de'i gnyen por sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:125b-8: bdag nyis so sor sdug pa'i gzugs rnams la phan tshun ltos pa'i 'du shes dang phan tshun 'brel pa'i 'du shes la brten nas phan tshun ro gcig pa'i 'du shes thob pas ji ltar 'dod par gzugs la lhag par mos pa la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:125b-9: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i lam rnam pa gnyis las thar pa dang mthun par gnas pa'i lam ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
T03TD3787E:125b-10: zhi bar gnas pa'i lam ni 'du shes dang /
T03TD3787E:125b-12: gzhan gyi don gyi nges par 'byung ba'i dbang du byas nas gsum dang /
T03TD3787E:125b-13: gzhan gyi don gyi ched du bya ba can rang gi don mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i dbang du byas nas lnga ste brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:125b-14: des na 'di rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rnam pas rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:125b-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rnam pas /
T03TD3787E:125b-16: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:126a-0: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni 'jig rten las @126a * //
T03TD3787E:126a-1: 'das pa'i lam gyis thob pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:126a-2: spong pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam bden pa rnam pa bzhi la brten pa ni bden pa bzhi'i rnam pas /
T03TD3787E:126a-3: kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:126a-4: kun 'byung ni 'dir nyon mongs pa kun 'byung ba'o //
T03TD3787E:126a-5: 'gog pa ni de dang bral ba'o //
T03TD3787E:126a-6: sangs rgyas kyi lam du gyur pa'i lam pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni /
T03TD3787E:126a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:126a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:126a-12: rab 'byor ser sna la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam pa bcu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:126a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs nas dus phyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:126a-16: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i lam dang /
T03TD3787E:126a-19: sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi dbang du mdzad nas go rims bzhin du gsum dang gsum dang lnga dang dgu dang bzhi dang bcu ste /
T03TD3787E:126a-20: lam shes pa'i lam la brten pa'i rnam pa sum cu rtsa bzhi gsungs pa ni yin no //
T03TD3787E:126a-21: de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni shin tu phul du byung ba yin pa'i phyir gcig bu kho na yin mod kyi /
T03TD3787E:126a-22: 'on kyang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas lam 'di'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pas dbye ba brjod par bya ba yin pas /
T03TD3787E:126a-23: stobs bcu'i rnam pas chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs te ;
T03TD3787E:126a-24: de'i gnas skabs su chos rnams rnam pa med pa'i chos nyid thob pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:126a-25: mi 'jigs pa'i rnam pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam dang mngon par shes pa thams cad thob pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:126b-0: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rnam pas @126b thams cad la ye shes chags pa med pa thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs dang /
T03TD3787E:126b-3: chos rab tu dbye ba'i yul la go rims bzhin du yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rtogs pa'i ro myong bar mi byed pas na chags pa med pa'i phyir dang shes bya'i sgrab pa spangs pas thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3787E:126b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rnam pas /
T03TD3787E:126b-5: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba chos ma 'dres pa de dang de mi mthun pa'i chos gang dang gang yin pa de dang de las yang dag par 'da' ba'i dbang du mdzad pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:126b-7: dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa grong du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na /
T03TD3787E:126b-8: res 'ga' glang po che gtum po'am rta mi srun pa'am /
T03TD3787E:126b-9: ba lang mi srun pa dang /
T03TD3787E:126b-10: khyi mi srun pa dang lhan cig 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3787E:126b-11: tshang tshing dang tsher ma'i 'obs su 'gro ba'am /
T03TD3787E:126b-12: sbrul nag po rkang pa gnyis kyis brdzis pa'am /
T03TD3787E:126b-13: de lta bu'i tshul gyis gang na bud med kyi tshogs kyis rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pas mgron du bos pas khyim du 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:126b-14: dgon pa'am yang na lam drang po nas lam gol bar 'gro ba'am /
T03TD3787E:126b-15: rkun po'am chom po pa dang /
T03TD3787E:126b-18: gzhan gyi chung ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba ste /
T03TD3787E:126b-19: dgra bcom pa'i 'khrul pa de lta bu'i cha dang mthun pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:126b-20: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa res 'ga' dgon par nags khrod stug por rgyu ba na lam las nyams nas khang pa stong par sgra 'byin cing dbyangs rjes su sgrogs la sgra chen pos 'bod pa'am /
T03TD3787E:126b-21: bag chags kyi nyes pa la brten nas nyon mongs pa'i rta gad chen po dgod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:126b-23: steg pa'i tshul yang nye bar ston par byed de /
T03TD3787E:126b-24: de lta bu'i cha dang mthun par dgra bcom pa'i ca co de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:127a-0: @127a * // de bzhin gshegs pa la ni dran pa nyams pa mi mnga' ste /
T03TD3787E:127a-1: nyon mongs pa ma yin pa'i thugs kyi mdzad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:127a-2: gsungs pa rjes su dran pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:127a-3: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa ni phung po la mtha' gcig tu mi mthun pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing phung po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la ni zhi ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur gyi /
T03TD3787E:127a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni tha dad pa'i 'du shes mi mnga' ste /
T03TD3787E:127a-5: mchog tu btang snyoms pas bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:127a-6: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa ni snyoms par zhugs pa na mnyam par bzhag pa yin gyi ldang ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:127a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni gnas skabs thams cad du thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:127a-8: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa ni so sor ma brtags par sems can gyi don bya ba la btang snyoms su byed pa yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:127a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu'i cha dang mthun pa so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:127a-10: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa las brtsams te ma thob pa'i yongs su nyams pas 'dun pa las kyang nyams shing /
T03TD3787E:127a-15: rnam par grol ba las nyams pa yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:127a-16: nyams pa'i rnam pa 'di drug de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:127a-17: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa ni lan 'ga' lus kyi las dge ba la 'jug la /
T03TD3787E:127a-18: lan 'ga' ni lung du ma bstan pa la'o //
T03TD3787E:127a-19: ngag dang yid kyi las la yang de bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:127a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las gsum char la yang ye shes sngon du 'gro ba nyid dang ye shes rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyis lung du ma bstan pa'i las mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:127a-21: de la ye shes kyi kun nas bslang ba yin pa'i phyir ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'o ;
T03TD3787E:127a-22: / ye shes dang lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang ba'o //
T03TD3787E:127a-23: gzhan yang dgra bcom pa ni gang gis 'di'i ye shes kyi mthong ba chags pa med par 'gyur ba /
T03TD3787E:127a-24: dus gsum pa'i dngos po btsal ba tsam las rtogs par mi 'gyur la /
T03TD3787E:127b-0: gang gis 'di'i ye shes @127b kyi mthong ba thogs pa med par 'gyur ba thams cad rtogs pa'ang ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:127b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa ni btsal ba tsam gyis dus gsum pa'i shes bya'i dngos po thams cad rtogs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:127b-2: de bas na bco brgyad po 'di dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3787E:127b-3: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pas /
T03TD3787E:127b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:127b-5: rang byung gi rnam pas chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de'i thugs su chud pa gzhan gyi rkyen las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:127b-6: sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam pa ni //
T03TD3787E:127b-7: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:127b-8: rab 'byor thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:127b-9: de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni sangs rgyas nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:127b-10: de de ltar byas pas stobs la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam pa rnams ji ltar rab tu dbye ba dang /
T03TD3787E:127b-11: 'di rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:127b-12: chos de rnams la mnga' bsgyur ba gang yin pa rang byung dang /
T03TD3787E:127b-13: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa gang gi don du ste /
T03TD3787E:127b-14: de ltar na go rims bzhin du bcu dang bzhi dang bzhi dang bco brgyad dang gcig dang gcig dang gcig ste /
T03TD3787E:127b-15: rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la brten pa'i rnam pa sum cu rtsa dgur bshad pa ni yin no //
T03TD3787E:127b-16: de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus na rnam pa brgya bdun cu rtsa gsum du 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:127b-17: bcu drug las gzhan dri med pa'i //
T03TD3787E:127b-18: rnam pa gzhan med ces gang gsungs pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa tsam gyi gnyen po'i rnam pa la dgongs pa yin pas na de dang 'di la 'gal ba med do //
T03TD3787E:127b-19: rnam pa zhes bya ba 'di chos gang zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:127b-20: gzhi shes pa yi bye brag rnams //
T03TD3787E:127b-21: rnam pa zhes bya mtshan nyid de //
T03TD3787E:127b-22: zhes bya ba dang po rtsom pa nyid na mtshan nyid brjod zin ma yin nam /
T03TD3787E:128a-1: rnam par gnas pa'i dmigs pa yar //
T03TD3787E:128a-2: dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad de //
T03TD3787E:128a-3: de yang dge la sogs pa yin //
T03TD3787E:128a-4: 'jig rten pa yi rtog pa dang //
T03TD3787E:128a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas brjod zin pa des na 'dir rnam pa gzhi med par 'gyur ba'i skyon yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:128a-6: de la thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa ni nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i dbye bas zag pa med pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
T03TD3787E:128a-7: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa ni rnam grangs kyi zag pa dang bcas pas zag pa dang bcas pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:128a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nyon mongs pa shin tu yangs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:128a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam pa ni zag pa med pa kho na yin te /
T03TD3787E:128a-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:128a-11: rnam pa rnams bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:128a-13: // / da ni sbyor ba brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:128a-14: de la re zhig sbyor ba'i rten sbyor ba po brjod nas de'i 'og tu 'di brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:128a-15: de la sbyor ba po na rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03TD3787E:128a-17: sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti byas //
T03TD3787E:128a-18: de la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun /
T03TD3787E:128a-19: dge ba'i bshes kyi mgon bcas pa //
T03TD3787E:128a-20: 'di mnyan pa yi sdod yin no //
T03TD3787E:128a-21: zhes gsungs pa ji skad du /
T03TD3787E:128a-22: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:128a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang dge ba'i shes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa'i snod yin no zhes gsungs pa bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:128a-27: kun chub par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:128a-28: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:128a-29: de la mi dad pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'i rten gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:128a-30: sangs rgyas brten dang kun 'dri dang //
T03TD3787E:128a-31: sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs spyod pa /
T03TD3787E:128a-32: len dang 'dzin la sogs pa yi //
T03TD3787E:128a-33: snod du dam pa rnams bzhed do //
T03TD3787E:128a-35: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:128a-36: yongs su zhu ba byas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:128b-0: pha rol tu phyin pa @128b drug gi spyod pa dang ldan pa ni len pa po la sogs pa'i snod nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:128b-1: ji skad du gsungs pa'i rgyu las bzlog pa mi mos pa dang yong bar byed pa'i rgyu ni /
T03TD3787E:128b-2: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab po zhes gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:128b-3: de la zab pa ni mos pa tsam med pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:128b-4: de yong ba ni sems can la log par byed pa'i nyes pa'i rgyu nyid du shes par byed pa'i don gyis so //
T03TD3787E:128b-5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:128b-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis phan tshun nges par skyes pa dang rab tu phye ba dag gis ni thams cad shes pa nyid las 'da' bar 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:128b-7: lam shes pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:128b-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bskyed par 'dod pas rnam pa thams cad du de la sbyor ba sgrub par nye bar bstan pas sbyor ba bstan pa nye bar dgod pa'i don tu yin no //
T03TD3787E:128b-9: de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par skyes pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:128b-10: de las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:128b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:128b-12: de las de'i rgyu'i dngos po gsal ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:128b-13: de nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du de dag nges par skyes pa dang rab tu phye bar smos pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:128b-14: nyan pa po'i rnam par g-yeng ba'i nyes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:128b-15: shes rab kyi nyes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:128b-16: 'dun pa zhan pa'i nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig ces pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:128b-17: sbyor ba yang rnam pa nyi shu 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:128b-19: gzugs la sogs pa mi gnas phyir //
T03TD3787E:128b-20: de la sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:128b-21: de yi de bzhin nyid zab phyir //
T03TD3787E:128b-22: de rnams gting dpag dga' ba'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:128b-23: de dag tshad ni med phyir dang //
T03TD3787E:128b-24: tshegs chen yun ring rtogs pa'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:128b-25: lung bstan phyir mi ldog nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:128b-26: nges 'byung bar chad med bcas dang //
T03TD3787E:128b-27: byang chub nyi dang myur ba dang //
T03TD3787E:129a-2: gzugs sogs bsam mi khyab mi mthong //
T03TD3787E:129a-3: gzugs sogs de yi mtshan ma dang //
T03TD3787E:129a-4: de yi ngo bor rnam mi rtog /'bras bu rin chen sbyin byed dang //
T03TD3787E:129a-5: de ni dag pa mtshams dang bcas //
T03TD3787E:129a-6: zhes bya ba gsungs te sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3787E:129a-7: de la gzugs la sogs pa la mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba ni gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:129a-8: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas pa bkag pas de la sbyor bar byed ba rjes su gnas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:129a-10: gang la gnas par bya ba dang gang la sbyar bar bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs la sogs pa mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:129a-11: mi sbyor ba nyid sbyor ba yin pa ni /
T03TD3787E:129a-12: yang gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed de /
T03TD3787E:129a-13: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi sbyor ba de'i tshe gzugs la sbyor bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid la mi sbyor ba de'i tshe de la sbyor bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:129a-15: gzugs la sogs pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:129a-16: zab pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa nyid kyi gnas pa mi dmigs pa'i don gyis thams cad shes pa nyid kyi skabs kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:129a-17: gting dpag dka' ba'i sbyor ba ni gzugs la sogs pa gting dpag dka' ba nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rnyog pa med pa'i don gyis lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs kyis gting dpag dka' ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:129a-18: tshad med pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs la sogs pa tshad med pa nyid kyis mtha' dmigs su med pa'i don gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skabs kyi de tshad med pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:129a-19: de'i 'ang chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen pos go rims bzhin du sbyor ba rnam pa gsum yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:129a-20: gal te gzugs zab po zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:129a-21: gzugs gting dpag dka'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:129b-0: gzugs @129b tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
T03TD3787E:129b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:129b-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi spyod pa gsum po bkag pas de'i spyod pa rjes su gnang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:129b-4: gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa dang ;
T03TD3787E:129b-5: gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:129b-6: tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma yin no zhes bya ba nas gzugs la sogs pa rnams de'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid can ma yin pa nyid du bstan pas yin no //
T03TD3787E:129b-7: yang zab mor mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T03TD3787E:129b-8: thun mong ma yin par byang chub pa dang /
T03TD3787E:129b-9: bla na med pa mngon par byang chub pa'i dbang du mdzad nas zab pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gsum yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:129b-10: tshogs chen po skyo bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sbyor ba gsungs pa ni las dang po pa dag ni zab pa nyid kyis na dang nga bar 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:129b-11: dang por skrag pa skye bas so //
T03TD3787E:129b-12: gting dpag dka' ba nyid kyis na kun tu skrag par 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:129b-13: de lhag par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:129b-14: tshad med pa nyid kyis na kun tu skrag pas zin par 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:129b-15: dar nges par ma rtogs pa'i chos kyi snod ma yin par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:129b-16: des ni phyir mi ldog pa'i mdun du de brjod par rjes su gnang ba zhes bya bas yin no //
T03TD3787E:129b-17: lung bstan pa thob pa'i sbyor ba ni de la mi dang ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa rmi lam gyi nang na yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yid la byed ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:129b-18: phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba ni rang nyid byung ba de 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis phyir mi ldog pa nyid du zhes gang gsungs pa yan no //
T03TD3787E:129b-19: nges par 'byung ba'i sbyor ba ni skyes bu 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po zhig na gnas pa'i dpes par chad byed pa'i chos las 'das par bstan pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130a-0: par chad med pa'i sbyor ba ni skyes bu rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i dpes nye bar gyur @130a * //
T03TD3787E:130a-1: na rtag tu mtshan ma'i dngos po yang dag par mthong ba'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130a-2: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang nye bar sbyor ba ni rtsi shing gi lo ma dang 'dab ma lhags pa'i dpes rten zag pa med pa'i chos gser gyi gzhi'i dngos por bstan pas gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130a-3: myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sbyor ba ni bud med sbrum ma btsar nye ba'i dpes rten pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu chos kyi sku myur du mngon par 'grub par ston pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130a-4: gzhan gyi don gyi sbyor ba ni ;
T03TD3787E:130a-5: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:130a-6: skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:130a-7: bdag nyid kyang chos kyi 'khor la bskor la gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la yang dag par bskul lo zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:130a-8: de rnams ni gnyi ga'i don byed pa nyid kyis na /
T03TD3787E:130a-9: de bzhin gshegs pas sgrub pa la legs par yongs su gtad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130a-10: 'phel pa dang 'grib pa med pa'i sbyor ba ni ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:130a-11: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'phel ba dang /
T03TD3787E:130a-12: 'grib par mthong ba bkag pas des bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba rjes su gnang bas gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130a-13: chos dang chos ma yin pa mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:130a-14: yang chos dang chos ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:130a-19: mi dge ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:130a-22: 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:130a-23: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nas /
T03TD3787E:130a-24: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rjes su mthong ba bkag pas snga ma bzhin te /
T03TD3787E:130a-26: 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid ni nges par grub pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130b-0: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam @130b pa'i 'du shes 'gog pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs la sogs pa nas /
T03TD3787E:130b-1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'du shes pa bkag pas snga ma bzhin du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130b-2: rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs dang gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang /
T03TD3787E:130b-3: gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa nas /
T03TD3787E:130b-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de'i mtshan ma dang de'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i don can dang /
T03TD3787E:130b-6: gzugs la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yin par mi rtog par rjes su 'thad par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130b-7: 'bras bu rin po che sbyin pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:130b-8: rgyun tu zhugs pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar ni rin po che ster bar byed pa nyid yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che'i phung po'o //
T03TD3787E:130b-9: chos rin po che'i phung po rnams sgrub par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130b-10: rnam par dag pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:130b-11: gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung po'i zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130b-12: sa mtshams kyi sbyor pa ni rin po che chen po dang 'dra bar /
T03TD3787E:130b-13: bar chad mang ba nyid yin pas lo'i par gyis bri ba la sogs pa la mngon par brtson pa mi gtang bar bya bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130b-14: lo smos pa ni de tsam gyis dus tshigs la sogs pas rkyen tshogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:130b-15: de ltar byas na mchod sbyin shing shun dang /
T03TD3787E:130b-17: brjod 'gyur te mang du thos pa rnams kyis lor dpyod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:130b-18: lo las lhag pa'i dus ni med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:130b-21: gang gis lo ni mthong gyur pa //
T03TD3787E:130b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:130b-23: sbyor ba nyi shu po 'di dag gi go rims 'di ni rigs pa'i tshul nyid yin te /
T03TD3787E:130b-24: chos thams cad la mngon par zhen par gnas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:130b-25: de la mi sbyor ba ni de dag gi zab pa dang gting dpag dka' ba dang tshad med par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:131a-0: sbyor ba ma yin pa byed pa nyid @131a * //
T03TD3787E:131a-1: kyis ni las dang po pa tshogs chen po pa dang /
T03TD3787E:131a-2: de las gzhan pa ni bde blag tu lung bstan pa dang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob nas nges par 'byung ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:131a-3: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par nye bar 'gyur la dang /
T03TD3787E:131a-4: myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:131a-5: de nas ni gzhan gyi don byed cing 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:131a-6: chos sam chos ma yin pa la sogs pa'i 'du shes thams cad dang bral bas rnam par rtog pa dang /
T03TD3787E:131a-7: 'bras bu rin po che sbyin pas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa thob pa ni sngon nyid du lo'i bar du mngon par brtson pas sems kyi rlung yongs su sbyangs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:131a-10: // / de'i phan yon brjod par bya ba yin pas /
T03TD3787E:131a-11: bdud kyi mthu bcom la sogs pas //
T03TD3787E:131a-12: yon tan rnam pa bcu bzhi'o //
T03TD3787E:131a-14: de la bdud kyi mthu bcom pa'i yon tan ni bdud par chad byed pa la zhugs su zin kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyis dgongs shing yongs su gzung ba ni bdud kyi mthu bcom pa'i rgyu yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:131a-16: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni chos nyid yin no //
T03TD3787E:131a-17: zhes de la dgongs pa'i 'thad pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:131a-18: sangs rgyas kyis dgongs shing mkhyen pa'i yon tan ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag la dgongs shing yongs su 'dzin pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyis gzung bar rig bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis chos smra ba des dgongs shing mkhyen pas lhag par mos pa bstan pa skyes pa las dogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir bdud 'jug pa'i skabs mi rnyed par shes par byed pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:131a-19: sangs rgyas kyis mngon du mdzad pa'i yon tan ni /
T03TD3787E:131a-20: de dag ni ye shes kyis mkhyen zhing de dag ni sha'i spyan gyis gzigs pa yin no zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:131a-21: yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa'i yon tan ni /
T03TD3787E:131b-0: theg @131b ba chen po pa de dag ni 'di ltar bdag cag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes bya bas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:131b-1: don che ba la sogs pa'i yon tan ni /
T03TD3787E:131b-2: glegs bam du bris pa 'chang ba tsam yang don che ba dang /
T03TD3787E:131b-5: rnam par smin pa che bar 'gyur te zhes bya bas gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:131b-6: sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:131b-7: bde 'gror gzhol bar gyur pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:131b-8: yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:131b-9: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su la yang gzhan gyi don la 'jug pa'i dbang du mdzad nas go rims bzhin du tshig bzhi yin par bshad par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:131b-10: 'dir thag ring bar smin pa yin pas na rnam par smin pa zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o yul dpyad pa'i yon tan ni /
T03TD3787E:131b-11: lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas bar ta ni dang byang phyogs kyi rgyud du spyad par 'gyur ba la sogs pa smos pa yul la sogs pa dpyad pas chos smra ba la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa la dogs pa bsal ba'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:131b-12: zag pa med pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i yon tan ni mi dang nga pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa'i dkar po'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:131b-13: smra ba'i skyes bu yon tan ni /
T03TD3787E:131b-14: yang nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod de zhes bya bas sngon du gtam smra ba'i skyes bu nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:131b-15: mi phyed pa'i yon tan ni yang bstan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir na bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang byang chub las bzlog par mi nus pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:131b-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba thun mong ma yin pa skye ba'i yon tan ni yang dga' ba dang /
T03TD3787E:131b-18: rab tu mgu brgya chen po thob pa de ni skye po mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba skye ba'i rgyu nyid gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:132a-0: de la dga' ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i @132a * //
T03TD3787E:132a-1: chos chol ba gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:132a-2: dang ba ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la brten pa gang yin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:132a-3: mgu ba ni dge ba la sems 'jug pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag yin no //
T03TD3787E:132a-4: dam bcas pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i yon tan ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag srog chags brgya phrag mang po byang chub la rab tu bkod par bgyi'o zhes sangs rgyas nas rjes su dgyes pa'i tshig smras pa gang yin pa de don ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs par byed par shes pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:132a-5: 'bras bu rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan ni de dag mos pa rlabs po che nyid kyis las kyi 'bras bu rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:132a-6: sems can gyi don sgrub pa'i yon tan ni phyi nang gi de'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad la ster ba'i phyir dang sangs rgyas sngon du gyur pa'i zhing gzhan dag tu lhag par bsten pa'i phyir gong nas gong du sems can gyi don rjes su sgrub par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:132a-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma rnyed pa dang ma tshang ba rnyed pa las bzlog pas tshang rnyed pa'i yon tan ni tshol bar byed pa rnams las kyang 'ga' zhig gis 'thob pa dang mi 'thob pa dang mtshang bar thob pas dang /
T03TD3787E:132a-8: sh'a ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar 'gyur ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:132a-9: zhes bya ba chos nyid kyi rigs pas bar chad med par rab tu sbyor ba rnams kyis ni skye ba rjes su zin kyang gdon mi za bar de rnyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:132a-10: sbyor ba'i phan yon bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:132a-12: // / de'i bar chad brjod par bya ba des na /
T03TD3787E:132a-13: skyon ni bcu tshan bzhir bcas pa //
T03TD3787E:132a-14: drug tu nges par rtogs par bya //
T03TD3787E:132a-16: bzhi bcu rtsa drug ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3787E:132a-17: de dag las kyang tshegs chen pos 'thob pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu tshegs chen po dang /
T03TD3787E:132b-0: yun ring pos spobs pa skyes pas gang @132b gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:132b-1: spobs pa shin tu myur chas pa nyid ni sngon pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gnas skabs su ha cang myur bar spobs pa skyes pas brjod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:132b-2: lus kyi gnas ngan len gyi rnam par 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum ni yang glal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:132b-4: phan tshun steg cing 'dri na lus rnam par 'gyur ba'i bar chad nyid yin par gang gsungs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:132b-5: steg pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus sam lus dang 'brel pas gzhan gyi lus la ku re byed pa'o //
T03TD3787E:132b-6: sems kyi gnas ngan len ni gsum ste /
T03TD3787E:132b-7: sems g-yeng ba dang phan tshun rnam par shes pa dang ldan pas 'dri zhing nyan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:132b-8: bdag gis 'di'i ro myang ba ma rnyed do snyam du sems bskyed nas langs te 'gro ba ni sems kyi bar chad byed pa nyid yin par gang gsungs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:132b-9: phan chun rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa ni phan tshun la brten nas dga' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po rnam par shes pa'o //
T03TD3787E:132b-10: rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i kha ton la sogs pa byed pa ni yang lus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba de rnams nyid kyis 'chad pa dang yang sems kyi rnam par 'gyur ba de rnams nyid kyis 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed pa ni bar du gcod pa nyid yin par gang gsungs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:132b-11: phyir phyogs pa'i rgyu mtshan 'dzin pa nyid ni nges par ma zhugs pa ni lung mi ston par 'thad pas na /
T03TD3787E:132b-14: lung ma bstan pa'i mi bstan pa la sogs pas nges par brtag pa med pa'i 'thad pas rang gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa las dang ba ma thob par gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:132b-15: rgyu nyams pa ni rtsa ba bor nas lo 'dab dang yal ga 'dzin pa'i dpes rgyu yongs su nyams pa'i don dang ;
T03TD3787E:132b-17: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten pa las 'das pa'i chos rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par skyes par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:133a-0: gya nom pa'i ro myang ba las nyams pa ni khyi'i dpes gya nom pa'i ro myang ba las nyams @133a * //
T03TD3787E:133a-1: pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:133a-2: theg pa mchog las nyams pa ni yang glang po che don du gnyer bas de rnyed bzhin du de'i rjes su chol ba'i dpes theg pa chen po yongs su nyams pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin ne //
T03TD3787E:133a-3: ched du bya ba nyams pa ni /
T03TD3787E:133a-4: yang rgya mtsho chen po dang ba lang gi rjes snyoms pa'i dpes ched du bya ba yongs su nyams pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:133a-5: rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel pa nyams pa ni yang phya mkhan nyi ma'i gzhal med khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang byad 'dod pa'i dpes rgyu 'bras rjes su mthun pa las phyin ci log tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i go rims nyams pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:133a-6: gong na med pa'i gnas las nyams pa ni yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal phran snyoms pa'i dpes chos kyi sku'i gnas las yongs su nyams pa'i don gyis bar du gcod pa'i bdud kyi las nyid yin par gang gsungs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:133a-7: yul la rnam par rtog pa'i spobs pa 'byung ba ni chos de dang de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-8: chos de dang de'i yul can gyi spobs pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:133a-9: yi ge 'dri ba la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-10: dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-11: bris pa'i yi ge la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-12: 'di la yi ge med par mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-13: yul la sogs pa yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-16: tshigs su bcad pa'i ro myang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-17: lam ma yin pas thabs la mkhas pa tshol ba zhes bya ba ste bar chad rnam pa bdun ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin pas dngos po med pas dngos po med pa bri bar mi nus pa nyid kyis dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-18: dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-19: bris pa'i yi ge la de yin par mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-20: de la yi ge med par mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133a-21: yul la sogs pa yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-0: @133b tshigs su bcad pa'i ro myong bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor te bdud kyis nye bar gtad pa'i mdo sde rnams las thabs mkhas pa tshol ba ni bdud kyi las nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:133b-3: snyom las kyis bral ba ni yang nyan pa po dang ;
T03TD3787E:133b-5: mngon par 'brel bas phan tshun 'dun pa can dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-6: snyom las can nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:133b-7: 'dun pa'i yul tha dad pas bral ba ni yang de dag nyid phan tshun gyi 'dun pa can yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod pa nyid du gang gsungs pa'o ;
T03TD3787E:133b-8: / rnyed pa gtsor byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-9: 'dod chen chung ba gnyis kyis bral ba ni yang de dag nyid phan tshun rnyed pa la sogs pa gtsor byed pa dang 'dod pa chung ba la sogs pa dang ldan par gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:133b-10: de bzhin du sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-12: dge ba dang mi dge ba ma yin pa'i chos can dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-18: rnam par spros pas go ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-19: mdo la sogs pa'i chos mngon par shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-21: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-29: 'dod pa la sogs pa'i 'dun pa dang bral ba dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-30: ma bral ba nyid ces bya ba ni go rims bzhin du nyan pa po dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-32: mngon par 'brel pas na bral ba rnam pa bcu gcig po bar chad rnam pa bcu gcig tu brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:133b-34: gzhan yang de dag nyid sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-35: mi ldan pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te yang de dag nyid phan tshun 'dod pa la sogs pa'i 'dun pa dang /
T03TD3787E:133b-36: bral ba dang ma bral ba nyid kyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa las bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:134a-1: ba las phyir phyogs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:134a-2: gzhan 'ga' zhig 'ongs te dmyal ba la sogs pa'i mi bsngags pa brjod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:134a-3: bde 'gror 'gro ba la legs par phyogs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:134a-4: de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:134a-5: 'di ni snga ma nyan pa po dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-6: phyi ma 'chad pa po la nges par byas te bral ba bshad pa yin na /
T03TD3787E:134a-7: da ni snga ma 'chad pa po dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-8: phyi ma nyan pa po las nges par bral ba rnam pa bdun brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:134a-10: de ltar nyan pa po dang ston pa po dag gi phan tshun 'dod pa la sogs pa'i 'dun pa dang bral ba dang ma bral ba nyid kyis kyang chogs pa dang bral bas bdud kyi las nyid yin pas na /
T03TD3787E:134a-11: ston pa po dang nyan pa po dag snga ma dang phyi mar rnam par bzhag pas kyang bar chad rnams 'jig pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:134a-12: zhes nyan pa po dang 'chad pa po gnyi ga snga ma dang phyi ma gnyi gar gnas pa nyid du shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:134a-13: de la ston pa po dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-15: mngon par 'brel ba rnam pa bdun ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:134a-19: go skabs mi 'byed pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-20: zang zing cung zad tsam 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-21: sbyin par mi 'dod pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-22: srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-23: mi 'gyur ba'i phyogs su 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-25: de bzhin du lo legs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-26: mu ge byung ba la sogs pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-28: chom rkun la sogs pa'i rgyus dkrugs pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3787E:134a-30: khyim la blta bas nyan pa po 'dor bar byed pa ni rab 'byor gzhan yang ston pa po dang dag ces bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T03TD3787E:134a-31: zas ster ba'i khyim la blta bas de yong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:134a-32: bdud sdig can gyis 'byed pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T03TD3787E:134b-0: gzhan yang bdud sdig to can @134b 'di skad du nged kyi mdo sder ji ltar byung ba de yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:134b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:134b-3: yang 'byed pa'i sbyor bas de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshogs pa dang bral ba'i sbyor ba gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:134b-4: bcos ma nye bar sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud dang rab tu ldan pa bdud kyis gtad pa la de'i las su yongs su spong bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:134b-5: yul ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa la sogs par dga' ba bskyed pa ni gzhan yang bdud sangs rgyas kyi cha byad 'dzin pa mthong nas 'dod pa skye ba dang /
T03TD3787E:134b-6: bdud kyis sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba la 'dod pa bskyed pas ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:134b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos thams cad spyod pa ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:134b-10: chos rnams ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:134b-11: 'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che chen po'i dpes ni de la de lta bu'i bar chad mang po yod du zin kyang bar chad ni chos bsal bar byas pa'i phyir na dkar po'i phyogs ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu'i rgyu nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:134b-13: bu mang po yod pa'i ma'i dpes de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad dgongs pas de la brtson pa rnams kyis srung pa la sogs pa mdzad pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:134b-15: de ni sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:134b-16: 'jig rten ston par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:134b-17: sbyor ba'i bar chad rnams bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:134b-19: // / de'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya dgos pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:134b-20: gang gis mtshon te mtshan nyid du //
T03TD3787E:134b-21: shes bya de yi rnam pa gsum //
T03TD3787E:134b-22: shes pa khyad par byed pa ste //
T03TD3787E:134b-23: ngo bo nyid gang mtshon bya yang //
T03TD3787E:135a-1: mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:135a-2: de la shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni re zhig thams cad shes pa nyid kyis dbang du byas nas rnam pa bcu drug tu shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:135a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang //
T03TD3787E:135a-6: sems can sems kyi spyod pa dang //
T03TD3787E:135a-7: de bsdus pa dang phyir bltas dang //
T03TD3787E:135a-8: mi zad pa yi rnam pa dang //
T03TD3787E:135a-9: chags bcas sogs dang rgya che dang //
T03TD3787E:135a-10: chen por gyur dang tshad med dang //
T03TD3787E:135a-11: rnam shes bstan du med pa dang //
T03TD3787E:135a-12: sems ltar med dang shes pa ste //
T03TD3787E:135a-13: g-yo ba la sogs shes bya dang //
T03TD3787E:135a-14: de las gzhan yang de dag ni //
T03TD3787E:135a-15: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par shes //
T03TD3787E:135a-16: thub pas de bzhin nyid rtogs te //
T03TD3787E:135a-17: gzhan la bstan pa zhes bya 'di //
T03TD3787E:135a-18: thams cad shes pa nyid skabs kyi //
T03TD3787E:135a-19: shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa yin //
T03TD3787E:135a-20: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:135a-21: de la de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes pa ni stobs la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad mtshan nyid kyi bar sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos rnams bskyed pa yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:135a-22: 'jig rten 'jig pa med pa zhes pa ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa ni 'jig pa ma yin pa'i don gyis na phung po la sogs pa rnams kyis 'jig pa ma yin rab tu 'jig pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i chos nyid nges par ston par byed pa nyid kyis 'jig rten stong pa nyid do zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:135a-23: sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa mkhyen pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rag las pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:135a-24: de la sems can dang der gdags pa'i rgyu phung po la sogs pa nas /
T03TD3787E:135a-25: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa nyid kyis 'jig rten stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:135a-27: de la re zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang dmigs su med pa ni yin na /
T03TD3787E:135b-0: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du lta ga la yod ces bya @135b pa'i 'thad pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:135b-1: sems can bsdus pa shes pa dang de dag nyid g-yengs pa shes pa ni gang la re zhig chos rnams kyi chos nyid ma dmigs pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3787E:135b-2: spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:135b-3: sems mi zad pa'i rnam pa ni yang de rnams kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T03TD3787E:135b-5: spong ba rnams kyi mi zad pa'i rnam pa rab tu mkhyen par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:135b-6: sems dang 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:135b-7: sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:135b-8: sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:135b-10: rab 'byor yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa'i sems ni dmigs su med cing sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med do zhes bya bas 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:135b-11: sems rgya chen po shes pa ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pas rgya cher mi byed pa'i phyir sems rgya che ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:135b-12: sems chen por gyur pa shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:135b-13: de bzhin du sems chen por gyur pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:135b-14: sems tshad med pa shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:135b-15: sems kyi rgyun ni rten med cing tshad med pas te /
T03TD3787E:135b-16: gang la gnas par 'gyur ba de rnams la de rnams kyi rten yod pa ma yin no zhes snga ma bzhin du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:135b-17: sems bstan du med par shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:135b-18: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:135b-19: sems bltar med pa shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:135b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga la sems de dag snang bar mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136a-0: sems g-yo ba la sogs pa @136a * //
T03TD3787E:136a-1: shes pa ni sems 'phro ba dang 'du ba la sogs pa phung po lnga la brten pas skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du snga ma bzhin du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136a-2: de la sgrub pa'i sgo nas g-yo ba la sogs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:136a-3: bdag gang dang 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug pa'o //
T03TD3787E:136a-4: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te srog gang yin pa 'di ni lus so zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:136a-5: rang gi yul la sems 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
T03TD3787E:136a-6: btsum pa la sogs pa bkag pa'i sgo nas sems yul gzhan du mi 'jug pa ni /
T03TD3787E:136a-7: bdag dang 'jig rten mi rten ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:136a-8: srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan no zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136a-9: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yang de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du phung po lnga mkhyen pas g-yo ba la sogs pa yongs su mkhyen pa nyid du gang gsungs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:136a-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud pa de gzhan la yang dag par ston zhing 'dogs pa shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:136a-11: rab 'byor de ltar na sems 'phro ba la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:136a-12: chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad pa yin no zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136a-13: da ni ji ltar lam shes pa nyid kyi shes pa rnam pa bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa gang yin pa de'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:136a-14: stong nyid mtshan ma med bcas dang //
T03TD3787E:136a-15: smon pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:136a-16: skye med 'gag pa med sogs dang //
T03TD3787E:136a-17: chos nyid rnam par 'khrug med dang //
T03TD3787E:136a-18: 'du mi byed dang rnam mi rtog / rab dbye mtshan nyid med nyid la //
T03TD3787E:136a-19: lam shes nyid kyi skabs kyis ni //
T03TD3787E:136a-20: zhes pa'i mtshan nyid yin par bzhed //
T03TD3787E:136b-0: de la stong pa nyid @136b dang ;
T03TD3787E:136b-2: smon pa med pa shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:136b-3: de la stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136b-5: 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa shes pa ni de la skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:136b-6: 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136b-7: sogs pa smos pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:136b-9: ngo bo nyid shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:136b-10: rten med pa shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:136b-11: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid shes pa bsdu ste /
T03TD3787E:136b-13: de la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid med do zhes bya bar gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136b-14: chos nyid rnam par 'khrugs pa med pa shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:136b-15: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid de yin pa'i phyir des mtshan nyid de dor ba mi nus pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136b-16: mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:136b-17: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid de mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136b-18: rnam par mi rtog pa shes pa ni de dag gis mtshan nyid zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:136b-19: 'jig rten pa dang 'dus byas kyi dngos po bzlog zla dang bcas pa bkag pas nam mkha'i dpes lam shes pa'i dbang du byas pa yang dag par ston par byed pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136b-20: rab tu dbye ba shes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung zhes bya ba nas brtsams te gang la dpyad pas de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
T03TD3787E:136b-21: mtshan nyid thams cad kyi rab tu dbye ba mdzad pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pas rnam par 'gyur ba med par sems can gyi don byed pa'i 'bras bu ston pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:136b-22: mtshan nyid med par shes pa yang /
T03TD3787E:136b-23: gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gzugs su rung ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:137a-0: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid yongs su gtong @137a * //
T03TD3787E:137a-4: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mi 'khrugs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:137a-5: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi nges par 'byin par byed pa zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:137a-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid mngon sum du byed pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:137a-7: de la bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la brten nas 'phags pa'i lam bskyed pa'i phyir na de rnams ni 'khrugs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can du shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:137a-8: 'di phan chad ni ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shes pa rnam pa bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa de las brtsams ni /
T03TD3787E:137a-9: de ni nyid kyi chos brten nas //
T03TD3787E:137a-10: gnas dang gus par bya ba dang //
T03TD3787E:137a-11: bla ma nyid dang mnyes pa dang //
T03TD3787E:137a-12: de la mchod dang byed med dang //
T03TD3787E:137a-13: kun 'jug mkhyen pa gang yin dang //
T03TD3787E:137a-14: ma mthong ston par mdzad pa dang //
T03TD3787E:137a-15: 'jig rten stong nyid rnam pa dang //
T03TD3787E:137a-16: brjod dang shes mdzad mngon sum mdzad //
T03TD3787E:137a-17: bsam mi khyab dang zhi nyid ston //
T03TD3787E:137a-19: rnam pa kun mkhyen tshul la ni //
T03TD3787E:137a-20: shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do //
T03TD3787E:137a-21: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:137a-22: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi chos la brten nas gnas pa shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:137a-23: rab 'byor gang gis de ltar bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:137a-24: ston pa nyid yin pa'i rgyu des na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos 'di la brten cing gnas so zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:137a-25: de la gus par bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:137a-29: chos de la rim gror mdzad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:137a-32: mchod pa mdzad pa ni byas pa mkhyen zhing byas pa tshor ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:137a-33: byed pa med pa nyid shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:137b-0: byed @137b pa ngo med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:137b-1: thams cad du 'gro ba shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:137b-2: yang ye shes byas pa med pa chos thams cad la 'jug pa med pa'i brdas 'jug ste zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:137b-3: ma mthong ba'i don ston pa ni /
T03TD3787E:137b-4: gzugs la dmigs pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i bar gyi rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i don gyis ma mthong ba'i gzugs mthong ba'i phyir de ni 'jig rten ston pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:137b-5: stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa brjod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:137b-7: mthong bar mdzad pa shes pa ni go rims bzhin du yang dag par bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3787E:137b-8: yongs su smin par gyur pa dang /
T03TD3787E:137b-9: rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'i gdul bya rnams la yin te /
T03TD3787E:137b-10: ji skad du de ni 'jig rten stong pa nyid do zhes bya bar brjod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:137b-12: ston par mdzad pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:137b-13: de la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum la dgongs nas 'phags pa'i gang zag rnam pa gsum gyi dbang du mdzad de /
T03TD3787E:137b-14: go rims bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:137b-15: ched du bya ba'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:137b-16: mngon sum du byed pa'i 'jug pa'i dbang du mdzad nas shes pa gsum yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:137b-17: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang zhi ba shes pa ni /
T03TD3787E:137b-18: gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:137b-19: 'jig rten 'gog pa shes pa ni yang chos rnams med pa nyid kyis ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung pa de ltar ston pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:137b-20: shes pa'i mtshan nyid bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:137b-22: // / khyad par gyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba yin pas /
T03TD3787E:137b-23: bsam mi khyab sogs khyad par gyis //
T03TD3787E:137b-24: khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod yul can //
T03TD3787E:137b-25: skad cig ma ni bcu drug gis //
T03TD3787E:137b-26: khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
T03TD3787E:138a-1: yul can zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i yul gyis so //
T03TD3787E:138a-2: khyad zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa las khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T03TD3787E:138a-3: skad cig ma ni bcu drug gis zhes bya ba ni bden pa re re zhing chos dang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang shes pas bsdus pas so //
T03TD3787E:138a-5: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i khyad par sdug bsngal gyi skad cig ma dang pos bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:138a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
T03TD3787E:138a-7: zhes bya ba bsam pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i don gyis dang ;
T03TD3787E:138a-8: rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba la sogs pa mngon par brjod pas yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du shes par byed pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:138a-9: de ltar byas pas rgyun tu zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang spangs pa gang yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:138a-10: mi mnyam pa nyid kyi khyad par skad cig ma gnyis pas bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:138a-11: mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba mnyam pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i don gyis dang /
T03TD3787E:138a-12: rab 'byor gzugs kyang mi mnyam pa'o //
T03TD3787E:138a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:138a-14: gzhal du med pa nyid kyi khyad par skad cig ma gsum pas bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:138a-15: gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba tshad ma la yang dag par 'das pa'i don gyis dang /
T03TD3787E:138a-16: rab 'byor gzugs kyang gzhal du med pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:138a-17: grangs med pa nyid kyi khyad par sdug bsngal gyi skad cig ma bzhi pas bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:138a-18: grangs med pa zhes bya ba grangs las yang dag par 'das pa'i don gyis dang /
T03TD3787E:138a-19: rab 'byor gzugs kyang grangs med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:138b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi khyad par ched du byed par gyur pa'i phyir na thams cad rgyu'i khyad par gyi sgo nas nye bar dgongs pa @138b yin par bya ba'am /
T03TD3787E:138b-1: chos dang rjes su shes pa khyad par gyi mthar thug pa la brten pa 'di dag nyid kyis mi mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa ni mnyam pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i don gyis na /
T03TD3787E:138b-2: rab 'byor gzugs kyang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o //
T03TD3787E:138b-3: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas pa'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:138b-4: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad sdud par byed pa'i khyad par kun 'byung gi skad cig ma dang pos bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:138b-5: blon po'i dpes 'phags pa'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag par ldan pa nyid kyis 'di ni byang chen po la sogs pas nye bar gnas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:138b-7: chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid du gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:138b-9: gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:138b-10: mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa nas /
T03TD3787E:138b-11: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid las yongs su gzung bar mi bya /
T03TD3787E:138b-12: mngon par zhen par mi bya zhes gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi thugs su chud pa thun mong ma yin pa'i 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:138b-13: skyes bu'i khyad par gyis rig par bya ba nyid kyi khyad par skad cig ma gnyis pas bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:138b-14: de ni phra ba mdzangs pa mkhas pa rnam par shes pas rig par bya ba nyid do zhes gsungs pa yin no ;
T03TD3787E:138b-15: / de la phra ba ni de kho na nyid kyi don la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:138b-16: mdzangs pa ni ma nus pa'i don la 'jug pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:138b-17: ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa nye bar gzung ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:138b-18: de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3787E:138b-19: gang dag sngar blo yongs su smin par byas pa so so'i skye bo skye bas 'thob pa'i shes rab don de dag gnyi ga la 'jug par nus pa dang ldan pa mkhas pa dang bden pa mthong bas rnam par shes pa ste /
T03TD3787E:138b-20: de dag ni don de gnyi ga la zhugs pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:139a-0: thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi khyad par skad cig ma gsum pas bsdus pa ni stong @139a * //
T03TD3787E:139a-1: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi grangs snyed dad pas rjes su 'brang ba nas /
T03TD3787E:139a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du gyur pa'i shes pa dang spangs pas 'di nyid la mos pa la sogs pa mchog nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:139a-3: mngon par shes pa myur ba'i khyad par kun 'byung gi skad cig ma bzhi pas bsdus pa ni 'di ni phul du byung ba'i chos rgya cher 'chad pa yin pas theg pa gzhan pas 'di la mngon par brtson pa rnams myur du mya ngan las 'da' ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:139a-4: 'grib pa dang 'phel ba med pa'i khyad par 'gog pa'i skad cig ma dang pos bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:139a-5: sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur du zin kyang 'di la 'grib pa'am 'phel pa med pa'i che ba nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:139a-6: drag tu yang dag par sgrub pa'i khyad par skad cig ma gnyis pas bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:139a-7: ba drus ma be'u gzhon nu mi 'dor ba'i dpes mos pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig ldan pa'i thos pa dang ldan pa ni sngon gyi thos pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:139a-8: yang dag par 'grub pa'i khyad par skad cig ma gsum pas bsdus pa ni yang de nyid sangs rgyas mang po la brten pas dga' ldan nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa nyid dang bzlog pas 'phags pa'i sa gzhan gnyis por lhung ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:139a-9: dmigs pa'i khyad par 'gog pa'i skad cig ma bzhi pas bsdus pa ni yang rgya mtshor gru zhig pa'i dpes bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med par byed pa dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa'i mtshan ma la gnas pa'i dbang du byas te ;
T03TD3787E:139a-10: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal ba'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:139b-0: rten gyi khyad par lam gyi skad cig ma dang pos bsdus pa ni yang bum pa so ma btang ba dang btang ba'i dpes sgrub pa'i chos kyi rten ma yin pa dang rten yin pa'i ngo bor bstan pa'i don gyis gang @139b gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:139b-1: ma tshang ba mad pa'i khyad par skad cig ma gnyis pas bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:139b-2: yang rgya mtsho'i gru zag lhan ma byas pa dang byas pa'i dpes sgrub pa ma tshang ba dang tshang ba dang ston pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:139b-3: yongs su 'dzin pa'i khyad par skad cig ma gsum pas bsdus pa ni /
T03TD3787E:139b-4: yang skyes bu rgas shing nyam chung ba'i dpes lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dang yongs su ma bzung bar bstan pas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gcig tu ltung ba dang mi ltung bar ston pa'i don la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:139b-5: ro myang ba med pa'i khyad par lam gyi skad cig ma bzhi pas bsdus pa ni yang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir chos thams cad la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:139b-6: 'dod pa med pa nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo bar byed pa brten par bya ba la sogs pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:139b-7: bshad ma thag pa'i tshig lhug pas gsungs pa'i don gang yin pa de tshigs su bcad pas bsdus pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:139b-8: bsam mi khyab dang mi mnyam dang //
T03TD3787E:139b-9: gzhal dang bgrang las yang dag 'das //
T03TD3787E:139b-10: 'phags pa kun sdud mkhas pa yis //
T03TD3787E:139b-11: rig bya thun mong min shes nyid //
T03TD3787E:139b-12: shes myur bri dang gang med dang //
T03TD3787E:139b-13: sgrub dang yang dag 'grub pa dang //
T03TD3787E:139b-14: dmigs pa rten dang bcas pa dang //
T03TD3787E:139b-15: mtha' dag pa dang yongs 'dzin dang //
T03TD3787E:139b-16: ro myang med dang khyad par ni //
T03TD3787E:139b-17: bcu drug bdag nyid ces bya ste //
T03TD3787E:139b-18: gang gis lam 'di gzhan dag las //
T03TD3787E:139b-19: khyad du 'phags pas khyad par lam //
T03TD3787E:139b-21: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:139b-23: // / byed pa'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba yin pas /
T03TD3787E:139b-24: phan dang bde dang skyob pa dang //
T03TD3787E:139b-25: mi rnams kyi ni skyabs dag dang //
T03TD3787E:139b-26: gnas dang dpung gnyen gling dang ni //
T03TD3787E:139b-27: yongs 'dren pa zhes bya ba dang //
T03TD3787E:139b-28: lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyi //
T03TD3787E:140a-0: 'bras bu mngon du mi byed bdag / tha ma rten gyi mdzad @140a * //
T03TD3787E:140a-2: 'di ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin //
T03TD3787E:140a-3: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:140a-4: de la phan pa'i byed pa ni sems can rnams 'gro ba rgyud lnga las yongs su bton cing mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pas ma 'ongs pa'i phan pas bsdus pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:140a-5: bde ba'i byed pa ni sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su bkrol zhing mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir 'jig rten la bde bar yang dag par zhugs pas tshe 'di'i bde bas bsdus pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:140a-6: skyob pa'i byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gang ci yang rung ba las skyob cing yang mi skye bar byed pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi skyob pa yin pa nyid kyis rnam par smin pa med pa'i chos la 'jog pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:140a-7: skyabs kyi byed pa ni sems can skye ba la sogs pa'i chos can rnams phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi skyabs su gyur pa nyid kyis gtan du phan pa la zhugs pa'i don gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:140a-8: gnas kyi byed pa ni chos thams cad 'dre ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:140a-11: 'gag pa med par ston pa'i phyir gnas su gyur pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las bzlog pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:140a-12: dbung gnyen gyi byed pa ni gang chos thams cad kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:140a-14: gzugs la sogs pa'i pha rol na gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do zhes chos ston pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:140a-15: dpung gnyen du gyur pa nyid kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:140b-0: gling gi byed pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad @140b pas chus yongs su bskor ba'i skams dang chos mthun par sred pa zad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:140b-3: mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa'i phyir gling du gyur pa nyid kyis rang dang gzhan gyi don rtogs pa'i rten gyi ngo bor gyur pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:140b-4: yongs su 'dren pa'i byed pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:140b-6: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:140b-7: rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos yang dag par ston pa las yongs su 'dren par gyur pa nyid kyis gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la 'jug pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:140b-8: lhun gyis grub pa'i byed pa ni /
T03TD3787E:140b-9: rab 'byor gzugs ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:140b-10: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste /
T03TD3787E:140b-11: de ni mi 'gro mi 'od ngo zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:140b-12: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te /
T03TD3787E:140b-13: de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' zhes bya ba'i bar gyis thams cad shes pa'i dbang du mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis kyang sems can gyi don la lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:140b-14: thams cad shes pa'i dbang du mdzad pa'i byed pa thams cad mya ngan las 'das par ston pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:140b-15: theg pa gsum gyi nges par 'byung zhing de'i 'bras bu mngon du mi byed pa ni /
T03TD3787E:140b-16: rab 'byor chos thams cad mi skye mi 'gag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:140b-17: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:140b-18: rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:140b-19: rab 'byor chos thams cad mi g-yo ba'i ngang tshul can te zhes bya ba'i bar gyis lam shes pa'i chos ston pa nyid kyis theg pa ji lta ba bzhin nges par 'byung ba dang de mngon du mi byed pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141a-0: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi ngang tshul can te zhes @141a * //
T03TD3787E:141a-2: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dang tshul can zhes bya ba chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ston pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi don du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141a-3: byed pa'i mtshan nyid bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:141a-5: // / ngo bo nyid brjod par bya yin pas /
T03TD3787E:141a-6: nyon mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang //
T03TD3787E:141a-7: mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dag / dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang //
T03TD3787E:141a-8: ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang//
T03TD3787E:141a-9: mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang //
T03TD3787E:141a-10: dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang //
T03TD3787E:141a-11: mi mthun thog pa med dang /
T03TD3787E:141a-12: de bzhin nyid ni mi dmigs dang //
T03TD3787E:141a-13: ngo bo nyid bcu drug bdag nyid //
T03TD3787E:141a-14: mtshon bya lta bur mtshon pas na //
T03TD3787E:141a-15: mtshan nyid bzhi par bzhed pa yin //
T03TD3787E:141a-16: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141a-17: bcu drug gi bdag nyid yin zhes ji ltar brjod ce na /
T03TD3787E:141a-18: nyon mongs pa las dben pa'i ngo bo nyid ni /
T03TD3787E:141a-21: gti mug rnam par bsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du gyur ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141a-22: de'i rtags kyis dben pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rtags kyis dben par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141a-23: de'i mtshan mas dben pa'i ngo bo nyid ni nyon mongs pa'i mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141a-24: de la rtags ni lus la sogs pa'i gnas ngan len no //
T03TD3787E:141a-25: mtshan ma ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa'o //
T03TD3787E:141a-26: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs dag gis dben pa'i ngo bo nyid ni //
T03TD3787E:141a-33: gti mug med pas dben pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dang tshul can nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:141a-34: lhag par mos par byed pa rnams la bsgom pa'i lam nye bar bkod pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141a-35: bya dka' ba nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni /
T03TD3787E:141b-0: chos thams cad shin tu med @141b pa'i phyir de dang 'brel pa med pa nyid nye bar bzung nas sems can thams cad yongs su nya ngan las 'das pa'i go chog bya dka' ba nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa'i sgom pa bya dka' ba'i don du ston pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141b-1: nges pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de ltar go cha bgos pa ni nyan thos la sogs par lhung ba'i gnas kyi go skabs med pa nyid kyis sgom pa mtha' gcig tu nges par ston pa'i don du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141b-2: ched du bya ba'i don ngo bo nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ya shes kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i go cha bgos pas ni ched du bya ba la mi 'khrul bar bstan pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141b-3: mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni //
T03TD3787E:141b-4: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin tu zab ste /
T03TD3787E:141b-5: de ni sus kyang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags se zhes bya bas bsgom par bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:141b-7: bsgom pa mi dmigs pa'i rnam par bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:141b-8: bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa ma lags so zhes bya bas thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam par bsgom pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141b-9: mngon par zhe na med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni //
T03TD3787E:141b-10: rab 'bor shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o zhes bya bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par ma zhen par yongs su rtog pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:141b-12: nga ba la sogs pa rnams kyis lam shes pa'i rnam gyis lam shes pa'i rnams pa bsgom pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:141b-13: dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:142a-0: rab 'byor rmi lam dang sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub @142a * //
T03TD3787E:142a-1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam par bsgom pa nye bar dgod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:142a-2: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yong rtog par byed dam zhes bya ba thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:142a-3: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skabs su gsungs pa'i dmigs pa sgom pa 'i khyad par gyi zhar la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dmigs pa'i khyad par bsgom pa'i don dris pa dang /
T03TD3787E:142a-4: rab 'byor byang chub sems d'a sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs nas rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:142a-5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do zhes bya ba rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i khyad par shes par bye dpa'i don gyis la bstan pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:142a-6: de la rtog pa ni lhag mthong gi ye shes so //
T03TD3787E:142a-8: dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad de //
T03TD3787E:142a-9: de yang dge la sogs pa yin //
T03TD3787E:142a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de ji ltar yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:142a-11: gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T03TD3787E:142a-12: rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs so zhes bya bas de dag phan tshun gyi ngo bo'i zab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:142a-14: de dag gi de bzhin nyid dag gnyis su byar med pa nyid du gang gsung pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:142a-15: gal te de lta de lta yin na /
T03TD3787E:142a-16: 'o na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ji ltar 'thad ce na /
T03TD3787E:142a-17: sangs rgyas dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dag gnyis su me cing gnyis su byar med pa nyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du thugs las chung ba nyid kyi rgyu nyid yin par gsungs te dmigs par bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:142a-18: dmigs par byed pa'i dbye ba med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3787E:142a-19: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid ni //
T03TD3787E:142b-0: lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab ba'i phyir chos 'di zab po @142b zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:142b-1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
T03TD3787E:142b-2: mi bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags so //
T03TD3787E:142b-3: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni 'dzin pa la spyod do zhes bya bas 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa nyid kyis ni 'dzin pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod ma yin pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:142b-4: thogs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa rnam pa gsum gyi rnam pa legs par rdzogs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa thams cad la ye shes kyi chos thogs pa med pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:142b-5: gzhi med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rten mi dmigs pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:142b-6: shes pa dang shes bya mnyam pa nyid kyi don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:142b-7: 'gro ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni /
T03TD3787E:142b-8: thams cad mkhyen pa gsum po mtha' dag kyang skyed par byed pa'i dbang du byas te /
T03TD3787E:142b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa las gnas brtan rab 'byor dper byas te /
T03TD3787E:142b-10: ji ltar bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song bas na /
T03TD3787E:142b-11: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:142b-12: chos rnams kyi de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rdzas su 'dod pa gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi spyi'i chos nyid do //
T03TD3787E:142b-13: gnas pa'i de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni rgyun gyi chos nyid do //
T03TD3787E:142b-14: mi 'gyur zhing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni sgrub pa'i chos khyad par du 'gro ba dang de la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i chos nyid do ;
T03TD3787E:142b-15: / dbyer med pa'i de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni theg pa gsum gyi dbye ba dmigs su med pa'i chos nyid do //
T03TD3787E:142b-16: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni theg pa gsum las de bzhin nyid du tshol ba med pa'i chos nyid do //
T03TD3787E:143a-0: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni rang @143a * //
T03TD3787E:143a-1: bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T03TD3787E:143a-2: de bzhin du phung po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:143a-5: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:143a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa nyid du rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba mi thob par gyur pa dang mi de'i mtshan ma dbang por gyur pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa mtho ba dang dam bar gyur ba dang dma' bar gyur pa yin pas /
T03TD3787E:143a-7: mod las de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par 'gyur ba drug dang mtshan ma chen po bco brgyad du g-yos so //
T03TD3787E:143a-9: kun ru rab tu g-yos so //
T03TD3787E:143a-15: kun tu rab tu ldeg go //
T03TD3787E:143a-18: kun tu rab tu chem chem mo //
T03TD3787E:143a-22: kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro zhes gang gsung pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:143a-23: de la rnam pa drug ni g-yo ba dang /
T03TD3787E:143a-30: ltas chen po bco brgyad ni g-yo ba la sos pa'i 'gyur ba rnams pa drug po de rnams nyid go rims bzhin du chung du dang 'bring dang chen po nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:143a-31: snyod kyi 'jig rten gyi mngon par 'dus byas pa dang 'dus ma nyas pa'i dbang du byas pa dang 'jig rten thams cad na sems can gyi ris bzhi po mi dge ba la spyod pa dang lhag sna tshogs la mos ba dang /
T03TD3787E:143a-33: rigs pa dang ldan pa'i dbang du byas te /
T03TD3787E:143a-34: bya chung du dang 'bring dang chen po'i dbye bas g-yos so zhes bya ba nas nas kun tu rab ru 'ur 'ur ro zhes bya ba'i bar tshigs bcom brgyad kyi don bstan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:143b-0: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su @143b skyes pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:143b-1: skye med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni /
T03TD3787E:143b-2: de ltar na lha'i bu dag gnas bran rab 'byor gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes /
T03TD3787E:143b-3: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes so //
T03TD3787E:143b-4: zhes bya ba gnas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:143b-5: gang zhig gang rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis /
T03TD3787E:143b-6: de ltar lam shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i rjes su skyes pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:143b-7: de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:143b-8: rtag tu de bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:143b-9: phyin ci ma log pa'i don gyis ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:143b-10: chos rnams nyid las chos nyid btsal ba'i don gyis gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:143b-11: dbye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don gyis chos nyid ces ya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:143b-12: 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir don gyi chos kyi dbyings zhes bya dang /
T03TD3787E:143b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mdzad pa'i don gyis chos gnas pa nyid ces bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:143b-14: rgyud dang rkyen mi 'khrul ba'i chos nge pa nyid ces bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:143b-15: phyin ci ma log pa'i mthar thug pa'i don gyis nas yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3787E:143b-16: re zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang kyang dmigs su med na /
T03TD3787E:143b-17: de'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par ltag la 'gyur /
T03TD3787E:143b-18: 'dab chags bya lus chen po gyur pa'i dpes sbyin pa la sogs pa dang rab tu ldan du zin kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkha' pas yongs su ma bzung na nyan tsho la sogs pa'i sar ltung ba'i don gyis de'i tshe mang po zhig bstan pa rtogs pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:143b-19: ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:143b-22: // / thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa brjod par bya ba yin pas /
T03TD3787E:143b-23: mtshan med rab tu sbyin la sogs //
T03TD3787E:143b-24: yang dag sgrub la mkhas pa ni //
T03TD3787E:143b-25: rnam pa thams cad rtog 'di la //
T03TD3787E:143b-26: thar pa'i chad dang mthun par 'dod //
T03TD3787E:143b-27: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:144a-0: thog mar sems bskyed pa nas nye bar @144a * //
T03TD3787E:144a-2: thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bar sbyin pa gtong ba mtshan ma mi 'dzin zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:144a-3: rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom zhing mtshan mar mi 'dzin zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:144a-8: shes rab kyi bdag nyid can gyis rnam pa lnga'o //
