T03TD3787E:180b-7: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyis don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags te /
T03TD3787E:180b-8: sems can nam sems can du btags pa yang mi dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsung pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:180b-9: yams nad 'di rnams zad pa na //
T03TD3787E:180b-10: yun ring lon nas dbus phyin ltar //
T03TD3787E:180b-11: rnam pa kun tu 'gro ba yi /
T03TD3787E:180b-12: bde sgrub yon tan phun tshogs kun //
T03TD3787E:180b-13: rgya mtsho che la chu bo bzhi //
T03TD3787E:180b-14: 'bras bu mchog gis dpa' ba yi //
T03TD3787E:180b-15: sems dpa' chen po de la ni //
T03TD3787E:180b-16: rnam pa kun du rten par byed //
T03TD3787E:180b-17: ji skad du lo ma dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-19: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i ldang bu'i dpes byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsod nams kyi zhing yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:180b-20: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bde ba'i longs spyod kyi mchog tu gyur cing mang ba sna tshogs pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-21: 'bras bu 'dus pa nyid kyis de'i 'bras bu mchog gis dpa' ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-22: de lta bur gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung ba dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-24: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyis rnam par dag pa thob par byed pa'i 'thad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-25: de bzhin du de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-26: las bdag gir byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-28: dus gsum gyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-29: sems can rnams kyi don dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-30: sangs rgyas kyi zhin yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-31: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tob pa dang /
T03TD3787E:180b-32: chos kyi 'khor lo bskyor ba dang /
T03TD3787E:181a-0: sems can yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i phan yon thob par @181a * //
T03TD3787E:181a-4: skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis ljang bu 'dod pas sa bon btab la /
T03TD3787E:181a-5: des kyang ljang bu de'i rtsa ba mi shes /
T03TD3787E:181a-8: 'bras bu mi shes par de ljang bu de'i myu gu 'dzugs shing /
T03TD3787E:181a-10: de'i sdong bu de rim gyis yal ga dang lo ma dang /
T03TD3787E:181a-11: me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /
T03TD3787E:181a-15: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can gyi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste /
T03TD3787E:181a-16: de dag rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob nas lo ma dang /
T03TD3787E:181a-18: 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:181a-19: de la lo ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang la brten nas sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su grol bar byed pa de yin no //
T03TD3787E:181a-20: me tog ni gang la brten nas rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i rigs nas /
T03TD3787E:181a-21: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye ba'o //
T03TD3787E:181a-22: de la 'bras bu ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:181a-23: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams gang la brten nas sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas /
T03TD3787E:181a-26: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rab tu 'god pa de yin no //
T03TD3787E:181a-27: rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la 'bras bu mchog gis dpa' ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:181a-28: sgom pa'i lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:181a-31: // / da ni sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i de ma thag pa snga ma bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin brjod par bya ba yin pa des na /
T03TD3787E:181a-32: stong gsum skye bo nyan thos dang //
T03TD3787E:181a-33: bse ru'i rtogs pa phun tshogs dang //
T03TD3787E:181a-34: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med la //
T03TD3787E:181a-35: bkod pa'i dge rnams dper mdzad nas //
T03TD3787E:181b-0: bsod nams mang @181b po nyid kyis ni //
T03TD3787E:181b-1: sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar med de //
T03TD3787E:181b-2: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03TD3787E:181b-4: ji skad du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'god par byed pa bas /
T03TD3787E:181b-5: de rnams byang chub sems dpa' las nges par skyes pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed pa bsod nams ches mang du 'phel ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:181b-6: de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /
T03TD3787E:181b-7: de bzhin du rigs kyis dang /
T03TD3787E:181b-8: de bzhin du thong pa'i sa dang /
T03TD3787E:181b-9: de bzhin du mthong ba'i sa dang /
T03TD3787E:181b-11: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /
T03TD3787E:181b-12: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /
T03TD3787E:181b-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /
T03TD3787E:181b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa la 'god par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la zhugs pa'i bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa nyid kyi bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar chad med pa'i rgyu nyid yin par shes par byed pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:181b-15: de la byang chub sems dpa' zhugs pa ni 'bras bu bzhi pa la zhugs pa'i don yin gyi brgyad pa'i don ni ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:181b-16: 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
T03TD3787E:181b-17: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu zhugs pa rnams pas /
T03TD3787E:181b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa nyid bsdus pa zhes bya bas de ma thag pa de bzhin gshegs pa khyad par du byed par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:181b-19: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis de ma thag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba sangs rgyas nyid de'ang gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:181b-20: de ni rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid //
T03TD3787E:181b-22: ji skad du gnas skabs de lta bur gyur pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya bar gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:181b-23: 'di yi dmigs pa dngos med de //
T03TD3787E:181b-24: bdag po dran pa yin par bzhad //
T03TD3787E:181b-26: ces bya ba ni de'i dmigs pa dang dbang dang rnam pa zhugs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:181b-27: de'i dmigs pa dngos po med pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:182a-0: bdag po dran pa nyid yin par @182a * //
T03TD3787E:182a-2: 'gog pa shes pa'ang zhi ba'i rnam par yin no snyam na /
T03TD3787E:182a-3: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa yin te zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3787E:182a-4: 'dis ni 'dir rang bzhin gyis zhi bar brjod par 'dod pa yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:182a-5: dngos po 'gog pas zhi ba ni ma yin no zhes ston par byed pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:182a-6: da ni log par rtog pa brjod par bya ba yin pa des na /
T03TD3787E:182a-8: rab tu smra rnams brgyud mar rgol //
T03TD3787E:182a-10: gnas 'di la rab tu smra bar log par zhugs la rnam pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rtsod pa sna tshogs kyi spros pa rnam par spel pa spyod pa sel ba tsam gyi smra ba spong ba /
T03TD3787E:182a-11: ngag gi brjod pa'i lam mthar thug pa med ba rgol ba brgyud ma chen po rtsom par byed do //
T03TD3787E:182a-13: de'i phyir 'di brjod pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:182a-14: dmigs pa 'thad dang de yin no //
T03TD3787E:182a-15: ngo bo nyid nges gzung ba dang //
T03TD3787E:182a-16: rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes dang //
T03TD3787E:182a-17: dam pa'i don dang kun rdzob dang //
T03TD3787E:182a-18: sbyor dang dkon mchog gsum po dang //
T03TD3787E:182a-19: thabs bcas thub pa'i rtogs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:182a-20: phyin ci log ni lam bcas dang //
T03TD3787E:182a-21: gnyen po mi mthun phyogs dag dang //
T03TD3787E:182a-22: mtshan nyid dang ni sgom pa la //
T03TD3787E:182a-23: smra ba rnams kyi log rtog pa //
T03TD3787E:182a-24: rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid rten can //
T03TD3787E:182a-25: rnams pa bcu drug dag tu bzhed //
T03TD3787E:182a-27: bcu dang drug ces bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:182a-28: de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten pa'i dmigs pa 'thad pa log par rtog pa ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:182a-29: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul shes par bya ba'i don de nyid nas brtsams te ;
T03TD3787E:182a-30: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:182a-32: de la ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:182a-33: dngos po med pa nyid kyis rigs pa bkod pa la gzhan gyis de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa dris pas gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:182a-35: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:182a-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa la brten nas /
T03TD3787E:182a-37: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:182b-0: dmigs @182b pa'i ngo bo nyid la log par rtog pa ni yang de rnams de bzhin nyid la sogs pa ngo bos dngos po med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:182b-1: de lta yin na byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa nas /
T03TD3787E:182b-2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i bar med par zhus pa dang /
T03TD3787E:182b-3: rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad la yongs su 'dris par byed pa gang yin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ste zhes bya bas de'i lan btab pa dang /
T03TD3787E:182b-4: yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams la stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pas byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed pa'i de'i dus mtshams yang dag par shes pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:182b-5: des na pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
T03TD3787E:182b-6: skad cig ma gcig dang yang dag par ldan pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dang /
T03TD3787E:182b-7: bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi skye bar spong ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:182b-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la log par rtog pa ni des na des sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par bltas pa na /
T03TD3787E:182b-9: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:182b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa la spyod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:182b-11: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar thob par byed pa dang ldan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dngos po med par yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:182b-13: chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyis kyang ma byas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:182b-14: chos rnams ni chos rnams nyid dang bral ba'i phyir na /
T03TD3787E:182b-15: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid kyi chos kyis dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid shes par mi 'thad pa'i mtha' bzhi pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:182b-16: 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu dngos po dang dngos po med par ston par rjes su gnang bas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:182b-17: bden pa gnyis la log par rtog pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag gi de bzhin nyid mngon par ma shes pa rnams kyi phyir dngos po dang dngos po med par sngon pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:182b-18: sbyor ba la log par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:183a-0: @183a * // byang chub kyi phyir spyod pas te zhes bya bas gzugs la sogs pa rnams nas 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dag gi bar la spyod pa dang rjes su spyod pa dag gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa nyid yin par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:183a-1: sangs rgyas dkon mchog la log par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:183a-2: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang dag pa'i don brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-3: yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-4: yang dag pa'i don rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-5: chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du /
T03TD3787E:183a-6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi dbang du mdzad nas sangs rgyas su brjod pa 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan bshad pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:183a-7: chos dkon mchog la sogs par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:183a-8: byang chub ces bya ba'i tshig bla dags zhus pa dang ;
T03TD3787E:183a-9: stong pa nyid la sogs pa byang chub kyi tshig bla dags nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-10: yang byang chub ni ming tsam yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-11: yang mi phyed pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-12: yang de bzhin nyid la sogs pa byang chub yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-13: yang mi dang mtshan ma tsam byang chub yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-14: 'di sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin pa'am /
T03TD3787E:183a-15: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na byang chub ces brjod pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:183a-16: dge 'dun dkon mchog la sogs par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:183a-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas byang chub kyi dmigs pa'i dngos po bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-18: de lta yin na pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-19: de nyid la gnyis kyi spyod pa spangs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-20: de lta yin na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par mi 'phel ba'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-21: gnyis la brten pa rnams la 'phel ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnyis la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brdzi ba med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa rnam par 'phel ba spangs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183a-22: phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun bstan pa'i dge 'dun bstan pa'i don du sangs rgya la bsnyen bkur byas pa las gzugs rab tu thob cing sangs rgyas dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-0: byang chub sems dpa' dang mi 'bral ba rnams @183b kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rje su thob par brjod pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:183b-1: thabs la mkhas pa la log par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:183b-2: de thob pa'i rgyu'i thabs la mkhas pa yongs su zhus pa na de nges par bstan pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:183b-3: dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba na /
T03TD3787E:183b-6: len pa po mi dmigs pa'i thabs la mkhas pas /
T03TD3787E:183b-7: sems can yongs su skyob ba pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-8: de bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs la mkhas par brjod par rgya cher sbyar ba dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-9: de ltar thabs la mkhas pa rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad la rang bzhin med par dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:183b-10: rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pas blo mchog dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-12: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:183b-13: mngon par rtogs pa la log par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:183b-14: dngos po med pas dngos po med pas dngos po med pa mngon par byang chub par bya bar mi nus pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-15: dngos pos dngos po med pa mngon par byang chub par mi nus pa dang dngos pos pa dang dngos pos dngos po med par mngon par byang chub ba bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-16: dngos po med pas dngos po med pa byang chub pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-17: de lta yin na mngon par rtogs pa med par thal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-18: mu bzhi las ba zlog pas dngos po dang dngos po med pa mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba ni mngon par rtogs pa nyid yin par gzhal gyis bzhes pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:183b-19: phyin ci log la log par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:183b-20: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams la rtag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-22: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-23: bdag dang bdag med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-25: ma zhi ba nyid du mngon par zhes pa ni spros pa yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-26: de bzhin du yongs su shes par bya ba dang yong su shes par ma byas pa yin pa nyid du mngon par zhes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:183b-27: de bzhin du skye mched dang khams la sogs pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:184a-1: par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi bar du sgom par la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-2: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jig pa dgu sgom pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-3: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:184a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar las 'da' bar mngon par zhen na pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po yongs su rdzogs par mngon par zhen pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:184a-6: skyon med par zhugs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-8: sems can yongs su smin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-10: stong pa nyid thams cad sgom pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcos brgyas bskyed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-15: bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar mngon par zhen pa ni spros pa yin pa nyid du shes pas /
T03TD3787E:184a-16: byang chub sems dpa' la ji skad du bshad pa'i spros pa med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-18: ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo nyid dam /
T03TD3787E:184a-19: dngos po med pas dngos po med pa spros par me byed do zhes bya ba'i 'thad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-20: gzugs la sogs pa spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spros pa med pa'i spyod pa rjes su gnang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-21: chos thams cad la spros pa med par rnam par lta ba nyid zhugs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-22: rab 'bor gzugs pa sogs pa ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:184a-23: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis nas spros pa med par rnam par lta ba'i rgya nyid yin pas skyon med pa la 'jig pa mngon par brjod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-24: ngo bo med pa nyid yin na byang chub sems dpa'i skyom med pa la 'jig pa'i lam med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-25: dgra bcom pas lam gyi 'bras bu mi skyed pa'i dpes lam shes pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i 'bras bu thob par bstan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184a-26: de nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi de ma thag tu skad cig ma gcig la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:184b-0: dgra @184b bcom pa nyid lam thams cad la bslab nas yang dag pa'i skyon med pa la 'jig mod kyi /
T03TD3787E:184b-1: ji srid du lam gyi 'bras bus ma bskyed pa de srid du 'bras bu thob par mi byed do //
T03TD3787E:184b-2: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lam thams cad bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jig mod kyi /
T03TD3787E:184b-3: ji srid du rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par ma gyur gyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:184b-4: lam la rnam par rtog pas ni /
T03TD3787E:184b-5: gal te lam shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
T03TD3787E:184b-6: byang chub sems dpa' skyon med pa la 'jug na brgyad pa la sogs pa'i lam rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir lam de dang de rdzogs par byed pa na byang chub sems dpa' de dang de'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur bas na /
T03TD3787E:184b-7: brgyad pa dang rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa nyid du thal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:184b-8: sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T03TD3787E:184b-9: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod pa na shes pa dang mthong ba dag gis /
T03TD3787E:184b-10: dkar po rnam par mthong ba la sogs pa'i sa rnam pa brgyad las 'da' bas na /
T03TD3787E:184b-11: lam shes pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyon med pa la zhugs pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par brjod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184b-13: brgyad pa la sogs pa rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang spong ba dag ni /
T03TD3787E:184b-14: byang chub sems pa'i bzod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dang po kho nar nyan thos kyi lam gyis de'i rtogs pa bsal bar byed pa'i don gyis lam shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la sogs pa'i 'thad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184b-15: rim pa 'dis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad 'bras bu la nye bar spyod pa'i rgyu nyid ces bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:184b-16: nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam tha dad pa'i bsams pas lam shes pa'i lam yongs su zhus pa dang /
T03TD3787E:184b-17: lam thams cad kyi rnams pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma mngon par rdzogs par rtogs te /
T03TD3787E:185a-1: dag la brjod pa dang bstan pa la sogs pa rnams lam shes ba nyid kyis lam nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:185a-2: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams kyi sems can thams cad go bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:185a-3: rjes su mthun pa'i skad dang /
T03TD3787E:185a-6: sgra brnyan lta bur yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa bskyed pas gzhan gyi don gyi thabs phun sum tshogs pa shes par byed pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:185a-7: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pas gzhan gyi 'dzin gyi sbyor ba dan yod par shes par byed pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:185a-8: dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan songs de dang de'i lam dang 'bras bu shes nas de'i rgyud dang 'bras bu las bzlog pa nas brtsams se /
T03TD3787E:185a-9: 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi lam dang 'bras bu la sogs pa shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:185a-10: byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa snying rje chen po'i bar du shes par bya ba dang sems can rnams lam ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la 'god par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:185a-12: 'di ltar de ni skyes bu'i dbang po rnams shin tu rnam par phyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas te /
T03TD3787E:185a-13: shin tu rnam par phyed pa zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rnam par phye bas legs par shes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:185a-14: skyes bu smos pas ni bud med kyang rtogs par 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:185a-15: skyes bu ni bud med dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni sgra'i lugs yin no //
T03TD3787E:185a-16: dbang po de dag kyang dad pa la sogs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:185a-17: de dang byang chub dang de'i phyogs kyi chos rnams ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa /
T03TD3787E:185a-21: mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid kyis na byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i chos gang lags zhus pa dang /
T03TD3787E:185a-22: de lta bu mi shes pa'i sems can gyi don nyid du bstan pa yin par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:185a-23: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po la log par rtogs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:185a-24: rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs gang yin pa dang zhed bya ba nas brtsam te /
T03TD3787E:185b-0: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar gyi chos gang yin @185b pa de dag thams cad ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa med kyis sems can rnams gzus bar bya ba'i don du 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du de dag gdags pa dang /
T03TD3787E:185b-1: nyan thos la sogs pa'i da dang /
T03TD3787E:185b-2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:185b-3: mthong ba dag gis mngon sum du rtogs par bya ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:185b-4: 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba nas brtsam te /
T03TD3787E:185b-5: nyon mongs pa 'dul pa ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:185b-6: bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan ba yang ma yin zhes bya bya ba nas brtsam te /
T03TD3787E:185b-7: rtogs pa'i chos thams cad ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:185b-9: 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad gzugs med pa /
T03TD3787E:185b-12: mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
T03TD3787E:185b-13: 'di lta ste mtshan nyid med pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:185b-14: gzugs med pa dang bstan du med pa la sogs pa ni gzugs med pa dang bstan du med pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:185b-15: mtshan nyid log par rtog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:185b-19: mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pa rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mi dmigs par shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:185b-20: chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid med ba la bslab par bya ba yin na nyan rtogs la sogs pa'i sa las 'da' bar bya ba med par 'gyur ba dan /
T03TD3787E:185b-21: chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa /
T03TD3787E:185b-26: mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid kyis mtshan nyid la slob pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:185b-28: gal te sngar nyid yod pa zhig yin na ni de phyis mtshan nyid med par 'gyur ba zhig na ces bya ba'i 'thad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:185b-29: mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa la slob pa bkag pa dang //
T03TD3787E:186a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung de @186a * //
T03TD3787E:186a-1: bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
T03TD3787E:186a-2: mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings 'di ni ngas pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i 'thad pas gang gsung pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:186a-3: goms pa la sog par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin na ni de bsgoms pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa sgom par mi 'thad pas nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa las 'da' ba dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa la sgo pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-5: de sgom pa la mtshan nyid gcig pa dang mtshan nyid tha pa nyid bkag pas mtshan nyid med pa nyid de sgom pa yin par rjes su gnang ngang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-6: ji ltar na zhes bya bas de yongs su zhus pa la /
T03TD3787E:186a-7: gzugs som pa rnam par mi bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba sgom pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-8: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-11: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-12: de'i 'dus te reg pa la sog pa dang //
T03TD3787E:186a-13: de'i rkyen gyi tshor ba la sog pa dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-14: sa la sogs pa khams drug dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-16: de'i yan lag mya ngan la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-18: spong ba'i mtshan nyid blang ba dang dor ba dag dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-19: dang po la sog pa'i bsam gtan rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-24: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-25: rjes su dran pa drug nas gzung ste /
T03TD3787E:186a-26: rjes su dran pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-30: bdag dang sems can la sogs pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-37: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-41: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-42: mthar gyis ngas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
T03TD3787E:186a-43: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-0: rtog pa med pa dpyod @186b rtsam dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-1: rtog pa'ang med dpyod pa'ang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-13: sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-14: pha rol tu phyin ba rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-15: stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-16: mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-21: so so yang dag par rig pa dang ;
T03TD3787E:186b-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-24: rgyun du zhugs pa la sgo pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-26: ram pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-27: bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa sgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa nyid yin te /
T03TD3787E:186b-28: sgom pa smos pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum pa so so ba dang bsdus pa'i mngon par rtog pa'i dbang du byas nas ji skad du bstan pa'i sgom pa'i lam shes pa'i don du'o //
T03TD3787E:186b-29: rnam par mi bsgom pa smos pa ni sgom pa'i lam gyi bdag nyid ji lta ba shes pa'i don du'o //
T03TD3787E:186b-30: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid rnam pa mang por phye ba'i gzugs la sogs pa'i chos mang po smos pa ni sngar gyi sgom pa'i lam gyi yul gyi shes pa'i don du ste /
T03TD3787E:186b-32: ji ltar na zhes bya sa ji skad du gsungs pa rgyas par zhus pa la bshad pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-33: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-34: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs bag la nyal ba la sog pa rnams dngos po'i zhes sgom pa med pa rjes su ngang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-36: rab 'byor dngos bo'i 'du shes can la ni /
T03TD3787E:186b-37: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med do zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-39: dngos po la 'di ni nga'i zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags pa la thar pa med pa'i 'thad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:186b-40: gnyen po'i chos thams cad sgom pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-0: dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid zhus pa la de dag gi @187a * //
T03TD3787E:187a-2: gnyis med pa yin par bstan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-3: gnyis dang gnyis med pa yongs su zhus pa la /
T03TD3787E:187a-5: 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes kyi bar dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-6: de bzhin du de bdag gi 'du shes med pa rnams rim pa ji lta ba gnyis pa dang gnyis pa dang gnyis med par bstan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-7: ji srid du gnyis yod pa de srid du dngos po'o //
T03TD3787E:187a-8: ji srid du ngos po yod pa de srid du 'du byed do / ji srid du 'du byed yod pa de srid du sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal las mi 'grol ba dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-9: gnyis kyi 'du shes can la byin pa la sog pa rnam par byang ba'i chos thams cad med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-10: gal te de lta yin na dngos bo med pa'i 'du shes can la yang rnam par byang ba'i chos thams cad sgom pa med par thal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-11: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te /
T03TD3787E:187a-12: zhe zhal gyis bzhes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dngos po dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-13: dngos po med pa'i 'dus shes thams cad bkag pas rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'i lam dang 'bras bu dag bstan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-14: lam dang mngon par rtogs pa dag dngos po med pa nyid kyi rnam grangs kyi chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas mngon par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi dmigs pa las tha dad pa'i chos med par byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-15: gal te de lta yin na de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-16: de la mnga' bsgyur ba rnyed pa la sogs pa med par thal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-17: nga sngon 'dod pa rnams las dben pa /
T03TD3787E:187a-18: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ba'i chos rnams las dben pa /
T03TD3787E:187a-19: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
T03TD3787E:187a-20: bde can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te ngas la zhes bya ba nas btsams te /
T03TD3787E:187a-21: sems can rnam phung po gsum du lung bstan te zhes bdag nyid dbang po nyid kyis dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid thugs su chud pa zhus pa la /
T03TD3787E:187a-22: rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa rnams la rang gi ngo bo 'am /
T03TD3787E:187b-0: ngos bo med pa zhig yin par gyur na ni zhes bya @187b ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:187b-1: mngon par bzhed pa'i thugs su chud pa'i bstan pa dang ste /
T03TD3787E:187b-2: de la rang gi ngo bo ni dngos po'o //
T03TD3787E:187b-4: dngos po med pa ni dngos po nye bar chad pa'o //
T03TD3787E:187b-5: de ltar na 'di dag ni rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rten du byas nas rab tu smra ba rnams kyi rnam par nges pa dang bcas pa'i skabs rgya cher byas pas log par rtog pa'i nga rnam pa bcu drug tu gyur pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:187b-7: de yi rtags dang rnam 'phel dang //
T03TD3787E:187b-8: bstan dang sems kun ngas pa dang //
T03TD3787E:187b-9: mthong zhes bya dang sgom ba zhes //
T03TD3787E:187b-10: bya ba'i lam ni so sol //
T03TD3787E:187b-11: rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi //
T03TD3787E:187b-12: gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
T03TD3787E:187b-13: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03TD3787E:187b-14: log par sgyu ba dan bcas pa ni //
T03TD3787E:187b-16: zhes gang bstan pa de bshad pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:187b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyun zhes bya ba las rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i skabs bslab pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste ldan ba'o /
T03TD3787E:187b-19: // / da ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa brjod par bya ba yin pas /
T03TD3787E:187b-20: bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar rtogs pa'i chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na /
T03TD3787E:187b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni mthar gyis bgyi ba dang mthar gyis bslab pa dang /
T03TD3787E:187b-22: mthar gyis sgrub par ji ltar gdags ra 'gyur zhes bya ba'i dri bas mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa nye bar dgod ba'i don te /
T03TD3787E:187b-23: bgyi ba smod pa ni sems bskyed pa bzung ba'i don du'o //
T03TD3787E:187b-24: bslab pa smos pa ni nge par 'byed pa'i chad dang mthun pa shes pa'i don du'o //
T03TD3787E:187b-25: sgrub pa smod pa ni myong ba'i lam dang /
T03TD3787E:187b-26: sgom pa'i lam shes pa'i don du'o //
T03TD3787E:187b-27: gsum smos pa ni mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar gyis pa shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
T03TD3787E:187b-28: de dang rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thog ma nyid do zhes bya ba nas skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang med do zhes ya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:187b-29: gal bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam ma rgyas kyang rung ste /
T03TD3787E:188a-0: @188a * // chos thams cad dngos po med pa kho na'o //
T03TD3787E:188a-1: zhes nges par bzung nas dngos po'i 'du shes can rnams kyi 'du shes de bzlog pa'i don du rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:188a-2: mthar gyis pa'i bya ba la sogs pa rtsom pa nye bar bstan pas mngon par rtogs pa'i go rims kyis gzhan gyi don khas blang ba'i phyir brda las byung ba'i dngos po shes par byed pa'i don du gsung pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:188a-3: mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa 'di 'ang rnam par bcu gsum du shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:188a-6: sbyin pa shes rab bar dag dang //
T03TD3787E:188a-7: sangs rgyas la sogs dran dang chos //
T03TD3787E:188a-8: dngos med ngo bo nyid kyis de //
T03TD3787E:188a-9: mthar gyis pa'i bya bar bzhed /
T03TD3787E:188a-10: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:188a-11: de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:188a-12: bdag nyid kyang sbyin par byed la zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:188a-13: sbyin pas mthar gyis ba'i bya ba la sogs pa shes pa'i don du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:188a-15: tu phyin pa ni bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:188a-16: tshul khrims kyi mthar gyis pa'i bya ba la sos pa shes pa'i don du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:188a-17: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba ni /
T03TD3787E:188a-18: bdag nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:188a-19: btso pas mthar gyis pa la sog pa shes pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:188a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa re rer la mthar gyis pa rnams par 'phel ba'i bya ba re re mngon par brjod bas mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs ston pas ngag gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:188a-23: sangs rgya rjes su dran pa'i mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:188a-24: yang de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T03TD3787E:188a-25: rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo byed du lag par mos pa dang ldan pa ni de bzhin gshegs ba la gzugs la sgo par yid la mi byed pas de rjes su dran pa ni sangs rgya rjes su dran pa dag de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03TD3787E:188b-0: gzugs @188b la sogs pa la ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ngos bo med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:188b-2: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni dran pa med pa nyid yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:188b-3: de bzhin du re re zhing gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba drug pa gnyis kyis de bstan pa yan mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:188b-4: yang mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa yid la me byed pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
T03TD3787E:188b-5: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi phung po la sogs par yid la mi byed pas de rjes su dran pa dang /
T03TD3787E:188b-6: de bzhin du stobs bcu la sog par yid la mi byed pas de rjes su dran pa dang /
T03TD3787E:188b-7: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar yid la mi byed pas de rjes su dran pa ste /
T03TD3787E:188b-8: de ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par lnga'o //
T03TD3787E:188b-9: de la dang pos ni sems bskyed pa'o //
T03TD3787E:188b-10: bzhin po rnams kyis ni nges par 'byed pa'i chad dang mthun pa bzhi'o //
T03TD3787E:188b-11: de ltar slob pa na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs yongs su rdzogs pas ni mthong ba'i lam dang /
T03TD3787E:188b-12: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar gyis ni sgom pa'i lam yin te /
T03TD3787E:188b-13: de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo byid yin du zin kyang mthar gyis pa'i bya ba la sogs pa rab tu shes pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par rtogs par bya'o / de kho na bzhin du dge ba dang /
T03TD3787E:188b-15: lung du ma bstan pa la sogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed pas chos rjes su dran pa dang /
T03TD3787E:188b-16: skyes bu zung bzhi po rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyed kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:188b-17: dngos po med pa nyid du yid la byed pas dran pa med cing yid la byed ba med pas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
T03TD3787E:188b-18: dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bor bzung ste /
T03TD3787E:188b-25: mkhas pas mngags pa shin tu rdzogs ba'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub par byed pa'i tshul khrims la ngas pas /
T03TD3787E:188b-26: tshul khrims de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyed du yid la byed byas dran pa med cing yid la byed pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang ste /
T03TD3787E:188b-27: de la tshul khrims ma nyams pa ni theg pa gzhan la mi brten pas so //
T03TD3787E:189a-1: med pa ni nyam nga ba'i skye ba rnam par spangs pas so //
T03TD3787E:189a-2: ma 'dres pa ni skye bo ngan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189a-3: nyon mongs pa dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:189a-4: nag ngo med pa ni chag gcig tu dkar po'i chos rnam par 'phel ba nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:189a-5: mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa ni skye bar smin lam mi 'debs pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:189a-6: dbang 'byo ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bgrod pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:189a-7: mkhas pas bsngags pa ni mdzangs ba rnams kyi so //
T03TD3787E:189a-8: shin tu rdzogs pa ni dbang po rnams drung ba nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:189a-9: ring nge 'dzin sgrub par byed pa ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag gi tshig nye bar sogs pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3787E:189a-10: chos dang zag zing gi sbyin pa dag ngos po nyid pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed pas dran pa med cang yid la med cing yid la byad pa med pa'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189a-11: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lta'i rigs drug tu skyes pa'i rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:189a-13: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed pas dran pa dang yid la byed pa byed pa'i lta rjes su dran pas mthar gyis ba'i bya ba la sogs pa rab tu gdags par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:189a-14: 'o na mdo sde gzhan las 'di skad ces lha'i ris gnyis su dran par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:189a-16: ngas tsang ma ba'o zhes gsungs ba de ji ltar zhen na /
T03TD3787E:189a-17: de ni ma 'dres pa'i gang zag la dgongs nas gsungs pa yin pas nyes pa med do //
T03TD3787E:189a-18: chos thams cad dang po med pa'i ngo bo nyed du shes pas mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:189a-19: de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
T03TD3787E:189a-20: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:189a-24: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189a-26: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom pa'i 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189a-29: rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum dang /
T03TD3787E:189a-30: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:189a-31: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po rnams dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-0: snying rje chen po la slob pa ni dngos ba ni dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid @189b du rtogs mthar gyis pa'i bya ba la sogs pa yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-1: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na thams cad med pa'i phyir mtha' gcig tu chad pa med par smra bar thal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-2: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na yod pa'am med pa mi dmigs pas de spangs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-3: rang nyid la ne ma nur med kyang ma 'ongs pa'i skyes bo la ltos nas ngas brtan rab 'byor gyis zhus pa yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-4: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jig pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-5: de nyid kyis de yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-7: dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la thon pa dan mngon par rtogs pa bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-8: mi dmigs pa nyi chos kyi dbyings 'khrug pa me pa yin pas de thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa min pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-9: de yin nas bcu la sogs par rnam par gzhag pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-10: de nyid kyi phyir mngon par 'dod pa yang dag par 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-11: mi dmigs pa dang sbyin pa la sog pa rnams tha dad du bya ba bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-12: de mi dmigs pa'i rnam par sgom par byed pa rnams la de'i khyad par zhal gyis bzhes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:189b-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:189b-14: de de ltar byas na mthar gyis pa rnam gsum rna pa bcu zhe snang gsungs pa de yongs su rdzogs pa yin par shes pa'o //
T03TD3787E:189b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las mthar gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i skabs rim gyis 'jig par bslab pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o /
T03TD3787E:189b-17: // / da ni sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa brjod par bya ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:190a-0: des na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na ji ltar sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin par bgyid ces bya ba'i dri bar skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa nye bar dgos pa'i don du @190a * //
T03TD3787E:190a-2: skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa 'di'ang rnam pa bzhir rig par bya ba la /
T03TD3787E:190a-3: sbyin pa la sogs pa gang yang rung bas zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad skad cig ma gcig gis bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi dbang du mdzad nas ;
T03TD3787E:190a-4: sbyin pa la sogs sa re res kyang //
T03TD3787E:190a-5: zag med chos kun bsdus ba'i phyir / thub pa'i skad cig gcig ba'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:190a-6: rtags pa 'di ni shes par bya /
T03TD3787E:190a-8: ji skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin ba'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas dpe byad bzang po brgyad bu'i bar rnams yongs su zin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:190a-9: gnyis su med pa'i 'du shes ni skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa nyid kyi dkar po'i chos thams cad khongs su 'dus pa dang /
T03TD3787E:190a-10: zag pa med pa'i sems la gnas pa ni //
T03TD3787E:190a-11: gang la gang zhig gang gis sbyin //
T03TD3787E:190a-12: zhes bya bar de'i mtshan ma mi mthong bar sbyin pa byin pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rnam par skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:190a-13: de lta yin na mtshan ma med cing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa rnams la sbyin pa la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa med par thal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:190a-14: nye bar mkho ba med pa'i sbyin pa rgya chen po bstan bas khyod la cig zhig bya zhes 'dun pa bzlog pa na mi dmigs pas yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa las mi ldog pa dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i dpes pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnam par byang ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par brjod de spangs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:190a-15: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rgya cher mdo ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:190a-18: gzhan 'phrul dbang dang byed kyi lha rnams kyi yo byad phun sum chog pa thams cad ni bsams pa tsan gyis 'byung ngo //
T03TD3787E:190a-19: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsams ba tsam gyis pha rol tu phan pa yongs su rdzod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:190b-0: yang ji ltar na zag pa med pa'i @190b chos gcig la dmigs pa'i sgom pa zhigs pa na zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad sdud pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:190b-1: ri zhig don 'di la 'di rten pa'i dpe cung zag kyang bstan par bya ba yin pa des na /
T03TD3787E:190b-2: ji lta skyes bus zos bcud brgyad /
T03TD3787E:190b-3: rdog thabs gcig gis bskyod pa na /
T03TD3787E:190b-4: thams cad cig car 'gyur ba ltar / skad cig gcig shes de bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:190b-6: 'di la sngon gyi 'phran pa'i shugs las shes par dgos pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:190b-7: rna par smin pa'i chos nyid kyi ngas skabs yi zag pa zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad skang gi ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa ni gang gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:190b-8: gang tshe chos dkar thams cad kyi //
T03TD3787E:190b-9: rang bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin //
T03TD3787E:190b-10: rnam smin chos nyid ngas skabs skyes //
T03TD3787E:190b-11: de tshe skad cig gi ye shes //
T03TD3787E:190b-13: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03TD3787E:190b-14: 'di la yang dag pa'am yongs su grub pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes bya ba nas brtsam te /
T03TD3787E:190b-15: rgya cher rna par byang ba'i don du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:190b-16: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad skad cig ma med pa'i sbyor bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs nas skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa nyid kyis rnam par smin pa cig car du skye ba dang 'gag par shes par byed pa'i don du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:190b-17: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad cig ma phyogs thams cad rnam par smin gcig la mngon par tshogs pa ni nga gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:190b-18: sbyin pa la sog spyod pa yis //
T03TD3787E:190b-19: chos kun rmi lam 'drar ngas nas //
T03TD3787E:190b-20: chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa nyid //
T03TD3787E:190b-21: skad cig ma ni gcig gis rtogs //
T03TD3787E:190b-23: ji skad du phan tshun shin tu tha dad pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid chos gcig gi khongs su 'dus par mi 'thar pa /
T03TD3787E:190b-24: skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa med par thal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:191a-0: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems pa'i sems dpa' sems chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na rnal mam la byu'i nye bar len pa'i phun @191a * //
T03TD3787E:191a-1: bo lnga gnas nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:191a-2: rgya cher chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa nyid gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:191a-3: rmi lam lta bu zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi rang bzhin can no //
T03TD3787E:191a-4: mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste /
T03TD3787E:191a-5: 'di ltar chos mthun pa'i dpe'i don gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa la sogs pa dus su bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med pa stong pa nyid yid la byed pas lhag par spyod pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:191a-6: tshogs la nye bar mkho ba nyid du nyams su myong nas de rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su chos rnams ro gcig pa nyid kyi dbye ba med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi don yang dag par 'grub bo //
T03TD3787E:191a-8: sring mo phung mo phung po ni rmi lam lta bu ste /
T03TD3787E:191a-9: shin tu yongs su ma grub ba'o //
T03TD3787E:191a-10: byang chub kyang rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid de /
T03TD3787E:191a-11: de ltar na phung po dang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03TD3787E:191a-12: de bzhin du rmi lam la sogs pa'i dpes tshul khrims la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po mdo ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:191a-13: gnyis su med ba'i mtshan nyid du chos thams cad skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:191a-14: gang gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:191a-15: rmi lam dang ni de mthong nyid //
T03TD3787E:191a-16: gnyis kyi tshul du mi mthong ltar //
T03TD3787E:191a-17: chos rnams dmigs su med pa yi //
T03TD3787E:191a-18: de nyis skad cig gcig gis mthong //
T03TD3787E:191a-21: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na rmi lam mi mthong /
T03TD3787E:191a-22: rmi lam mthong ba po mi mthong zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T03TD3787E:191a-23: de dag dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do zhes bya bas chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:191a-24: chos thams cad dbyer med na dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa'i chos bstan pa med par thal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:191b-0: der brjod pa yod par thal bas der mngon par brjod pa 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan btsal @191b ba'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:191b-1: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la brjod du med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:191b-2: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas pa ni chos kyi skur btags pa yang dag par 'grub par gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:191b-3: de ltar byas na skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par byang chub pa /
T03TD3787E:191b-4: mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi //
T03TD3787E:191b-5: zhes gang gsungs pa de'i skabs kyi 'brel pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3787E:191b-6: gang dag skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa la ni /
T03TD3787E:191b-7: 'phags pa nyan thos sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal bar yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:191b-8: kun 'byung la kun 'byung bar yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:191b-9: lam la lam gyi bar du yid la byed pas ni zag pa med pa yid la byed pas mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams rnam par 'byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo dang 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3787E:191b-10: de ni 'phags pa nyan thos zhes gsungs pa'i phyir des mi gnod de /
T03TD3787E:191b-11: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:191b-12: skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang nye bar 'brel pa gang yin pa 'khor ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par goms pa rab tu brtan pas nges par sbyar ba /
T03TD3787E:191b-13: dmigs pa'i dug gi sgregs pa rnam pa 'di lta bu rnams bzlog par bya ba'i don du 'di la mkhas pa rnams kyi brjod par bya ba rnam pa mang du yod do //
T03TD3787E:191b-14: mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:191b-15: mngon ba ni mngon du phyogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:191b-16: sam gyi sgra ni nges par mngon par brjod pa'o //
T03TD3787E:191b-17: aa ya ni rtogs pa la'o //
T03TD3787E:191b-18: des na 'di skad du mngon du phyogs par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du nges par rtogs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:191b-19: shes pa'am khong du chud pa ni mngon par rtogs pa yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:191b-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba las /
T03TD3787E:191b-21: skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa'i skabs bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o /
T03TD3787E:191b-23: // / da ni chos kyi sku brjod par bya ba yin la /
T03TD3787E:191b-24: de ni rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:191b-25: ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang /
T03TD3787E:191b-26: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T03TD3787E:191b-28: gang gi phyir ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:192a-1: pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni //
T03TD3787E:192a-2: zag pa med pa'i chos gang dag / thob gyur rnam kun rnam dag pa //
T03TD3787E:192a-3: de gang rang bzhin mtshan nyid can //
T03TD3787E:192a-5: chos kyi dbyings dang ldan bar gyur pa zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad du rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin te ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i don gyis na /
T03TD3787E:192a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin par shes par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:192a-7: ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten na grags pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:192a-8: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam ni de 'thob par byed pa yin gya /
T03TD3787E:192a-9: byed pa po ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:192a-10: gang dag gis rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rnam par dag ba'i ngo bo nyid chos kyi skur 'gyur ba zag pa med pa'i chos de rnams kyang gang zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:192a-11: byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-12: rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni //
T03TD3787E:192a-13: snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-14: zad bar bcu yi bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-15: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni //
T03TD3787E:192a-16: rab tu dbye bas rnam brgyad dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-17: nyon mongs med dang smon mkhyen dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-18: mngon shes so sor yang dag rig / rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-19: dbang bcu dang ni stobs bcu dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-20: mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-21: srung ba med pa rnam gsum dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-22: dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum dang /
T03TD3787E:192a-23: bsnyel ba mi mnga'i chos nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:192a-24: bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-25: skye la thugs rje chen po dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-26: thun pa kho na'i ma 'dres chos //
T03TD3787E:192a-27: bco brgyad bshad pa gang yin dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-28: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:192a-29: chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin//
T03TD3787E:192a-31: rkyen phyis pas chos nyid kyi sku zhes bya ste /
T03TD3787E:192a-32: gzhan du chos rnams kyi sku ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ba yin pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid bkag par 'gyur pa dang /
T03TD3787E:192a-33: spyod pa'i don yon pa'i phyir 'dus byas su 'gyur pa'i nyes pa yod do //
T03TD3787E:192a-34: de la sku zhes brjod pa ni sngon gyi gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'brangs nas nye bar btags pa yin par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:192b-0: de la byang chub kyi phyogs dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa bshad pa dang bcas pa'i skabs rgyas par lam gyi tshogs las ji skad bshad pa @192b de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:192b-1: tshad med pa byams pa la sogs pa ni tshad med pa'i 'jug par ji skad bshad bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:192b-2: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni gzugs can gzugs rnams la blta ba 'di ni dang bo'o //
T03TD3787E:192b-3: nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la blta ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3787E:192b-4: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni gsum pa'o //
T03TD3787E:192b-8: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya ba'i rnam par thar ba bzhi dang /
T03TD3787E:192b-9: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa zhes bya ba gcig ste /
T03TD3787E:192b-13: kun tu longs spyod pa 'di'i mtha' yod ba ma yin pas na mtha' yas so //
T03TD3787E:192b-14: nam mkha' mtha' med pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas yin la /
T03TD3787E:192b-15: nam mkha' mtha' yas nyid ni nam mkha' mtha' yas par gyur ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:192b-16: 'di ni rgyu mtshan nam mkha'i ming yin la /
T03TD3787E:192b-18: bsam gtan 'di la nam mkha' mtha' yas par gyur pa de'i gnas yod pas nam mkha' mtha' yas kyi aa ya ta na ste /
T03TD3787E:192b-19: lha rnams kyi lha'i aa ya tan zhes bya ba bzhin te /
T03TD3787E:192b-20: aa ya ta na ni gnas yin no //
T03TD3787E:192b-22: kun du longs spyod pas 'di la mtha' med pas na mtha' yas so //
T03TD3787E:192b-23: rnam shes mtha' med pa ni rnam shes mtha' yas yin la /
T03TD3787E:192b-24: rnam shes mtha' yas nyid ni rnam shes mtha' yas par gyur pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:192b-25: 'di ni nam mkha' la 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ming yin la /
T03TD3787E:192b-26: snga ma bzhin du bsam gtan 'di la rnam shes mtha' yas par gyur pa de'i gnas yod pas na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do //
T03TD3787E:192b-27: 'di la yan lag tsam gyi lhag ma 'am cung zad lus pa med pas na cung zad med pa yin la /
T03TD3787E:192b-28: de'i dngos po ni cung zad med par gyur pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:192b-29: 'di ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i ming yin la /
T03TD3787E:193a-0: snga ma bzhin du bsam gtan 'di la ci yang med pa'i gnas yod pas na cung zad med pa'i skye @193a * //
T03TD3787E:193a-2: 'du shes rags pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:193a-3: phra mo yod pa'i phyir na 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsam gtan ni /
T03TD3787E:193a-4: 'du shes yod min med min no //
T03TD3787E:193a-5: de ni 'du shes yod min yang yin la /
T03TD3787E:193a-6: de ni 'du shes med min yang yin no //
T03TD3787E:193a-7: yid kyi skye mched dang chos kyi skye mched kyi rnam grangs su gyur pa'i skye mched yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:193a-8: de skye mched gzhan ni ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:193a-9: des na yod min med min skye mched do //
T03TD3787E:193a-10: 'di dag thams cad du yang dmigs pa las yang dag par 'da' ba nyid 'thob kyi yan lag 'da' ba ni ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:193a-11: dper na bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa rnams zad par sa la sogs pa dmigs pa gcig la dmigs pa ma spangs pa rtog pa la sogs pa'i yan lag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba de ltar 'di rnams ni ma yin no //
T03TD3787E:193a-12: 'di rnams la ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma las 'das pas dang po'o //
T03TD3787E:193a-13: nam mkha' las 'das pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3787E:193a-14: nam mkha' la 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa las 'das pa ni gsum pa'o //
T03TD3787E:193a-15: nam mkha' la 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i dngos po med pa las 'das pa ni bzhi ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:193a-16: des na de ltar 'di dag thams cad du ni dmigs pa las yang dag par 'das pa nyid 'thob po //
T03TD3787E:193a-17: yan lag las yang dag par 'da' ba ni ma yin te /
T03TD3787E:193a-18: btang snyom dang sems rtse gcig pa'i dbang gis ni 'di dag thams cad yan lag gnyis dang ldan pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:193a-19: ji ltar sbom po dang phra ba dang shin tu phra ba dang ches phra ba'i dogs pa las btags pa'i ras yug chu zheng mnyam pa bzhi po rnams la tshad khyad par med kyang reg na bde ba dang srab pa'i ngo bo dang rin thang che ba nyid rnams kyis snga ma las phyi ma phyi ma ches shin tu gya nom par gyur pa de bzhin du 'di rnams yang yan lag gi khyad par med kyang phra ba dang zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir snga ma las gzhan rnams kyi nom pa dang /
T03TD3787E:193a-20: shin tu gya nom pa dang /
T03TD3787E:193a-21: ches shin tu gya nom pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:193b-0: rnam par thar pa'i bshad pa lhag ma ni rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par @193b ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:193b-1: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bsam gtan bzhi dang /
T03TD3787E:193b-2: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3787E:193b-4: zad par gyi skye mched bcu ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:193b-12: dkar bo ste zad par brgyad dang /
T03TD3787E:193b-13: zad par rnam par shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:193b-15: de la zad par sa ni rnal 'byor pa gang zhig goms pas dbang du gyur ba'i bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin las langs nas snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni nye bar gnas pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po yin zhing rtog pa rags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:193b-16: yan lag stobs chung ba yang yin no zhes bya bar de'i skyon mthong nas /
T03TD3787E:193b-17: bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhi ba nyid du yid la byas te /
T03TD3787E:193b-18: bsam gtan dang po la mtha' gcig tu yongs su ma bzung bar gnyis pa thob par bya ba'i don du yan lag rnams la rtog pa rtsam rags pa yin zhing dpyod pa la sogs pa la zhi ba nyid du nye bar gnas pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:193b-19: 'di rags pa'i yan lag spang bar bya ba'i phyir dang zhi ba'i yan lag thob par bya ba'i phyir de nyid rgyu mtshan du byed pa yang ma yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:193b-20: sa'o zhes yang dang yang du yid la byed pa ni zad par sar rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:193b-21: de bzhin du zad par chu la sogs pa dgu po rnams la yang tshul 'di nyid yin par blta'o //
T03TD3787E:193b-22: sngar sgom pa goms par byas pa la ni chu klung dang /
T03TD3787E:193b-24: rdzing bu la sogs pa rnams su ma byas pa kho nar zad par chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:193b-25: de bzhin du nags kyi me 'bar zhing du ba 'thul ba rnams su ni zad par me'o //
T03TD3787E:193b-26: rlung gis bskyod pa'i 'od ma dang 'khri shing gi lo ma la sogs pa rnams la rlung 'di ni gnas 'di rab tu rgyu ba yin no zhes kun tu lta ba ni rlung ngo /
T03TD3787E:193b-29: gos la sogs pa sngon po bting ba la ni zad par sngon po'o //
T03TD3787E:193b-30: de dag nyid ser po dang /
T03TD3787E:193b-32: dkar por gyur pa la ni zad par ser po la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:194a-1: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams la ni zad par dkar po'o //
T03TD3787E:194a-2: skar khung gi nang la sogs par zhugs pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyi rtsig pa dang sa'i phyogs su bskyed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T03TD3787E:194a-3: shing gi lo ma'i tshogs kyi gseb nas byung ba rnams kho nas sa bzhi la bskyed pa zla ba'i 'od dang nyi ma'i 'od kyi thig le la rnam par lta ba ni zad par rnam par shes pa'o //
T03TD3787E:194a-5: rtsig pa'i bu gal sogs pa rnams su zad par nam mkha' skye bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:194a-6: gang zhig sngar bsgoms pa goms par ma byas pa las dang po pa'i sngom brtson la de ltar mi skye bas de'i yongs su sbyong ba'i khyad par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:194a-7: des ni sngon po la sogs pa'i kha dog gi dbye ba dang bral ba'i chu dri ma med pa nam mkha' nas bab pa'am yongs su dag pa'i chu tshags las 'dzag pa rnams kyis lhung bzed dang khar gzhong la sogs pa'i snod gang yang rung ba bkang nas rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug cing bde bar gnas pas yid la byed pa brtsam par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:194a-8: 'di ni zad par chu'i yongs su sbyong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:194a-9: snum zhing snying po dang bcas pa'i shing dum bur gtubs nas shing drung ngam 'gron khang yang rung ste rjes su ma thun par rdza so gtong ba'i tshul du spungs te /
T03TD3787E:194a-10: mtho gang sor bzhi'i tshad kyi bu ga byas pa kun tu sbar nas pags pa'am re lde gang yang rung ba'i stan mdun du bting ba la bde bar gnas pas 'og tu shing dang rtsva dang steng du bya 'phur bar yid la bya zhing dbus su me 'bar ba mthug po rgyu mtshan du gzung bar bya ste /
T03TD3787E:194a-11: 'di ni zad par me'i yongs su sbyong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:194a-12: med na byas kyang rung ste rtsig pa'i bu ga'am /
T03TD3787E:194a-13: de'i skar khung gi bu ga'am /
T03TD3787E:194a-15: yan lag gi phyogs gang la rlung gi reg pa der dran pa gtad par bya ste ;
T03TD3787E:194a-16: 'di ni zad par rlung gi yongs su sbyong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:194a-17: autpala sngon po dang gi ri kar ni la sogs pa yu ba dang /
T03TD3787E:194a-21: za ma tog sngon po la sogs pa rnams gang yang rung ba bkram pas kheng par byas pa'am /
T03TD3787E:194b-0: de bzhin du @194b ras sngon po rnga bo che'i mthil ltar brgyangs pa la ni la kang pa dang /
T03TD3787E:194b-1: pa la sha sngon po dang /
T03TD3787E:194b-2: mig sman sngon po la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i tshon gyis 'pho ba dang /
T03TD3787E:194b-3: mi 'pho ba'i dkyil 'khor byas nas kha dog mi mthun pa gnag yang rung bas yongs su bcad de /
T03TD3787E:194b-4: de dang nyi bar stan bde pa la 'dug nas yid la byed pa 'jug par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:194b-5: 'di ni zad par sngon po yongs su sbyong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:194b-8: dkar po rnams la yang tshul 'di nyid yin te /
T03TD3787E:194b-9: 'dir sngon po gang yin pa de ni de rnams su ser po la sogs pa'i kha dog yin par bzung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par ro //
T03TD3787E:194b-10: yang bum pa'i nang du mar me sbar ba kha bcad nas de la bug pa ha cang mi che ba gtod de /
T03TD3787E:194b-11: rtsig pa la mngon du phyogs pas bzhag pa de las byung ba'i mar me'i 'od kyis rtsig pa la bskyed pa'i snang ba'i dkyil 'khor yun ring du gnas par gyur pa de yid la bya ste /
T03TD3787E:194b-12: 'di ni zad par rnam par shes pa'i yongs su sbyong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:194b-13: rtsig pa dang re lde dang snam bu rnams gang yang rung bas g-yogs pa'i gnas su mtho gang sor bzhi pa'i bu ga gtod nas yid la byed pa 'jug par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:194b-14: yongs su bcad pa 'di ni zad par nam mkha'i yongs su sbyong ba'o //
T03TD3787E:194b-15: de lta bu ni re zhig 'di rnams kyi yongs su sbyong ba'i khyad par yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:194b-16: byas pa'am ma byas pa'i zad par de rnam pa dgu char la yang 'dzin pa dang snang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma gnyis skye'o //
T03TD3787E:194b-17: de la zad par chu'i 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma ni /
T03TD3787E:194b-18: dbu ba dang chu bur dang 'dres pa'i tshul g-yo ba'i rnam pa de 'dra bar gyur pa nyid du gyur nas nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:194b-19: de la 'bad pa byas na skyon de spong bar nus la /
T03TD3787E:194b-21: ma byas na ni zad par gyi nyes par gdags so //
T03TD3787E:194b-22: snang ba'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'i nor bu'i rlung yab lta bu dang /
T03TD3787E:194b-23: nor bu'i rang bzhin gyi me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bu yongs su mi g-yo ba'i rnam pa can du gyur nas nye bar gnas pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:194b-24: zad par me'i 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma yang chad cing ltung ba lta bur g-yo ba nye bar gnas pa ste /
T03TD3787E:195a-0: @195a * // ma byas na ni 'dir zad par gyis nyes par gdags shing 'gal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:195a-3: du ba rnams la cung zad cung zad nye bar gnas so //
T03TD3787E:195a-4: snang ba'i mtshan ma nu nam mkha' gnas pa'i lva ba dmar po lta bu 'am /
T03TD3787E:195a-5: gser gyi rlung yab lta bu'am /
T03TD3787E:195a-6: gser gyi kab lta bur nye bar gnas pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:195a-7: zad par rlung gi 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma ni 'o ma bskol ba phog ma thag pa'i rlangs pa 'thul ba lta bur gyur nas nye bar gnas so //
T03TD3787E:195a-8: snang ba'i mtshan ma ni 'dug pa lta bur mi g-yo bar gyur pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:195a-9: zad par sngon po la ni me tog ge sar dang sdong bu med pa lta bu ste /
T03TD3787E:195a-10: ge sar dang sdong bu rnams dang cig shos 'dab ma gzhan du byas pa zhes bya ba 'di ni zad par gyi nyes par gdags so //
T03TD3787E:195a-11: snang ba'i mtshan ma ni zad par gyi dkyil 'khor las 'phags pas nor bu'i rlung yab lta bu nam mkha' la snang ba'o ;
T03TD3787E:195a-12: / zad par ser po la sogs pa rnams la yang tshul 'di nyid yin no //
T03TD3787E:195a-13: zad par rnam par shes pa'i 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma ni sa'am rtsig par skyes par gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
T03TD3787E:195a-14: snang ba'i mtshan ma ni snang ba'i chogs stug po rab tu dang ba dang 'dra ba'o//
T03TD3787E:195a-15: zad par nam mkha'i 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma ni /
T03TD3787E:195a-16: rtsig pa'i mtha' la sogs pa dang pa dang bcas par bu ga dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur la bskyed kyang 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:195a-17: snang ba'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha'i dkyil lta bur gyur nas nye bar gnas shing bskyed na ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o //
T03TD3787E:195a-18: de ltar na 'dir byas pa'am ma byas pa'i zad par gyi 'dzin pa dang snang ba'i mtshan ma dag gi khyad par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:195a-19: mtshan ma rnam pa 'di dgu char la yang bde bar 'dug nas kha dog pa la so sor rtog pa dang mtshan nyid yid la byed pa dag spangs te /
T03TD3787E:195a-20: zad par sa la brjod pa'i tshul du btags pa rtsam la sems bzhag nas chu chu me me zhes bya ba de dang de'i ming gsal ba'i dbang nyid kyis goms par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:195a-21: de rnams kyi de dang de la goms pa'i khyad par ni de lta bu yin par shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:195b-0: de ltar goms pa de rnams la snga ma kho na bzhin du yan lag dang bcas pa'i @195b ting nge 'dzin de rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:195b-1: zad par sa la dbang du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa dang ldan par gyur pa na /
T03TD3787E:195b-2: gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-4: nam mkha' 'am chu las sar sprul nas rkang pa gnyis kyis 'gro ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-5: g-yo bar byed pa la sogs pa'i khyad par 'di 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:195b-6: zad par chu'i dbang gis ni sa la bye'u zul byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-9: sa dang ri bo la sogs pa rnams chu bo dang rgya mtsho la sogs par sprul pa yang dag par 'grub po //
T03TD3787E:195b-10: zad par me'i dbang gis ni du ba 'thul ba'am me rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-11: me dag gi char 'bebs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-12: me kun du len pa dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-13: gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de bsreg par nus pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-14: lha'i mig gis yul gsal bar bya ba'i don du snang bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-15: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus na me'i khams kyis lus bsreg pa la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:195b-16: zad par rlung gi dbang gis ni rlung ltar mgyogs par 'gro ba dang rlung gi char rab tu 'bebs pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:195b-17: zad par sngon po'i dbang gis ni gzugs sngon por sprul pa dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-18: mun par byed pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:195b-19: zad par ser po'i dbang gis ni gzugs ser por sprul pa dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-20: gsar du rnam par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:195b-21: zad par dmar po'i dbang gis ni gzugs dmar por sprul pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:195b-22: zad par dkar po'i dbang gis ni gzugs dkar por sbrul pa dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-23: gnyid ring du byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-24: mun pa rnam par 'jig pa dang lha'i mig gis ni yul snang bar byed pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:195b-25: zad par rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis ni gzugs gsal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-27: gnyid rgyang ring bar byed pa dang mig gis yul snang bar byed pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:195b-28: zad par nam mkha'i dbang gis ni bsgribs pa rnams rnam par 'byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:195b-29: sa dang ri bo la sogs pa rnams kyi nang na nam mkhar sprul nas spyod lam byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:196a-0: rtsig pa la sogs pa la thad kar thogs @196a * //
T03TD3787E:196a-1: pa med par 'gro ba la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:196a-2: rgyun mi 'chad par khyab par spro pa na zad par gyi skye ma do //
T03TD3787E:196a-3: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni brgyad de /
T03TD3787E:196a-4: nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs kha dog bzang po dang /
T03TD3787E:196a-5: kha dog ngan pa rnams la blta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes /
T03TD3787E:196a-6: zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste /
T03TD3787E:196a-7: de ltar 'du shes par gyur pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o //
T03TD3787E:196a-8: phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur pa la la yang de bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:196a-9: nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa nyid la de bzhin du sbyar ba bzhin dang /
T03TD3787E:196a-10: nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa nyid sngon po dang /
T03TD3787E:196a-13: dkar po la blta ba ste /
T03TD3787E:196a-15: de la sngon po zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i tshig go //
T03TD3787E:196a-16: kha dog sngon po zhes bya ba ni lhan cig bskyed pa'i sngon po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:196a-17: sngon po lta bur ston pa zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i sngon po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:196a-18: 'od sngon po 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni de gnyis 'od 'phro zhing mdangs gsal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:196a-19: zil gyis mnan nas zhes bya ba ni dbang bsgyur bas so //
T03TD3787E:196a-20: shes zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyi lam gyis so //
T03TD3787E:196a-21: zil gyis mnan nas mthong zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gi lam gyis so //
T03TD3787E:196a-22: de ltar 'du shes par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni zil gyis mnan tam ma non kyang rung ste /
T03TD3787E:196a-23: de la mngon pa'i rgyal gyi 'du shes med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:196a-24: gcig la dpe gnyis bkod pa ni lhan cig skyes pa dang sbyor ba las byung ba'i kha dog bstan pa'i don du'o //
T03TD3787E:196a-25: dper na sngon po zhes bya ba ni me tog dang ras dag la thun mong du bstan pa'i tshig go //
T03TD3787E:196a-26: kha dog sngon po zhes bya ba ni me tog gi dbang du byas pa ste /
T03TD3787E:196a-27: de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sngon po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:196a-28: sngon po lta bur ston pa zhes bya ba ni ras kyi dbang du byas pa ste /
T03TD3787E:196a-29: de ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i sngon po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:196a-30: 'od sngon po 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni me tog dang ras gnyi ga'i dbang du byas pa ste /
T03TD3787E:196a-31: mdangs gsal ba nyid gnyi ga la yod pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:196b-0: @196b de ltar byas nas dper na zar ma'i me tog gam /
T03TD3787E:196b-1: yul b'a r'a na si'a'i ras kha dog phun sum tshogs pa sngon po kha dog sngon po zhes dpe dang bcas par bstan pa ni rig pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:196b-2: ser po la ni dong ka'i me tog / dmar po la ni ban du dzi ba ka'i me tog gam /
T03TD3787E:196b-3: dkar po la ni skar ma pa ba sangs sam /
T03TD3787E:196b-4: ras kha dog phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:196b-5: dmigs pa zil gyis gnon pas de la dbang bsgyur pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:196b-6: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched do //
T03TD3787E:196b-7: nyon mongs pa gang zhe na /
T03TD3787E:196b-8: bsam gtan la brten nas pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa skye ba rjes su bsrung bas gnas pa yang dag par grub pa na /
T03TD3787E:196b-9: shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gang dag yin pas te /
T03TD3787E:196b-10: gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa mi skye bas na nyon mongs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:196b-11: de la nyan thos rnams la sangs rgyas kyi nyon mongs pa med pa'i khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:196b-12: nyan thos nyon mongs med pa ni //
T03TD3787E:196b-13: mi yi nyon mongs yongs spangs nyid //
T03TD3787E:196b-14: grong sogs su de'i nyon mongs rnams //
T03TD3787E:196b-15: rgyun gcod rgyal ba'i nyon mongs med //
T03TD3787E:196b-16: ces gang gsungs pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:196b-17: 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni grong la sogs pa rnams su sems can gang gi nyon mongs pa spong bar 'dod pas de la lta bar mi 'dod do //
T03TD3787E:196b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di nga la dmigs nas nyon mongs pa rgyun du gnas par ma gyur cig ces lhag par yang de nyid la gzigs par bzhed do //
T03TD3787E:196b-19: smon nas mkhyen pa gang zhe na /
T03TD3787E:196b-20: bsam gtan la brten nas 'di shes par gyur cig snyam pa'i smon lam grub pa na snga ma ltar de thob pa ni khams gsum na gnas pa'i shes bya gang dang gang mkhyen par 'dod pa de dang de la 'di shes par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:196b-21: snyam du yid la smon te bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs nas de las langs pa na smon pa des shes bya de rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:196b-22: de la nyan thos la sogs pa rnams la sa sangs rgyas kyi smon gnas mkhyen pa'i khyad par ni 'di yin te //
T03TD3787E:196b-23: sangs rgyas smon gnas mkhyen pa ni //
T03TD3787E:196b-24: lhun gyis grub dang chags spangs dang //
T03TD3787E:197a-3: ces gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:197a-4: de la lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi dang gis 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3787E:197a-5: chags spangs shes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
T03TD3787E:197a-6: thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni shes bya thams cad las 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3787E:197a-7: rtag gnas zhes bya ba ni thugs rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pas gnas pa'o //
T03TD3787E:197a-8: 'dri ba kun lan 'debs par zhes bya ba ni zhus pa'i lan thams cad 'debs par mdzad pa'o //
T03TD3787E:197a-9: nyan thos rnams kyi smon gnas shes pa de las bzlog par nges par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:197a-10: mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na /
T03TD3787E:197a-11: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:197a-14: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:197a-15: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T03TD3787E:197a-16: zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du byed pa'i mngon par shes pa'o //
T03TD3787E:197a-17: 'di dag gi bshad pa ni gdams ngag gi skabs su ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:197a-18: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la /
T03TD3787E:197a-19: chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni bsam gtan la brten nas dper na ma rig pa las brtsams te mi shes pa dang mi mthong ba dang mngon par ma rtogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs la thogs pa med pa yang dag par grub pa na ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'o zhes thams cad la sbyar ro //
T03TD3787E:197a-20: don so so yang dag par rig pa ni chos rnams kyi rnag dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang don gzhan la dgongs pa la sogs pa la thogs pa med par yang dag par grub pa zhes bya ba ste //
T03TD3787E:197a-21: des pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni yul gyi skad yul so so la bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du phan tshun ming gzhan gyi tha snyad byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:197a-22: dper na 'jig cing rab tu 'jig pa de'i phyir 'jig rten no zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:197a-23: gzugs su rung bas na gzugs so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa nges pa'i tshig la'o //
T03TD3787E:197a-24: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni chos kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams thogs pa med par yang dag par grub pa nas snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3787E:197a-25: de la rab tu dbye ba ni rdzas su yod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:197a-26: btags par yod pa dang don dam par yod pa zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3787E:197b-0: rnam pa thams cad du @197b yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na /
T03TD3787E:197b-1: rten len pa dang gtong pa dang gnas pa rnams la 'dod pa bzhin spyod pa'i phyir rten yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:197b-2: dmigs pa sprul pa dang sgyur ba dag la 'dod pa bzhin du spyod pa'i phyir dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:197b-3: ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir thugs yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:197b-4: ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir ye shes yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3787E:197b-7: che la dbang ba ni 'dod pa bzhin 'chi bas bsdus pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:197b-8: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:197b-10: longs spyod byin pas sems can rnams kyi che'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:197b-11: sems la dbang ba ni mngon par 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems la 'jug pas bsdus pa de thob par bya ba nyid de /
T03TD3787E:197b-12: longs spyod byin pas sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi rjes su gtsor 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:197b-13: yo byad la dbang ba ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yo byad nye bar gnas par byed pas de thob par bya ba nyid de /
T03TD3787E:197b-14: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la yo byad rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:197b-15: las la dbang ba ni mngon par 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus dang ngag gi las nye bar bsdus pas gnas pa ste /
T03TD3787E:197b-16: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:197b-18: sems can rnams lus kyi las dang ngag gi las kha na ma thob med pa la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bskul ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:197b-19: skye ba la dbang ba ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin 'gro bar skye bas bsdus pa ste /
T03TD3787E:197b-20: de thob par bya ba nyid do //
T03TD3787E:197b-22: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam grub pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:197b-23: mos pa la dbang ba ni /
T03TD3787E:197b-24: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T03TD3787E:197b-25: sa la sogs pa rnams gser la sogs pa'i dngos por de'i mos pa'i rjes su byed pas bsdus pa ste /
T03TD3787E:197b-26: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:197b-28: sngon gyi cho rabs rnams su bzod pa des sems can gyi mos pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:198a-1: dbang ba ni ji ltar smon pa bzhin yang dag par 'grub pas bsdus pa ste /
T03TD3787E:198a-2: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob par bya ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:198a-4: sngon des sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus ma btang ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:198a-5: mngon par shes pa ldas bsdus pa'i rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba ni /
T03TD3787E:198a-6: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob par bya ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:198a-7: sngon sems can rnams kyi dgos pa ji lta ba bzhin bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:198a-8: ye shes la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ye shes mngon du byed pas bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:198a-9: sngon sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa ji lta bzhin du mngon du byed pa la sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:198a-10: chos la dbang ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa la sogs pa mngon par 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin ston pas bsdus pa /
T03TD3787E:198a-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas thob par bya ba nyid de /
T03TD3787E:198a-12: sngon sems can rnams 'dod pa dang mthun par mdo la sogs pa'i chos la sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:198a-14: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3787E:198a-15: las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3787E:198a-17: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3787E:198a-18: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3787E:198a-19: mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
