T03TD3787E:198a-20: khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3787E:198a-21: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3787E:198a-22: 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3787E:198a-23: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3787E:198a-24: zag pa zad mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T03TD3787E:198a-25: 'di rnams kyi don ni rgya cher gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la sogs pa'i mdo sde las gsungs par blta'o //
T03TD3787E:198a-27: kye ma nga ni dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas pa la khyod kyi chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar /
T03TD3787E:198b-0: der nga la 'ga' @198b zhig gi rtsod pa'i rgyu mtshan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
T03TD3787E:198b-1: rgyu de ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pas gnas pa 'di ni dang po'o //
T03TD3787E:198b-2: de bzhin du kye ma zag pa'i dag zad do zhes dam bcas pa la khyod kyi zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes der da la rtsod pa med do zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te 'di ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3787E:198b-3: gang yang ngas nyan thos rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam bstan pa na de bsten kyang sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa'i phyir na sdug bsal mthar bya ba'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:198b-4: nges par 'byin pa ma yin no zhes 'di 'ga' zhig rgol ba'i rgyu mtshan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te /
T03TD3787E:198b-6: gang yang ngas nyan thos rnams la bar du gcod pa'i chos su bstan pa de bsten kyang par du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes nga la 'ga' zhig rgol ba'i rgyu mtshan snga ma bzhin te /
T03TD3787E:198b-8: bsrung ba med pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:198b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
T03TD3787E:198b-10: gang zhig gzhan 'ga' zhig gis shes par 'ang zhes de bzhin gshegs pa 'chab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su mdag pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o //
T03TD3787E:198b-11: sku'i phrin las ji lta ba bzhin du gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las la yang brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:198b-12: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
T03TD3787E:198b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad pa na kha cig gus par nyan zhing rna ba gtong la kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog ste /
T03TD3787E:198b-14: chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub na /
T03TD3787E:198b-15: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur /
T03TD3787E:198b-17: thugs yeng por mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:198b-18: gzhan gus par mi nyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bzlog pa na /
T03TD3787E:198b-19: de de bzhin gshegs pa khong khro bar mi 'gyur /
T03TD3787E:198b-21: thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:198b-22: kha cig gus par nyan zhing kha cig gus par mi nyan na /
T03TD3787E:198b-23: de de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'am khong khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:199a-1: pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas btang snyoms su gnas pa'o //
T03TD3787E:199a-2: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ni /
T03TD3787E:199a-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa dus la mi 'da' ba ste /
T03TD3787E:199a-4: de nyid kyi phyir na de rnams kyi mdzad pa 'bras bu yod par 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:199a-5: bag chags yang dag par bcom pa ni /
T03TD3787E:199a-6: nyon mongs pa ma spangs ba bzhin du spyod pa ni 'dir nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yin par brjod la /
T03TD3787E:199a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ni /
T03TD3787E:199a-9: des na de la nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcom pa zhes brjod do //
T03TD3787E:199a-10: thugs rje chan po ni phan par dgongs pa nyid de /
T03TD3787E:199a-11: gang gis dus thams cad du nyid lan gsum mtshan lan gsum ste /
T03TD3787E:199a-12: nyin zhag gcig la lan drug tu byas nas /
T03TD3787E:199a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten la so sor rtog pa yin no /
T03TD3787E:199a-15: su ni yongs su dge ba'i rtsa ba smin /
T03TD3787E:199a-16: su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin /
T03TD3787E:199a-17: su ni mngon par mtho ba bstan pa'i snod yin /
T03TD3787E:199a-18: su ni nges par legs pa bstan pa'i snod yin /
T03TD3787E:199a-19: su ni sangs rgyas kyi 'byor ba'i snod yin /
T03TD3787E:199a-20: gang zhig la ci zhig bya zhes so /
T03TD3787E:199a-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:199a-24: dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:199a-25: thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi nga'o /'du shes sna tshogs pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:199a-26: so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:199a-29: dran pa nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:199a-30: ting nge 'dzin nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:199a-31: shes rab nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:199a-32: rnam par grol ba nyams pa mi mnga'o //
T03TD3787E:199a-33: 'das pa lam chags pa ma thogs pa'i ye shes 'jug go//
T03TD3787E:199a-35: ma 'ongs pa la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes 'jug go //
T03TD3787E:199a-36: sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
T03TD3787E:199a-37: gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
T03TD3787E:199b-0: @199b thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste /
T03TD3787E:199b-1: ma 'dres pa'i bshad pa ni rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par ji skad du bshad pa bzhin no /
T03TD3787E:199b-2: rnam pa thams can mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na /
T03TD3787E:199b-3: kha cig ni bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa'i shes pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bsdus pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3787E:199b-4: gzhan dag ni de'ang chos thams cad ngo bo med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:199b-7: gzod ma nas zhi ba dang /
T03TD3787E:199b-8: rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam pa'i ye shes bsdus pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3787E:199b-9: gzhan dag ni 'dir gnyen po'i phyogs kyis bsdus pa'i rnam pa brjod par mi 'dod kyi /
T03TD3787E:199b-10: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar de las sems can gyi don du gnyer ba'i don khan ma tho ba med pa 'grub par 'gyur pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T03TD3787E:199b-11: yang gzhan dag ni sangs pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ste /
T03TD3787E:199b-12: de la ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i grib pa dang bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa ni rnam pa gsum char yang mnga' ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:199b-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'grel pa 'di thams cad kyang legs na ;
T03TD3787E:199b-14: slob dpon bzang skyong gis skabs su bab pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i shes bya rnam pa bcus bsdus pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya ba 'di ni shin tu ches legs te /
T03TD3787E:199b-15: yongs su grub pa la dmigs pas so ;
T03TD3787E:199b-16: / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:199b-17: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa'o //
T03TD3787E:199b-19: rnam pa ni zhi ba ste mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3787E:199b-20: de la bdag po dran pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas zhes de dang der gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:199b-21: ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sku de'ang /
T03TD3787E:199b-22: rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur na //
T03TD3787E:199b-23: gang dang gang la gang dang ni //
T03TD3787E:199b-24: gang che bya ba phan gyur pa //
T03TD3787E:199b-25: de dang de la de snang ngo //
T03TD3787E:200a-0: sprul pa snang ngo zhes bya ba @200a * //
T03TD3787E:200a-2: de ltar byas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi dgos dgu sgrub pa'i tshul du gnas pa yin yang rang gi rgyu yongs su smin pa ma tshang ba'i phyir dpung yang skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal las rnam par ma grol ba ni 'thad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:200a-4: lha yi rgyal pos char phab kyang //
T03TD3787E:200a-6: sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur kyang //
T03TD3787E:200a-7: skal ba med pas bzang mi myong //
T03TD3787E:200a-9: de ltar mdzad pa rgya che'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:200a-10: sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod //
T03TD3787E:200a-11: de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir //
T03TD3787E:200a-12: rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin //
T03TD3787E:200a-13: de ltar na dgos pa 'dis sangs rgyas thams cad du song ba dang /
T03TD3787E:200a-14: rtag pa yin par bshad pas bstan bcos dang 'gal ba med do //
T03TD3787E:200a-15: ngo bo nyid kyi sku bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:200a-17: // / da ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku brjod par bya ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:200a-19: mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T03TD3787E:200a-20: dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di //
T03TD3787E:200a-21: theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
T03TD3787E:200a-22: thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed//
T03TD3787E:200a-24: sku des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po sa chen po la zhugs pa rnams dang thabs cig tu kha na ma thob med pa theg pa chen po'i chos kyi longs spyod kyi dga' ba dang bde ba so sor myong bar mdzad pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:200a-25: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang gnag zhe na /
T03TD3787E:200a-26: phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs //
T03TD3787E:200a-27: phyag dang zhabs sor dra bas 'brel pa dang //
T03TD3787E:200a-28: phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags //
T03TD3787E:200a-29: 'di yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang //
T03TD3787E:200a-30: sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang //
T03TD3787E:200a-31: zhabs 'bur mi mngon spu ni gyen na du phyogs //
T03TD3787E:200a-32: byin pa ae ya 'dra phyag ring mdzes //
T03TD3787E:200a-33: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog /'phags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang //
T03TD3787E:200a-34: sbun re re nas g-yas legs 'khrungs dang //
T03TD3787E:200a-35: zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge 'dra /
T03TD3787E:200b-0: @200b 'di yi dpung pa'i mgo zlum phrag pa rgyas //
T03TD3787E:200b-1: 'di la ro mi zhim pa 'ang ro mchog snang //
T03TD3787E:200b-2: sku ni nya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab //
T03TD3787E:200b-3: gtsug tor dbur ldan ljags ring mdzes pa dang //
T03TD3787E:200b-4: tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems //
T03TD3787E:200b-5: shin tu dkar dang tshems mnyam thags bzang dang //
T03TD3787E:200b-6: grangs ni bzhi bcu tham pa tshang pa dang //
T03TD3787E:200b-7: spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi /'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T03TD3787E:200b-9: de la phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil rnams la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud dang lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste dper na rus pa'am ba so la gzugs su brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' ba yin no //
T03TD3787E:200b-10: zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs rnyongs pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-11: dad pa'i rgyal pho ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel pas phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-12: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil shing bal gyi 'dab ma ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-13: phyag dang zhabs dang phrag pa gnyis dang ltag pa'i phyogs mtho bas bdun mtho ba dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-14: phyag dang zhabs kyi ser mo ring bas sor mo ring ba dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-15: rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-16: sku khru bdun tsam du 'phags shing ya yo med pas sku che zhing drang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-17: pus mo'i lhang dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs 'bar 'bur mi mngon pa dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-18: ba spu gyen du g-yas phyogs su 'khyil pas sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-19: byin pa ri dags sha ra bha dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-20: ae ne ya lta bu yin pa'i phyir yongs su ma nyams shing rim par 'tsham la rgyas shing zlum pas byin pa ri dags ae ne ya'i lta bu dang /
T03TD3787E:200b-21: zhabs dang phyag mnyam pa'i phyir ma btud par phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la slebs pas phyag ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-0: glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i mtshan ma shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa @201a * //
T03TD3787E:201a-2: shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-3: dngul dang gser sa le sbram legs par yongs su sbyangs pa dang 'dra bar pags pa shin tu 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-4: sku la rdul gyis ma gos pas pags pa 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-5: ba spu shin tu rnam par phye zhing re re nas gnyis pa med par skyes pas ba sbu re re ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-6: 'di'i zhal gyi smin ma'i bar kun da dang ba'i 'o ma dang kha ba ltar dkar zhing zla ba dang nyi ma bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i spus brgyan pas zhal mdzod spus mtshan pa nyid de /
T03TD3787E:201a-7: mdzod spu zhes bya ba ni spu dkar zhing 'jam pas g-yas su 'khyil bar gnas pa'o //
T03TD3787E:201a-8: sku'i stod 'phel ka che bas ro stod seng ge 'dra ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-9: mgrin pa legs par 'brel zhing kun nas zlum pas dpung mgo shin du zlum pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-10: gser gyi glegs ma shin tu phyis pa ltar thong ka rgyas pas phrag pa'i bar rgyas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-11: ljags rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyis ma nyams pa'i phyir dang ro bro ba so sor myong ba dang mthun pa'i rnam par shes pa mnga' bas ro bro ba mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-12: sku'i khyon dang 'dom gyi tshad du mnyam bas n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-13: dbu'i gtsug tor zlum zhing kun nas mnyam pas g-yas su 'khyil ba dang ldan zhing dbu mnyam pa la legs par rgyas shing lta na sdug pa'i gtsug tor dang ldan pas dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-14: autpala dmar po'i 'dab ma'i mdog 'dra zhing yangs pas ljags ring zhing srab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-16: bya ka la ping ka'i lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-17: 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing zlum la rgyas shing lta na sdug pas 'gram pa seng ge lta bu nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-18: kun da dang dung bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems dkar ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-19: tshems la mthon dman med pas tshems mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-20: tshems la mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201a-21: tshems bla 'og lhag chad med pas tshems bzhi bcu mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201b-0: dkar nag @201b gi cha ma 'dres shing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang dmar po ra ri dang ma 'brel bas spyan mthon mthing nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:201b-1: 'og na gnas pa dang steng na gnas pa'i rdzi ma rnams legs par gzhol ba'i phyir dang ma 'dres pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu nyid do //
T03TD3787E:201b-2: 'di la mchan ni gang gang gi //
T03TD3787E:201b-3: sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin //
T03TD3787E:201b-4: de dang de ni rab rdzogs pas //
T03TD3787E:201b-6: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid 'di rnams kyang sngon gyi yongs su sbyong ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid las grub par rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:201b-7: yang mtshan gang gi sngon gyi yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyu gang zhe na /
T03TD3787E:201b-8: bla ma skyel la sogs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:201b-9: yang dag blang ba brtan pa dang //
T03TD3787E:201b-10: bsdu ba bsten dang gya nom pa'i //
T03TD3787E:201b-11: dngos po sbyin dang gsad bya ba //
T03TD3787E:201b-12: thar bar byed dang dge ba ni //
T03TD3787E:201b-13: yang dag blangs pa spel la sogs //
T03TD3787E:201b-14: sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid dang ;
T03TD3787E:201b-15: / mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin //
T03TD3787E:201b-18: bla ma rnams la bsu ba dang /
T03TD3787E:201b-21: me tog gi phreng ba 'bul ba dang /
T03TD3787E:201b-22: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten la sogs pa'i gan du 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3787E:201b-23: g-yog 'khor byin pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:201b-24: de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:201b-25: yi dam la shin tu brtan pas na zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste /
T03TD3787E:201b-26: de ni gang gis rang gi rtogs pa'i chos la gzhan gyis g-yo bar mi nus pa mi g-yo ba'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:201b-27: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bsten pas na phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel pa ste /
T03TD3787E:201b-28: de ni gang gis ma bsdus pa'i sems can rnams sdud par byed pa myur du sdud pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:201b-29: bza' ba dang btung ba dang /
T03TD3787E:201b-30: bldag pa dang bca' ba bya nom pa rnams byin pas na phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang /
T03TD3787E:201b-32: de gnyis ni bza' ba dang /
T03TD3787E:201b-35: bca' ba gya nom pa 'thob pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:201b-36: bcings pa thar bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:202a-0: srog gcod pa las slar ldog @202a * //
T03TD3787E:202a-1: pa bsten pas na sor mo ring ba dang rting pa yangs pa dang sku che zhing drang ba ste /
T03TD3787E:202a-2: de ni tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:202a-3: dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs shing gzung ba yang dag par spel ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:202a-4: nyams par ma byas pa na zhabs kyi 'bar 'bur mi mngon pa nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:202a-5: sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa ste /
T03TD3787E:202a-6: de ni yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos nyid dam gdul bya'i snga ltas te /
T03TD3787E:202a-7: 'dir gdul bya ni yang dag par bsdus pa'i sems can gyi khams gang yin pa yongs su smin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:202a-8: gus par byas te rigs dang bzo'i las rnams nye bar byin pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:202a-9: lhvam byin pas na byin pa ae ne ya'i lta bu ste /
T03TD3787E:202a-10: de ni gang gis bshad par bya ba dang dgongs pa drangs zin pa'i don 'dzin par byed pa myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:202a-11: rang la bdog pa'i nor slangs na ster ba dang /
T03TD3787E:202a-12: med ces mi spyod pa'i phyir phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste /
T03TD3787E:202a-13: phyag drang zhing ring ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3787E:202a-14: de la drang ba nyid ni bdog pa'i nor slangs pa mi sbed pa'i gya gyu med pa las yin la /
T03TD3787E:202a-15: rang nyid ni slong mo pa ma spangs shing skabs phye ba las so //
T03TD3787E:202a-16: de ni dbang du gyur pa dang 'dul ba'i snga ltas te /
T03TD3787E:202a-17: sems dbang du gyur pas ser sna'i gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:202a-18: nyon mongs pa 'dul bas thams cad kyi tshe mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang ma 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:202a-20: rang gi skye bo dang 'brel pa dang /
T03TD3787E:202a-21: lhan cig 'grogs pa rnams phan tshun mi 'byed pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:202a-22: sems can bye ba rnams bsdums pa'i phyir dang ;
T03TD3787E:202a-23: tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:202a-24: gsang ba'i gros bsrungs pa'i phyir mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste /
T03TD3787E:202a-25: de ni 'khor ba ji srid par sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir sras mang ba'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:202a-31: gnas khang gya nom pa rnams byin pas na mdog gser 'dra ba dang pags pa 'jam pas te /
T03TD3787E:202a-32: de gnyis ni gding ba dang /
T03TD3787E:202b-0: gnas khang gya nom pa rnams @202b rnyed pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:202b-8: bla ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su bkod pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:202b-9: de la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rim gro pa byin pas na ba spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste /
T03TD3787E:202b-10: de ni do zla med pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:202b-11: mu cor mi smra ba dang /
T03TD3787E:202b-12: gzhan la mi smod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:202b-14: legs par bshad pa la rjes su mthun par byed pas na ro stod seng ge lta bu dang /
T03TD3787E:202b-15: dpung mgo legs par zlum pa ste /
T03TD3787E:202b-16: de ni thogs pa med pa'i snga ltas te /
T03TD3787E:202b-17: ye shes dang mthu thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:202b-18: nad pa rnams la sman dang rim gro pa dang sman pa dang phan pa'i zas byin pa dang rim gro byas pas na phrag pa'i bar rgyas pa ste /
T03TD3787E:202b-19: 'di'i phrag pa gnyis kyi bar rnams shin tu rgyas pa'o //
T03TD3787E:202b-20: ro bro ba mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam par smin pas thob pa nyid kyis ljags kyi dbang po 'di 'dra bar gyur pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:202b-21: dbang po dang ro ngan pa phrad du zin kyang de ro bro ba mchog nyid du yang dag par myong bar mdzad pa ste /
T03TD3787E:202b-22: de ni gnod pa nyung ba'i snga ltas so ;
T03TD3787E:202b-27: bgrod dka' bar zam pa btags pa dang /
T03TD3787E:202b-31: 'dug gnas byed pa la sogs pa la thog mar 'gro zhing gzhan dag kyang spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:202b-32: snga ma rnams las lhag par byed pa'i phyir phyag gnyis brkyang ba'i zheng gi cha ji tsam yin pa 'og gi zhabs nas brtsams te spyi bo'i bar gyi khyon de srid yin pas na n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste /
T03TD3787E:202b-33: de ni mnga' brnyes pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:202b-34: yun ring po nas 'jam zhing snyan la mnyen pa'i tshig brjod pas na /
T03TD3787E:202b-35: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam bzhed pa'i bar du ljags kyis khebs par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3787E:202b-36: ngag gcig brjod pa rnam par rig pa du ma'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ljags ring ba dang /
T03TD3787E:203a-1: khams mang pos bar du chod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203a-2: gam la gnas pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang po'i yul du mtshungs par gyur pa'i gsung dbyangs mnga' ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs te /
T03TD3787E:203a-3: de rnams ni ngag gi lam yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs thob pa'i snga ltas te /
T03TD3787E:203a-4: ngag gi lam yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs ni /
T03TD3787E:203a-5: kun shes par bya zhing rnam par shes par bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:203a-6: mnyan par 'os shing mi mthun pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203a-7: zab cing rjes su sgrogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203a-8: mi tshugs shing rnar snyan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203a-9: rig cing khyab par byed pa'o //
T03TD3787E:203a-10: rig cing zhes bya ba ni rtogs par byed pa zhes brjod pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:203a-11: de nyid kyis na khyab par byed pa zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3787E:203a-12: gdul bya'i skye bo sna tshogs kyi rgyud rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:203a-13: yun ring por tshig rkyal pa las log pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203a-14: dus su smra bas na 'gram pa seng ge 'dra ba ste /
T03TD3787E:203a-15: de ni ngag btsun pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:203a-18: 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas na tshems shin tu dkar ba tshems mnyam pa ste /
T03TD3787E:203a-19: de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:203a-20: yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig kun tu spyad pas na tshems thags bzang ba dang bzhi bcu mnga' bas te /
T03TD3787E:203a-21: de ni 'khor mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so //
T03TD3787E:203a-22: 'khyud par byed pa dang smod par byed pa la yang chags pa dang sdang ba med cing rmongs pa med pa'i spyan gyis gzigs pas na spyan mthon mthing dang rdzi ma ba'i lta bu ste /
T03TD3787E:203a-23: de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas te /
T03TD3787E:203a-24: spyan phye ba'i rang bzhin can dang chos mtshungs so //
T03TD3787E:203a-25: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:203a-27: // / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams brjod par bya ba yin te /
T03TD3787E:203a-28: des na gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'du byed thams cad la chags pa dang bral bas na sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang //
T03TD3787E:203a-29: rang gi skye bo bzhin du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203a-30: bde bar dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' bas na sen mo snum pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203a-31: rigs dang rgyud mthon por bltams pas na sen mo mtho ba dang /
T03TD3787E:203a-32: tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' bas na sor mo rnams zlum pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-0: @203b dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags pas na /
T03TD3787E:203b-1: sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rim gyis yang dag par bsags pas na /
T03TD3787E:203b-3: sor mo rnams rim gyis phra ba dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-6: thugs kyi phrin las kyi mtha' dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-7: 'tsho ba dag pa sbas pas rtsa mi mngon pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-8: nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa grol bar mdzad pas na /
T03TD3787E:203b-9: rtsa la mdud pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-10: shin tu legs par sbas pa'i chos nyid can yin pas na /
T03TD3787E:203b-11: long bu mi mngon pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-12: nyam nga ba thams cad las nges par sgrol bar mdzad pas na /
T03TD3787E:203b-13: zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-14: mi'i seng ge yin pas na /
T03TD3787E:203b-15: seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-16: mi'i glang po che yin pas na glang po'i sta bas su gshegs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-17: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la gshegs pas na ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-18: skyes bu'i khyu mchog yin pas na khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-19: mthun pa'i lam mnga' bas na g-yas phyogs su gshegs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-20: blta na mdzes pas na mdzes par gshegs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-21: rtag tu thugs gya gyu mi mnga' bas na sku drang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-22: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston par mdzad pas na sku 'khril bag chags pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-23: sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas na sku byi dor byas pa lta bu dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-24: chos rim gyis ston par mdzad pas na sku rim par 'tsham pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-25: sku dang gsung dang thugs gtsang ba dang ldan pas na sku gtsang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-26: rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam bas na sku 'jam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-27: rang bzhin gyis thugs rnam par dag pas na sku rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-28: chos 'dul ba legs par yongs su rdzogs pas na mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-29: yangs shing mdzes pa'i yon tan brjod par mdzad pas na sku'i kho lag yangs shing bzang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-30: thams cad la thugs snyoms pas na gom pa snyoms pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-31: gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pas na spyan rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-32: shin tu 'jam pas chos ston par mdzad pas na sku shin tu gzhon sha can dang /
T03TD3787E:203b-33: rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' bas na sku zhum pa med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-1: ba rnams bcom pas na sku rgyas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-2: yang srid pa dang rjes su 'brel pa zad pas na sku shin tu grims pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-3: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nyid lag legs par ston par mdzad pas na yan lag dang nyid lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-4: gzigs pa rnam par dag pas na gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-5: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na dku zlum pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-6: 'khor ba'i skyon rab tu sbyangs pas na dku skabs phyin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-7: nga rgyal gyi dreg pa bcom pas na dku ma rnyongs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-8: chos zad pa rnam par bzlog par mdzad pas na phyal phyang nge ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-9: chos zab mo mngon du mdzad pas na lte ba zab pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-10: mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na lte ba g-yas su 'khyil ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-11: kun nas mdzes pa'i slob ma'i tshogs mnga' bas na kun nas mdzes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-12: thugs mchog tu gtsang bas na kun du spyod pa gtsang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-13: chos 'dul ba nag po ston pa dang bral bas na sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-14: shing bal dang 'dra bar yang ba'i lus thob par byed pa'i chos ston par mdzad pas na phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-15: rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal po che la snyoms par byas pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pas na phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-16: mchog tu zab cing brtan par gnas pas na phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-17: rgya chen po la bzod pa'i chos ston par mdzad pas na phyag gi ri mo ring ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-18: shin tu rlabs po che ma yin pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar mdzad pas na zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-19: 'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar ston pas na zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-20: 'jam pa sngon du btang nas 'dul bas na ljags mnyen pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-21: yon tan phra mo'i tshogs dang ldan pas na ljags srab pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-22: byis pa'i skye bo chags pa can rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i chos kyis 'dul bas na ljags dmar ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204a-23: glang po che'i nga ro dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-0: 'brug gi sgra rnams la bsnyems pa mi mnga' bas glang po che dang 'brug gi @204b sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-1: snyan zhing mnyen la 'jam pas smra ba'i slob ma mnga' bas na gsung snyan zhing mnyen la 'jam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-2: srid pa kun tu sbyor ba bsdams pas na mche ba zlum pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-3: skye bo rnon pos 'dul ba la mkhas pas na mche ba rno ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-4: chos 'dul ba mchog tu dkar bas na mche ba dkar ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-5: sa'i cha mnyam pa la zhugs pas na mche ba mnyam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-6: mngon par rtogs pa rim gyis ston par mdzad pas na mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-7: shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pas na shangs mtho ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-8: gdul bya'i skye bo gtsang ma yid ches bas na shangs gtsang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos mchog tu yangs pa dang ldan pas na spyan yangs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-10: sems can gyi tshogs bsags pas na rdzi ma stug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-11: lha dang lha ma yin dang mi'i na chung ltar mig dkar nag 'byes shing padma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu dang ldan pas mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pas na spyan dkar nag 'byes shing padma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-12: rtag tu yangs pa ston pas na smin tshugs ring ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-13: 'jam pos 'dul ba la mkhas pas na smin ma 'jam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-14: skyon kun nas mkhyen pas na smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar snum pas rgyud snum par gyur pa'i skye bo rnams 'dul bas na smin ma snum pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-16: mchog tu rgyas shing ring ba'i phyag mnga' bas na phyag rgyas shing ring ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-17: nyon mongs pa'i g-yul las rnam par rgyal bas na snyan mnyam pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-18: ma nyams pa'i sems can gyi rgyud 'dul bar mdzad pas na snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-19: blta bar bya ba thams cad rnam par spang pas na dpral ba legs par 'byes pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-20: dge sbyong dang bram ze dang phas kyi rgol ba rnams rab tu bcom pas na dpral ba'i dbyes che ba dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-21: smon lam gyi mchog tu yongs su rdzogs pas na yan lag gi mchog shin tu rgyas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-22: yul gyi bung ba'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pas na dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:204b-23: mthong ba dang sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bag la nyal spangs pas na dbu skra stug pa dang /
T03TD3787E:205a-0: blo 'jam pos bstan pa'i snying po mngon par mkhyen pas na dbu skra @205a * //
T03TD3787E:205a-2: rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs mnga' bas na dbu skra ma 'dzings pa dang /
T03TD3787E:205a-3: rtag tu ma brlang ba'i gsung mnga' bas na dbu skra mi bshor ba dang /
T03TD3787E:205a-4: byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog dri zhim pos skye bo rnams mthun par bsgrubs pas na dbu skra dri zhim pa dang /
T03TD3787E:205a-5: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dpal be'u dang bkra shis dang g-yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:205a-6: mdo'i tshig lhug pa bsdu bar bya ba'i don du tshig le'ur byas pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di yin te /
T03TD3787E:205a-7: thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-8: mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams //
T03TD3787E:205a-9: zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-10: rtsa mi mngon pa mdud pa med //
T03TD3787E:205a-11: long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-12: seng ge glang chen bya dang ni //
T03TD3787E:205a-13: khyu mchog stabs gshegs g-yas phyogs dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-14: mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags //
T03TD3787E:205a-16: gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku //
T03TD3787E:205a-17: mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-18: sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang //
T03TD3787E:205a-19: gom snyoms pa dang spyan gnyis ni //
T03TD3787E:205a-20: dag dang gzhon sha can nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-21: sku zhum med dang rgyas pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-22: shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-23: yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-24: gzigs pa sgrib med dag pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-25: dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-26: byang de ba dang lte ba ni //
T03TD3787E:205a-27: zab dang g-yas phyogs 'khyil ba dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-28: kun nas lta na sdug pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-29: kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni //
T03TD3787E:205a-30: sme ba gnag bag med pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-31: phyag ni shing bal ltar 'jam dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-32: phyag ris mdangs yod zab ring dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-33: zhal ni ha cang mi ring dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-34: mchu ni bim pa ltar dmar dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-35: ljags mnyen pa dang srab pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-36: dmar dang 'brug gi sgra nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-37: gsung mnyen 'jam dang mche ba zlum ;
T03TD3787E:205a-38: / rno dang dkar dang mnyam pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-39: byin gyis phra dang shangs mtho dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-40: mchog tu gtsang ba nyid dang ni //
T03TD3787E:205a-41: spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug / padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-42: smin tshugs ring dang 'jam pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205a-43: snum dang spu ni mnyam pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205b-0: phyag ring rgyas dang snyan @205b mnyam dang //
T03TD3787E:205b-1: nyams pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205b-2: dpral ba legs par 'byes pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205b-3: dbyes che ba dang dbu rgyas dang //
T03TD3787E:205b-4: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag dang //
T03TD3787E:205b-6: mi bshor dri zhim skyes bu yi //
T03TD3787E:205b-7: yid ni 'phrog par byed pa dang //
T03TD3787E:205b-8: dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis ni //
T03TD3787E:205b-9: sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed //
T03TD3787E:205b-10: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bshad zin to /
T03TD3787E:205b-12: // /'di gnyis kyi bshad pa ni sprul pa'i sku'i phrin las ston pa'i mdo las 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po nyid kyis ston par 'gyur te /
T03TD3787E:205b-13: des na dang por ma gsungs so //
T03TD3787E:205b-14: sprul pa'i sku gang zhe na /
T03TD3787E:205b-15: gang gis srid pa ji srid par //
T03TD3787E:205b-16: 'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag / mnyam du mdzad pa'i sku de ni //
T03TD3787E:205b-17: thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi chad //
T03TD3787E:205b-21: des na 'di phan chad ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs rnam pa thams cad legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi sku thob pa ni 'khor ba ji srid par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sprul pa rnams kyis lhun gyis grub cing rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi don sna tshogs pa 'jug par byed pa'i sgo nas gnas yongs su gyur pa'i phrin las kyi dbang du mdzad do //
T03TD3787E:205b-22: bcom ldan 'das rmi lam lta bu dngos po med pa dang /
T03TD3787E:205b-23: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:205b-24: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa'i chos rnams la dge ba dang /
T03TD3787E:205b-27: 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar gzhag ces bya ba'i dri ba de'i mdzad pa nye bar 'god pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:205b-28: rab 'byor 'di la byis pa so so skye bo thos pa dang ldan pas ni rmi lam yang mi dmigs so zhes bya ba nas brtsams pa 'khor ba'i rmi lam la dgongs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:205b-29: rmi lam mthong ba yang mi dmigs so zhes bya ba de las sad pa'i gang zag la dgongs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:205b-30: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag la de mi mnga' bar gsungs pas dris pa'i lan bstan pas te /
T03TD3787E:206a-1: ji lta ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po nye bar mi dmigs pa shes par byed pa'i don can dang /
T03TD3787E:206a-2: dka' ba byed pa rnams kyi chos rnam par gzhag par bya dka' ba ngo mtshar che ba nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:206a-5: yang chos kyi sku'i phrin las rnam pa du zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:206a-6: 'gro rnams zhi ba'i las dang ni //
T03TD3787E:206a-7: bsdu rnams bzhi la 'god pa dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-8: kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yi //
T03TD3787E:206a-9: rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-10: bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can gyi //
T03TD3787E:206a-11: don dang pha rol phyin drug dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-12: sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyis //
T03TD3787E:206a-13: stong pa nyid dang gnyis zad dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-14: brda dang dmigs pa med pa dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-15: lus can rnams ni yongs smin dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ni //
T03TD3787E:206a-17: mngon par zhen pa bzlog pa dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-18: byang chub thob dang rgyal ba'i zhing //
T03TD3787E:206a-19: rnam par dag dang nges pa dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-20: sems can don ni tshad med dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-21: sangs rgyas bsten sogs yon tan dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-22: byang chub yan lag las rnams ni //
T03TD3787E:206a-23: chud mi za dang bden mthong dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-24: phyin ci log ni spang pa dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-25: de gzhi med pa'i tshul dang ni //
T03TD3787E:206a-26: rnam par byang dang tshogs dang ni //
T03TD3787E:206a-28: tha dad yongs su mi shes dang //
T03TD3787E:206a-30: chos kyi sku yi phrin las 'di //
T03TD3787E:206a-31: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du bzhed //
T03TD3787E:206a-33: de la 'gro ba rnams zhi ba'i phrin las ni 'gro ba rnam pa lngas bsdus pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:206a-34: gang gi phyir dmyal ba'i 'gro ba zhi ba'i phrin las kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:206a-35: rab 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bsams bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su song ste zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas sems can de dag de nas thar te theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T03TD3787E:206b-0: phyogs @206b bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba la sogs pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas zhi ba'i phrin las dang /
T03TD3787E:206b-1: de bzhin du yi dags kyi yul gyi sdug bsngal rgyun gcod pas gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal zhi ba'i phrin las dang ;
T03TD3787E:206b-2: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la chos bstan pa'i rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T03TD3787E:206b-3: tshangs pa rnams kyi lta ba'i rnam pa dang phral ba na lha'i 'gro ba zhi ba'i phrin las dang /
T03TD3787E:206b-4: rab 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud par byed de zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:206b-5: rgya cher sems can rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa'i 'di ni 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu yin par brjod do zhes bya ba'i bar 'dis ni mi'i 'gro ba zhi ba'i phrin las dang /
T03TD3787E:206b-6: gal te byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa de lta yin na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la khyad par med par thal bas brtsad pa dang /
T03TD3787E:206b-7: gnyi ga'ang ched du bya ba gcig pa yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:206b-8: mngon du byed pa dang mi byed pas ni ma yin no zhes de ltar khyad par khas blangs pa'i lan btab pas gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:206b-9: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:206b-10: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sbyin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:206b-14: stong pa nyid rnams kyi rjes su gzung ba rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:206b-15: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rtogs pa la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:206b-16: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad 'dom zhing 'di skad rjes su ston te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:206b-17: yi ge mngon par sgrub pa'i tshig la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas rtsod pa dang bcas pa'i lan rgyas pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-1: sprul pa dper brjod pa dang bcas pas chos thams cad ma bcings ma grol ba nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-2: mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba dang 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad la mnyes par byas pa ma yin pa nas /
T03TD3787E:207a-3: chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' las kyang phyir mi ldog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis mi ldog pa mngon par brjod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-4: de gzhan ma yin pa'i bsam pas gal te chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa las mi ldog na /
T03TD3787E:207a-5: 'o na chos kyi dbyings gzhan la gzugs kyang gzhan nam ci zhes bya bas chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa las gzhan yin par dris pas gzugs la sogs pa rnams las kyang mi ldog par thal bar byed pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-6: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byad ba'i bdag nyid can du ston par byed pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-7: rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas nas zhes bya bas de rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-8: gal te 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa kun rdzob yin gyi /
T03TD3787E:207a-9: don dam pa ma yin na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i dngos por thal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-10: de rnams kyi bden pa gnyis rab tu ma shes pa'i lan nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:207a-11: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams dag char rnam par bcad pas 'bras bu rnam par 'jog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-12: chos kyi dbyings char mi gcod pa yin na kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas 'bras bu dang po yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-13: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems bsrabs pa nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-14: 'og ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yin pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207a-15: gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yin par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas rgya cher byang chub ces bya ba'i bar gyi 'bras bu char dbye ba med par 'gyur bas dris pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207b-0: dus gang gi tshe skad cig ma gcig gis chos thams cad rtogs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dper brjod pa dang bcas pa nas chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa @207b zhes bya ba'i bar gyis de'i lan btab pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207b-1: chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa nyid zhus pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dper brjod pas de'i lan btab pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207b-3: sprul pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i lam sgom pa bzhin du dngos po med pa'i chos legs par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:207b-4: chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu yin pas sgyu ma lta bu'i chos mthong ba byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu'i byed pa yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:207b-5: de lta bu yin na sems can gyi don du 'jug pa don med par thal ba dang /
T03TD3787E:207b-6: sems can rnams rang nyid de ltar ma shes pas de 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin par gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:207b-7: de bzhin du phrin las 'og ma 'og ma rnams la yang brgal ba dang lan dang mtshams sbyar ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i brjod pa'i gnas skabs rgya cher ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:207b-8: kho bos gzhung mangs ba'i nyes pa spang ba'i don du bsdu ba tsam byas pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:207b-9: bdag ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don la 'god pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dpes sems bskyed pa dang sgrub pa dang thob pa'i mtshan nyid thog ma dang tha ma rnams su chos kyi dbyings mi 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas na gzhan rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:207b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'god pa ni de'i rjes la pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:207b-11: sangs rgyas kyi lam la 'god pa ni de'i 'og tu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:207b-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:207b-13: rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:207b-14: de'i 'og tu rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las rgyas par bstan pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:207b-15: gnyis su med pa'i chos la 'god pa de'i rjes la /
T03TD3787E:207b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang /
T03TD3787E:208a-0: dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gyi dpe dag gis gnyis su med pa'i mngon par rtogs pa la 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs @208a * //
T03TD3787E:208a-2: brda las byung ba shes pa 'gog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208a-3: de'i 'og tu gnas brtan rab 'byor bdag nyid dbang du byas pa'i dpes chos thams cad rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208a-4: dmigs su med pa'i ye shes la 'god pa ni de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams la bsgom par bya ba dang sgom pa po dang /
T03TD3787E:208a-5: sgom pa dmigs su med pa'i ye shes la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208a-6: sems can yongs su smin pa la 'god pa ni de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208a-8: de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208a-9: chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa spangs pa la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208a-10: de'i 'og tu chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208a-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208a-12: de'i 'og tu byang chub thob pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208a-14: de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no ;
T03TD3787E:208a-15: / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par so sor nges pa la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208a-17: sems dang po bskyed pa dang phyir mi ldog pa dang /
T03TD3787E:208a-18: srid pa tha ma pa so sor nges pa nyid la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208a-19: sems can gyi don tshad med pa la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208a-21: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can tshad med pa'i don thob par mdzad pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208b-0: sangs rgyas kyi drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba la sogs pa la 'god pa @208b ni de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du nye bar 'gro ba dang bsnyen bkur byed pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:208b-1: mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bral nas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sbyor bas phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208b-2: byang chub kyi yan lag la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208b-4: byang chub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no ;
T03TD3787E:208b-5: / las dang 'bras bur 'brel pa chud mi za ba la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208b-7: las dang 'bras bur 'brel pa'i tha dad dang ldan pa 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba chud mi za ba la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208b-8: bden pa mthong ba la 'god pa ni ;
T03TD3787E:208b-10: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po mnyam pa nyid du rjes su rtogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208b-11: phyin ci log spangs pa la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208b-13: phyin ci log bzhi spang ba la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208b-14: gzhi med pa'i phyin ci log shes pa la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208b-16: skra'i rtse mo bye bar gshags pa'i tshad tsam gyi dngos po'ang bkag pa dang /
T03TD3787E:208b-22: sprul pa'i dpe rnams kyis gzhi med pa'i phyin ci log shes pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208b-23: rnam par byang ba la rab tu 'jog pa ni /
T03TD3787E:208b-25: tha snyad la brten nas rnam par byang ba la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:208b-27: de'i 'og tu tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:209a-0: mtha' gnyis mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rtogs pa nyid la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa @209a * //
T03TD3787E:209a-2: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas tha mi dad par yongs su shes pa la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:209a-3: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dag phan tshun tha dad par mi nus pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:209a-5: de dag mngon par rtogs pa'i dus su ldan pa yang ma yin /
T03TD3787E:209a-6: mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:209a-7: mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:209a-8: don dam par mngon par rtogs par 'du byed bkag pa'i rnam grangs gzhan rjes su gnang ba dang /
T03TD3787E:209a-9: stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid du cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:209a-10: sems can rnams 'du shes thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'i phyir /
T03TD3787E:209a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu'i khyu mchog nyid du zhal gyis bzhes pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:209a-12: phrin las nyi shu rtsa bdun pa mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa ni /
T03TD3787E:209a-13: chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu yin pa nyid kyis skye ba dang 'gag pa las rnam par grol ba'i chos ma lus pa sprul pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:209a-14: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sprul pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:209a-15: ji ltar snyed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig gis /
T03TD3787E:209a-16: sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:209a-17: phrin las 'di rnams kyi go rims dang so so'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par ni de dang de'i phrin las kyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs te bltas la brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:209a-18: don yongs su bsal bas kho bo cag gis ni rnam par ma phye ste /
T03TD3787E:209a-19: btags pa la 'thag pas ci zhig bya /
T03TD3787E:209a-21: ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang //
T03TD3787E:209a-22: de bzhin gzhan pa sprul pa ni //
T03TD3787E:209a-23: zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum dang /
T03TD3787E:209a-24: chos kyi sku yi phrin las 'di //
T03TD3787E:209a-25: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du bzhed //
T03TD3787E:209a-26: ces bstan pa gang yin pa de bshad par rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:209a-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las /
T03TD3787E:209b-0: chos kyi sku'i skabs bslab pa'i 'bras bu'i @209b le'u ste brgyad pa'o /
T03TD3787E:209b-2: // /'on te gleng gzhi'i le'u las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i padma chen po ngo mtshar can gyi skyes bskur ba dang /
T03TD3787E:209b-3: gzhal du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'ongs pa de ci'i don du yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:209b-4: sems bskyed pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa yongs su rdzogs kyi bar gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byin gyis brlabs par shes par byed pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:209b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par sdud pas sems can gyi khams brjod du med pa la dmigs te /
T03TD3787E:209b-6: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa shes par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:209b-8: tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so so rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub srid pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mang po nyid du shes par byed pa'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:209b-9: mngon par shes pas brtse ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams phan tshun gyi sangs rgyas kyi drung du 'gro ba dang blta ba dang chos nyan pa dang mchod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:209b-10: bsnyen bskur byed pas sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:209b-11: rang gi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don dang /
T03TD3787E:209b-12: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su gzung ba'i don du yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:209b-13: gang gi phyir gzhung stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa skabs 'byed pa nas brtsams te /
T03TD3787E:209b-14: yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar gyis dngos po rnams gcig tu bsdus na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i mthar thug pa dngos po brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T03TD3787E:209b-16: shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni //
T03TD3787E:209b-17: dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad //
T03TD3787E:209b-18: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
T03TD3787E:209b-19: de nas thams cad shes pa nyid //
T03TD3787E:210a-2: rtse mor phyin dang mthar gyis pa //
T03TD3787E:210a-3: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
T03TD3787E:210a-4: chos kyi sku dang de rnam brgyad //
T03TD3787E:210a-5: ces gang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:210a-6: yang 'di nyid bshad pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum ni mtshan nyid pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3787E:210a-7: rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa ni sbyor ba'o //
T03TD3787E:210a-8: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa ni rab tu gyur pa dang ldan pa'o //
T03TD3787E:210a-9: mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni go rims dang ldan pa'o //
T03TD3787E:210a-10: skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni mthar thug pa'o //
T03TD3787E:210a-11: chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa ni rnam par smin pa ste /
T03TD3787E:210a-12: de ltar 'di ni bshad pa'i rnam grangs gzhan yin no //
T03TD3787E:210a-14: mtshan nyid de yi sbyor ba dang //
T03TD3787E:210a-15: de yi rab de'i go rims dang ;
T03TD3787E:210a-16: / de'i mtha' de yi rnam smin ni //
T03TD3787E:210a-17: don bsdus gzhan de rnam pa drug / ces bya ba 'di gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:210a-18: yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum ni yul yin no //
T03TD3787E:210a-19: mngon par rtogs pa bzhi ni rgyu yin no //
T03TD3787E:210a-20: chos kyi sku rnam pa gsum ni de'i 'bras bu yin la /
T03TD3787E:210a-21: sems can gyi don rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bdun ni de'i phrin las yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam grangs gzhan yin no //
T03TD3787E:210a-23: yul ni rnam pa gsum po rgyu //
T03TD3787E:210a-24: sbyor ba bzhi yi bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3787E:210a-25: chos sku phrin las 'bras bu ni //
T03TD3787E:210a-26: don bsdus gzhan te rnam pa gsum //
T03TD3787E:210a-27: zhes bya ba 'di gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:210a-28: 'on te de dang der nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi so so'i khyad par gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:210a-29: re zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gang yin pa de dag ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams las khyad par rnam pa drug gis khyad par du 'phags pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:210b-0: dmigs pa'i khyad par gyis ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi rnam par @210b mi rtog pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:210b-1: rnam pa'i khyad par gyis ni /
T03TD3787E:210b-2: mngon par zhen pa med pa la sogs pa rnams yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:210b-3: rgyu'i khyad par gyis ni theg pa gsum gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:210b-4: yang dag par 'dzin pa'i khyad par gyis ni thabs mkhas pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:210b-5: mtshungs par ldan pa'i khyad par gyis ni rnam par rtog pa rnam pa bzhi dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:210b-6: rnam pa'i khyad par can gyis ni rnam pa chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po yin te /
T03TD3787E:210b-7: de ltar na cig shos kyi nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams las rang bzhin khyad par can yin te /
T03TD3787E:210b-8: ji skad du de nyid las /
T03TD3787E:210b-9: dmigs pa dang ni rnam pa dang //
T03TD3787E:210b-10: rgyu dang yongs su 'dzin pa yis //
T03TD3787E:210b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:210b-12: lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs su /
T03TD3787E:210b-13: nyan thos kyi lam gyi nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gsungs pa gang yin pa dang de dag kyang snga ma rnams las dmigs pa dang rnam pa dag gi khyad par can yin te /
T03TD3787E:210b-14: dmigs pa'i khyad par gyis ni /
T03TD3787E:210b-15: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:210b-16: rnam pa'i khyad par gyis ni gzugs la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid rnams gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa rnam pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:210b-17: ji skad du de nyid las /
T03TD3787E:210b-18: gzugs sogs phung po'i stong nyid phyir //
T03TD3787E:210b-19: stong pa nyid rnams dbyer med pas //
T03TD3787E:210b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:210b-21: rang byang chub kyi lam du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang snga ma dag las dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3787E:210b-22: rnam pa'i khyad par dag gis khyad par du gyur pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:210b-23: dmigs pa'i khyad par gyis ni /
T03TD3787E:210b-24: chos thams cad btags pa tsam la mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:210b-25: rnam pa'i khyad par gyis ni /
T03TD3787E:210b-26: btags pa dang mi 'gal bar chos nyid ston pa rnam pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3787E:210b-27: de nyid las ji skad du /
T03TD3787E:210b-28: btags pa'i chos nyid mi 'gal bar //
T03TD3787E:211a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:211a-3: rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
T03TD3787E:211a-4: sems can thams cad la brten pa'i sbyor ba'i 'am gyis yin pas /
T03TD3787E:211a-5: sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i khyad par dang /
T03TD3787E:211a-6: de dag sems mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par gyis bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khyad par du gyur pa yin te /
T03TD3787E:211a-7: de nyid las ji skad du /
T03TD3787E:211a-8: dro ba rnams kyi dmigs pa 'dir //
T03TD3787E:211a-9: sems can thams cad yin par brjod //
T03TD3787E:211a-10: de dag nyid la sems mnyam sogs //
T03TD3787E:211a-11: rnam pa dag ni bcur bshad do //
T03TD3787E:211a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:211a-13: 'di ni re zhig nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams kyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yin no //
T03TD3787E:211a-14: 'on te de dang der mthong ba'i lam mang po rnam pa mang pos bstan pa gang yin pa de'i so so'i khyad par ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3787E:211a-15: re zhig lam shes pa nyid kyi mthong ba'i lam gang yin pa de ni /
T03TD3787E:211a-16: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang rung bar mi ltung ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'i lam yin no //
T03TD3787E:211a-18: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas lam thams cad bskyed par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:211a-19: 'dis yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mngon du mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:211a-20: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mthong ba'i lam gang yin pa de ni theg pa dman pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i lam yin no //
T03TD3787E:211a-21: 'di ltar de nyid las nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni /
T03TD3787E:211a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa dang mthong bas bltas nas 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang /
T03TD3787E:211a-23: yang rgyun du zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang spangs pa gang yin pa ni /
T03TD3787E:211a-24: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa yin no zhes kyang gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:211a-25: rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03TD3787E:211a-26: mthong ba'i lam gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni khyad par gyi lam yin te /
T03TD3787E:211a-27: de nyid las ji skad du /
T03TD3787E:211a-28: bsam mi khyab sogs khyad par gyi //
T03TD3787E:211b-0: khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod @211b yul can //
T03TD3787E:211b-1: skad cig ma ni bcu drug gis //
T03TD3787E:211b-2: khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
T03TD3787E:211b-3: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3787E:211b-4: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi dbang du mdzad nas de nyid du gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni slob pa'i lam yin te /
T03TD3787E:211b-5: slob ba'i gnas skabs na yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3787E:211b-6: de nyid las ji skad du /
T03TD3787E:211b-7: mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang //
T03TD3787E:211b-8: shes pa'i skad cig bcu drug ni //
T03TD3787E:211b-9: byang chub sems dpa' mi ldog pa'i //
T03TD3787E:211b-10: mtshan nyid yin par shes par bya //
T03TD3787E:211b-12: thams cad du skad cig ni ji srid kyis zhes bya ba la /
T03TD3787E:211b-13: shes pa skye ba 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:211b-14: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mthong ba'i lam gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni gnyen po'i lam yin par shes par bya ste /
T03TD3787E:211b-15: de nyid las ji skad du /
T03TD3787E:211b-16: mthong zhes bya dang sgom pa zhes //
T03TD3787E:211b-17: bya ba'i lam ni so so la //
T03TD3787E:211b-18: rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi //
T03TD3787E:211b-19: gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
T03TD3787E:211b-21: de ltar 'di rnams ni mthong ba'i lam rnams kyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:211b-23: phyogs 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03TD3787E:211b-24: rnam pa thams cad mngon par par rdzogs par rtogs par sgom pa'i lam gyi sbyor ba dang /
T03TD3787E:211b-25: rnam par rtog pa de dang de dag gi rab tu dbye ba'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa gang yin pa brtags shing bshad par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:211b-26: de ltar 'jig rten 'di ni song zhing rjes song lam la brten pa zhes bya dang //
T03TD3787E:211b-27: gang phyir sangs rgyas lam gang yin par blos byas min yang mthong ba lkog gyur pa //
T03TD3787E:211b-28: des na kho bos 'gro ba rnams la phan phyir mi yis sngon chad ma myong 'di //
T03TD3787E:211b-29: shes rab pha rol phyin tshul mkhas pa rnams la phyogs tsam gsal bar byas pa yin //
T03TD3787E:211b-30: kye ma ma la mi shes rang bzhin sdig pa yis //
T03TD3787E:211b-31: gang phyir 'phags pa'i mig ni shin tu bkag gyur pa //
T03TD3787E:211b-32: des na skye dgu 'di dag rab tu gsal ba dang //
T03TD3787E:211b-33: bsod nams dbang ldan rab tu 'jug pa mi 'dor mtshang [?] //
T03TD3787E:211b-34: rtog ge'i 'thad las rab tu byung ba'i lam du ni //
T03TD3787E:211b-35: thar 'dod rnams kyi yid kyis gom 'dor mi nus pas //
T03TD3787E:212a-0: rab grags tsam gyi ji bzhin don nyid gang @212a * //
T03TD3787E:212a-2: de yi don du rdzogs sangs 'bras can bstan pa yin //
T03TD3787E:212a-3: de lta de ltar gzhan la brten pa'i 'gro ba 'di //
T03TD3787E:212a-4: song rjes 'gro bas glang chen phrug gu lta bu ste //
T03TD3787E:212a-5: gang zhig rang gi stobs kyis bgrod dka' 'jigs byed pa //
T03TD3787E:212a-6: glang chen de nyid la ni sde rnams sten par byad //
T03TD3787E:212a-7: tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsum ni /
T03TD3787E:212a-10: yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa gsum mo //
T03TD3787E:212a-11: go rims ji lta ba bzhin gzhug par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:212a-12: rab tu rtogs par 'dod pa dang /
T03TD3787E:212a-13: khyad par du 'gro bar 'dod pa nyid kyi dbang du byas par rig par bya'o //
T03TD3787E:212a-14: kye ma gzhung lugs sna tshogs kyis //
T03TD3787E:212a-15: dub pa dag gi ngal bso'i gnas //
T03TD3787E:212a-16: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i lugs //
T03TD3787E:212a-17: ring mo zhig nas mthong ba yin //
T03TD3787E:212a-18: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i tshul gyi mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi man ngag gi bstan bcos kyi 'grel pa legs par spyad pa'i las can /
T03TD3787E:212a-19: theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa /
T03TD3787E:212a-20: 'phags pa mang pos bkur ba ku ru ku lle'i sde pa gtsug lag khang rgya chen po du ma'i bdag po /
T03TD3787E:212a-21: slob dpon sangs rgyas 'bangs kyi tsha bo /
T03TD3787E:212a-22: sh'akya'i dge slong 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sdes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T03TD3787E:212a-24: // / gang du dngos por dmigs pas dkrugs pa mang pos bkur ba bzhin du 'khrul gyur pas ;
T03TD3787E:212a-25: / shes rab pha rol phyin tshul gang zhig theg chan lam la gzhan gyis ma rtogs pa //
T03TD3787E:212a-26: des na 'phags pa gsal ba'i blo mnga' de yis rgyal la mngon sum nyid zhus nas //
T03TD3787E:212a-27: grangs don go rims ming dang dbye ba 'bras bu'i sgo nas 'di bshad ngo mtshar che ;
T03TD3787E:212a-28: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shar phyogs kyi dge bsnyen chen po dpal go mi 'chi med dang /
T03TD3787E:212a-29: lo ts'a ba chen po sh'akya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te lags par gtan la phab pa'o /
